[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/phal chen ga ba bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D44-39}]@#/_/shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba/_bam po dang po/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de'i nang nas 
[\[1b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni ci tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[1b.3\]]ldan 'das rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam dang 'byung ba rnam par dag pa ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung ni ji tsam 
[\[1b.4\]]zhig tu bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi skye ba ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs 
[\[1b.5\]]pa'i sku ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ni ci tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis mi khyab/_
[\[2a.2\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chags pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga' ba'i rnam par spyod pa ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa ni ji tsam zhig tu bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab snyam pa dang /_
[\[2a.3\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems thugs kyis thugs su chud nas/_byang chub sems dpa' ut+pa la'i snying po/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi ye 
[\[2a.4\]]shes kyis byin dang ldan par mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis snang bar mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis yongs su rgyas par mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas kyi [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa la rab tu gzhog go_/sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[2a.5\]]chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa khong du chud par mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba nyid dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rab tu rtogs par mdzad do/_/chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rgyud 'byam klas pa la rab tu gzhog go_/sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[2a.6\]]gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rigs rab tu rtogs par mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas kyi tshul gyi gnas brjod du med pa la rab tu gzhag pa mdzad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' ut+pa la'i snying pos chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa rig 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]cing khong du chud pas chags pa med pa'i dbyings su sgrub pa'i yid dang /_chos thams cad la bsgribs pa med par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang ldan pa'i yang dag par 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 
[\[2b.2\]]rjes su song ba'i sangs rgyas blta ba dang /_snying rje chen pos lta ba'i sems can thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i go cha chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i yi dam dang /_spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyun chad pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa skad 
[\[2b.3\]]cig gi cha shas la rnam par spyod pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo mthong ba mi zad pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa'i rnam pa gzungs thams cad kyis snang bar byas pa dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' pad mo'i snying po la 
[\[2b.4\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/_tshad med pa la rnam par spyod pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rnam par 'phrul pa chen po la rnam par spyod pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[2b.5\]]sras/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad la/_sku'i mtshan thams cad rab tu brnyes pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba ni ting nge 'dzin dang /_dgongs pas sbyar 
[\[2b.6\]]ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni brjod du med pa yang brjod du med pa shin tu bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bsam gyis mi khyab par rnam par spyod pa'o/_/sangs 
[\[2b.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi gsung dang dbyangs ni tshad med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings thugs su chud pa ni brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba ni thams cad 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]mngon par mkhyen pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings thugs su chud cing /_bstan pa ni bsgribs pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras/_bcu 
[\[3a.2\]]po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams te/_bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gzugs kyi sku rnam par dag pa ni rnyog pa med par 
[\[3a.3\]]rgyud thams cad du byung bas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chags pa med pa'i spyan ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi spyan mngon par sangs rgyas pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/_/sangs 
[\[3a.4\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chags pa med pa'i snyan ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgra bsgribs pa med par thugs su chud pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shangs kyi skye mched ni sangs rgyas kyi mnga' thams 
[\[3a.5\]]cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ljags shin tu yangs pa ni chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gsung gi dbyangs rjes su 'gro bas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[3a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku'i chos nyid ni sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i sems kyi rnam pa la de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi 'phrin 
[\[3a.7\]]las ni chos kyi sku dang tha mi dad cing dus gsum chags pa med par thugs su chud cing rnam par dag pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa mi mnga' ba 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]la rnam par spyod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang dang rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_cho 'phrul mi zad pa yang dag par ston pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par dag pa ni brjod du 
[\[3b.2\]]med pa'i rgyan byin gyis brlabs pas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yang dag par bstan te/_bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par mdzad pas mtha' dang dbus med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 
[\[3b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang /_smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni rnam par rol ba'i ye shes kyis chos yongs su rdzogs te/_chos thams cad rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba la mtha' dang dbus med pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras/_
[\[3b.4\]]bcu po de dag ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 
[\[3b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi skad cig la ye shes kyi mngon par sgrub pa yang dag par bstan pa'o/_/bcu gang zhe na/_skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'pho ba yongs su bstan pa dang /_skad cig gcig la 'jig rten 
[\[3b.6\]]gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i tshe yongs su bstan pa dang /_skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'byung ba yongs su bstan pa dang /_skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub kyi shing 
[\[3b.7\]]drung du bzhugs shing mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yongs su bstan pa dang /_skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yongs su bstan pa dang /_skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dul ba'i sems 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]can yongs su smin pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du/_dus bab pa shes pas sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba yongs su bstan pa dang /_skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can ji ltar 'dul ba'i tshul 
[\[4a.2\]]bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa brjod du med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku sna tshogs rnam par dmigs pa yongs su bstan pa dang /_skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du/_rgyan sna tshogs dang rgyan brjod du med pas/_de bzhin 
[\[4a.3\]]gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzod yongs su bstan pa dang /_skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par dag pa gcig ma yin pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa dang /_skad cig 
[\[4a.4\]]gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad du dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus rnam pa tha dad pa byung ba dang /_mos pa dang /_spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa byung ba la dus 
[\[4a.5\]]gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyud du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yongs su bstan pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi skad cig la ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yang dag bstan pa'o/_/kye rgyal 
[\[4a.6\]]ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi dus las mi 'da' ba ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mngon par 'tshang rgya ba ni/_de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/_
[\[4a.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba rnam par smin pa dang /_rnam par ma smin pa mnyam pa nyid ni de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yongs su smin pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]dpa' rnams lung bstan pa ni de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud du cho 'phrul yongs su bstan pa ni de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 
[\[4b.2\]]sems can mos pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i tshul bzhin du sku yongs su bstan pa ni de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams btang snyoms su bzhugs pa ni de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/_sangs 
[\[4b.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yul dang /_grong dang /_grong rdal du gshegs pa de ni de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dad pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa'i tshul bzhin du sems can yongs su 'dzin pa ni/_de'i 
[\[4b.4\]]dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa dang ldan zhing gdul dka' ba la gzhan la ltos pa mi mnga' bar 'dul ba ni de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/_sangs rgyas 
[\[4b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas/_rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa ni de'i dus las mi 'da' bas dus la bab pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 
[\[4b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi dus las mi 'da' ba'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul dpe med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par 
[\[4b.7\]]skyil mo krung gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba dang /_dus gcig tu sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su bstan pa dang /_'od gzer gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad snang bar bya ba dang /_sku gzugs gcig gis lus dang /_
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]gzugs thams cad yongs su bstan pa dang /_gnas gcig na bzhugs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par byon pa'i skur 'gyur ba dang /_ye shes gcig rtogs pas chos thams cad la bsgribs pa 
[\[5a.2\]]med par 'gyur ba dang /_thugs gcig bskyed pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus par rgyas par 'gengs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i gshegs stabs gcig gis de kho na nyid yang dag par bstan pa dang /_
[\[5a.3\]]dus gsum thams cad sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang gis rgyas par 'gengs pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad dang ma 'dres par bzhugs shing 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[5a.4\]]pa'i tshul gyis rgyud kyi tshul gcig pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul dpe med cing bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 
[\[5a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'jug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos thams cad la 'jug pas/_smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes dang /_lus med pa la lus mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes dang /_
[\[5a.6\]]chos thams cad mi gnyis pa la mngon par 'tshang rgya ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes dang /_sems can gyi mthar thug par bdag med pa la sems can 'dul bar mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes dang /_chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la mtshan ma sna tshogs mngon par 
[\[5a.7\]]bsgrub pa'i ye shes dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kyi yul ma skyes pa la 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang /_'jig pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes dang /_yul thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la/_las kyi rnam par smin pa mngon par bsgrub 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]pa'i ye shes dang /_chos thams cad brjod du med pa la/_chos kyi dbyings su gsung mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes dang /_chos thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang bas 'jug pa med pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par 
[\[5b.2\]]byang ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes dang /_chos thams cad ma skyes pa la skye ba dang /_'jig pa'i mtshan nyid rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[5b.3\]]mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshad med pa'i khongs su chud pa dag ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku ni dus gsum thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang 
[\[5b.4\]]ba'i khongs su chud pa yin/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can thams cad 'dul ba mdzad pa ni/_cho 'phrul chen po gsum gyi khongs su chud pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad la mkhas pa ni 
[\[5b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gzungs thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i khongs su chud pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[5b.6\]]'das rnams sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba ni thugs rje chen po'i khongs su chud pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa ni dus thams cad du sems can thams cad la rnam par gzigs pa'i khongs su 
[\[5b.7\]]chud pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ni sems can rnam par 'dul ba thams cad khongs su chud pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chags pa mi mnga' bar spyod pa ni chos kyi dbyings thams cad khongs su chud pa 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]yin/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi skad cig gcig tu ni 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad khongs su chud pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nyi ma gcig tu ni 
[\[6a.2\]]dus gsum gyi bskal pa'i grangs khong du chud par bstan pa thams cad khongs su chud pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshad med pa'i khongs su chud pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs 
[\[6a.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba rnams te/_bcu gang zhe na/_bdud kyi dkrugs ma rab tu 'jom zhing rnam par 'thor ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/_/
[\[6a.4\]]mu stegs can gzhan dang phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcad pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/_/'dul ba'i sems can thams cad rab tu tshim par mdzad pa ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu 
[\[6a.5\]]rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/_/sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad tu gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/_/chos kyi dbyings thugs su chud pa'i 
[\[6a.6\]]ye shes ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par skus khyab cing sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par phye ba sna tshogs thams cad du mi gnyis pa ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[6a.7\]]'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/_/gsung gi yan lag thams cad la sems can mos par bya ba dang /_thos par bya ba dang /_gdul bar bya ba don yod par so so yang dag par rig pa thogs pa med pas bstan pa'i tshul du so so 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'byung ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i bu ga gcig nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin 
[\[6b.2\]]tu phra ba snyed bsam gyis mi khyab cing /_thogs pa med pa'i tshul du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi thabs kyis/_'byung zhing de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas 'byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin 
[\[6b.3\]]tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yongs su ston cing /_sangs 
[\[6b.4\]]rgyas kyi rgyan dang rang bzhin gyi lhab lhub dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba rgyun mi 'chad cing sems can rnam par 'dul ba thogs pa med pa la 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu gtogs pa rnams la'ang mi bde ba dang /_gnod pa med kyang rdul shin tu phra ba de'ang yangs 
[\[6b.5\]]par ma byas/_'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang chung bar ma byas par ji ltar gnas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyang thugs su chud pa'i ye shes mnga' ba ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/_/mun pa med pa'i 
[\[6b.6\]]khams de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par sangs rgyas te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mun pa med cing bsgribs pa mi mnga' la sems can pha rol gyi bsgribs pa sna tshogs kyi gnas rnam par sel na/_de la de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[6b.7\]]bcu dang ldan pa ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rgya che ba'i chos bzod par dka' ba'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu bo 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]'di dag ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu dag pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag par bsgrubs pa bdag nyid che ba 
[\[7a.2\]]ni sngon gyi mtha' nas rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing rnam par dag pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud du rigs dang ldan par 'byung ba'i bdag nyid che ba ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 
[\[7a.3\]]rnam par dag pas/_rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug 
[\[7a.4\]]par gnas pas/_rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing /_shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dus gsum la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing chos thams cad la rten pa yang dag par bcom pas sangs 
[\[7a.5\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni/_rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dngos po rnam pa tha dad pa la rnam par gzhag pa gcig gis len pa med pas sangs 
[\[7a.6\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mthar chos kyi dbyings la gnas pas/_mnyam pa'i bsod 
[\[7a.7\]]nams mi zad pa dang ldan pas mi zad pa'i bsod nams mnga' ba ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku gzugs 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]dang kha dog mtha' yas pa/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sems can 'dul ba'i dus dang dbang gis chags pa med par bzhugs pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing 
[\[7b.2\]]shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi brnyes pas bag tsha ba mi mnga' bar bzhugs shing /_khyu mchog dang seng ge'i nga ro 'byin te rgol ba'i nang na stag lta bu'i mthu dang ldan la chos thams cad bstan pa 
[\[7b.3\]]la thugs sgron ma lta bu mnga' bas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa 
[\[7b.4\]]brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa zhig lon yang mtshan gyi tshig thos pa tsam gyis bzhugs pa dang 'dra bar sems can rnams kyi yon shin tu sbyong zhing mya ngan las 'das nas/_de srid kyi yun ring po 'das kyang sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i yon tan zad par 
[\[7b.5\]]mi 'gyur bas/_sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag na 
[\[7b.6\]]bzhugs shing 'jig rten gyi khams rgyang ring po na bzhugs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sems can rnams kyis rjes su dran par byas nas sku mngon par ston pa mdzad pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad du kha 
[\[7b.7\]]na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag nyid che ba ni rnam pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po 'di dag ni 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/_sangs rgyas kyi tshangs pa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa la sngon gyi smon lam gyis shin tu rnam par dag 
[\[8a.2\]]pa yin/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chags pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyis shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa sel bas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/_sangs rgyas 
[\[8a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gis shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor gyis shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs rnam par dag pas shin tu rnam par 
[\[8a.4\]]dag pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang /_dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi sku rnyog pa med pas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/_
[\[8a.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phung po bsgribs pa med pas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa thams cad la mthu chen po brnyes shing /_pha rol tu 
[\[8a.6\]]phyin pa dam pa brnyes pas shin tu rnam par dag pa yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mdzad pa 'jig 
[\[8a.7\]]rten gyi khams thams cad du 'byung zhing dus thams cad du gnas pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa thob pa'i sems can rnams la dus thams cad du sangs rgyas bstan pa dang /_sems can sems cang shes dang ldan pa rnams la/_
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]dus thams cad du chos bstan pa dang /_sems can sangs rgyas la dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dus thams cad du bskyed pa dang /_chos skyon med par 'das pa'i sems can rnams dus thams cad du ye shes khong du chud par bya ba dang /_
[\[8b.2\]]'gro ba thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dus thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dus thams cad du/_chags pa mi mnga' bar gshegs pa dang /_sems can thams cad la 
[\[8b.3\]]thugs rje chen po dus thams cad du mi gtong ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa dus thams cad du thogs pa med pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dus 
[\[8b.4\]]thams cad du thogs pa med pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi dbyings gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dus thams cad du 'byung ba ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'jig rten gyi 
[\[8b.5\]]khams thams cad du 'byung zhing dus thams cad du gnas pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'i tshul rnams te/_bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[8b.6\]]rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi phrin las tshad med pa brnyes pas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi 
[\[8b.7\]]yul mnga' bas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnga' bas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi char mngon par 'bebs 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]pas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang legs pa mang po mnga' bas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' 
[\[9a.2\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i smon lam dang khyad par mnga' bas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mur 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgyun mi 'chad par sgrub pas ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/_/
[\[9a.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi rigs thams cad ma lus pa'i sems dang spyod pa la ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams zil gyis mi non pas ye shes rgya mtsho 
[\[9a.4\]]mi zad pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes rgya mtsho mi zad pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs 
[\[9a.5\]]rgyas kyi tshul rnams te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis mngon par byung ba 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/_/'di lta ste chos thams cad la mi mkhyen pa gang yang mi mnga' ba 'di ni 
[\[9a.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/_/'di lta ste/_thams cad kyang thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/_/'di lta ste thams cad kyang stobs bcu tshad med pa dang ldan pa 'di ni 
[\[9a.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/_/'di lta ste thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/_/'di lta ste thams cad kyang sems can 'dul ba la yang dag 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]par zhugs pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/_/'di lta ste thams cad kyang 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du mngon par sangs rgyas pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/_/'di lta ste 'dul ba'i sems 
[\[9b.2\]]can rnams 'dul ba la thogs pa mi mnga' ba 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin no/_/'di lta ste mi gnyis par yang dag par spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos la rab tu gzhol ba 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin 
[\[9b.3\]]no/_'di lta ste ji ltar yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang /_dul bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi yul mu med pas sangs rgyas kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ston pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul yin te/_kye 
[\[9b.4\]]rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi tshul lo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas pa shin tu bstan pa'i sgo rnams te/_bcu gang zhe na_/
[\[9b.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi khams shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi spyod pa sna tshogs shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[9b.6\]]ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi las dang rnam par smin pa shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad la gdams ngag dang man ngag shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas 
[\[9b.7\]]pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can mtha' yas pa rnam par sbyong ba'i nan tan gyi sgor mtha' yas pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la gdams ngag dang man ngag gis 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]yongs su gzhog pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' khyad par gyi smon lam rnam pa tha dad pas 'byung ba shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[10a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus pa'i 'du ba dang 'jig pa shin tu bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa dang mos 
[\[10a.3\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su bstan pa'i sgor mtha' yas pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa 
[\[10a.4\]]ni bskal pa yangs pa de dang de dag tu bstan cing brjod pa dang /_yongs su bshad pas/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i sgor mtha' yas pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[10a.5\]]kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas pa shin tu bstan pa'i sgo'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sems can rnams la sgrub pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[10a.6\]]'das rnams kyi sku yongs su bstan pa ni sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sgrub bo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung yang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sgrub bo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[10a.7\]]rnams len pa mdzad pa yang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sgrub bo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams len pa mi mdzad pa yang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sgrub bo/_/sa dang chu dang [{]mye [,]me [}]dang /_rlung gis 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sgrub bo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byin gyi rlabs kyi yul dang mi dmigs pa thams cad yul du mdzad pas kyang sems can rnams la 
[\[10b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sgrub bo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sgrub bo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni zhing la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par mdzad pas kyang sems can 
[\[10b.3\]]rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sgrub bo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sgrub bo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi gsung bar bzhugs pa yang sems can rnams la sangs 
[\[10b.4\]]rgyas kyi phrin las sgrub ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las sems can rnams la sgrub pa'o//_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po gnyis 
[\[10b.5\]]pa/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos te/_/bcu gang zhe na/_smon lam chen po la rab tu brten zhing smon lam zhig pa mi mnga' bas ji skad du gsung ba 
[\[10b.6\]]de ltar mdzad cing gnyis su mi gsung ba 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos dang po'o/_/phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pas rab tu brtson 
[\[10b.7\]]zhing sgyid lug pa mi mnga' ba 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos gnyis pa'o/_/sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba gcig gcig gzigs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par gshegs shing 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]thams cad du gshegs pa la thag thogs med pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos gsum pa'o/_/zhe sdang ba'i sems can rnams la thugs rje chen pos snyoms pa dang /_dad pa'i sems can rnams la 
[\[11a.2\]]thugs rje chen pos snyoms pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos bzhi pa'o/_/gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas 
[\[11a.3\]]kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mi 'gyur ro/_/snyam du byang chub kyi sems ma nyams pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos lnga pa'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub 
[\[11a.4\]]cing /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas 'jug gi_/'jig rten pa'i rgyud la ma yin pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos drug pa'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su sngon sangs rgyas kyis spyad pa'i sems su lus kyi 
[\[11a.5\]]las dang /_ngag gi las dang /_yid kyi las kyis slob cing nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba med pas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs 
[\[11a.6\]]rgyas pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos bdun pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sems rnam par dag cing 'od gsal ba dang /_thams cad du snang zhing kun tu 'od 'byung ba/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang zhing thams 
[\[11a.7\]]cad du snyoms pas/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos brgyad pa'o/_/'jig rten pa'i bde ba thams cad yongs su spangs te/_'jig rten pa'i dga' ba thams cad la ma 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]chags pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyis gos pa med pa'i smon lam thams cad du mnyam pa nyid kyis/_'jig rten thams cad bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byas te/_sdug bsngal dang spros pa thams cad rab tu 'joms pa 'di ni 
[\[11b.2\]]sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos dgu pa'o/_/sdug bsngal gyi [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba thams cad nyams su bab ste/_'gro ba thams cad kyi don du dka' thub kyis shin tu gdungs kyang bla bar sems bskyed pas/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs yongs su 
[\[11b.3\]]bsrung ba dang ldan pa dang /_stobs bcu'i sa'i bar du sangs rgyas kyi yul la mos pas mthar thug pa 'di ni sems can gyi gtso bo'i chos bcu pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can gyi 
[\[11b.4\]]gtso bo'i chos so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa chags pa med pa rnams te/_bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus 
[\[11b.5\]]pa thams cad du gshegs pas chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad na bzhugs pas chags pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[11b.6\]]'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa dang bzhengs pa dang /_bzhud pa chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du chos ston 
[\[11b.7\]]pa chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs kyang chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_da ltar byung ba'i mtha' la chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[12a.2\]]ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad tsam gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs kyang chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la gzigs shing /_
[\[12a.3\]]thugs kyi skad cig gcig la cho 'phrul chen po gsum gyis sems can rnam par 'dul yang chags pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku gcig gis kyang tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs 
[\[12a.4\]]rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa chen por rnam par spyod kyang chags pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can gyi khams 'byam klas pa ma lus pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ma lus pa thams 
[\[12a.5\]]cad kyi mthar thug pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab par ston cing gsung yang chags pa mi mnga' bar rnam par spyod pa yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa chags pa med pa'o/_/
[\[12a.6\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa rnams te/_bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa 
[\[12a.7\]]ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung yan lag gi mchog dam pa drug cu dang ldan zhing /_yan lag lnga brgyas yongs su bzung ba dang /_
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]rgyan brgya stong du mas rab tu brgyan pa dang /_dbyangs kyi yan lag mtha' yas mu med pas rnam par dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi don dang tshig dang yi ge brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas rab tu tshim par mdzad pa dang /_bag 
[\[12b.2\]]tsha ba mi mnga' bar seng ge'i nga ro chen po sgrog pa dang /_'jigs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa chen pos bsnyengs pa mi mnga' par gyur pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du sems can thams cad la grag cing gsal te/_khong du chud par 'gyur ba 
[\[12b.3\]]dang /_sems can bsam pa tha dad pa dang /_dbang po tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul bar nye bar gnas pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung gi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 
[\[12b.4\]]thugs kyi phrin las ni stobs bcus brgyan pa sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin chen po thams cad kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan cing bsgrubs pas chags pa med pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa chos kyi 
[\[12b.5\]]dbyings kyi gzhi la rab tu rten pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos gting med pa rab tu brnyes pa/_chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur pa/_dus gsum gyi chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can kun gyi 
[\[12b.6\]]sems dang spyod pa thams cad skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rab tu mkhyen pa ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'od zer 
[\[12b.7\]]bye ba brjod du med pa rab tu 'gyed par mdzad de/_'od zer de dag re re la yang 'od zer gyi 'khor gyi dra ba brjod du med pa dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad ma lus par snang bar byed cing 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]cad mun pa med par ston pa/_sangs rgyas skye ba dang mi 'bral bas/_sangs rgyas kyi phrin las las phyir mi ldog cing don yod pa/_sangs rgyas skye ba brjod du med pas gnas pa med pa rang bzhin rnam par dag cing 
[\[13a.2\]]kun tu snyoms par 'byung ba ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od zer gyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhad mo 'dzum par ston na/_zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs 
[\[13a.3\]]kha dog du ma dang ldan pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad snang bar byed pa sems can gyi khams tshad med grangs med bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa rnam par ston pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[13a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur bar lung ston pa/_'gro ba thams cad du shin tu gsal bar 'byung ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bzhad mo 'dzum pa bstan pa'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/_/sangs 
[\[13a.5\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku ni tshad med pa ste/_bsgribs pa med pas rnam par dag pa chos thams cad chags pa med pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa/_'jig rten thams cad 
[\[13a.6\]]dang ma 'dres pa'i 'jig rten thams cad dang 'dzi ba med pa/_'jig rten thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la yang dag par zhugs pa/_'jig rten thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa/_'jig rten thams cad las 'das pa'i chos kyis yang dag par 
[\[13a.7\]]spyod pa/_tshig gi lam dang bral ba/_brjod du med pa'i mthar phyin pa/_phung po dang khams dang /_skye mched dang bral ba ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'od tshad med pa mnga' ba ste/_'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'od ma 'dres shing /_rgyan du ma dang ldan pa kha dog sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/_'od kyi snang ba kun tu thogs 
[\[13b.2\]]pa med cing /_thams cad du chags pa med pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgribs pa med pa tshad med pa'i mdzod du gyur pa/_'od thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/_/
[\[13b.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni kha dog mtha' yas pa mnga' ba ste/_kha dog yid du 'ong ba mnga' ba'o/_/kha dog 'od gsal ba mnga' ba'o/_/kha dog tshad med pa mnga' ba'o/_/sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi 
[\[13b.4\]]bsam pa dang /_mos pa bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa'i kha dog mnga' ba'o/_/de ma yin pa'i kha dog gzhan khams gsum du gtogs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i kha dog mnga' ba'o/_/kha dog thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[13b.5\]]brnyes pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni kha dog bla na med pa mnga' ba ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi kha dog gi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge bas shin tu rnam par 
[\[13b.6\]]dag pa ste/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs dge ba rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa la shin tu byung ba'o/_/chos nyid kyi rnam pa thams cad du khyad par yod pa dang khyad par med pa'i spyod pas 
[\[13b.7\]]rnam par dag pa'i rgyan gyi ye shes skye ba thams cad kyi nang du gtogs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bsgribs pa med pa'i rgyud rnam par dag pas/_'jig rten gyi mi snyan pa thams cad kyis mi snyan par brjod du med pa ste/_'di ni sangs 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang /_rgyud rnam par dag pa'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byams pa chen po'i mthu dang rang bzhin gyi rgyan mnga' ba ste/_
[\[14a.2\]]shin tu dang ba yongs su rtog pa'i rnyog pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga' ba sku'i phrin las yongs su gsal ba blta bas mi skyo ba/_dgongs pa shin tu rnam par gsal ba/_thugs rje chen po mnga' ba/_'gro ba thams cad skyob pa yon gyi gnas kyi dam pa bla na med pa 
[\[14a.3\]]yongs su 'dzin pa'i nang na thugs brtse ba can phan par mdzad pa sems can thams cad kyi don tu ye shes chen po byin gyis brlab ste/_bsod nams chen pos yongs su 'phags pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa sems can 
[\[14a.4\]]rnams kyi yon tan dang /_ye shes kyi phung po thams cad rnam par 'phel bar mdzad pa ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byams pa chen po dang /_thugs rje chen po'i mthar thug pa'i bsod nams kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med 
[\[14a.5\]]pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' 
[\[14a.6\]]bsgyur ba'i chos rnams te/_bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad la mnga' ba dang /_chos thams cad la snang bar mdzad pa'i mnga' bsgyur bas/_tshig dang yi ge mtha' yas pa la thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i 
[\[14a.7\]]spobs pa mnga' ba dang /_chos thams cad ma lus par yongs su brjod pas mnga' che ba ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos dang po'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]rnams ni sems can ji ltar yongs su smin pa dang /_smon lam ji ltar btab pa'i tshul bzhin du/_'dul ba la thogs pa mi mnga' bas mnga' che ba ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos gnyis pa'o/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[14b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad sems can gcig la yang gnod pa med par rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rgyan rnam par bkod pa grangs med tshad med pa dang ldan pa nam mkha'i dbyings 
[\[14b.3\]]kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad gcig nas gcig tu 'phang ba dang /_gcig nas gcig tu gzhug pa dang /_gcig nas gcig tu bsdu ba dang /_gcig nas gcig tu bsre bas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag gzhan dang gzhan gyi phyogs 
[\[14b.4\]]su rab tu bzhag kyang sems can gyi khams rnams 'khor zhing rmongs par mi 'gyur la/_the tsom du mi 'gyur bar mdzad pas mnga' che ba ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos gsum pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[14b.5\]]'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad byin gyis rlob pa'i ye shes kyis 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyan phan tshun du byin gyis brlab pa dang /_dgongs pa'i skad cig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyan yang dag par 
[\[14b.6\]]bstan pa dang /_bskal pa grangs med par brjod kyang yi ge shin tu bstan pa zad mi shes pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang /_mi mthun pa med cing nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_
[\[14b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu yongs su 'du bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa thams cad byin gyis brlab pa la mnga' che ba ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos bzhi pa'o/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gzigs na sems can gcig gi don du bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par skyil mo krung gcig gis bzhugs na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[15a.2\]]bde ba mi mnga' zhing thugs la mi bde ba mi mnga' ste/_gang zag de yang mi bsnyel bas 'dul ba'i dus las mi 'da' ba dang /_gang zag gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du rim pa rim pas/_'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du phyi ma'i mtha'i 
[\[15a.3\]]mur thug pa'i sku tshe la mnga' bar byin gyis brlabs te bzhugs kyang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la skyo ba mi mnga' ste/_de ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad mthar gyis rim pas sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i gang zag gi 
[\[15a.4\]]don du yongs su skyo bar mdzad pa la mnga' che ba ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos lnga pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du 
[\[15a.5\]]yang dag par gzhol ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bzhud pa la thag thogs mi mnga' ba dang /_phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho 'byam klas pa 
[\[15a.6\]]dang /_phyogs kyi dra ba'i rgyud thams cad du dgongs pa'i skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i bzhud par byin gyis rlob cing /_chos kyi dbyings shin tu bstan pa khong du chud par bya bas chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med pa rab tu bskor ba la mnga' 
[\[15a.7\]]che ba ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos drug pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi don du dgongs pa'i skad cig re re la/_
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mnga' che ba ste/_de la chos thams cad mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa gang yang med la/_gang mngon par sangs rgyas pa gang yang med la/_gang gis mngon par sangs 
[\[15b.2\]]rgyas pa'ang med de/_/mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba med kyang slob pa'i sa la gnas shing /_mngon par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi brjod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang bsgribs pa med par rtogs par thugs su chud pas 
[\[15b.3\]]sems can thams cad gdul ba'i don du ye shes tshad med pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i yul yongs su rgyun mi gcod pa 'di ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' 
[\[15b.4\]]bsgyur ba'i chos bdun pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni spyan gyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi phrin las gang bsgrub pa de snyan gyi skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do/_/snyan gyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi phrin las 
[\[15b.5\]]gang bsgrub pa de shangs kyi skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do/_/shangs kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi phrin las gang bsgrub pa de ljags kyi skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do/_/ljags kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas 
[\[15b.6\]]kyi phrin las gang bsgrub pa de ni sku'i skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do/_/sku'i skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi phrin las gang bsgrub pa de thugs kyi skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do/_/thugs kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[15b.7\]]phrin las gang bsgrub pa de 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi dmigs pa 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa sna tshogs rnam par phye ba thams cad du grub par mdzad do/_/de bzhin du dmigs pa thams cad re re yang snrel 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]zhir bsgrub pas sangs rgyas kyi phrin las bsgrub pa la mnga' che ba ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos brgyad pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi sku'i 
[\[16a.2\]]ba spu'i bu ga gcig gi nang du sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad gzud pa mdzad cing khongs su chud par mdzad pa dang /_sems can re re zhing yang lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa tsam du yangs par mdzad kyang sems can de dag la gnod pa dang 
[\[16a.3\]]mi bde bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_de dag tu yang sems can re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu brgyud pas bskal pa grangs med pa zad par gnas par bya ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par gom pa gcig gis phyin pas/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[16a.4\]]khams de dag tu sangs rgyas byung ba rnams kyi spyan sngar 'gro bar bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas de dag byung ba'i tshe yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud dang /_gling de dag na sems can gyi gtso bo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi 
[\[16a.5\]]'khor lo bskor bar bya ba dang /_ba spu'i bu ga de nas sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa 'byung bar bya ba dang /_sems can gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa 'byung bar 
[\[16a.6\]]bya ba dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bskor bar bya ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings bstan pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa shin tu bstan par bya ba dang /_'das pa gcig nas 
[\[16a.7\]]gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa dang /_da ltar byung ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod du med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings mtha' dang dbus med par 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]bstan pa kun tu mtshams med par sems can thams cad 'ong zhing 'gro ba dang /_skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du 'dod pa'i longs spyod rgya chen po bgegs med pa thams cad 'byung bar bya ba la mnga' che ba ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[16b.2\]]rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos dgu pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du pad+mo'i rgyan chen pos brgyan bI seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can la de bzhin 
[\[16b.3\]]gshegs pa gcig gi chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa thams cad du khyab pa'i skus byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su bstan par mdzad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gcig 
[\[16b.4\]]gis ji lta bar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi gtso bo thams cad kyang de bzhin du dgongs pa skad cig ma re re'i byin gyi rlabs kyis brlabs pa dang /_dgongs pa skad cig la ji lta ba de bzhin du dgongs pa 
[\[16b.5\]]skad cig ma thams cad la yang /_pad mo'i rgyud kyis yongs su dag par mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang /_de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa rnam par dag pa/_rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan 
[\[16b.6\]]pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dmigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i zhing rnam par dag pa 'byam klas pa/_brjod du med pa mtshan nyid tha dad pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyud tshad med cing 'byam klas pa/_dus kyi rgyud grangs med pa dang ldan pa bstan 
[\[16b.7\]]pa ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa/_blo tshad med pa dang mos pa shin tu yangs pa dang ldan pa/_mtshan nyid sna tshogs kyi gnas med pa/_mtshan nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/_tshad med pa thams cad dgongs pa skad cig ma las dgongs pa 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]skad cig ma gcig gis thams cad yongs su bstan kyang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ched du bsgrub pa mi mdzad pa la mnga' che ba ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen 
[\[17a.2\]]pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos bcu pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pos mnga' bsgyur ba'i chos so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[17a.3\]]chos yongs su rdzogs pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams te/_bcu gang zhe na/_mtshan re re zhing bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan yongs su dag par 'gyur ba 'di ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang po ste/_des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[17a.4\]]'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[17a.5\]]'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas phun sum tshogs pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogs pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/sems 
[\[17a.6\]]can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi mnga' 'gro ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/_yongs su rdzogs pas sangs 
[\[17a.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/zhing yongs su dag par bya ba yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang gzugs kyi sku blta na don yod pa yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/
[\[17b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ste/_sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' 'o/_/
[\[17b.3\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thabs mkhas 
[\[17b.4\]]pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa med cing spros pa thams cad med par yang thugs su chud la/_dge ba'i sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyang shin tu ston cing brjod de/_
[\[17b.5\]]'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa dang po'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad la gzigs pa med cing phan tshun du mkhyen pa med do/_/ma bcings ma grol ba dang gzung ba med 
[\[17b.6\]]cing bstsags pa med de/_yongs su rdzogs pa med par yang thugs su chud la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mnga' dam pa'ang brnyes te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos thams cad la mnga' bsgyur ba de yang /_yang dag pa 
[\[17b.7\]]de kho na nyid ma nor ba rnam pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang /_chos thams cad bdag gi med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med la de kho na nyid kyi mtha' las rnam par mi 'da' yang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mnga' chen pos chos kyi dbyings thams 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]cad snang ba la yang /_rab tu mkhyen pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi/_sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa gnyis pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mtshan ma'i mtha' thams cad mi mnga' ste/_
[\[18a.2\]]mtshan ma thams cad dang mi 'grogs shing /_mtshan ma'i mngon par shes pa thams cad dang ma 'dres la de'i rang bzhin du ngo bo nyid med pa dang /_ji ltar ngo bo nyid med pa'i sgra'i tshul thams cad thugs su chud kyang gzugs kyi mtshan ma'i sku 
[\[18a.3\]]gzugs rnam par dag pa grangs med pa dang /_zhing gi mtshan ma dang rnam par spyod pa'i mtshan ma zad mi shes pa rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par bstan cing bshad pa'i ye shes kyi phung po mun pa med pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgron ma chen por gyur pas/_mun 
[\[18a.4\]]pa med pa'i snang ba ston pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa gsum pa'o/_/chags pa med pa'i mtha' ni sngon gyi mtha' yang ma yin/_phyi ma'i mtha' yang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/_chos 
[\[18a.5\]]kyi dbyings su gnas pa ni 'das pa'am/_ma 'ongs pa'am/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin pas de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis 'byung ba med kyang /_sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams kyi rigs tshad med pa'i phyir shin tu bstan pa brjod du med pas 
[\[18a.6\]]'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba yang rab tu brjod cing kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis de bzhin du gzigs pa 'di ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas 
[\[18a.7\]]pa bzhi pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku'i phrin las dang gsung gi phrin las dang /_thugs kyi phrin las kyis mngon par 'du mdzad pa yang mi mnga' la/_yongs su blang ba mi mnga' bas bzhugs shing /_rnam par phye ba med 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]pa'i mthar thug pa ste/_dor ba med pa'i chos kyi gnas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/_bgrang ba'i tshul las rnam par 'das kyang tshul des ba med pa'i mdzod du gyur cing /_bgrang ba dang mngon par bsgrub pa mtha' yas pa dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_
[\[18b.2\]]'jig rten las 'das pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i grangs kyi tshul thugs su chud pa ye shes bsgribs pa med pas gzigs pa rnams te/_chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can gdul ba rnam par dmigs pa la/_rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs 
[\[18b.3\]]tshad med mu med par mngon par sgrub par mdzad pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa lnga pa'o/_/chos thams cad lta ba med pas tha mi dad pa dang bye brag med pa dang /_'byung ba med pa dang mtshan nyid med pa dang /_sna tshogs 
[\[18b.4\]]med pa dang /_blang ba med pa dang /_dor ba med pa dang /_rang bzhin med par rab tu mkhyen kyang /_chos kyi rgyud shin tu nges pa yang dag par sgrub cing /_'jig rten gyi tshul dang 'gal ba med pa dang /_rang bzhin med pa yang yang dag par gzigs 
[\[18b.5\]]pas thams cad mkhyen pa/_thams cad gzigs pa mkhyen par bya ba thams cad ma lus par gzigs pas chos la mnga' bsgyur ba thams cad kyang rab tu ston la/_de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin las kyang mi nyams pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[18b.6\]]ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa drug pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs su chud pa'i rnam pa gcig gis gzhan dang gzhan mkhyen par bya ba chos de'i skyon med pa las rnam par ma 'das pa gnas med pa dge 
[\[18b.7\]]ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid kyi chos skyon med pas/_dus thams cad du gnas pa rab tu mkhyen te/_de la yang nyi ma gcig gam/_zla ba phyed dam/_lo gcig gam/_lo brgya 'am/_bskal pa 'jig pa dang /_'du 
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]bas rjes su bsnyag pa dang /_phyir phyogs pa mi mnga' bar dus tshad med pa dang /_nyi ma gcig dang /_yud tsam gcig gi dus dang snga dro nas nyi ma phyed kyi dus dang /_phyi dro nas snga dro'i dus dang /_nyi ma gung nas phyi dro'i dus 
[\[19a.2\]]dang /_nyi ma bgrangs pa'i dus dang /_nyi ma bdun dang /_zla ba phyed kyi dus dang /_zla ba dang /_lo dang /_lo brgya'i dus dang bskal pa gcig gi dus dang /_tshad med grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dus nas/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug 
[\[19a.3\]]pa'i dus su chos bstan pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med cing phyir mi ldog_/rgyun chad par mi 'gyur/_bral bar mi 'gyur/_bar chad par mi 'gyur/_med par mi 'gyur/_'jig par mi 'gyur/_g.yo bar mi 'gyur/_ring du mi 
[\[19a.4\]]'gyur/_'khor de na gnas pa nyid du yang rgyun chad par mi 'gyur te/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa bdun pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du rtag 
[\[19a.5\]]tu dus la bab par bzhugs pa ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi 'jigs pa tshad med pa mnga' ba'o/_/so so yang dag par rig pa grangs med pa mnga' ba'o/_/so so yang dag par rig pa tshad med pa mnga' ba'o/_/so so yang 
[\[19a.6\]]dag par rig pa zad mi shes pa mnga' ba'o/_/so so yang dag par rig pa thogs pa med pa mnga' ba'o/_/so so yang dag par rig pa mtha' yas pa mnga' ba'o/_/thun mong ma yin pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa mnga' ba'o/_/so so 
[\[19a.7\]]yang dag par rig pa mthar thug pa med pa mnga' ba'o/_/so so yang dag par rig pa de kho na dang ldan pa mnga' ba'o/_/so so yang dag par rig pa tshig gi tshul thams cad rab tu rtogs pa mnga' ba'o/_/chos thams cad 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]so so yang dag par rig pa mnga' ba'o/_/bsam pa dang mos pa dang /_dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi tshul dang rnam grangs tshul ji ltar rnam par bkod pa bzhin du sa mtshams med par ston te/_mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig brjod du med pa'i yang 
[\[19b.2\]]brjod du med pa rnams mdo sde de dang de la thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus kyi tshul gyis yang dag par ston te/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa brgyad pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ming med kyang [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang rigs su 
[\[19b.3\]]'byung ba'i chos thams cad tshig dang yi ges shin tu dbyangs pa'i dbyings mngon par sangs rgyas pa ste/[ {]mying [,]ming [}]'das pa ma yin pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]ma 'ongs pa ma yin pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]da ltar byung ba ma yin pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]sems can ma yin pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]
[\[19b.4\]]zhing ma yin pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]chos ma yin pa dang /_ming yon tan ma yin pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]grangs ma yin pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]grangs med pa ma yin pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]skye ba 
[\[19b.5\]]ma yin pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]'gag pa ma yin pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}{]myed [,]med [}]pa ma yin pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]yod pa ma yin pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]gcig pa ma yin pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]thams cad ma yin pa dang /_chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 
[\[19b.6\]]brjod du med pa dang /_phyogs med pa dang /_brda med pa dang /_tshig gi lam med pa/_sgra dang bral ba dang /_sgra'i rnam pa thams cad mi 'byung ba/_yongs su bsgrubs pa med pa/_byas pa dang rnam par byas pa med pa rnam pa gcig ma yin 
[\[19b.7\]]pa/_rnam pa mang po ma yin pa yang thugs su chud la/_brjod pa dang spyod pa thams cad la yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog brnyes pa dag ste/_rnam par rtog pa'i yul mi mnga' bdag go_/mngon par 'du mdzad pa med pa la rab tu brtson pa dag go_/
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]rtog pa dang kun tu rtog pa dang yongs su rtog pa 'gags pa dag go_/spyod pa thams cad la mi gnas par spyod pa dag ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa dgu pa'o/_/
[\[20a.2\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos thams cad kyi gzugs ma skyes pa rab tu mkhyen pa ste tshor ba'i spros pa med pa dang /_'du shes kyi grangs med pa dang /_'du byed kun tu rgyu ba med pa dang /_rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa med pa dang /_rang bzhin 
[\[20a.3\]]gyis zhi ba rab tu mkhyen te/_chos thams cad skye mched kyi rgyud med pa dang /_khams rnams mi dmigs pa dang /_chos thams cad mi 'jig pa dang /_chos thams cad bskyod du med cing /_rang bzhin gyis nam mkha' lta bu dang /_chos 
[\[20a.4\]]thams cad dben pa dang /_las med pa dang /_rnam par smin pa med pa dang /_spyod pas 'byung ba med pa dang /_ma grub pa dang /_ma byung ba dang /_grangs kyis mi brjod pa dang /_yod pa ma yin pa dang /_med pa ma yin pa dang /_ma skyes pa 
[\[20a.5\]]dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_rnam par byang ba med pa dang /_skyon med pa dang /_gnas pa med pa dang /_yongs su gnas pa med pa dang /_yongs su smin par byas pa med pa dang /_rnam par btul ba med pa dang /_
[\[20a.6\]]sems can med pa dang /_sems can med pa ma yin pa dang /_srog med pa dang /_srog med pa ma yin pa dang /_rkyen med pa dang /_rkyen med pa ma yin pa dang /_rten pa med pa dang /_rten pa med pa ma yin par chos thams cad thugs su chud kyang chos kyi dbyings 
[\[20a.7\]]thams cad shin tu bstan pa la pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa brnyes pa dag ste/_nges pa dang ma nges pa dang /_log par nges pa'i phung po gsum rnam par dgod pa rnams la stobs bcus thugs su chud pa'i ye shes mi 'jigs pa bzhis rnam par dag pa'i sangs 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]rgyas kyi yul chen po dang ldan pas seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa bcu pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs mkhas pa'o//_//
[\[20b.2\]]sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po gsum pa/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rgya chen po tshad med pa bsam gyis mi 
[\[20b.3\]]khyab pa rnams te/_de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par mi nus pa'o/_/bcu 
[\[20b.4\]]gang zhe na/_phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du dga' ldan du skye ba bstan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mu med pa dag la sangs rgyas kyi phrin las 
[\[20b.5\]]mdzad do/_/kha dog tshad med pa gzi brjid tshad med pa snang ba tshad med pa/_dbyangs tshad med pa dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa tshad med pa gsung brjod pas rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa tshad med pa/_ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa la spyod pa/_shes rab dang ye 
[\[20b.6\]]shes kyi yul tshad med pa mnga' ba rnams lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan 'dogs pa mdzad de/_bdud dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa/_lha dang mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig 
[\[20b.7\]]rten la phan 'dogs pa mdzad do/_/byams pa chen po'i spyod yul thogs pa med pa dang /_thabs thugs rje chen po'i sgo'i mthar thug pas sems can la phan 'dogs pa mdzad do/_/bsod nams kyi stobs dang /_mnga' phun sum tshogs pa dang /_
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]dbang po rnam par sbyang ba dang /_cang shes kyi sems yongs su dag pas kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa mdzad do/_/theg pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pas kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa mdzad do/_/
[\[21a.2\]]theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya bas kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa mdzad do/_/'gro ba thams cad gdon pas kyang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa mdzad de/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las 
[\[21a.3\]]dang po'o/_/dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'phos pa med kyang yum gyi skur gshegs shing /_byang chub sems dpa'i sku tha ma skye bar ston pa/_sgyu ma lta bu'i yongs su spyod pa/_sprul pa lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthar thug pa/_mig yor lta bur rnam 
[\[21a.4\]]par dmigs pa/_nam mkha'i yul tshad med par khyab pa/_bzhed pa bzhin du skye ba yang chags pa mi mnga' ba smig rgyu lta bur bstan pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la yang dag par gzhol ba/_gnas med pa'i ye shes la gnas pa/_rang 
[\[21a.5\]]bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang bral bas rnam par dag pa/_rgyan shin tu rgya che ba'i mdzod kyis sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/_/khang ba brtsegs pa rin po che las byas pa'i pho brang chen po rin po che'i rgyan mang po dang ldan pa na bzhugs pas kyang sangs rgyas 
[\[21a.6\]]kyi phrin las mdzad do/_/rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/_/yid la bya ba'i byin gyi rlabs chen pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/_/rnam par 'phrul pa'i mdzod chen po yang dag par bstan pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin 
[\[21a.7\]]las mdzad do/_/ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen pos kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/_/yum sku bskyed pa'i sku na bzhugs pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi spyod yul chen po brnyes pas kyang sangs 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/_/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis 'jig rten byin du brlabs pa mtha' yas pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/_/ting nge 'dzin chen po grangs med pa la rnam par spyod cing /_snyoms par 'jug pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin 
[\[21b.2\]]las mdzad do/_/ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs pa de dang de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/_/spyod pa'i thog ma la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mthar thug pa'i bar du thog ma dang dbus dang tha ma'i tshul gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[21b.3\]]'phrin las mdzad do/_/sa 'di la gnyis su med pas thams cad mthar phyin par byas nas tha mar 'jig rten gyi grangs kyi skye ba yongs su ston te/_skye bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/_/gzhon nur gyur 
[\[21b.4\]]bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/_/byang chub sems dpar gyur pas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/_/mngon par 'byung bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi phrin 
[\[21b.5\]]las mdzad do/_/mngon par 'tshang rgya bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/_/thabs mkhas pa sna tshogs kyis kyang 'jig 
[\[21b.6\]]rten sna tshogs 'jig rten tshad med pa/_'jig rten kun tu mtha' yas pa phyogs kyi dra ba'i rgyud dang /_rigs thams cad kyi 'jig rten ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/_/zhing gi rgyud ma lus pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas 
[\[21b.7\]]kyi phrin las mdzad do/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa ma lus pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/_/sems can gyi rgyud ma lus pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/_/skye ba dang shi 'pho ba'i rgyud ma lus pa'i 'jig rten 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]du sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad do/_/sprul pa chen po'i rgyud dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang /_chos dran pa'i sgo'i 'khor los kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad de/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs 
[\[22a.2\]]rgyas kyi phrin las gnyis pa'o/_/dge bar spyod pa'i las rnam par dag cing gdung rabs thams cad du ye shes kyi tshul rnam par dag pas/_sku tshe'i rgyud kyi tshul dang ldan pa sems can thams cad gdul ba thugs su chud pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams 
[\[22a.3\]]cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad do/_/btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bzhugs pa ston kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba'i tshul gyis gnas la bzhugs pa rnams sgra dang /_tshig thams cad dang bral bar brtags pas/_dngos po 
[\[22a.4\]]thams cad dngos po med pa las byung bar khong du chud par bya ba dang /_dngos po thams cad shes pa la gzud par bya ba dang /_tshul khrims thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_snying rje chen pos 'gro ba 
[\[22a.5\]]mu med pa la rnam par blta bar bya ba dang /_byams pa chen pos sems can med pa'i yul la rab tu rtogs par bya ba dang /_dga' ba chen pos 'jig rten brjod du med pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /_btang snyoms chen pos sems la 
[\[22a.6\]]dbang bsgyur ba la gnas par bya ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan gyis rang yongs su rgyas par byed par bya ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi lus ma lus par mngon par bsgrub par bya ba dang /_thams cad du gnas med pa'i lus yongs su 
[\[22a.7\]]rdzogs par byed par bya ba dang /_'khor thams cad rnam par dag par nan tan tu byed par bya ba dang /_chos bstan pa rnam par brjod par rab tu brjod par bya ba dang /_'jig rten gyi dngos po la smod par bya ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi nyes pa la 
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]rtog par bya ba mdzad cing spyod pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa bas rnam par smin pa yang dag par bstan pa dang /_ji ltar bkod pa'i tshul du sems can gdul ba dang /_yongs su ma smin pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_yongs su smin pa rnams 
[\[22b.2\]]tshul bzhin du gdul ba dang /_grangs med pa'i thabs mkhas pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi phrin las phyir mi ldog pa yongs su bstan pa dang /_sgo sna tshogs nas chos kyi spyod pa rab tu brjod pa dang /_sems can rnams kyi bsam 
[\[22b.3\]]pa sna tshogs par rnam par sbyang ba dang /_thugs rje chen po las byung ba'i chos kyi sprin gyis mngon par spang ba dang /_thams cad la skyob pa'i byams pa chen po bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul gsum gyis yongs su brlan pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad mngon pa dang /_
[\[22b.4\]]rnam par dmigs par btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bstan pa yan chad du 'jig rten mtha' dang dbus med par sangs rgyas kyi phrin las yongs su bstan pa mdzad cing /_ye shes kyi mthu chen po thogs pa med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mngon par mkhyen pa bsgribs pa med 
[\[22b.5\]]par bsgrub pa dang /_chos rnam pa gsum gyi thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i phrin las kyi mtha' dang /_sku'i phrin las kyi mtha' shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /_gsung gi phrin las ye shes nyams pa med pas rnam par dag pa dang /_thugs kyi phrin las 
[\[22b.6\]]kyi mtha' zab cing chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las gsum pa'o/_/rnam par rgyal ba chen po mnga' ba rnams ni btsun mo'i 
[\[22b.7\]]'khor rgyan rnam par phye ba tshad med pa dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba spangs te/_mngon par 'byung ba'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pas sems can rnams 'jig rten gyi gnas las bskyod pa dang /_'jig rten gyi mngon par zhen pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_'jig rten du gtogs pa 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]thams cad mi rtag par shes par bya ba dang /_'jig rten gyi tshul la mngon par zhen pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_'jig rten gyi dga' ba la sred pa yongs su gcad pa dang /_'jig rten gyi nyon mongs pa byang zhing nub pa la yang dag par spyod par bya ba dang /_sems can 
[\[23a.2\]]gyi don rjes su dran par bya ba'i phyir/_/mngon par 'byung ba'i don la rab tu gzhol ba dang /_/khyim pa'i tshul yongs su spang ba bstan pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi sbyor ba la yang dag par gnas par bya ba dang /_sngon gyi smon lam 
[\[23a.3\]]yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor tshad med pa yongs su snang bar bya ba dang /_ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po brnyes pas sems can rnams kyi mi shes pa'i sgrib pa rab tu bstsal ba dang /_bdag nyid bsod nams kyi zhing 
[\[23a.4\]]bla na med par gyur par 'gro ba thams cad la bstan pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nang du 'dus par 'gro ba thams cad la yang dag par brjod pa dang /_bdag nyid kyis ye shes kyi don gzigs par bstan 
[\[23a.5\]]pa dang /_sems can rnams rnam par dag pa'i sgor brjod pa dang /_sems can rnams kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sgor bsgrub pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad du 'byung ba'i sgo rab tu bstan pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgyal mtshan yang dag 
[\[23a.6\]]par bsgreng bar mdzad cing mngon par 'byung ba ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las bzhi pa'o/_/don gcig ma yin pa mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar thug pa rnams ni chos thams cad 
[\[23a.7\]]mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes byang chub kyi shing drung du byon te/_byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bas kyang bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang /_sku'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mdzod kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi ma lus pa thams cad du rgyas par 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]dgang ba'i phyir byin gyi rlabs zad mi shes pa'i mthar thug pas mtha' rnam par spangs pa spyod pa tshad med pa rab tu brnyes pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul gyis rnam par rol pa'i ye shes kyi don dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan yang dag par 
[\[23b.2\]]bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gdan rnam par bkram pas yongs su rgyas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpas rnam par dmigs pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod 
[\[23b.3\]]pa dam pa thob pa rnams kyi zhal du blta ba/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam pa dang /_smon lam khyad par can dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis yang dag par bsam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo zab mo 
[\[23b.4\]]rab tu bskor ba/_sangs rgyas kyi yul tshad med pa brtsams pas/_byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs spyod pa la yang dag par gzhol ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor 
[\[23b.5\]]gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa mnga' ba/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis byin du rlob pa'i yul mnga' ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can gyis rnam par dmigs pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tha mi dad pa 
[\[23b.6\]]dang ldan pa 'byung ba'i sa/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i mthu'i gnas la yon tan gyi khyad par thams cad rab tu brnyes nas bzhugs pa/_'jig rten gyi rnam pa thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug pa/_sems can gyi rnam 
[\[23b.7\]]pa thams cad dang /_zhing gi rnam pa thams cad dang /_chos kyi rnam pa thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa thams cad dang /_yongs su smin par bya ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang /_dus kyi rnam pa thams cad dang /_gdul ba'i rnam 
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]pa thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i rnam pa thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug pa rnams 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad du mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par 'tshang rgya bas sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad de/_/'di 
[\[24a.2\]]ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi phrin las lnga pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad pa phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyi khong du chud 
[\[24a.3\]]par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis tshad med pa'i 'khor lo dang /_mi 'jigs pa'i seng ge'i nga ro chen po'i tshul gyis thams cad ma lus par mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i 'khor lo dang /_chos kyi mdzod mun pa med pa'i sgos snang bar byed pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad 
[\[24a.4\]]mkhyen pa'i mdzod kyi 'khor lo dang /_ye shes nam mkha'i dbyings ltar tshad med pa'i tshul gyis chags pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang /_chos thams cad kyi dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i tshul gyis bsgribs pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang /_sems 
[\[24a.5\]]can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig rnam par sbyong ba'i tshul gyis 'jig rten thams cad kyi sgron ma'i 'khor lo dang /_'jig rten thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos brjod pa'i 'khor lo dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
