[\[135b.4\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/_rtswa dang lo ma'i phung po ni ri rab tsam zhing yod du zin kyang der me mngag yungs kar kyi 'bru tsam zhig bcug na/_rtswa dang lo ma'i phung po de ni gdon mi za bar 'tshig par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni me'i mtshan 
[\[135b.5\]]nyid bsreg pa la sta gon du gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i me mdag kyang ji tsam du chung du zin kyang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rtswa dang lo ma'i phung po ma lus par bsregs nas/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[135b.6\]]mthar phyin kyi bar du 'grub par byed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni shin tu thug pa'i mthar phyin pa'i phyir ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang 'di lta ste dper na/_ri'i rgyal po kha ba can la/_sman 
[\[135b.7\]]gyi rgyal po chen po blta na legs pa zhes bya ba yod de/_sman gyi rgyal po de sems can gang gis mthong bar gyur pa de dag gi mig rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/sman gyi rgyal po de la rlung gis btab pa'i sgra gang gis thos pa de dag gi rna ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]gang gis dri tshor ba de dag gi sna rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/gang gis myongs pa de dag gi lce rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/gang gis reg pa de dag gi lus rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/gang gis de 'khor gyi sa phyogs su phyin pa de dag gi nad kyang 
[\[136a.2\]]yongs su zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi rgyal po chen po bla na med pa yang sems can thams cad rnam pa thams cad du nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/_sems can gang gis de bzhin 
[\[136a.3\]]gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku mthong bar gyur pa de dag la mthong ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni lha'i mig yongs su dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pa de dag la rna ba yongs su dag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang gis 
[\[136a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri tshor ba de dag la lha'i sna yongs su dag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi ro myong ba de dag la tshig gi tshul thams cad shes pa'i lce'i dbang po yangs pa rnam par dag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/
[\[136a.5\]]sems can gang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis phog par gyur pa de dag la chos kyi sku shin tu che ba yongs su dag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa rtse gcig yongs su dag pas 
[\[136a.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa byas na de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad 
[\[136a.7\]]zhi zhing 'phags pa'i bde ba thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod kyis yid ches pa dang khong du chud par bya na/_sems can la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngam thos kyang las kyi sgrib pas kun nas 'khor ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]pa la ma dad pa zhig byas na yang de dag gi mthong ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du don yod do zhes bdag smra'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang thos pa dang de dag dang 'grogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skye ba ni/_byang chub sems 
[\[136b.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spang ba dang /_dge ba'i chos thams cad mngon tu bya zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i rgyur khong du chud par bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang dpe rnam par dgod pa thams cad kyis de bzhin 
[\[136b.3\]]gshegs pa rnam pa thams cad du shes par mi rung ste/_cis kyang dper bya ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sems kyi las thams cad las shin tu 'das pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/_'on kyang 
[\[136b.4\]]sems can rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su tshim par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dpes ston pa mngon par gnang ba mdzad kyi de lhur blang ba'i phyir ni ma yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras chos kyi rnam grangs rnam pa 'di lta bu dag ni 
[\[136b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i gnas shes bya'o/_/'jig rten thams cad kyis shes par dka' ba zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/ye shes kyi mthu chen po brjod pa zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 
[\[136b.6\]]ston pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa zhes bya'o/_/'gro ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya'o/_/shin tu nges par de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gyis rjes su song ba zhes bya'o/_/sems can gyi khams 
[\[136b.7\]]ma lus pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstan pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o/_/shin tu mthar thug pa'i mur phyin pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras chos kyi rnam grangs rnam pa 'di lta bu dag 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i theg pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ma gtogs par gzhan gyi don du de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa mi mdzad do/_/
[\[137a.2\]]chos kyi rnam grangs rnam pa 'di lta bu dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma gtogs par sems can gzhan gyi lag tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste dper na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che gang gis 
[\[137a.3\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por brjod pa'i rin po che gang yang rung ste/_rin po che de dag ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i bu thu bo gzhon nu btsun mo dam pa las byung ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa ma gtogs par sems can gzhan gyi lag 
[\[137a.4\]]tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i bu 'khor los sgyur ba'i mtshan dang ldan pa de lta bu med na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dus byas nas zhag bdun lon pa dang nor bu rin po che de dag ma lus par nub par 'gyur te 
[\[137a.5\]]mi 'khod do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du mdo sde rin po che rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sras kyi thu bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams ma gtogs par sems 
[\[137a.6\]]can gzhan gyi lag tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras skyes bu dam pa de lta bu dag med du zin na ni ring por mi thogs par mdo sde rnam pa 'di lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba chen po chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul rgyun mi 'chad par byed 
[\[137a.7\]]pa rnams kyang /_thams cad kyi thams cad du nub par 'gyur te mi 'khod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la ni chos kyi rnam grangs rnam pa 'di lta bu dag mnyan pa'i mthu 'ang med na/_gzung ba 'am bcang ba 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]'am klag pa 'am bstan pa 'am/_bri ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas ma yin no/_/gzhan du na chos kyi rnam grangs rnam pa 'di lta bu dag ni skyes bu dam pa de dag nyid kyi lag tu phyin pa'am/_glegs bam du byas pa'am/_yid las yod par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[137b.2\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras de lta bas na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu dag thos na bsam pa thag pas rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_rje sar byas te/_spyi bo la blang bar bya'o/_/rab tu dga' bar bya'o/_/de ci'i 
[\[137b.3\]]phyir zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras gnas 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dkon pa ma yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskal ba 
[\[137b.4\]]bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang dag par bsgrub pa la mngon par brtson par byas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di ma thos sam/_thos 
[\[137b.5\]]nas kyang yid mi ches shing dad pa med de mi 'jug khong du chud par mi byed na/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid la yang dag par byung ba ma yin no/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[137b.6\]]rigs su byung bar bshad par mi 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes che ba nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa tshad med pa chags pa med pa bsgribs pa med pa 'di thos nas yid ches shing 
[\[137b.7\]]dad de 'jug pa dang khong du chud par byed pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi rjes su song ba yin/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid du 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]shin tu grub pa yin/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la rab tu gnas pa yin/_'jig rten gyi chos thams cad dang shin tu bral ba yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la shin tu byung ba yin/_byang 
[\[138a.2\]]chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos nyid rtogs par khong du chud pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang /_rnam par rol pa la the tsom med pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa'i dbang rang 'byung gi chos nyid la gnas 
[\[138a.3\]]pas kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul chags pa med pa la 'jug pa yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpas chos 'di dag thos nas blo thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang /_sems kyi bsam pa'i stobs dang shugs tshad med pa'i rjes 
[\[138a.4\]]su song ba dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pas 'jug par rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa yongs su spangs pa dang /_yid la byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du gyur pa dang /_dran pa'i dbang nam mkha'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par 
[\[138a.5\]]bsgoms pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i blo gros kyi las chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pas rnam par dpyad pa dang /_rang byung gi ye shes 'byam klas pa yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pas mngon par shes par bya ba dang /_sems 
[\[138a.6\]]bskyed pa 'jig rten thams cad kyi dri ma dang bral ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dpyod pa dang /_bsam pa la 'jug pa 'byam klas pa phyogs kyi dra ba thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba'i ye shes 'das pa dang ma byon 
[\[138a.7\]]pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pas chos 'di rnams la 'jug pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par khong du chud pa'i tshul gyis 'jug par bya ste/_des ni chos gang la yang gcig tu [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pas yid la bya bar mi bya'i/_kye 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]rgyal ba'i sras chos gcig la chos thams cad tshad med pa'i tshul du yid la bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni las gron chung ngur rang 'byung gi ye shes dang mnga' bsgyur ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas 
[\[138b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos don de nyid yang brtag par bya ba'i phyir/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/rgyal ba de dag thos mthong mchod pa byas pas kyang /_/tshad med pa yi bsod nams phung po 'phel 
[\[138b.3\]]bar 'gyur/_/nyon mongs 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad spangs gyur du/_/'dus byas 'di nang bar ma dor ni zad [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_/skyes bu la las rdo rje zos gyur de la ni/_/zhu bar mi 'gyur gdon mi za bar phyir 'byung 'gyur/_/de 
[\[138b.4\]]bzhin stobs bcu rnams la mchod byas bsod nams kyi/_/ye shes rdo rjes nyon mongs ma lus bcom par 'gyur/_/rtswa skam spungs pa ri bo'i mchog tsam yong gyur kyang /_/[{]mye [,]me [}]mdag yungs 'bru tsam gyis de ni 'tshig 'gyur te/_/de 
[\[138b.5\]]bzhin bde gshegs mchod pa chud zad cig byas kyang /_/nyon mongs thams cad tshig byed mya ngan 'das rgyur 'gyur/_/ri bo kha ba can la mthong legs sman yod de/_/mthong zhing reg pas nad rnams thams cad zhi bar byed/_/de bzhin stobs 
[\[138b.6\]]bcu rnams ni mthong ngam thos kyang rung /_/yon tan kun ldan sangs rgyas ye shes 'thob par 'gyur/_/de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba 
[\[138b.7\]]snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams rnam pa drug dang ltas chen po bco brgyad du g.yos so/_/rab tu g.yos so/_/kun tu g.yos so/_/'gul to/_/rab tu 'gul to/_/kun tu 'gul to/_/ldeg go rab tu ldeg go_/kun tu ldeg go_/chem 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]chem rab tu chem chem/_kun tu chem chem mo/_/'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/_kun tu 'ur 'ur ro/_/shig shig rab tu shig shig kun tu shig shig go_/'di lta ste shar phyogs dma' bar gyur na/_nub phyogs mtho bar gyur to/_/nub 
[\[139a.2\]]phyogs dma' bar gyur na shar phyogs mtho bar gyur to/_/lho phyogs dma' bar gyur na byang phyogs mtho bar gyur to/_/byang phyogs dma' bar gyur na lho phyogs mtho bar gyur to/_/dbus dma' bar gyur na mtha' mtho bar gyur to/_/mtha' dma' bar 
[\[139a.3\]]gyur na dbus mtho bar gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus lha rdzas las 'das pa'i me tog gi sprin dang na bza'i sprin dang /_gdugs kyi sprin dang rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dang /_ba dan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/_/lha rdzas las 'das pa'i spos kyi sprin 
[\[139a.4\]]gyi char mngon par bab bo/_/lha rdzas las 'das pa'i phreng ba dang /_byug pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/_/lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan dang lhab lhub kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/_/lha rdzas las 'das pa'i nor bu rin po che 'od chen po 
[\[139a.5\]]dang ldan pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/_/lha rdzas las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i legs so/_/zhes brjod pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/_/lha rdzas las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus brjod du med pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/_/
[\[139a.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab par yongs su dag pas mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/_/gling bzhi 
[\[139a.7\]]pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub thugs su chud pa'i chos kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' dga' bar gyur pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du'ang phyogs bcu rgyas pa thams cad rab tu 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]dga' bar gyur to/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa brgyad cu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol dag nas kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 
[\[139b.2\]]brjod du med pa brgyad cu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mtshan kun tu bzang por mthun pa sha stag gis/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la zhal mngon par bstan te/_'di skad ces gsungs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu 
[\[139b.3\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul mang po sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_chos nyid rjes su bsnyegs pas bstan pa legs so legs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa brgyad 
[\[139b.4\]]cu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad kyang mtshan mthun pa sha stag chos bstan pa 'di la legs pa brjod pa mdzad do/_/ded kyis kyang de skad du brjod pa yin no/_/nged kyis ji skad du brjod pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang brjod do/_/
[\[139b.5\]]chos bstan pa 'di shin tu bstan pa'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon par shes pa rab tu thob par gyur te/_de dag kyang nged kyis thams 
[\[139b.6\]]cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu tshe gcig gis thogs par lung bstan to/_/sems can sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_
[\[139b.7\]]de dag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi yul/_phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag tu 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]'gyur bar nged kyis lung bstan to/_/chos bstan pa 'di yang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma thos pa'i chos thos par bya ba'i phyir nged kyis byin gyis brlabs so/_/gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[140a.2\]]'dir sems can rnams kyis ji ltar shes par gyur cing dul bar gyur pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa mtha' yas pa mu med pas mtshams med pa dpag tu med 
[\[140a.3\]]pa brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad ma lus pa dag tu yang sems can rnams rnam par dul bar gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 
[\[140a.4\]]snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_chos nyid rab tu thob pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes nyams pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa las [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku 'thob pa las gzhan 
[\[140a.5\]]du mi 'gyur ba dang /_dus la ji ltar bab pa bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par bskul ba dang /_sngon mngon par bsgrub pa chud ma zos pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang mthu/_shin tu yangs 
[\[140a.6\]]pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mnga' bsgyur ba yang dag par bstan pa'i mthus phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol nas/_byang 
[\[140a.7\]]chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs shing byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan chen po rab tu bstan pa dang /_'od gzer gyi dra ba chen po rab 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]tu bkye ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bskyod pa dang /_bdud kyi khyim thams cad rab tu gzhig pa dang /_ngan song gi yul thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid rab tu brjod pa dang /_chos yang 
[\[140b.2\]]dag par bgro ba rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i legs pa brjod pa dang /_rnam pa thams cad du chos kyi char tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dbab pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_lus rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa rab tu bstan pa dang /_de 
[\[140b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin chen po rang rang gi rgyud kyi snod tshad med pas yang dag par gzung ba byed cing 'ongs par gyur to/_/de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis 'di skad du brjod de/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar khyod kyis 
[\[140b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phrogs shing bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di brjod pa legs so/_/legs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bdag cag kyang thams cad kun tu bzang po zhes bya bar ming mthun pa sha stag ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 
[\[140b.5\]]kun tu grags pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba dag gi drung nas 'jig rten gyi khams kyi [{]mying [,]ming [}]kun tu snang ba'i 'od ces bya ba dag nas 'dir phyin te/_thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid rab tu thob pas chos 
[\[140b.6\]]bstan pa 'di nyid byung bar gyur to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar bdag cag kyang dbang du gyur pa sha stag_/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'khor 'dir phyin te/_ji ltar bdag cag 'khor 'dir phyin pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig 
[\[140b.7\]]rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang mthus byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]shin tu phra ba snyed phyin par gyur te/_thams cad na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' mi 'phrogs pa'i chos 'di nyid tshig 'di dag nyid dang /_yi ge 'di dag nyid dang /_nges pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa 'di dag nyid kyis don 'di nyid brjod de 
[\[141a.2\]]lhag chad [{]myed [,]med [}]par brjod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la rnam par bltas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs brjod cing sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid smos pa dang /_
[\[141a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid mi 'phrogs pa yongs su brjod pa dang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med cing yangs pa don yod par brjod pa dang /_rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas skye ba smos pa dang /_sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi 
[\[141a.4\]]sems kyi bsam pa rab tu brtag pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad la dus la ji ltar 'bab pa bzhin du chos bstan pa rnam par dgod pa yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos snang ba mtha' dang dbus med pa 
[\[141a.5\]]yang dag par bskyed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dang /_byin gyi rlabs rnam par dgod pa chen po rab tu bstan pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rang bzhin gcig pa'i lus mi 'khrugs par bya ba byed cing sngon gyi spyod 
[\[141a.6\]]pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis mngon par bsgrubs te rang gi rgyud kyi mthus yang dag par blangs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/dpe rnams ji snyed 'jig rten kun na gang yod pa/_/de dag 
[\[141a.7\]]thams cad sangs rgyas spyod lam 'di dang bral/_/'on kyang 'gro la phan phyir sems can bstan pa'i phyir/_/dpe med rnams la don gyi tshul gyis dpe yang blangs/_/bde gshegs gsang ba 'di dag tha mal dmas mi thos/_/bskal pa 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]brgya phrag stong du de yi sgra dkon no/_/gang rnams brtson 'grus blo ldan shin tu dul gyur pa/_/de 'dra'i skye bus sangs rgyas gsang ba 'di 'dra thos/_/gang gis 'di thos gyur nas rab tu dga' 'gyur ba/_/de ni sngon cad sangs rgyas brgya 
[\[141b.2\]]stong bkur cing mchod/_/bde gshegs rnams kyis byin brlabs rgyal bas yongs su bzung /_/lha dang mis bstod mkhas pas rim gro bya ba yin/_/'di ni bde gshegs 'jig rten 'das pa kun gyis dkor/_/rgyal ba sems can 
[\[141b.3\]]sgrol ba kun kyang 'di las 'byung /_/'di ni dkar po'i lam mnga' kun gyi mtha' yas rigs/_/de phyir bag yod gyis te 'di ni gzung bar gyis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mngon par gnang 
[\[141b.4\]]ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i dpal yid dga' ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang lha dang 
[\[141b.5\]]mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi mgon po dang /_dbang phyug chen po dang gtsang ma'i gnas kyi 'khor du bcas pa thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[141b.6\]]po kun tu bzang pos bshad pa la mngon par dga' 'o/_/shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba 'byung ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//[{D44-44}]sangs rgyas rmad ga 
[\[141b.7\]]cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo//_//bam po bcu gsum pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'das shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i dgongs pa mnga' ba mi gnyis pa la yang dag par spyod pa/_mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la rab tu brten pa/_
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/_bsgribs pa med pa thugs su chud pa rtogs pa/_phyir mi ldog pa'i chos dang ldan pa/_spyod yul la 'phrogs pa med pa/_dus gsum rnam par dgod pa bsam 
[\[142a.2\]]gyis mi khyab pa la mnyam pa nyid du byung ba/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du shin tu khyab pa'i sku mnga' ba/_chos thams cad la the tsom mi mnga' ba'i ye shes can spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i dgongs pa mnga' ba/_chos kyi ye shes la nem nur 
[\[142a.3\]]mi mnga' ba/_/rnam par ma brtags pa'i sku dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yang dag par mnod pa'i ye shes can sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa mi gnyis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog brnyes pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa tha 
[\[142a.4\]]mi dad pa'i ye shes kyi mthar phyin pa/_sangs rgyas kyis mtha' dang dbus med pa'i mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas rnam par spyod cing yul 
[\[142a.5\]]ma ga d+ha'i chos kyi dgon pa'i snying po'i byang chub la pho brang 'od kun nas byung ba na gdan seng ge'i khri pad mo'i snying po can la bzhugs shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i 
[\[142a.6\]]rdul shin tu phra ba snyed thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu tshe gcig gis thogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan nas 'dus pa kun kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi tshul thams cad rab tu thob pa sha stag ste/_'di ltar 
[\[142a.7\]]sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_rnam par gdul ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i chos la rab tu dgod par mkhas pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad dpyad pa'i tshul gyi ye shes 'byam klas pa la zhugs pa dag ste/_
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa dang spyod yul dang /_ye shes la spyod cing rtog pa spros pa thams cad yongs su chad pa/_spyod pa nye bar gzung ba rgyun mi 'chad pas sems can thams cad yang dag par gzung ba la mkhas pa/_chos kyi tshul 
[\[142b.2\]]la 'jug par bya ba mtha' dang dbus med pa la rab tu zhugs pa/_sems can thams cad kyi las rnam par smin pa chud mi za shing mi dmigs par brtags shing dpyad pa la shin tu mkhas pa/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal 
[\[142b.3\]]ba dang /_dbang po dang /_rtsom pa dang sbyor ba mthon dman brtags cing dpyad pa la rab tu mkhas pa/_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i don dang tshig dang yi ge gzung zhing bcang ba dang shes 
[\[142b.4\]]par bya ba dang /_mnyam par gzung ba dang brtag par bya ba la shin tu mkhas pa/_'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi tshul la 'jug par bya ba mtha' dang dbus med pa la shin tu zhugs pa/_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas 
[\[142b.5\]]dang /_dus rnam pa tha dad pa'i tshul brtag pa la rab tu mkhas pa/_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor skad cig gcig gis de ma thag tu rab tu thob pa la rnam par spyod 
[\[142b.6\]]pa sems kyi skad cig re re la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yang dag par ston pa/_sems can thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa dang mi 'bral bar byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba sems can gcig gi sems kyi dmigs pa la zhugs pas sems can 
[\[142b.7\]]ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems kyi dmigs pa la mkhas par khong du chud pa rang 'byung gi ye shes dang sa mngon du gyur pa las mi nyams pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa thob kyang rgyun mi 'chad pa'i 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]spyod pa las phyir mi ldog pa/_byang chub sems dpas mngon par 'du bya ba'i mthu rgyun mi chad pa mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ye shes kyi tshul la zhugs pa/_sems can gcig gi don du bskal pa mu med par 
[\[143a.2\]]spyod pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i byin gyi rlabs la mkhas pa/_bskal pa grangs med par 'byung zhing mthong bar dka' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rin po che shin tu bzang po chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'gro ba thams cad 
[\[143a.3\]]rnam par gdul ba'i dbyings la 'jug par mkhas pa/_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i gnas yang dag par gzung ba'i phyir sngon gyi spyod pa'i mthu'i khyad par dang smon lam 
[\[143a.4\]]phun sum tshogs pa dag ste/_de dag dang de ma yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yon tan bsngags shing yongs su brjod kyang bskal pa mu med par mi zad mi thug pa/_legs pa shin tu brjod pa rab tu thob pa sha stag ste/_'di ltar

[\[144a\]]

[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]pa dang smon lam du ldan pa/_smon lam dang lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad kyi drung du 'gro zhing gsol ba gdab pa la mkhas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul yang dag par 'dzin

[\[147a.1\]]yongs su tshol ba ni gang /_chos rab tu brjod pa ni gang chos kyi nan tan ni gang /_bdud ni gang /_bdud kyi las ni gang /_bdud kyi las bzlog pa ni gang /_sangs rgyas mthong bar bya ba ni gang /_sangs rgyas

[\[147a.7\]]dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu shes rab la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag thams cad la smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]chen po rnams kyi rgyu 'thun pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar chud mi za ba'i phyir/_byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyu 'thun pa dang /_rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rgyu 'thun pa dang /_shin tu bstsags pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 
[\[147b.2\]]rgyu 'thun pa dang /_nan tan du bya ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu 'thun pa dang /_'byung ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi rgyu 'thun pa dang /_byang chub brtan pa'i phyir smon lam gyi rgyu 'thun pa dang /_rgya chen po yang dag par bstsags pa'i phyir spyod pa'i 
[\[147b.3\]]rgyu 'thun pa dang /_tshul gcig tu bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang rgyu 'thun pa dang /_sems rab tu dang ba'i phyir sangs rgyas mchod pa rgyu 'thun pa dang /_pha lta bur brjod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rgyu 'thun pa'o/_/

[\[147b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar kyi 'du shes te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la mi dge bar 'du shes pa dang /_dge ba thams cad la byang chub kyi sa bon du 'du shes pa dang /_sems can thams cad la byang 
[\[147b.6\]]chub kyi snod du 'du shes pa dang /_smon lam thams cad la smon lam med par 'du shes pa dang /_chos thams cad la 'byung bar 'du shes pa dang /_spyod pa thams cad la spyod pa med par 'du shes pa dang /_chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos

[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes te/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'du shes rnam par bzlog pa la mkhas pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[148a.2\]]bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du spyod pa dang /_chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i don du spyod pa dang /_bslab pa thams cad nan tan tu bya ba'i 
[\[148a.3\]]don du spyod pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bstsags pa'i don du spyod pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin rtse gcig tu bya ba'i don du spyod pa dang /_ye shes rab tu shes par bya ba'i don du spyod pa dang /_bsgom pa yongs su bsgom pa'i don du spyod pa dang /_zhing 
[\[148a.4\]]brgyan pa'i don du spyod pa dang /_dge ba'i gshes gnyen bkur ba'i don du spyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i don du spyod pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ste/_de 
[\[148a.5\]]dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i spyod pa bla na med pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[148a.6\]]te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub kyi sems la rab tu gzhog pa'i bshes gnyen dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba la sbyor ba'i bshes gnyen dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug par byed pa'i bshes gnyen dang /_chos thams cad ston pa'i bshes 
[\[148a.7\]]gnyen dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba la gzhog pa'i bshes gnyen dang /_spobs pa la rnam par gdon [{]myi [,]mi [}]za bar byed pa'i bshes gnyen dang /_'gro ba thams cad gnas gyen du bskyod pa'i bshes gnyen dang /_bskal 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]pa thams cad du gnas shing mi skyo bar byed pa'i bshes gnyen dang /_kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la rab tu gzhog pa'i bshes gnyen dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug cing 'bab par byed pa'i bshes gnyen te/_kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[148b.2\]]sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad 
[\[148b.3\]]yongs su smin par bya'o snyam ste/_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_chos thams cad gzung bar bya'o snyam ste brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su sbyang bar bya'o snyam ste/_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_
[\[148b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad shes par bya'o snyam ste/_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi nyes byas zad par bya'o snyam ste brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye 
[\[148b.5\]]gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcad do snyam ste/_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_bdud thams cad las rgyal bar bya'o snyam ste/_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_sems can thams cad la 'khrug pa med par bya'o 
[\[148b.6\]]snyam ste/_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa bya'o snyam ste/_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya'o snyam ste/_brtson 'grus rtsom pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[148b.7\]]bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus rtsom pa ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs phyin pa thob pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar bdag ni byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa yin gyis da dung gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems la dgod 
[\[149a.2\]]do zhes te dbugs phyin pa rab tu 'thob bo/_/bdag ni 'jig rten gyi rtsod pa thams cad kyis rtsod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la gzhol ba yin gyis da dung gzhan yang rtsod pa med par dga' ba la dgod par bya'o/_/zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo/_/bdag ni byis 
[\[149a.3\]]pa'i chos las 'phags kyi da dung pha rol kyang byis pa'i chos las gyen du bskyod de sangs rgyas kyi chos la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo/_/bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba btsal ba la brtson pa yin gyis/_da dung gzhan yang dge ba'i rtsa ba tshol bar 
[\[149a.4\]]brtson pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo/_/bdag ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam du zhugs pa yin gyis/_/da dung gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam du 'jug pa la dgod par bya'o/_/zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas 
[\[149a.5\]]kyi rigs su skyes pa yin gyis/_da dung gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye ba la rab tu dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo/_/bdag ni dngos po med pa'i chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa yin gyis/_da dung gzhan yang dngos po med pa'i chos 
[\[149a.6\]]kyi tshul la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mi spong ba la brtson pa yin gyis/_da dung gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad [{]myi [,]mi [}]spong bar brtson pa la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob 
[\[149a.7\]]bo bdag gis ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub tu smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur gyis/_/da dung gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub tu smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo/_/bdag ni de 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mdzod mi zad par zhugs pa yin gyis/_/da dung gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mdzod [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad par 'jug pa la dgod par bya'o zhes dbugs phyin pa 'thob bo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[149b.2\]]bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs phyin pa thob pa ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i dbugs phyin pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[149b.3\]]bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dag ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sbyin pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smyin par byed do/_/gzugs kyis kyang sems can gyi khams 
[\[149b.4\]]yongs su smyin par byed do/_/chos ston pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smyin par byed do/_/skal ba mnyam pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smyin par byed do/_/gnas med pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smyin par 
[\[149b.5\]]byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brjod pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smyin par byed do/_/'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'bar ba yang dag par bstan pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smyin par byed do/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[149b.6\]]kyi chos kyi che ba nyid brjod pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smyin par byed do/_/rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pas kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smyin par byed do/_/thabs mkhas pa'i sbyor ba dang /_tshul gyis 
[\[149b.7\]]'jig rten du spyad pa sna tshogs kyis kyang sems can gyi khams yongs su smyin par byed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can/_yongs su smyin par bya ba ste/_de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]rnams kyi sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par byed pa dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar byang chub kyi sems [{]myi [,]mi [}]nyams pa'i tshul 
[\[150a.2\]]khrims dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su spong ba'i tshul khrims dang /_sems can thams cad la phan par dka' bas rnam par lta ba'i tshul khrims dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rab tu dgod pa'i tshul khrims dang /_byang 
[\[150a.3\]]chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la nan tan bya ba'i tshul khrims dang /_chos thams cad [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i tshul khrims dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul khrims dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku thams cad las phyir 
[\[150a.4\]]phyogs su mi lta ba'i tshul khrims dang /_chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang /_dbang po sdom pa'i tshul khrims so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu bo de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims te/_
[\[150a.5\]]de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims rgya chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa ste/_lung bstan 
[\[150a.6\]]pa de dag gis lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag cag lung bstan to/_/zhes bya bar shes so/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar snying thag pa nas byang chub kyi sems phun sum tshogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi rgyud las lung 
[\[150a.7\]]bstan pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mi skyo ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa'o/_/bskal pa thams cad du zhe non pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nan tan du byed pa ni byang chub sems 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' la gcig tu chad par mos shing yid ches la mngon par dad pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sogs shing sgrub 
[\[150b.2\]]pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o/_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab tu dgod par brtson pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu byed pa 
[\[150b.3\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la ston par 'du shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa'o/_/sngon gyi byang chub kyi smon lam rjes su bsrung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[150b.4\]]kyi lung bstan pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lung bstan pa ste/_lung bstan pa/_de dag gis lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag cag lung bstan to zhes bya bar shes so/_/kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[150b.5\]]sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sngon gyi smon lam la 'jug pa dang /_spyod pa la 'jug pa dang /_yang dag par bsgrub pa la 'jug pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jug pa 
[\[150b.6\]]dang /_bsgrub pa la 'jug pa dang /_smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug pa dang /_mos pa tha dad pa la 'jug pa dang /_zhing gi rgyan la 'jug pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug pa dang /_skye ba bstan pa la 'jug pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[150b.7\]]sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa ste/_'jug pa de dag gis ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'jug pa dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]dpa' rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar mu med pa'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la 'jug pa dang /_mu med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la 'jug pa dang /_mu med pa'i chos kyi 
[\[151a.2\]]tshul la 'jug pa dang /_mu med pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa dang /_mu med pa'i sems can 'dul ba la 'jug pa dang /_mu med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug pa dang /_mu med pa'i sku sna tshogs la 'jug pa dang /_mu med 
[\[151a.3\]]pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa dang /_mu med pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la 'jug pa dang /_mu med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su bstan pa'o/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug 
[\[151a.4\]]pa ste/_'jug pa de dag gis ni 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can gyi bsam pa dang /_spyod pa la 'jug pa ste/_sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa 
[\[151a.5\]]de dag gis ni/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang /_spyod pa la rab tu 'jug go_/bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mtha'i spyod 
[\[151a.6\]]pa la 'jug pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi da ltar byung ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 
[\[151a.7\]]sems kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i spyod pa la 'jug pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi mos pa sna tshogs kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags dang bag la nyal ba'i spyod 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]pa la 'jug pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dus dang dus ma yin par yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_rnam par 'dul ba'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa 
[\[151b.2\]]la 'jug pa ste/_de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa ste/_bcu gang 
[\[151b.3\]]zhe na 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la kun nas nyon mongs par 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rnams la rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rnams la chung ngur 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rnams la chen 
[\[151b.4\]]por 'jug pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la rdul shin tu phra mor chud par 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rnams la rab tu phra bar 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rnams la yangs par 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rnams la 
[\[151b.5\]]'byung bar 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rnams la sangs rgyas dang bcas par 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rnams la sangs rgyas med par 'jug pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 
[\[151b.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa ste/_de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bskal pa la 'jug pa 
[\[151b.7\]]ste/_de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams bskal pa thams cad la rab tu 'jug go_/bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'das pa'i bskal pa la 'jug pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa la 'jug pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa la 'jug 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]pa dang /_grangs yod pa'i bskal pa la 'jug pa dang /_grangs med pa'i bskal pa la 'jug pa dang /_grangs yod pa dang grangs med pa'i bskal pa la 'jug pa dang /_grangs med pa grangs yod pa'i bskal pa la 'jug pa dang /_
[\[152a.2\]]bskal pa thams cad la bskal pa gcig tu 'jug pa dang /_bskal pa ma yin pa la bskal par 'jug pa dang /_bskal pa thams cad la skad cig gcig gis 'jug pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bskal pa la 'jug 
[\[152a.3\]]pa rnams te/_de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams bskal pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum bstan pa ste/_de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus gsum 
[\[152a.4\]]shin tu ston to/_/bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus la 'das par bstan pa dang /_'das pa'i dus la ma 'ongs par bstan pa dang /_'das pa'i dus la da ltar byung bar bstan pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus la 'das par bstan pa dang /_ma 'ongs 
[\[152a.5\]]pa'i dus las da ltar byung bar bstan pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus la mi zad par bstan pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus la 'das par bstan pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma 'ongs par bstan pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus la mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa dang /_
[\[152a.6\]]da ltar byung ba'i dus la dus gsum skad cig tu bstan pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum bstan pa ste/_de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus gsum ston par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[152a.7\]]sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum la 'jug pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar brda la 'jug pa dang /_tshig gi lam la 'jug pa dang /_mngon par brjod pa la 'jug pa dang /_gdags pa la 'jug pa dang /_'du shes 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]la 'jug pa dang /_legs par bsngags pa la 'jug pa dang /_spyod pa la 'jug pa dang /_mi zad pa la 'jug pa dang /_zhi ba la 'jug pa dang /_dben pa la 'jug pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dus gsum la 
[\[152b.2\]]'jug pa ste/_de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams dus gsum la 'jug par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi skyo zhing sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di 
[\[152b.3\]]ltar sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing rim gror bya bas mi skyo zhing yongs su sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bsnyen bkur bas mi skyo zhing yongs su sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_chos thams cad 
[\[152b.4\]]btsal ba la mi skyo zhing yongs su sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_chos thams cad mnyan pa la mi skyo zhing yongs su sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_chos thams cad bstan pa la mi skyo zhing yongs su sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems 
[\[152b.5\]]bskyed pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul bas mi skyo zhing yongs su sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la rab tu dgod par bya bas mi skyo zhing yongs su sgyid lug pa 
[\[152b.6\]]med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_bskal pa brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i yang brjod du med par 'jig rten gyi khams re rer byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas mi skyo zhing yongs su sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams 
[\[152b.7\]]cad du rjes su spyod pas mi skyo zhing yongs su sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rtogs par bya ba dang /_yang dag par blta ba la mi skyo zhing yongs su sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi skyo zhing sgyid lug pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po yongs su skyo ba med pa bla na 
[\[153a.2\]]med pa thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems can kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang /_dbang po kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang /_las dang rnam 
[\[153a.3\]]par smin pa kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang /_skye ba kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang /_chos kyi dbyings kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang /_sangs rgyas kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang /_chos kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes 
[\[153a.4\]]dang /_dus gsum kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes dang /_tshig gi rgyud thams cad la ngag gi lam kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun tu dbye ba'i ye shes te/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub 
[\[153a.5\]]sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po kun tu dbye ba bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar chos thams cad mi brjed par 'dzin 
[\[153a.6\]]pa'i phyir thos pa'i gzungs dang /_chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu 'byed pa'i chos khong du chud pa'i gzungs dang /_chos kyi rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad nges par rtogs pa'i gzungs dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam 
[\[153a.7\]]gyis mi khyab pa thob pa'i phyir chos snang ba rab tu thob pa'i gzungs dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las chos mngon du thos pa yongs su mi zad pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin gyi gzungs dang /_sgra skad dang tha snyad bsam gyis 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]mi khyab pa la 'jug pa'i phyir dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa'i gzungs dang /_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa shin tu ston pa'i phyir dus gsum gyi gzungs dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[153b.2\]]mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad shin tu ston pa'i phyir rnam pa sna tshogs su spobs pa'i gzungs dang /_sangs rgyas byung ba brjod du med pa thams cad du rna ba'i dbang pos khyab par byed pa'i phyir thogs pa med pa'i rna ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i gzungs dang /_
[\[153b.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi bsnyengs pa la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi gzungs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs te/_de dag thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[153b.4\]]rnams kyi brtson par bya ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas bstan pa rjes su rtogs par bya ba ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar mngon par byang chub pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_smon lam gyi sangs rgyas dang /_
[\[153b.5\]]las rnam par smyin pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_byin gyis brlabs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_sprul pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi sangs rgyas dang /_sems kyi sangs rgyas dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sangs rgyas dang /_rang bzhin gyi sangs rgyas dang /_bsam pa ji lta ba'i 
[\[153b.6\]]sangs rgyas so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas bstan pa rjes su rtogs par bya ba rnams so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i sems bskyed 
[\[153b.7\]]pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems bskyed pa de ni 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i phyir byams pa chen po dang ldan pa'o/_/sems bskyed pa de ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rang gi lus kyis len pa'i phyir snying rje chen po dang ldan 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]pa'o/_/sems bskyed pa de ni ci bdog pa yongs su gtong ba'i phyir btang ba thams cad yongs su gtang ba sngon du 'gro ba'o/_/sems bskyed pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mngon par mos pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i 
[\[154a.2\]]ye shes yid la byed pa sngon du 'gro ba'o/_/sems bskyed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la nan tan du byed pas yon tan gyis brgyan pa'o/_/sems bskyed pa de ni skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du nyams par mi 'gyur bas rdo rje lta bu'o/_
[\[154a.3\]]sems bskyed pa de ni chos dkar po thams cad la yang dag par gzhol bas rgya mtsho lta bu'o/_/sems bskyed pa de ni gzhan gyis ngan du brjod pa dang ngan du smra ba dag bzod pa'i phyir ri bo chen po'i dbang po dam pa lta bu'o/_/sems bskyed pa de ni 
[\[154a.4\]]sems can thams cad la dbugs phyin pa chen pos sdud pa'i phyir bde bar byed pa'o/_/sems bskyed pa de ni chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pas mi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rtogs par khong du chud par bya ba'o/_/kye 
[\[154a.5\]]rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i sems bskyed pa ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams myur du kun tu bzang po'i ye shes khong du chud pa la mkhas pas 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/
[\[154a.6\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa thams cad du gnas pa'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so/_/ma byon pa'i de 
[\[154a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so/_/sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la dgod pa ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so/_/dge ba'i 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bstsags pa'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so/_/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[154b.2\]]par bya ba'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad brgyan pa'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skye ba gzung ba'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so/_
[\[154b.3\]]chos thams cad yongs su btsal zhing rab tu dbye ba la mkhas par bya ba'i smon lam ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i smon lam ni kun tu 
[\[154b.4\]]bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i chos te/_de dag gis smon cing mngon par brtson par byas na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams myur tu kun tu bzang po'i smon 
[\[154b.5\]]lam dang /_spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po bcu bzhi pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying 
[\[154b.6\]]rje chen po rab tu 'thob pa ste/_de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta'o/_/bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems can gyi khams mgon med pa rnams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje 
[\[154b.7\]]chen po rab tu thob pa dang /_sems can gyi khams theg pa med pa la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa bas dbul ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang /_yun ring 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]po nas gnyid kyis brgyal ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang /_dge ba med pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang /_'dod chags kyi 
[\[155a.2\]]bcing bas glags pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang /_srid pa'i gang chen mtshor rab tu gzhol bar gyur ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang /_yun ring po nas na ba'i sems can 
[\[155a.3\]]gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang /_dge ba'i chos la mos pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos las shin tu 'khyams par gyur pa'i sems can gyi khams la 
[\[155a.4\]]rnam par lta ba'i snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa ste de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can gyi khams la rnam par blta ba dag 
[\[155a.5\]]go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams rkyen gang gis byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen rnams te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems can gyi khams yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_rnam par 
[\[155a.6\]]gdul bar bya ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to/_/sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to/_/sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byad kyis sdud pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems 
[\[155a.7\]]kyi rkyen to/_/sems can thams cad kyi mi shes pa bstsal ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to/_/sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes nye bar bsgrub pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to/_/sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing rim 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]gror bya ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to/_/sangs rgyas thams cad ni sku gzugs dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su bstan pa'i rkyen ni byang chub 
[\[155b.2\]]kyi sems kyi rkyen to/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug cing khong du chud par byed pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to/_/sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang mi bsnyengs pa thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i rkyen ni byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen to/_/
[\[155b.3\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi rkyen te/_rkyen de dag gis byang chub kyi sems yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' gang gis bla na med pa 
[\[155b.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa des kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la rim gro dang bkur sti dang bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/de dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la rim 
[\[155b.5\]]gro dang /_bkur sti dang /_bsnyen bkur byed pa'i tshe/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la sems bskyed pa bcu po 'di dag bskyed par bya ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar rim gro bya ba'i sems dang /_dga' bar bya ba'i sems dang ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du nan tan 
[\[155b.6\]]tu bya ba'i sems dang yid mi 'byung ba'i sems dang /_ji snyam yang mi byed pa'i sems dang /_gcig tu nges pa'i sems dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i sems dang /_smon lam gcig pa'i sems dang /_ston 
[\[155b.7\]]pa'i sems dang /_spyod pa mtshungs par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i sems te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la sems bskyed pa rnams so/_/de sems bskyed pa bcu po 'di dag bskyed pa'i tshe yongs su dag 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]pa bcu rab tu 'thob par 'gyur te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar chud mi za ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dang /_sems can ji lta bur 'dul ba bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir gzugs yongs su dag pa dang /_sgra 
[\[156a.2\]]skad dang tha snyad bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir spobs pa yongs su dag pa dang /_mi shes pa thams 
[\[156a.3\]]cad dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir ye shes yongs su dag pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir skye ba yongs su dag pa dang /_sngon skal ba mnyam par spyad pa'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs 
[\[156a.4\]]su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'khor yongs su dag pa dang /_sgrib pa'i las thams cad spangs pas rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang tshul gcig tu bya ba'i phyir smon lam yongs 
[\[156a.5\]]su dag pa dang /_kun tu bzang po'i theg pas 'byung ba'i phyir spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste/_yongs su dag pa bcu po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_
[\[156a.6\]]bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang ba'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims yongs su sbyang ba'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i stobs kyis bsam pa mi 'khrugs 
[\[156a.7\]]pas sangs rgyas kyi stobs la sbyar ba'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_mos pa thams cad las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_dran pa rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi stobs la 'jug pa'i phyir ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_kun tu bzang po'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs 
[\[156b.2\]]par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rol tu phyin pa dang /_chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir chos kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[156b.3\]]pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur 
[\[156b.4\]]ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa khong du chud par bya ba ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rnam pa tha dad pa shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /_sems 
[\[156b.5\]]can gyi khams thams cad kyi rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /_chos thams cad la gcig pa dang tha dad par yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings 
[\[156b.6\]]'byam klas pa thams cad shin tu bstan pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyis klas pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi 'jug/
[\[156b.7\]]pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la 'das pa'i dus kyi 'jug pa'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi 'jug pa'i shes pa khong du 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]chud par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa dang /_smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya bas gcig tu rtogs par 'gyur ba'i shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /_'das pa 
[\[157a.2\]]dag ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyod pa gcig gis byung ba'i shes pa khong du chud par bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes pa khong du chud par bya ba ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub 
[\[157a.3\]]sems dpa' rnams chos snang ba thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba thob pa dang /_bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa thob pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu mos pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon 
[\[157a.4\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rab tu rtogs pa ste/_bcu gang zhen 'di ltar chos thams cad la tshul gcig tu rtogs pa dang /_chos thams cad la tshul tha dad par 
[\[157a.5\]]rtogs pa dang /_chos thams cad la mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs pa dang /_sems can gyi sems dang /_bsam pa thams cad la chags pa med pa'i ye shes su rtogs pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang /_sems 
[\[157a.6\]]can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang /_bag chags kyi spyod pa rtogs pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal ba'i spyod pa rtogs pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad rtogs pa dang /_
[\[157a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam dang rnam par rtse ba dang /_'phrul pa dang /_byin gyi rlabs thams cad rtogs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma lus par mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i byin gyi rlabs rtogs pa'o/_/
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtogs pa ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 
[\[157b.2\]]'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi shugs te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la 'jug pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang /_chos thams cad sprul pa lta bu'i stobs kyi shugs dang /_chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'i 
[\[157b.3\]]stobs kyi shugs dang /_chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos su 'jug pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang /_chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shin tu mos pa'i stobs 
[\[157b.4\]]kyi shugs dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la shin tu gus pa'i bsam pa mi gtong ba'i stobs kyi shugs dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis ye shes kyi rgyal po chen po mnyes par byed pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[157b.5\]]chos thams cad la zab par yid ches pas mi spangs pa'i stobs kyi shugs dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems las [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par mkhas pa'i stobs kyi shugs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[157b.6\]]kyi stobs kyi shugs te/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de/_
[\[157b.7\]]bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang /_smon lam thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang /_spyod pa thams cad la mnyam 
[\[158a.2\]]pa nyid dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la mnyam pa nyid do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid bla na med 
[\[158a.3\]]pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul gyi lam rnams te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ming tsam mo/_/chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/_/
[\[158a.4\]]chos thams cad ni mig yor lta bu'o/_/chos thams cad ni rten pa tsam mo/_/chos thams cad ni las dang bral ba'o/_/chos thams cad ni mi zad pa'i sbyor ba'o/_/chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' 'o/_/chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med 
[\[158a.5\]]pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni don dam pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul gyi lam ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[158a.6\]]rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul la mkhas pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos bstan pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar zab mo'i chos bstan pa dang /_
[\[158a.7\]]yangs pa'i chos bstan pa dang /_sna tshogs kyi chos bstan pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brjod pa mang po'i chos bstan pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]bsgrub pa'i chos bstan pa dang /_dus gsum dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpas bya ba'i chos bstan pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang /_legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i chos bstan pa dang /_
[\[158b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[158b.3\]]rnams kyi chos bstan pa ste de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos bstan pa chen po bla na med pa ston par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[158b.4\]]rnams kyi yongs su gzung ba ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs rnams yongs su gzung ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i chos bstan pa rnams yongs su gzung ba 
[\[158b.5\]]dang /_dpe dang mthun par bstan pa thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang /_chos kyi tshul dang /_sgo thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang /_gzungs thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo rnams yongs su gzung ba dang /_the tsom thams cad 
[\[158b.6\]]yongs su gcod pa rnams yongs su gzung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bsgrub pa thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu bstan pa'i sgo rnams yongs su gzung ba 
[\[158b.7\]]dang /_chos snang ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par sprul pa dang /_rnam par rol pa dang /_byin gyi rlabs rnams yongs su gzung ba'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su gzung ba ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po yongs su gzung ba'o/_/bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag 
[\[159a.2\]]go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar chos thams cad la rnam par ma brtags pa'i spobs pa dang /_chos thams cad la mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /_chos 
[\[159a.3\]]thams cad la mi gnas pa'i spobs pa dang /_chos thams cad la stong pa nyid du snang ba'i spobs pa dang /_chos thams cad la mun pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /_chos thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi spobs pa dang /_chos thams 
[\[159a.4\]]cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i spobs pa dang /_chos thams cad la tshig gi bye brag mkhas pa'i spobs pa dang /_chos thams cad la de kho na nyid bstan pa'i spobs pa dang /_sems can gyi sems dang /_spyod pa thams cad la bsam pa ji lta ba 
[\[159a.5\]]bzhin du tshim par byed pa'i spobs pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spobs pa la mkhas pa bla na med pa 'thob 
[\[159a.6\]]par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed cing 'dul ba'i ye shes kyi dbang dang /_chos thams cad snang ba rab 
[\[159a.7\]]tu 'thob pa'i dbang dang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la spyod pa'i dbang dang ye shes chen po'i dbang dang mi gnas pa'i tshul khrims kyi dbang dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i dbang dang /_brtson 'grus brtsams pa thams 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]cad las phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes kyi dbang dang /_bdud thams cad shin tu pham par bya ba'i ye shes kyi dbang dang /_gang du dga' bar 'gro bar byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i ye shes kyi dbang dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub nam 'dod pa 
[\[159b.2\]]na mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i ye shes kyi dbang ngo /_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i dbang bla na med pa 'thob 
[\[159b.3\]]bar 'gyur ba dag go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi gnas pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la mi gnas pa dang /_sems can thams cad la mi gnas pa dang /_
[\[159b.4\]]chos thams cad la mi gnas pa dang /_bya ba thams cad la mi gnas pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la mi gnas pa dang /_skye ba'i skye mched thams cad la mi gnas pa dang /_smon lam thams cad la mi gnas pa dang /_spyod pa thams 
[\[159b.5\]]cad la mi gnas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mi gnas pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la mi gnas pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi gnas pa ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang 
[\[159b.6\]]chub sems dpa' rnams sems yangs par bsgyur ba yongs su shes pa'i ye shes yongs su dag cing bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems mnyam pa nyid de/_
[\[159b.7\]]bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar bsod nams thams cad bstsags pa la sems mnyam pa nyid dang /_smon lam rnam pa tha dad pas 'byung ba thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang /_sems can gyi rigs thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang /_sems 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]can gyi las rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang /_chos la 'jug pa thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang /_zhing kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par dag pa thams cad la sems 
[\[160a.2\]]mnyam pa nyid dang /_sems can gyi mos pa la 'jug pa thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang /_spyod pa'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang mi bsnyengs pa la 'jug pa thams cad la sems mnyam 
[\[160a.3\]]pa nyid dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug pa khong du chud par bya ba la sems mnyam pa nyid do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems mnyam pa nyid de/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub 
[\[160a.4\]]sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa mnyam pa nyid rgya che zhing bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 
[\[160a.5\]]sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi mos pa khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_phyogs kyi dra ba rnam par dbye 
[\[160a.6\]]ba thams cad khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams spyi'u tshugs su rgyu ba dang snrel zhir rgyu ba thams cad khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_chos thams cad 
[\[160a.7\]]gcig pa dang /_tha dad pa'i 'byam klas par rnam par dgong pa la mkhas pa khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_lus kyi rgyud thams cad khong du chud par bya ba la 'jug par zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]'du shes kyis phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi rnam pa'i 'du shes dang /_rlom sems khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_chos kyi rgyud thams cad la 'byung ba gcig gi mthar thug par 'jug pa khong du chud par 
[\[160b.2\]]bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_byin gyi rlabs khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad 
[\[160b.3\]]kyi dus gsum du 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rigs thams cad rgyun mi gcod pa khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa 
[\[160b.4\]]ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos gang la yang mgo rmongs par mi 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sprul pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems can sprul 
[\[160b.5\]]pa dang /_lus sprul pa dang /_zhing sprul pa dang /_mchod pa sprul pa dang /_dbyangs sprul pa dang /_spyod pa dang smon lam sprul pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba sprul pa dang /_mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa 
[\[160b.6\]]sprul pa dang /_chos bstan pa sprul pa dang /_byin gyi rlabs sprul pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sprul pa ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad sprul pa 
[\[160b.7\]]yongs su rdzogs pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_chos kyi byin gyi 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]rlabs dang /_sems can gyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_las kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_spyod yul gyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_dus kyi 
[\[161a.2\]]byin gyi rlabs dang /_dge ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs te/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[161a.3\]]chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shin tu dbugs phyin pa rab tu rnyed pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la 
[\[161a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa gang ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad mnyes par bya'o/_/zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[161a.5\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang sangs rgyas kyi tshul dang 'dra ba'i rim gro bla na med pa bya'o/_/mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bla na med pa bya'o/_/zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo/_/bdag gis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[161a.6\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mchod nas kyang gdams ngag gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i sar byung bar gyur pa dang /_'byung ba dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gdams ngag dang man 
[\[161a.7\]]dag bstan pa mdzad kyis gdams ngag dang man ngag de'ang bdag gis bsam pa thag pas rim gro byas te/_mnyan la yang dag par nan tan tu bya'o/_/zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu 'thob bo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag bskal pa brjod du med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes dbugs phyin pa chen 
[\[161b.2\]]po rab tu 'thob bo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_sngon bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs pa'i tshe/_'di lta ste/_'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa'am/_grags 
[\[161b.3\]]pa med pa'i 'jigs pa'am/_'chi ba'i 'jigs pa'am/_ngan song gi 'jigs pa'am/_'khor du bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa'ang rung ste/_ji snyed kyi 'jigs par gyur pa de dag thams cad ni rnam par bzlog par gyur/_ring du byas par gyur rnam par 
[\[161b.4\]]bcil bar gyur te/_byang chub kyi sems bskyed ma thag tu cis kyang mi 'jigs par gyur to/_/mi sdangs par gyur to/_/skyi g.ya' ba med par gyur to/_/cis kyang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/sdangs bar mi 'gyur ro/_/skyi g.ya' bar mi 'gyur 
[\[161b.5\]]ro/_/de bas na brtan zhing rnam par gnon la zil gyis mi non pas bdud dang mu stegs can dang /_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi thub par gyur to/_/zhes dbugs phyin pa chen po rab tu thob bo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[161b.6\]]sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems bskyed de/_bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can gyi khams thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par bya'o/_/rab tu dgod par bya'o/_/de 
[\[161b.7\]]dag byang chub thob par gyur nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la dad pa chen po dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas tshe'i tshad kyi mthar thug gi bar du sangs rgyas la 'os pa'i rim gros mchod pa dang /_
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]bkur sti bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang sku gzugs la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir mchod rten tshad med pa mang po bya'o/_/de dag gi bstan pa yang yongs su bsrung bar bya'o/_/de
