[\[206b.7\]]pa'i chos te/_de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam dang mthun pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa'i chos dang po'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can gyi khams yongs su sdud cing /_'jig rten gyi zang zing dang /_chos 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i ngang tshul can/_bzhin 'dzum pa snyan par smra ba tshig 'jam pa/_sems can thams cad kyi sems mngon par dga' ba/_don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 
[\[207a.2\]]kyi don khong du chud par byed pa/_mi mnyam pa'i sems med pa/_sems can thams cad la snyoms par don du sems pa dag ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar ma bstan par sems can gyi khams yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir nan tan du byed pa 'di ni byang chub 
[\[207a.3\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi ma 'dres pa ste/_de ltar bsdu ba'i dngos po'i lam dang mthun pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma 'dres pa gnyis pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul la mkhas shing rnam par/_
[\[207a.4\]]smin pa la re ba med par/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rjes su song bar yongs su bsngo zhing 'jig rten gyi snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la ye brngam pa med pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la rab tu gnas shing sems can gyi don du yongs su bsngo ste/_kye 
[\[207a.5\]]rgyal ba'i sras de ltar ma bstan par dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad brtsam pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes de ltar tshol zhing sems can gyi don yongs su tshol ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma 'dres pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 
[\[207a.6\]]chos ma 'dres pa gsum pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pas sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang zhing 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi lam la yongs su skyo ba med pa'i yid dang ldan te/_
[\[207a.7\]]'phags pa'i spyod yul la mngon du bltas la/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'byung ba las phyir phyogs te/_sems can thams cad yongs su smin pa la mngon par brtson zhing /_bdag gi bde ba la chags pa med de/_bsam gtan 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]dang rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par ldang ba la mkhas pas rang gi dbang du gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med pa'i sems dang ldan te/_'khor ba la bza' shing gi rab lta bu'i 'du shes chen po 
[\[207b.2\]]thob pa dang /_bdud kyi khyim thams cad na gnas pa dang /_brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad kyi dbang chen po yongs su ston cing skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du gzugs brnyan byung bar gyur la/_zhags pa 'thub pa'i rab tu byung ba thams 
[\[207b.3\]]cad kyi lta ba dang bral te/_'jig rten pa'i rang bzo dang /_sngags dang gtsug lag dang /_yi ge dang shod thabs dang grangs dang rtsis dang /_rang gi rtsed mo dang /_'jig rten pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongs su ston cing /_bud med kyi cho ga dang /_mtshan ma dang 
[\[207b.4\]]cha lugs dang /_sgyu rtsal thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pa/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mnyan pa dang /_dpyad pa dang dri ba dang /_brtag pa shin tu bstan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i 
[\[207b.5\]]dgos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/_sems can thams cad kyis ngor blta ba dbang dang ldan pa dang /_rang rgyal ba thams cad kyi cho ga dang /_spyod lam yongs su ston pa/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 
[\[207b.6\]]'tshang rgya ba skad cig skad cig tu ston pa/_spyod pa'i rgyun yongs su mi gcod pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob kyang bstan pa med pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma 'dres pa'i chos te/_'di ni byang 
[\[207b.7\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa bzhi pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' zung dang snel zhi la mkhas shing ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pas/_'di ltar mya ngan las 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]'das pa la gnas kyang /_'khor ba'i sgo yongs su ston pa/_sems can med pa'i mtha'i spyod yul dang ldan yang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba ma btang ba shin tu dul ba dang /_zhi ba'i pha rol du phyin pa'i mchog thob 
[\[208a.2\]]kyang /_nyon mongs pa'i 'bar ba sems can la yongs su ston pa/_chos kyi ye shes gcig tu stug pa'i lus dang ldan yang sems kyi sgo mtha' yas pa yongs su ston pa/_bsam gtan chen po la bsam gtan 'cha' yang 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad 
[\[208a.3\]]kyis rtse zhing longs spyod par sems can la rnam par ston pas gcig tu dga' bar dga' zhing mos pa/_khams gsum pa thams cad las phyir ltas kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i bsam pa ma btang ba/_rtag tu chos kyi dga' bas dga' 
[\[208a.4\]]zhing mos kyang lha'i bu mo brgya phrag stong gi sgra rab tu phyung ba dang rtse ba/_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang /_dge ba'i mchog brgya phrag stong gis brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan yang dbul ba thams cad kyi tshul yongs su ston pa/_rtag tu kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las dge ba spyad 
[\[208a.5\]]kyang sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba yang yongs su ston pa/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus las gyen du ma g.yos pa dag ste/_
[\[208a.6\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ye shes mu med pa dang ldan pas/_de'i phyir de dag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang khong du chud par dka' na sems can byis pa gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_'di ni byang chub 
[\[208a.7\]]sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa lnga pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus dang ngag dang yid ye shes sngon du 'gro ba dang ldan pa ste/_las shin tu dag par spyod cing /_srog gcod pa dang bral ba nas sdig pa'i lta ba'i bar dang bral bas byams 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]pa phun sum tshogs shing yang dag pa'i lta ba la zhugs pa yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro ba dang ldan pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos 
[\[208b.2\]]ma 'dres pa drug pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pas sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong zhing sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rang gi lus kyis len par mkhas pas/_sems can dmyal ba 
[\[208b.3\]]dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal gyis sems can gyi don du yongs su skyo ba med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing sems can gyi khams thams cad dgrol ba la zhugs pa/_'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad kyis rtse zhing yongs su 
[\[208b.4\]]longs spyod pa la chags pa med pa'i yid dang ldan pas rtag tu sems can rnams sdug bsngal gyi phung po las dgrol ba la mngon par brtson pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar snying rje chen po'i stobs yongs su mi gtong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 
[\[208b.5\]]'dres pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bdun pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing mthong na dga' ba ste/_brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad kyis phyag 
[\[208b.6\]]bya ba/_'gro ba thams cad mthong bar smon pa/_sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams sngon nas las kyi mtha' kha na ma tho ba med pa dang ldan zhing yongs su 
[\[208b.7\]]dag pa'i las kyi tshul gyis spyos pas/_de'i phyir de dag mthong bas/_'gro ba thams cad mi ngoms pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar 'gro ba thams cad mthong bar mngon par dga' ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa ste/_'di ni byang chub 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems brtan pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i go ca shin tu bgos pas/_de dag ji ltar nyon mongs shing byis 
[\[209a.2\]]pa'i skye bo'i 'du 'dzi dang /_ji ltar bsten tam/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi tshogs kyi nang du ji ltar phyin kyang rung ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che bzang po 'od dang ldan pa de 'jig par mi byed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de ni 'di lta ste 
[\[209a.3\]]dper na nor bu rin po che chen po rgyan bzang po zhes bya ba de chu dang bar byed pa ni pad mo'i rdzing bu ji ltar rnyog kyang rung ste/_nang du bcug na nor bu rin po che'i 'od gsal zhing bzang po de nyid rnam par mi spong ste/_chu de thams cad kyang rnyog pa med par rab tu dang bar byed do/_/kye 
[\[209a.4\]]rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang byis pa'i skye bo'i 'du 'dzis ji ltar bsten kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che'i 'od gsal zhing snang ba bzang po de chud zos par mi byed de sems can de dag kyang nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa de las zlog cing thams cad 
[\[209a.5\]]mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che'i 'od gsal zhing snang ba de nyid la rab tu 'god do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar ci ltar nyon mongs par gyur kyang rung /_byis pa'i skye bo'i 'du 'dzi dang /_ji ltar bsten tam/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi tshogs kyi nang du ji ltar 
[\[209a.6\]]phyin kyang rung ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che de nyid 'jig par mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa dgu pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rang gi yul gyi 
[\[209a.7\]]ye shes kyi chos la dbang bsgyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pa ste/_rang byung gi ye shes kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur zhing go 'phang skyon med pa la gnas kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gnas pa ring du mi spong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro bya ba'i 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]rgyun mi gcod de/_de ltar tshul phun sum tshogs pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad du dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa las phyir mi ldog cing de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro bya ba rgyun mi gcod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa ste/_'di ni byang chub 
[\[209b.2\]]sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bcu pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos ma 'dres pa ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ma 'dres pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/
[\[209b.3\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su sbyang ba'i las dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur ba'i las dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i grogs thams 
[\[209b.4\]]cad dang dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig tu bya ba'i las dang /_sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i las dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug bar yongs su gzung ba'i las dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro yang 'jig 
[\[209b.5\]]rten gyi khams gcig nas mi g.yo ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi las dang /_kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od gzer dgye ba'i 'od kyi las dang /_pad mo'i snying po la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs 'khod pa yongs su bstan pa'i 'od gzer gyi las dang /_mya ngan las 'das 
[\[209b.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa gzung bas dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcad pa'i las dang /_'jig rten thams cad du rgyu zhing chos bstan pa dang /_sems can gdul ba yang dag par bsgrub pa'i sprul pa'i las dang /_nam 
[\[209b.7\]]'dod pa dang nam sems bskyed pa na smon lam yongs su rdzogs par sems can la yang dag par ston pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi las so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi las te/_de dag la 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las rgya chen po bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di 
[\[210a.2\]]ltar 'gro ba thams cad du byung ba med pas/_byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni 'ongs pa med pa'o_/'gro ba thams cad du mi dmigs pa med pas byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni 'ongs pa'o/_/'jig rten thams cad kyis dmigs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub 
[\[210a.3\]]sems dpa'i lus ni bden pa ma yin pa'o/_/'jig rten gyi bden pa rnam par dmigs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa ma yin no/_/phyi ma'i mtha'i mur rgyun mi 'chad pas byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni rgyun mi zad pa'o/_/bdud 
[\[210a.4\]]thams cad kyis mi shigs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus ni brten pa'o/_/bdud kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi sgul bas byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni sra ba'o/_/bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par dag par snang bas byang 
[\[210a.5\]]chub sems dpa'i lus ni mtshan bzang po dang ldan pa'o/_/chos kyi mtshan nyid med pa'i mthar thug pas byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[210a.6\]]sku dang mnyam pa nyid thob pas byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni kun tu song ba'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus te/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mi zad pa bla na 
[\[210a.7\]]med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus kyi las te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus gcig gis rgyas par 'gengs pa'i lus kyi las dang /_sems 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]can gyi khams thams cad du sgo yongs su ston pa'i lus kyi las dang /_skye ba thams cad du gnas pa'i lus kyi las dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba'i lus kyi las dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba'i lus kyi 
[\[210b.2\]]las dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lag pa gcig gis kun tu khebs par byed pa'i lus kyi las dang /_khor yug dang /_rdo rje'i ri thams cad lag pa gcig gis nyug pa'i lus kyi las dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rang gi lus 'jig pa 
[\[210b.3\]]dang /_'byung ba yongs su ston pa'i lus kyi las dang sems can gyi khams thams cad lus gcig gis yongs su 'dzin pa'i lus kyi las dang /_sems can gyi khams thams cad lus med par khong du chud pas zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_yongs su rdzogs pa kun 
[\[210b.4\]]tu ston pa'i lus kyi las so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus kyi las te/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos 'gro ba kun gyis rnam par rig par bya ba bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba 
[\[210b.5\]]dag go/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang bzhin te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar nan tan dang ldan pas pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang /_'gro ba thams cad yongs su mi gtong bas/_bsdu ba'i dngos po'i rang bzhin dang /_
[\[210b.6\]]sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rang gi lus kyis len kyang /_yongs su mi skyo bas snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin dang /_'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pas byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin dang /_'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho bas bsod nams 
[\[210b.7\]]kyi rang bzhin dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang /_gcig tu 'dres pas ye shes kyi rang bzhin dang /_skye ba'i skye mched thams cad las 'das pas chos kyi rang bzhin dang /_thams cad du sgo yongs su ston pas thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang /_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]dang rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad yongs su ston pas/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rang bzhin dang /_nam 'dod pa'i dus su mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas/_byang chub kyi rang bzhin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub 
[\[211a.2\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi rang bzhin te/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i rang bzhin bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni/_byang chub sems 
[\[211a.3\]]dpa' rnams kyi ngag ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar sems can thams cad bde bar byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni 'jam pa'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi sems sim par byed pas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni 
[\[211a.4\]]snyan pa'o/_/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du go bar byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni mi [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o/_/rmi lam na yang log par mi smra bas byang chub sems dpa'i ngag ni bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'o/_/brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_
[\[211a.5\]]'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad zil gyis gnon pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni rgya che ba'o/_/chos kyi rang bzhin ston pas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni zab mo'i dbyangs su sgrog pa'o/_/chos bstan pa thams cad 
[\[211a.6\]]mi zad pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni snying po dang ldan pa'o/_/sgra ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par byed pas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni shin tu gsal ba'o/_/dus dang las dang rnam par smin pa ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[211a.7\]]yongs su ston pas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni rnam pa tha dad pa'o/_/bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par spyod pa la 'jug par byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ni 'gro ba thams cad la 'gro ba'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i ngag de yang las rnam 
[\[211b.2\]]par dag pa bcus yongs su sbyangs pa yin te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung la mos pa yongs su dag pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshig sngon ma thos pa la mngon par mos pa yongs su dag pa dang /_'gro ba thams 
[\[211b.3\]]cad kyi yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig yongs su spangs pas yongs su dag pa dang /_sngon gyi mthar ngag gi nyes pa bzhi dang bral bas yongs su dag pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_mos pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par bstod pas yongs su dag pa 
[\[211b.4\]]dang /_sgra chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par 'os pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang /_legs pa brjod pas yongs su dag pa dang /_bsam pa thag pas sems can gzhan la chos kyi sbyin pas/_sdud 
[\[211b.5\]]pa yongs su dag pa dang /_glu'i dbyangs dang /_rol mo brdung ba dang /_dkrol ba'i dbyangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod pas yongs su dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las mngon sum du chos thos nas/_
[\[211b.6\]]rang gi lus 'bul bas yongs su dag pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos smra ba thams cad las chos thos nas/_rim gro bya ba'i phyir bdag 'bul zhing snying thag pa nas yongs su btang bas yongs su dag pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub 
[\[211b.7\]]sems dpa'i ngag ni las rnam par dag pa bcu po de dag gis shin tu sbyangs par 'byung ngo /_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngag de ltar yongs su sangs pa de yang yongs su 'dzin pa bcus/_yongs su gzung bar 'byung ste/_
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar lha'i dbang po la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa lha thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'byung ba yin/_klu'i dbang po dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang /_dri za'i dbang po dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang /_nam mkha' lding 
[\[212a.2\]]gi dbang po dang /_mi'am ci'i dbang po dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dang /_tshangs pa'i dbang po la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'byung ba yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbang po la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]
[\[212a.3\]]pa chos smra ba thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'byung ba yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i dag ni yongs su 'dzin pa/_bcu po de dag gis shin tu gzung bar 'byung ngo /_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'i ngag de ltar shin tu 
[\[212a.4\]]gzung bar 'byung ba de yang dgos pa bcu yongs su grub par byed de/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar sems can gyi khams mngon par dga' bar byed do/_/'jig rten gyi khams su go bar byed do/_/dbang po'i khams la 'jug par byed do/_/
[\[212a.5\]]mos pa'i khams rnam par dag par byed do/_/nyon mongs pa'i khams sel bar byed do/_/bag chags kyi khams spong bar byed do/_/bsam pa'i khams sbyong bar byed do/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khams rnam par 'phel bar byed do/_/chos 
[\[212a.6\]]kyi khams rgyas par byed do/_/mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams yang dag par rtogs par byed do/_/dgos pa bcu po de dag yongs su sgrub bo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'gro 
[\[212a.7\]]ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par 'dzin cing rton pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni sa lta bu'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rgya chen po'i rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs pas/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]rnams kyi sems ni rgya mtsho lta bu'o/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu mtho ba la 'gro ba thams cad rab tu dgod pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni ri bo chen po lta bu'o/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing bsam pa dag pa dang ldan 
[\[212b.2\]]pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni nor bu rin po che lta bu'o/_/chos thams cad la rab tu rno bas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni rdo rje lta bu'o/_/bdud dang mu stegs can gzhan dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi skul 
[\[212b.3\]]bas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni ri'i rgyal po rdo rje'i khor yug shin tu brtan zhing mi shigs pa lta bu'o/_/'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis mi gos pas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni pad mo lta bu'o/_/bskal pa thams 
[\[212b.4\]]cad du 'byung ba dang /_mthong bar dka' bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni me tog u dum bA ra lta bu'o/_/'gro ba thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag dang /_rab rib kyi rmugs pa sel ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[212b.5\]]kyi sems ni nyi ma lta bu'o/_/'gro ba thams cad kyis brjod du med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems ni bar snang lta bu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems te/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[212b.6\]]rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa rgya chen po yongs su dag pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad rab 
[\[212b.7\]]tu dgrol bar bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do/_/sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa bstsal bar bya'o/_/zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do/_/bag chags kyi mtshams 'brel ba thams cad spang bar bya'o/_/
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do/_/chos thams cad la the tsom med par thob par bya'o/_/zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do/_/sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rab tu zhi bar bya'o/_/zhes byang chub 
[\[213a.2\]]sems dpa' sems bskyed do/_/ngan song dang mi khom pa thams cad gcad par bya'o/_/zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya'o/_/zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do/_/byang 
[\[213a.3\]]chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la nan tan tu bya'o/_/zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do/_/skra'i sbubs su 'jug pa thams cad kyang ma lus par 'gro ba thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad byang chub tu 'tshang rgya ba bstan par bya'o/_/
[\[213a.4\]]zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed do/_/'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad kyi bsam pa dang /_dbang po rab tu rtogs pas/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du grags par bya bar chos kyi rnga bla na med pa brdung bar bya'o/_/zhes byang chub sems 
[\[213a.5\]]dpa' sems bskyed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa rgya chen po'i phrin las bla na med pa rtsom par 'gyur 
[\[213a.6\]]ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyis rgyas par dgang ba ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems shin tu yangs pa dang ldan pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang /_mtha' 
[\[213a.7\]]dang dbus med par khong du chud pas chos kyi dbyings/_thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang /_skad cig gcig tu 'dzud pas dus gsum thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang /_gshegs pa dang skye ba dang 'byung ba dang rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa chen po mngon sum du shes pas sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad du rgyas par dgang ba dang /_bag chags dang dbang po nam mkha' lta bur khong du chud pas/_sems can gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par dgang ba dang /_
[\[213b.2\]]chos kyi dbyings thams cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas mig yor lta bu'i ye shes kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang /_sgyu ma'i dra ba rnam pa tha dad pa lta bur khong du chud pas mtha' dang dbus med par rgyas par dgang ba dang rang bzhin mi dmigs pas mi skye bar 
[\[213b.3\]]rgyas par dgang ba dang /_rang gi sems dang gzhan gyi sems la thogs pa med pas chags pa med par rgyas par dgang ba dang /_sems bskyed pa thams cad la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yongs su ston pas dbang gis rgyas par dgang ba'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[213b.4\]]bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyis rgyas par dgang ba ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis rgyas par dgang ba mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rgyan bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/_/kye rgyal 
[\[213b.5\]]ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar dad pa phyir ldog pa med pas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni dga' bar byed pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[213b.6\]]thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bar byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni mngon par mos pa'o/_/bya ba thams cad thogs pa med pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni phyir mi ldog pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams 
[\[213b.7\]]cad rgyun mi gcod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni gnas pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul khong du chud pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni shin tu phra ba'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi dgos pa yongs su 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]grub par byed pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/_/chos thams cad la rab tu rno ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni rdo rje lta bu'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la 
[\[214a.2\]]snang ba thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni rdo rje'i 'od 'phro ba ltar snang bar byed pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang lus gcig tu gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni tha mi dad pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[214a.3\]]stobs kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ni chags pa med pa'i mthar phyin pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems 
[\[214a.4\]]dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po rgya chen po yongs su rdzogs pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[214a.5\]]rnams kyi bsam pa 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yid la bya ba dang ma 'dres pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa sangs 
[\[214a.6\]]rgyas kyi byang chub kyi rjes su song ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su 'byung ba'i lam dang mthun pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa bdud dang mu stegs can gzhan dang /_mu 
[\[214a.7\]]stegs spyod pa'i rgol ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par dag pas kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa chos ji skad du thos pa yongs su mi gtong bas/_shin tu zin par yang dag par 'dzin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa skye ba'i skye mched thams cad kyis ma gos pas yongs su nyams pa med pa dang /_byang 
[\[214b.2\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa ye shes phra ba la zhugs pa'i phyir zab pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la shin tu brtson pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[214b.3\]]kyi bsam pa ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i dgongs pa bla na med pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam 
[\[214b.4\]]pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bstsags pa la phyir mi ldog par dbang bsgyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[214b.5\]]cad kyi dgongs pa'i tshul bstan pa la nem nur med pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa smon lam dang spyod pa chen po'i rgyun yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[214b.6\]]thams cad la 'jug par bya ba la phul du phyin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur bas mngon sum du gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa chos sna 
[\[214b.7\]]tshogs kyi tshul la rab tu zhugs pas/_rgya che ba dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin par byed pas gtso bor gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyan thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa sngon gyi smon lam gyis yongs su bzung bas shin tu brtan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[215a.2\]]rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba la rgyun mi gcod pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[215a.3\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lhag pa'i dgongs pa bla na med pa yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/_//sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po bcu dgu pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[215a.4\]]bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar rnam par smin pa la re ba med par bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i sbyor ba dang /_gzhan la brnyas pa med pas byang 
[\[215a.5\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims dang /_bslab pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_sdom pa dang /_brtul zhugs dang dka' thub thams cad du yi dam bcas pa la nan tan byed pa'i sbyor ba dang /_bdag dang pha rol gyi 'du shes med 
[\[215a.6\]]pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnod sems kyi tha ba dang /_gshe ba thams cad rna la gzon cing sems can gyi ngan du byas pa thams cad bzod pa'i sbyor ba dang /_lus dang ngag dang sems yang dag par bskul bas brtsams pa thams cad mthar 
[\[215a.7\]]phyin par byed pa'i phyir/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa thams cad las phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang /_'dod pa'i 'khrug pa dang nyon mongs pa'i g.yog 'khor yongs su mi spong bas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_mngon par shes pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba dang bsod nams bstsags pa thams cad la skyo ba med pas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab 
[\[215b.2\]]kyi nan tan gyi sbyor ba dang /_sems can med pa la zhugs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa chen po'i sbyor ba dang /_chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug 
[\[215b.3\]]bsngal rang gi lus kyis len pa'i snying rje chen po las phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba dang /_chags pa med par khong du chud pas 'gro ba thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par 
[\[215b.4\]]'tshang rgya ba'i sbyor ba dang /_sems can gzhan gyi rgyud du phyin par byed pas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi ldog pa'i sbyor ba'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba 
[\[215b.5\]]ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i sbyor ba bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 
[\[215b.6\]]'di ltar bsgrub par dka' ba'i rtsa ba sbyor bas rlabs po che'i mos pa dang /_rgyan sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub pas sna tshogs kyi mos pa dang /_yid zhum pa med pas rgya chen po'i mos pa dang /_chos zab mo'i tshul la zhugs pas zhi bar byed pa'i mos pa dang /_
[\[215b.7\]]sems rgya chen po bskyed pas yangs pa'i mos pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu dang /_shugs su ldan pas rang gi skabs phye ba'i mos pa dang /_bdud kyi las thams cad rab tu 'joms pas mi 'phrogs pa'i mos pa dang /_
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]las kyi rnam par smin pa la gcig tu nges pas shin tu gdon mi za ba'i mos pa dang /_ci 'dod pa'i cho 'phrul yongs su ston pas mngon du gyur pa'i mos pa dang stobs dang mi ldan pa med pa'i phyir dus gang du 'dod 
[\[216a.2\]]par byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis lung bstan pa yang dag par nod pa'i mos pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa ste de dag la gnas shing byang chub 
[\[216a.3\]]sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su mos pa la 'jug pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 
[\[216a.4\]]'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu mos pa la 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gcig 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mos pa la 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad pad mo'i gdan gcig la 
[\[216a.5\]]bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su khyab par mos pa la 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin du yang dag par bstan par mos pa la 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas 
[\[216a.6\]]kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par mos pa la 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyis rgyas par dgang bar mos pa la 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad skra'i sbubs gcig tu dgod par mos pa la 'jug 
[\[216a.7\]]pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sems can gcig gi lus kyi rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang bar mos pa la 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi byang chub kyi shing dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]snying po byang chub kyis yongs su rgyas par gang bar mos pa la 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sgra'i dbyangs gcig gis go bar bya ba dang /_sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sgra skad rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug pas tshim par bya bar mos pa la 
[\[216b.2\]]'jug pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su mos pa la 'jug pa ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing la mos pa bla na med 
[\[216b.3\]]pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can gyi khams su mos pa la 'jug pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad rang bzhin gyis lus med par mos pa la 
[\[216b.4\]]'jug pa dang /_sems can gyi khams thams cad sems can gcig gi lus kyi rgyud du 'dus par mos pa la 'jug pa dang /_sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i khong du 'dus par mos pa la 'jug pa dang /_sems can 
[\[216b.5\]]gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur 'dus par mos pa la 'jug pa dang /_sems can gyi khams thams cad du sems can gcig gi lus yongs su zhugs par 'gyur bar mos pa la 'jug pa dang /_sems can gyi khams 
[\[216b.6\]]thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod du mos pa la 'jug pa dang /_sems can gyi khams thams cad brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi mgon po dang /_ci 'dod pa dang /_gar mos pa'i gzugs dang /_kha dog dang cha 
[\[216b.7\]]byad du mngon par blta bar mos pa la 'jug pa dang /_sems can gyi khams thams cad nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang kha dog dang cha byad du yongs su bstan par mos pa la 'jug pa dang /_sems can gyi khams thams cad byang 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyis yongs su brgyan par byin gyis brlab cing yongs su bstan par mos pa la 'jug pa dang /_sems can gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang /_gzugs 
[\[217a.2\]]kyi sku sna tshogs kyi spyod lam dang /_tshul dang spyod pa yongs su bstan cing gzhan gyis rig par bya bar mos pa la 'jug pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can gyi khams su mos pa la 'jug pa ste/_
[\[217a.3\]]de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgyes pa dang /_khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bag chags te/_bcu 
[\[217a.4\]]gang zhe na 'di ltar byang chub kyi sems kyi bag chags dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bag chags dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i bag chags dang /_sangs rgyas blta ba'i bag chags dang /_'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par skye ba'i bag chags 
[\[217a.5\]]dang /_spyod pa'i bag chags dang /_smon lam gyi bag chags dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa'i bag chags dang /_chos mnyam pa nyid nges par rtogs pa'i bag chags dang /_spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i bag chags so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 
[\[217a.6\]]de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bag chags te/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams nyon mongs pa'i bag chags ma lus pa spangs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i bag chags thugs su chud pa bla na med pa 
[\[217a.7\]]'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nye bar len pa ste/_nye bar len pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun mi gcod pa'o/_/bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar yongs su smin pa'i mthar phyin 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]par bya ba'i phyir sems can gyi khams nye bar len pa dang /_lhag ma med par yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar len pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas mnyes par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa nye bar len pa dang /_mtshan 
[\[217b.2\]]dang dpe byad bzang po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar len pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po nye bar blangs te/_rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po nye bar len pa dang /_
[\[217b.3\]]sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i bde ba la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir byams pa chen po nye bar len pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar len pa dang /_sgo thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i phyir 
[\[217b.4\]]thabs mkhas pa nye bar len pa dang /_chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi phyir byang chub nye bar len pa dang /_mdor na thams cad mngon sum du shes pas mngon par shes par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad nye bar len pa'o/_/
[\[217b.5\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nye bar len pa ste/_nye bar len pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun mi gcod cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nye bar len pa med pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur/_
[\[217b.6\]]bdag go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nan tan te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i nan tan dang /_bslab pa'i nan tan dang /_ye shes kyi nan tan dang /_don gyi nan tan dang /_chos kyi nan tan 
[\[217b.7\]]dang /_mngon par bsgrub pa'i nan tan dang /_yang dag par bstan pa'i nan tan dang /_spyod pas mi skyo ba'i nan tan dang /_mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i nan tan dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i nan tan no/_/kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nan tan te/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad kyi nan tan bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub 
[\[218a.2\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi 'grub pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sems pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la mngon par yid ches pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o/_/
[\[218a.3\]]dam pa'i chos la mi spong ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o/_/tshad med pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas su dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba mi zad pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul sa mtshams med par yid 
[\[218a.4\]]ches pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi yul la 'jug pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi yul las mi g.yo ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o/_/bdud kyi yul las gyen 
[\[218a.5\]]du spags pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rjes su dran pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i yul la mngon par mos pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'grub pa'o/_/kye 
[\[218a.6\]]rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'grub pa ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po 'grub pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang 
[\[218a.7\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol ba'i lam ste/_de dag ni byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang bar bya bdag go/_/bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brnyas pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol ba'i lam mo/_/'khor 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]ba'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la gol ba'i lam mo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas skyo ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol ba'i lam mo/_/'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pas yongs su skyo ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol 
[\[218b.2\]]ba'i lam mo/_/mnyam par gzhag pa la gnas su byed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol ba'i lam mo/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba la chags shing zhen pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol ba'i lam mo/_/dam pa'i chos spong ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol 
[\[218b.3\]]ba'i lam mo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las dpar bas 'byed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol ba'i lam mo/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su 'dod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol ba'i lam mo/_/byang chub sems dpa' la zhe sdang zhing khong 
[\[218b.4\]]khro ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol ba'i lam mo/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos las gol ba'i lam rnams te/_de dag ni byang chub sems dpas yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/de dag yongs su 
[\[218b.5\]]spangs nas de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa nyid du 'da' bar 'gyur ba dag go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyon med pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[218b.6\]]tu phyin pa'ang mngon par bsgrub la sems can thams cad la'ang rnam par lta ba dang /_/lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang yang bral la/_lta ba'i bcing bas glags pa thams cad kyang rab tu 'bral ba dang /_mtshan ma thams cad kyi yid la mi byed la 
[\[218b.7\]]mtshan ma la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can thams cad kyang mi 'dor ba dang /_khams gsum pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das te 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnas thams cad na gnas pa dang /_nyon mongs pa rnams kyang rnam par bzlog la/_
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]sems can rnams dang yang phrad cing 'grogs pa dang /_chos rnams la yang 'dod chags dang bral la/_sems can thams cad la yang snying rje chen pos byams pa dang /_dngos po thams cad kyis kyang dben la 'khor thams cad kyang 
[\[219a.2\]]yongs su ston pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams las kyang gyen du 'phags la skye zhing shi 'pho pa'i spyod pa yang mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis kyang ma gos la/_'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad la'ang thogs pa med pa dang /_
[\[219a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang mngon du gyur la spyod pa dang smon lam chen po'i nyi ma yang rgyun mi gcod pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyon med pa/_'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa/_'gro ba thams cad dang /_
[\[219a.4\]]thun mong ma yin pa nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang ma 'dres pa ste/_skyon med pa de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i chos nges pa rnam par 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di 
[\[219a.5\]]dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i chos nges pa 'thob pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi yul la gnas pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i las la zhugs pa 
[\[219a.6\]]yin/_pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi rgyud na sa byung ba yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung las skyes pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi stobs la gnas pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub tu rjes su song ba yin/_
[\[219a.7\]]sangs rgyas thams cad dang sku dang rang bzhin gcig pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par spyod pa dang mi gnyis pa yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i chos nges par 'thob pa 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]ste/_de dag ni skyon med pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'thob pa dag go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[219b.2\]]rnams dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thun mong du mos pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_tshul mthun zhing smon lam chen po la dbugs phyin pa thob pa 
[\[219b.3\]]ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo/_/sems rgya chen pos rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i go 'byed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo/_/las ji ltar byas pa chud mi za bas bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad du mi skyo ba ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos 
[\[219b.4\]]las 'byung ba'i lam mo/_/phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa thams cad du yongs su 'dzin pas/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par gnas par bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo/_/sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su 
[\[219b.5\]]smin par bya ba la mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun mi gcod pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo/_/snying rje chen po bskyed de sems tshad med par byed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo/_/nam mkha'i dbyings thams 
[\[219b.6\]]cad sems bskyed pa gcig gis rgyas par dgang bas spyod pa dang smon lam chen po'i khyad par la 'jug pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo/_/sngon mngon par bsgrubs pa chud mi za bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa ni 
[\[219b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo/_/'gro ba thams cad la byang chub kyi sems yongs su ston cing /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad nye bar ston pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam mo/_/kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'byung ba'i lam ste/_de dag gis byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyes bu dam pa'i ming bcu 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di 
[\[220a.2\]]dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyes bu dam pa'i ming 'thob pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub kyi ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/_theg pa chen po la rab tu gnas pa'i phyir sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba yin/_
[\[220a.3\]]chos kyi dam pa mngon par rtogs pas dam pa'i sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/_mchog gi chos mngon par 'tshang rgya bas mchog gi sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/_ye shes kyi khyad par rab dang ldan pas rab kyi sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/_phul du brtson 
[\[220a.4\]]'grus rtsom pas phul gyi sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/_gong na med pa'i chos yang dag par ston pas bla na med pa'i sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/_stobs bcu'i ye shes yangs pa dang ldan pas stobs kyi sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/_'gro ba 
[\[220a.5\]]thams cad na dpe med pas mi mnyam mi 'dra ba'i sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/_nam 'dod pa'i sems kyi skad cig la byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sems dpa' zhes bya ba yin/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[220a.6\]]bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skyes bu dam pa'i ming 'thob pa rnams so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar gcig pu grogs med par byang chub kyi sems mi gtong 
[\[220a.7\]]bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam gcig la rten pa dang /_thabs dang shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrub pas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam yan lag gnyis pa dang /_stong ba nyid kyi sbyor ba dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i mtha'i rtse 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]mor phyin pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i phyir khams gsum dang mi 'dre bas byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnam pa gsum pa dang /_nyes pa bshags pa'i tshul dang /_bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 
[\[220b.2\]]gdab pa'i rim gro rgyun mi gcod pa dang /_yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pas shin tu bsngo ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i lam spyod pa bzhis smos pa dang dad pa'i rtsa ba tshugs te/_shin tu brtan pa dang /_brtson 'grus chen po las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_
[\[220b.3\]]dran pa rtse gcig pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa dang /_rab tu rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi spyod yul la mkhas pas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam dbang po lngas rnam par spel ba dang /_'di lta ste lha'i mig gis 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[220b.4\]]thams cad kyi gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad dang /_sems can gyi shi 'pho dang /_skye ba thams cad yongs su mthong ba'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa dang /_lha'i rna bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos bstan pa mnyan cing dran par bya ba dang /_
[\[220b.5\]]yongs su gzung bar bya bas sems can pha rol gyi dbang po la yang dag par phyin par byed pa dang bdag gi sems chags pa med pas/_pha rol gyi sems shes pas mthong ba la dbang bsgyur ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pas 
[\[220b.6\]]bskal pa 'grangs pa thams cad rjes su dran zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa chen po bsgrubs pas sems can ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du cho 'phrul sna tshogs yongs su ston cing /_sems can thams cad la chos 
[\[220b.7\]]brjod pa dang /_zag pa zad pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mthong zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsgrub pa rgyun mi gcod pas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam mngon par shes pa drug gis rnam par 'phrul ba dang /_
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]'di lta ste/_sems can gyi gtso bo mtha' yas pa thams cad skra'i rtse mo gcig la bzhugs par mthong ste/_yang dag par yongs su gzung zhing sems can gyi bsam pas rnam par rig par bya ba la 'jug pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_
[\[221a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas ma g.yos par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mngon du zhal nas chos bstan pa bsgrags pa mi zad pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang /_dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[221a.3\]]rnam par rig par bya ba la 'jug pas chos rjes su dran pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mthong ba dang mi 'bral zhing 'gro ba thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i lus yongs su ston pas dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[221a.4\]]dpa' thams cad kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba la yang dag par gzhol zhing gtong ba chen pos rnam par spel ba yid la byed pas gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'gro ba thams cad la stobs pas/_tshul 
[\[221a.5\]]khrims rjes su dran pa dang /_dga' ldan gyi pho brang gi mchog na byang chub sems dpa' tshe gcig gis thogs pa bzhugs pa rjes su dran pas lha rjes su dran pa dang /_thabs kyi ye shes chen pos 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba rgyun 
[\[221a.6\]]mi 'chad pa la zhugs te/_sems can rjes su dran pa'i phyir dge 'dun rjes su dran pas byang chub sems dpa'i lam rjes su dran pa bdun gyis mngon par bsgrubs pa dang /_'di lta ste log par lta ba thams cad yongs su spangs pas yang dag pa'i lta ba'i lam du 
[\[221a.7\]]'byung ba dang /_rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_yongs su rtogs pa dang bral bas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mthun zhing don yod la yid la bya ba med pas byung ba dang /_ngag gi nyes pa bzhi dang bral bas 'phags pa dang mthun 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]zhing yang dag pa'i ngag rab tu brjod pa dang /_lus kyi las thams cad sems can nye bar 'tsho bas 'gro ba thams cad thogs pa med par yongs su smin par byed cing 'dul bas mngon par bsgrubs pa dang /_'phags pa'i rigs la rab tu gnas shing sbyangs 
[\[221b.2\]]pa'i yon tan gyis sdom pa byang chub kyi lam dang ldan pa'i spyod lam dang /_spyod pa dang tshul la rab tu gnas shing thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pas yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtul zhugs dang /_dka' thub kyis 
[\[221b.3\]]kun nas gdungs pa dang /_yongs su gdungs pa yang dag par ston cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i rang bzhin thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_sgra thams cad 'dzin cing dran pa 'jig rten gyi rnam par 'khrug 
[\[221b.4\]]pa thams cad kyis bar du mi chod pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin gcig gis ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[221b.5\]]dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad dang ldan zhing byang chub dang mthun par gyur pa dang /_'di lta ste 'dod pa dang gnod sems dang /_'tsho ba med pa dang ngag gi las thams cad kyis ma bsgribs 
[\[221b.6\]]par chos ston pa'i tshul dang ldan pas rnam par rtog pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa gsal ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i bsam pa yongs su mi gtong zhing dga' ba zing zing po dang bral ba dang /_
[\[221b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bas dga' ba'i yid bde ba yang rgyun mi 'chad cing 'jig rten pa'i bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal dang bral bas 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang mthun pa dang /_mi g.yo ba'i gzugs 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]med pa'i snyoms par zhugs pas mngon par bsgrubs pa dang /_'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams su skyes pa las ma g.yos par 'du shes pa dang /_tshor ba thams cad 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas mngon par bsgrubs 
[\[222a.2\]]shing /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsgrub pa rgyun mi gcod pas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam mthar gyis spyod cing snyoms par 'jug pa dgus mngon par bsgrubs pa dang /_'di lta ste gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pa'i ye shes dang 
[\[222a.3\]]ldan pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i las dang /_rgyu dang rnam par smin pa yongs su len pa shin tu rtogs pa dang /_dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston cing go bar byed pas sems can gyi khams 
[\[222a.4\]]thams cad kyi dbang po rab dang tha ma shes pa'i ye shes kyis shin tu brtags pa dang khams tha dad pa dang khams du ma la mkhas pa dang ldan pa dang /_rab dang tha ma dang /_'bring la mos pa rab tu rtogs pa'i chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad 
[\[222a.5\]]dang zhing dang dus dang /_bskal pa thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang /_gzugs kyis rgyas par dgang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul yongs su bstan pas/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsgrub pa yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_bsam 
[\[222a.6\]]gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba thams cad las rnam par ldang ba dus la bab pa dang /_dus la ma bab pa rtogs pa'i ye shes kyi 
[\[222a.7\]]tshul gyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa la rab tu gnas pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi skye ba dang /_shi 'pho ba dang lam gyi rgyud dang /_'pho ba tha dad pa'i gnas la mkhas pa dang ldan pa dang /_dus gsum gyi bskal pa 'grangs 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]pa thams cad skad cig gcig du gzung ba rtogs pa'i ye shes snang bas mngon par bsgrubs pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang bag chags dang bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal ba byang bar thob pa'i ye shes kyi tshul gyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 
[\[222b.2\]]sems dpa'i spyod pa bsgrub pa mi gtong bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rab tu rtogs pa la yang dag par btang ba'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ste/_de dag la 
[\[222b.3\]]gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lam la mkhas pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni tshad med pa'o/_/lam gyi tshogs ni tshad 
[\[222b.4\]]med pa'o/_/lam bsgom pa ni tshad med pa'o/_/lam gyi rgyan ni tshad med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de la bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam tshad med pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar nam mkha'i 
[\[222b.5\]]dbyings tshad med pa dang /_mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa dang /_mi zad pa'i sems can gyi khams tshad med pa dang /_mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dang /_mi zad pa'i bskal pa 'grangs pa tshad med pa 
[\[222b.6\]]dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi tha snyad mtha' yas shing tshad med pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshad med pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dbyangs tshad med pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tshad med pa dang /_thams cad 
[\[222b.7\]]mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshad med pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam tshad med pa rnams so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nam mkha'i dbyings ci tsam du tshad med pa de tsam du tshad med pa'i byang chub 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/_/ji ltar chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa de ltar mtha' dang dbus med par byang chub sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/_/ji ltar sems can gyi khams mi zad pa de ltar mi zad 
[\[223a.2\]]par byang chub sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/_/ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa de ltar mu med par byang chub sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/_/ji ltar bskal pa grangs su bgrang zhing bstan pa mi zad 
[\[223a.3\]]pa de ltar 'gro ba thams cad mi zad par byang chub sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/_/ji ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi tha snyad mtha' yas pa de ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgra dang tha snyad la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa mtha' yas 
[\[223a.4\]]par byang chub sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/_/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshad med pa de ltar 'gro ba dang zhing dang dus dang /_sems can dang bskal pa thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs zhing tshad med par byang chub sems dpas lam 
[\[223a.5\]]gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dbyangs tshad med pa de ltar byang chub sems dpas tshig gi las gcig brjod pas chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du rgyas par khyab cing sems can gyi khams thams cad go bar byed pa'i 
[\[223a.6\]]lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/_/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs tshad med pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyis bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/_/ji ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshad 
[\[223a.7\]]med pa de ltar tshad med par byas te/_byang chub sems dpas lam gyi tshogs yongs su bsdu bar bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam gyi tshogs te/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]gshegs pa'i ye shes mtha' dang dbus med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam bsgom pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar lus dang ngag dang sems kyis mi longs pa med pas blang ba med pa dang /_dor 
[\[223b.2\]]ba med pa bsgom pa dang /_yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas bsnan pa med pa dang /_dbri ba med par bsgom pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis 'jug pa med pas bsgom pa med pa dang /_rnam par bsgom pa med pa bsgom pa dang /_mngon par zhen pa 
[\[223b.3\]]thams cad dang bral bas sgyu ma dang rmi lam dang mig yor dang /_sgra brnyan dang gzugs brnyan dang smig rgyu dang chu'i zla ba lta bur bsgom pa dang /_khams gsum pa'i bsod nams blta bas bstsags pa bstsal ba'i phyir stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang 
[\[223b.4\]]smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa bsgom pa dang /_chos su gdags pa rnam par dgod pa dang bral bas brjod du med pa dang /_bstan du med pa dang smos su med pa dang /_bshad du med pa bsgom pa dang /_chos thams cad la zhugs pa'i ye shes 
[\[223b.5\]]mngon sum dang ldan pas/_chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa bsgom pa dang /_de kho na nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa khong du chud pas de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' ma nyams par bsgom pa dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa'i 
[\[223b.6\]]stobs rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes yangs pa bsgom pa dang /_chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur te/_the tsom med pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi bsnyengs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_
[\[223b.7\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang mtshungs pa med pa bsgom pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam bsgom pa ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bsgom 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]pa la mkhas pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam gyi rgyan te bcu gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa'i khams 
[\[224a.2\]]nas kyang mi g.yo la/_gzugs dang gzugs med pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang /_de dag gi dbang gis mi skye ba 'di ni lam gyi rgyan dang po'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[224a.3\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi lam mngon sum du gyur pa'i ye shes la zhugs kyang lam des 'byung ba 'ang ma yin pa 'di ni lam gyi rgyan gnyis pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas kyi lam la mngon sum du 
[\[224a.4\]]gyur pa'i ye shes snang ba la mkhas kyang snying rje chen po'i stobs rgyun mi gcod pa 'di ni lam gyi rgyan gsum pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan zhing g.yog 'khor lha dang mi'i rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing /_
[\[224a.5\]]lha'i bu mo brgya stong gis rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba'i sgra phyung ste brjod pa la spyod kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ldan pa'i bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa mi 'dor ba 'di ni lam gyi rgyan bzhi pa'o/_/
[\[224a.6\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi rtse rgal dka' dgod pa dang /_sems can dang 'dres shing 'bur ldog pa byed kyang sems kyi skad cig gcig la yang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid mi 'dor ba 'di ni lam gyi 
[\[224a.7\]]rgyan lnga pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad dang ma 'dres shing 'jig rten gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin yang /_sems can bsgral ba'i phyir pha rol tu mi 'gro ba'i lam yang mi gtong ba 'di ni lam gyi rgyan drug 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]pa'o/_kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi ye shes snang ba la zhugs pa'i lam la gnas kyang lam ngan par zhugs pa'i sems can phyir bzlog pa'i phyir lam ma yin pa dang /_lam ngan pa yang gnon la/_lam 
[\[224b.2\]]des 'khor ba 'dzin pa'ang ma yin te/_des dag par yang mi sems pa 'di ni lam gyi rgyan bdun pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu tshul khrims legs par bsrungs pa dang ldan zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims rnam 
[\[224b.3\]]par dag pa la rten pas/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' kha na ma tho ba med pa dang ldan yang tshul khrims ngan pa dang ldan pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir so so'i skye bo tha mal pa'i spyod pa thams cad ston cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[224b.4\]]lam la rten pas/_bsod nams kyi tshogs rnam par dag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin yang sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_mi khom pa dang dbul bar skyes pa'i lam du zhugs pa'i sems 
[\[224b.5\]]can thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir/_de dag gi lam du skyes pa yang ston la/_lam de dag la yang dag par gzhol ba yang ma yin pa 'di ni lam gyi rgyan brgyad pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 
[\[224b.6\]]la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing thogs pa med pa'i spongs pa thob pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la ye shes snang bas rnam par lta ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku dang /_lus gcig tu gyur 
[\[224b.7\]]pa sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi snying po'i tshul can dgongs pa'i snang ba khong du chud pa/_theg pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul la mngon par mos pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba/_sems 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]can gyi khams thams cad kyis ngor lta ba/_'gro ba thams cad kyi slob dpon du bya ba yin yang /_chos yongs su btsal bar bya ba rgyun mi gcod cing ngo mtshar gyis yongs su zin par snang bas sri zhu'i las thams cad la gnas te/_
[\[225a.2\]]mkhan po dang slob dpon du ston kyang de nyid 'gro ba thams cad kyi slob dpon du 'gyur ba yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni thabs mkhas pa dang ldan par byang chub sems dpa'i lam la shin tu gnas pa yin pas/_de dag ni thabs 
[\[225a.3\]]gang dang gang gis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dang de thabs sems can rnams la yongs su ston te/_'di ni lam gyi rgyan dgu pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su 'dus shing byang 
[\[225a.4\]]chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang rdzu 'phrul thams cad thob pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ba/_chos thams cad la dbang ba'i dbang phyug gi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/_chags pa med cing dri ma med pa'i thabs dang ldan pa/_'jig 
[\[225a.5\]]rten gyi khams thams cad du thogs pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang dag par ston pa/_chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med par bskor ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i lus dang gzugs bdog pa/_chos 
[\[225a.6\]]thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad rab tu thob pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi zhing du skye ba yongs su ston pa la mkhas pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs 
[\[225a.7\]]pa thams cad dang yul gcig tu gyur pa 'di yin la/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'ang rgyun mi gcod cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid kyang rnam par mi spong /_byang chub sems dpa'i las las kyang rnam par mi ldog_/byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]lam las kyang phyir mi ldog_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'ang rgyun mi gcod/_byang chub sems dpa'i nye bar len pa'ang 'chad par mi byed/_byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa las kyang phyir mi ldog_/byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba yang thogs par mi 
[\[225b.2\]]byed/_byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i stobs kyis kyang yongs su skyo ba med cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs las kyang ring du 'phang ba ma yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun mi gcod 
[\[225b.3\]]pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo la rnam par lta ba de lta bus ni byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu myur du 'byung ba'i phyir te/_'di ni lam gyi rgyan bcu pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[225b.4\]]rnams kyi lam gyi rgyan te/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam rin po che'i rgyan bla na med pa thob par gyur kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi rgyun mi gcod pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang 
[\[225b.5\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rkang pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar smon lam chen po'i khyad par yongs su bsdu ba shin tu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims kyi rkang pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad yang dag par bsdu ba las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir brtson 
[\[225b.6\]]'grus kyi rkang pa dang /_sems can rnams bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su tshim par bya ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa'i rkang pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro yang zhing gcig nas mi g.yo ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_khyad par du 'gro ba'i 
[\[225b.7\]]phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa'i rkang pa dang /_brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir dam bcas pa brtan pa'i rkang pa dang /_bla ma thams cad kyi bsgo ba las 'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir mthun par 'dzin pa'i rkang pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]cad kyis gsungs pa yang dag par gzung bas mi skyo ba'i phyir chos mnyan pa mi ngoms par tshol ba'i rkang pa dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'gro bar sgyid lug pa med pa'i phyir chos kyi char 'bebs 
[\[226a.2\]]pa'i rkang pa dang /_thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chen po la nan tan du byed pa'i rkang pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rkang pa ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems 
[\[226a.3\]]dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi mchog gis/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lag pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar de 
[\[226a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa la gcig tu mos shing yid ches pas mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir dad pa'i lag pa dang /_slong ba thams cad yid bzhin du tshim par bya ba'i phyir gtong ba rab tu gtong ba'i lag pa dang /_lag pa g.yas 
[\[226a.5\]]pa brkyang ba'i phyir tshur shog bde bar 'ongs sam zhes 'dor te/_gsong por smra ba'i lag pa dang /_bsod nams bsags pa rnam par spel ba las mi g.yo ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing rim gro byed pa'i lag pa dang /_sems 
[\[226a.6\]]can thams cad kyi the tsom gcad pa'i phyir thos pa thams cad la mkhas pa'i lag pa dang /_'dod pa'i 'dam du thogs pa'i sems can gyi khams la lag pa ring du brkyang ste/_'ju bar rnyeb pa'i phyir khams gsum dang bral zhing shin tu 'byung bar 
[\[226a.7\]]byed pa'i lag pa dang /_chu bo chen po bzhis khyer ba las lag pa ring du brkyang zhing gdon ba'i phyir bde ba'i thang la gzhog pa'i lag pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad la gnod pa med par bstan pa'i chos rab tu bstan pa'i phyir yang dag par sbyor ba'i chos la slob 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]dpon gyis mi 'chab pa'i lag pa dang /_lus dang sems kyi nad rab tu bsal ba'i phyir 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtsug lag thams cad shes pa'i lag pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i mun pa thams cad dang bral ba'i chos 
[\[226b.2\]]kyi snang ba mtshungs pa med pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir shes rab dang ye shes rin po che'i lag pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lag pa ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin 
[\[226b.3\]]gshegs pa'i phyag 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun nas yog par skyob pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go//_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po nyi shu pa/_/
[\[226b.4\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lto ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar bsam pa dag pas g.yo ba med pa'i lto dang drang bas sgyu med pa'i lto dang /_thibs po med pas 'chos pa med pa'i lto dang /_dngos po thams cad la mngon 
[\[226b.5\]]bar chags pa med pas yul la mi 'dzin pa'i lto dang /_shes pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa thams cad sel ba'i lto dang /_skyon med pa'i phyir sems dag pa'i lto dang /_chos ji lta ba bzhin du yid la bya ba'i phyir kha zas thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba 
[\[226b.6\]]so sor rtog pa'i lto dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon par 'du mi byed pa so sor rtog pa'i lto dang /_bsam pa shin tu smin pas 'byung ba thams cad shes pa'i lto dang /_sems can thams cad sangs rgyas 
[\[226b.7\]]kyi sku'i nang du chud pa khong du chud pa'i phyir dri ma mtha' yas pa'i lta ba thams cad dang bral ba'i lto'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lto ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]gshegs pa'i sku/_'gro ba thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[227a.2\]]tshul gyi mthu tshad med pa yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po/_sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod par kun nas gnas pa dang /_ye shes snang ba chen po yongs su bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i snying po chos kyi rigs rab tu gsal bar 
[\[227a.3\]]byed par kun nas gnas pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po dge 'dun gyi rigs yongs su sdud par kun nas gnas pa dang /_dus ji lta ba bzhin las mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir byang 
[\[227a.4\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po chos thams cad nges par gleng bar byed pa dang /_rgyu gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po nges pa med par yongs su smin par byed par gnas pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i 
[\[227a.5\]]rgyu skyon med par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po sems can log par nges pa rnams la snying rje chen po skye bar kun nas gnas pa dang bdud kyi sde thams cad btul te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba mi 'phrogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[227a.6\]]kyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thub pa med pa'i rgyu yongs su rdzogs par byed par kun nas gnas pa dang /_'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad yongs su tshim par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po mi 'jigs pa chen po'i seng ge dang /_khyu mchog 
[\[227a.7\]]gi nga ro 'byin par kun nas gnas pa dang /_thams cad du ye shes yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwo [,]bco [}]brgyad 'thob pa'i phyir kun nas gnas pa dang /_skad cig gcig tu mi mnyam par 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]med par zhugs pas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po zhing thams cad dang /_chos thams cad dang sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par gnas pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po ste/_de dag 
[\[227b.2\]]la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ma log pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po'i snying po bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying ste/_bcu gang 
[\[227b.3\]]zhe na brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir zhe non pa'i snying dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir sems zhum pa med pa'i snying dang /_bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu gzhom pa'i phyir rnam par gnon pa chen 
[\[227b.4\]]po'i snying dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa'i phyir tshul bzhin du sbyor ba'i snying dang /_snying po byang chub kyi bar du phyin par bya ba'i phyir phyir mi 'gyur zhing /_phyir mi ldog pa'i snying dang /_sems 'pho ba med par khong du chud pas mngon 
[\[227b.5\]]par chags pa med pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba'i snying dang /_ji ltar mos pa'i tshul bzhin du rnam par thar pa 'thob pa bya ba'i phyir/_sems can gyi tshul shes pa'i snying dang /_theg pa gzhan la mos pa med par sems can gyi khams yongs su bskyab 
[\[227b.6\]]pa'i phyir/_tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa rgya chen pos sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'jug pa'i snying dang /_lta ba'i mtshan mas khams gsum la mngon par chags pa med par bya ba'i phyir stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon 
[\[227b.7\]]par 'du bya ba med pa'i snying dang /_sems can thams cad bdud du gyur pa'i sgos bdud thams cad 'ongs par gyur kyang /_spu gcig kyang mi g.yo bas dpal gyi be'us brgyan cing rdo rje'i khams ltar sra zhing brtan pa'i snying po dam pa dang ldan pa'i snying ngo /_/kye 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang ba chen po'i snying po dang ldan pa'i snying bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba 
[\[228a.2\]]dag go/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi go ca ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir byams pa chen po'i go ca dang /_mi dga' ba thams cad bzod par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i 
[\[228a.3\]]go ca dang /_brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi go ca dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyan 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba'i go ca dang /_'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bya ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi go ca dang /_'gro ba thams 
[\[228a.4\]]cad bsgral ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa'i go ca dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i mun pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir ye shes kyi go ca dang /_sgo kun dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir thabs mkhas pa'i go ca dang /_theg pa gzhan 
[\[228a.5\]]la mos pa med pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems brtan zhing 'khrug pa med pa'i go ca dang /_chos kyi rlom sems med pas gcig tu nges pa'i go ca'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi go ca ste/_de dag 
[\[228a.6\]]la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdud kyi sde thams cad spa 'gong ba bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshon ca ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar ser sna'i skyon rab tu gzhom 
[\[228a.7\]]pa'i phyir gtong ba'i mtshon ca dang /_tshul khrims ngan pa thams cad bsal ba'i phyir tshul khrims kyi mtshon ca dang /_rnam par rtog pa thams cad bstsal ba'i phyir chos mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshon ca dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yongs su gcad pa'i phyir 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]shes rab dang ye shes kyi mtshon ca dang /_'tsho ba thams cad la kha na ma tho ba med par bya ba'i phyir/_yang dag par 'tsho ba'i mtshon ca dang /_sgo thams cad yongs su bstan pa'i phyir thabs mkhas pa'i mtshon ca dang /_nyon mongs pa'i sgo nas sems can 
[\[228b.2\]]bzlog pa'i phyir/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_mdor bsdu na nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi mtshon ca dang /_spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad pas sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'khor ba'i mtshon ca dang /_mngon par 
[\[228b.3\]]zhen pa thams cad rab tu bstsal ba'i phyir/_chos tshul gcig pa bstan pa'i mtshon ca dang /_spyod pa'i sgo las phyir phyogs su mi blta ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshon ca'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshon 
[\[228b.4\]]ca ste/_mtshon ca de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pa la yun ring po'i nye bar nyon mongs pa dang /_bag la nyal ba yod pa thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag 
[\[228b.5\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mgo ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar spyi gtsug ltar mi snang ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i mgo dang /_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad 'dud par bya ba'i phyir bla ma la 'dud pa'i mgo dang /_stong gsum thams
