[\[250a.5\]]las gang sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa bdud kyi dkrugs ma dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba bsgribs pa dang /_gcod pa dang /_kun nas 'khor ba thams cad yongs su chad pa sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_rnam 
[\[250a.6\]]par gdul ba'i ye shes dang mthun pa dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la brtson pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'i mngon par shes pa dang /_rig pa'i ye shes mngon sum du gyur cing de lta bu'i las byed pa 'di ni ye shes kyi las yang dag 
[\[250a.7\]]phul gyi chos dang ldan pa bcu pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi las te/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen po sngon du 'gro bas mngon par bsgrub 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]pa la mkhas pa bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi byin gyi rlabs te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems zhum par gyur pa ni bdud kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/bsam pa 
[\[250b.2\]]'khrugs pa ni bdud kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/rgya chung dus mgu ba ni bdud kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/gcig las mi bzod pa ni bdud kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/smon lam la lhag par mi dmigs pa ni bdud kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/nyon mongs pa rnam par 
[\[250b.3\]]bzlog pa dang /_zhi ba 'dod pa ni bdud kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/'khor ba'i rgyun mi gcod pa ni bdud kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/spyod pa las phyir mi ldog pa ni bdud kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/sems can yongs su smin par mi byed pa ni bdud kyi byin gyi 
[\[250b.4\]]rlabs so/_/chos la the tsom za zhing dam pa'i chos spong ba ni bdud kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni bdud kyi byin gyi rlabs te/_de dag yongs su spangs shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs 
[\[250b.5\]]bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar thog mar byang chub tu sems skye ba ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/tshe tshe rabs su byang chub kyi sems 
[\[250b.6\]]mi stor ba ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/bdud kyi las khong du chud cing de rnam par bzlog pa ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/pha rol tu phyin pa grag cing thos par 'gyur ba dang /_thos nas kyang nan tan byed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/
[\[250b.7\]]'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu shes shing yongs su skyo bar mi byed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/chos zab mo rtogs par bya bas 'bras bu thob par byed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/sems can rnams la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]par grol bas chos ston kyang de'i rnam par grol ba la mos pa med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/'dus byas kyi rang bzhin la rtog cing 'dus ma byas la mi gnas la/_'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas la mi gnyis par 'du shes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi byin 
[\[251a.2\]]gyi rlabs so/_/nying gi mtshams sbyor ba la gnas kyang nying gi mtshams sbyor ba sel ba ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsgrubs pa'i rigs rgyun mi gcad pa ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi 
[\[251a.3\]]rlabs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs te/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i byin gyi rlabs bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di 
[\[251a.4\]]dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi byin gyi rlabs te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag go zhes bya ba ni chos kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/'dus byas thams cad sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba ni chos kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/'du byed thams 
[\[251a.5\]]cad bdag med do zhes bya ba ni chos kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/mya ngan las 'das pa bzhi ba'o zhes bya ba ni chos kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/chos rnams ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ste/_rkyen rnams med par mi 'byung ba ni chos kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/tshul bzhin ma yin pa kun nas 
[\[251a.6\]]byung bas ma rig pa kun nas 'byung ngo /_/ma rig pa kun nas byung bas rga shi'i bar du kun nas 'byung ngo /_/tshul bzhin ma yin pa 'gags pas ma rig pa 'gag go_/ma rig pa 'gags pas rga shi'i bar du 'gag par 'gyur ba ni chos kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/nyan 
[\[251a.7\]]thos kyi theg pa rnam par thar ba'i sgo gsum gyis byung ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos khong du chud pas byung ba ni chos kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/theg pa chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis byung ba ni chos kyi 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]byin gyi rlabs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi yul zhing thams cad dang /_chos thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad dang dus thams cad rab tu mkhyen pa'i ye shes mnga' ba ni chos kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/mya ngan las 'das pa yid la bya ba thams cad yongs su chad pa dang /_'dzin 
[\[251b.2\]]pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i rang bzhin gyi rjes su song bar shes pa ni chos kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi byin gyi rlabs te/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems 
[\[251b.3\]]dpa' rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga' ldan na gnas pa'i las te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu rnams la 
[\[251b.4\]]'dod pa'i dben pa bstan pa dang /_dbang phyug mi rtag pa bstan pa dang /_phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rgud par 'gyur ba bstan pa dang de dag byang chub kyi sems la yang dag par dgod pa 'di ni dga' ldan na gnas pa'i las dang po'o/_/gzugs kyi khams kyi lha'i bu 
[\[251b.5\]]rnams la bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_rnam par ldang ba ston cing bsam gtan dang /_bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag la mngon par zhen pa dang /_sred pas byung ba'i 'jig tshogs su lta ba dang /_gti mug gi 
[\[251b.6\]]shas che ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa dang /_gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i phyin ci log la zhugs pa thams cad la sdug par yid la byed pa thams cad mi sdug cing mi rtag par yongs su bstan te/_byang chub kyi sems la dgod pa 'di ni dga' 
[\[251b.7\]]ldan na gnas pa'i las gnyis pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dga' ldan gyi gnas rab na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rgyan bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te/_lus las 'od bkye zhing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]rgyas par bkang nas sems can rnams la dad pa ji bzhin du chos sna tshogs kyi sgra skad rab tu brjod de chos kyi sgra skad de dag thos nas sems dang bar gyur te/_dga' ldan gyi lha dang brtul zhugs mthun par skye bar 'gyur zhing /_de ltar 
[\[252a.2\]]skyes nas kyang byang chub kyi sems la dgod pa 'di ni dga' ldan na gnas pa'i las gsum pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dga' ldan gyi gnas rab na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i mig bsgribs pa med pas/_phyogs bcu'i dga' ldan gyi gnas 
[\[252a.3\]]rab na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' de mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang chos yang dag par bgro ba chen po dang /_yang dag pa'i chos kyi gtam chen po byed do/_/yum gyi skur gshegs 
[\[252a.4\]]pa dang /_skye ba dang 'byung ba dang /_snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par dgod pa dang /_yang dag par bgro ba'o/_/sngon gyi spyod pa gang gis ye shes che ba nyid de thob par gyur pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa dag kyang rab tu brjod do/_/gnas nas mi g.yo yang bya ba 'di lta bu dag ston pa 'di ni 
[\[252a.5\]]dga' ldan na gnas pa'i las bzhi pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dga' ldan gyi gnas rab na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i drung du byang chub sems dpa' de la blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur ba'i phyir phyogs bcu nas dga' ldan gyi gnas rab na 'khod 
[\[252a.6\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'ongs te/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems dang bsam pa yongs su tshim par bya ba dang /_smon pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos yang dag par bgro ba'i sgo chen po yang dag par ston te/_so so'i sa la gnas pa'i 
[\[252a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gang bya ba dang /_gang spang ba dang gang bsgom pa dang gang mngon du bya ba de dag kyang yang dag par ston to/_/yang dag par bgro ba'i chos de dag thos nas kyang rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba dang /_rangs pas legs par rjod cing /_
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]rang rang gi zhing dang /_rang rang gi gnas su 'dod par 'gyur ba 'di ni dga' ldan na gnas pa'i las lnga pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dga' ldan gyi gnas rab na gnas pa'i gan du nam bdud sdig can 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor ba zhig glags btsal ba'i 
[\[252b.2\]]phyir 'ongs par gyur na 'ang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' bdud thams cad tshar gcod pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i tshig la gnas shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs mkhas pas yang dag par gzung ba'i ye shes kyi sgos mnyam zhing mnyan pa'i mtha' gnyis bzung 
[\[252b.3\]]nas ci nas kyang bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byin gyis rlob bo/_/de lta de ltar chos kyang ston te bdud kyi 'khor chen po des byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de lta bu mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[252b.4\]]tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba 'di ni dga' ldan na gnas pa'i las drug pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas rab na gnas pa ni gang gi tshe'i da ltar 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu 'di rnams chos mnyan pa dang /_yang dag par 
[\[252b.5\]]'gro bas skyo bar gyur to/_/zhes bya bar shes par gyur pa de'i tshe/_'dod pa'i khams kyi gnas thams cad du sgra sgrog cing dbyangs 'byin te/_grogs po dag de ring byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor chen po ston pa mdzad kyis blta bar su 'dod pa de 
[\[252b.6\]]dag myur du shig shig ces nas/_der lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kun nas 'du bar 'gyur te/_de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kun nas 'dus par gyur nas kyang /_lha'i bu de dag gis sngon cad ma mthong ma thos pa'i btsun mo'i 'khor 
[\[252b.7\]]de lta bu bstan nas/_de dag nam dga' bas mos par gyur pa de'i tshe/_de dag gis rol mo brdung ba dang /_dkrol ba de dag las kye grogs po rnams 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag go_/'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba'o/_/chos thams cad ni bdag 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]med pa'o/_/mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o/_/zhes sgra 'byung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ba thos par 'gyur te/_de dag gis chos kyi sgra de thos pa 
[\[253a.2\]]dang /_skyo ba skye bar 'gyur te/_byang chub kyi sems la yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ba 'di ni dga' ldan na gnas pa'i las bdun pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas rab na 'dug pa ni dga' ldan gyi gnas nas kyang lus mi snang bar ma 
[\[253a.3\]]gyur la/_phyogs bcur yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'gro ste/_de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sa mngon par dbang bskur ba thob pa'i 
[\[253a.4\]]mchog tu phyin pas thams cad mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba yang yang dag par bstan par 'gyur ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yan lag dang nye ba'i yan lag thams cad dang ldan zhing /_rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa la 'jug pa sems kyi skad 
[\[253a.5\]]cig gcig gis sbyor ba yang dag par bstan par 'gyur ba 'di ni dga' ldan na gnas pa'i las brgyad pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas ra ba na gnas pa'i mthus khyad par 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod 
[\[253a.6\]]pa dang /_rim gro rnam pa tshad med pas rnam par dag pa mtha' yas pa'i rnam pa yongs su ston pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa/_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las kyi don du 
[\[253a.7\]]'byung ste/_mchod pa de mthong nas sems can grangs med tshad med pa'i rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_'di ni dga' ldan na gnas pa'i las dgu pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas rab na gnas pa mtha' 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]dang dbus med pa'i chos sgyu ma la zhugs pa ni mig yor lta bus shin tu bsgrubs pa'i ye shes kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad du gzugs sna tshogs dang /_kha dog sna tshogs dang dbyibs sna tshogs dang /_spyod lam sna tshogs dang bya ba sna tshogs dang /_sbyor ba sna tshogs dang /_
[\[253b.2\]]bstan pa mngon par bsgrub pa sna tshogs dang /_dgong ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems dang bsam pa mgu bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston cing gzugs yongs su ston te/_'di ni dga' ldan na gnas pa'i las bcu pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de 
[\[253b.3\]]dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga' ldan na gnas pa'i las te/_de dag byas nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyis mi'i 'jig rten du 'ong bar 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'pho ston 
[\[253b.4\]]pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams lha'i ris dga' ldan nas shi 'pho ba'i tshe/_rkang pa'i mthil gyi 'og nas bde ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer 'byung ste/_de byung nas kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[253b.5\]]snang ba chen pos rgyas par bkang zhing ngan song dang mi khom pa'i rgyud du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi lus la 'bab bo/_/de ltar 'od des lus la bab ma thag tu de nyid kyi tshe/_sems can de dag bde ba thams cad kyis tshim zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rtse zil bar 
[\[253b.6\]]'gyur ro/_bde ba'i nyams ni nyams su tshor ma thag tu de dag gis 'di ltar grogs po dag sems can gzhan zhig ni 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skyes so zhes bya bar shes te/_'di ni dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'pho ston pa dang po'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang 
[\[253b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' de'i smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'byung ste/_de byung nas kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par bkang zhing sngon lhan cig tu spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]lus la 'bab bo/_/'od zer des de ltar lus la bab ma thag tu/_de nyid kyi tshe byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'pho bar khong du chud de de dag thams cad 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i 
[\[254a.2\]]las mngon par bsgrub pa 'di ni dga' ldan gyi gnas shi 'pho ston pa gnyis pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil nas yongs su dag pa'i yul zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'byung ste/_de byung nas kyang stong gsum gyi stong 
[\[254a.3\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su sbyong zhing de na zag pa med pa'i rang sangs rgyas 'khod pa de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du sel to/_/ma yin na yang gang gis shes par gyur pa de dag tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ro/_/gzhan yang 'dul ba'i dbang du de 
[\[254a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis byin du brlabs pa'i sems can ma gtogs par bdud dang mu stegs can gzhan dang phas kyi rgol ba dang kun tu rgyu ba dang /_dmigs pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can rnams 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du sel te/_'di ni dga' ldan gyi 
[\[254a.5\]]gnas nas shi 'pho ston pa gsum pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' de'i pus mo gnyis kyi lha nga gnyis nas dri ma med cing bzang la 'od gsal ba'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer 'byung ste/_de byung nas kyang lha'i gnas tha ma nye bar bzung ba yan cad 
[\[254a.6\]]'og min gyi lha'i gnas man chad du snang bar byed de/_des lha'i bu de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi gnas nas shi 'pho bar shes nas/_de dag kun kyang skyo ba skyo ba'i yid kyis me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_
[\[254a.7\]]na bza' dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan thogs te/_rol mo brdung ba dang /_dkrol ba'i sgra rab tu byung nas byang chub sems dpa'i drung du mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'dong ste/_shi 'pho nye bar bzung ba nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan gyi bar du bsnyen 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]bkur byed do/_/phyi bzhin 'brang ngo /_/'di ni dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'pho ba ston pa bzhi pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' de dpal gyi be'u'i rgyan dang ldan pa/_rdo rje'i khams ltar sra zhing brtan pa'i snying po can gyi snying ka nas gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 
[\[254b.2\]]'od zer gtong ste/_de btang nas kyang lag na rdo rje'i 'jig rten thams cad yongs su snang bar byed do/_/de nas lag na rdo rje khrag khrig phrag brgya 'ongs te/_shi 'pho ston pa nye bar bzung ba nas/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan gyi bar du byang chub sems dpa'i phyi bzhin 'brang ste/_
[\[254b.3\]]'di ni dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'pho ston pa lnga pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' de'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas 'gro ba thams cad du rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'byung ste/_de byung nas kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 
[\[254b.4\]]snang bar byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i lus la 'bab po/_/byang chub sems dpa'i lus la bab nas lha dang mi'i gnas su 'char ro/_/des byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang bdag cag gis 'dir gnas te/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod 
[\[254b.5\]]par bya bar 'gyur ro/_/snyam du khong du chud pa 'di ni dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'pho ston pa drug pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' de'i khang pa nor bu rin po che chen po'i snying po can nas/_rnam par bstsags pa shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'byung ste/_de byung nas 
[\[254b.6\]]kyang khyim gang du byang chub sems dpa' skye bar 'gyur ba'i khyim der 'char ro/_/'od zer de de ltar shar ma thag tu de nyid kyi tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag khyim mam grong khyer ram grong rdal lam/_'dzam bu'i gling du sems can 'dul ba nye bar bzung zhing skye ba rab tu 'dzin te/_'di ni dga' 
[\[254b.7\]]ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'pho ston pa bdun pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' de'i khang pa brtsegs pa lha thams cad kyi gnas kyi rgyan ces bya ba las gnas thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i 'od zer 'byung ste/_de dag byung ma thag tu yum gang gi dgu 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]g.yas par skye bar 'gyur ba de'i lus la 'bab po/_/de ltar bab ma thag tu de nyid kyi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i yum bde ba thams cad 'thob par 'gyur te/_yon tan dang sdom pa thams cad la 'ang gnas par 'gyur ro/_/yum gyi sku der yang pho brang brtsegs pa chen po 
[\[255a.2\]]rin po che'i dam pas brgyan pa byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod kyi don du 'byung ste/_'di ni dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'pho ston pa brgyad pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa'i mthil gyi 'og nas gnas pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'byung ste/_de byung ma thag tu lha'i 
[\[255a.3\]]bu 'am/_tshangs pa gang la la byang chub sems dpa'i mchod pa'i las kyi don du shi 'pho bar 'dod par gyur la byang chub sems dpas kyang lha'i bu de dag na 'khod pa bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las/_mngon par sgrub par nus par shes pa de dag gi lus la 'bab po/_/de ltar 
[\[255a.4\]]'od zer des bab par gyur ma thag tu de nyid kyi tshe lha'i bu de dag shi 'pho'i las de las rnam par ldang ste/_de dag de na 'khod bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la shi 'pho nye bar bzung ba nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa bstan gyi bar du mchod pa'i las byed de/_'di ni dga' ldan gyi 
[\[255a.5\]]gnas nas shi 'pho ston pa dgu pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i dpe byad bzang po rnams las nyi ma sna tshogs kyi tshul zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'byung ste/_de byung nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i las sna tshogs ston to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de la lha dang mi la las ni byang chub 
[\[255a.6\]]sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas rab nyid na 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/la las ni yum gyi skur bzhud pa mthong ngo /_/la las ni skye bar mthong ngo /_/la las ni 'byung bar mthong ngo /_/la las ni rnam par 'tshang rgya bar mthong ngo /_/la las ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mthong ngo /_/la las 
[\[255a.7\]]ni de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' bar mthong ste/_'di ni dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'pho ston pa bcu pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i 'od zer bcu po de dag las sogs pa/_'od zer grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu byang chub sems dpa'i lus las 'byung 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]ste/_de bzhin du stan dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa dag nas kyang 'byung ste/_de dag byung nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i las sna tshogs yongs su ston to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar las yongs su grub pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad rab tu grub pa'i phyir lha'i 
[\[255b.2\]]gnas dga' ldan nas shi 'pho ston to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngal na gnas par ston pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar sems rgya chung ba dang /_dma' ba la mos pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dngos po'i bsod nams kyi rtsa ba la 
[\[255b.3\]]yid mi ches par gyur du 'ong zhes byang chub sems dpa' mngal na gnas par ston pa 'di ni mngal na gnas par ston pa dang po'o/_/pha dang ma dang gnyen bshes kyi tshogs dang /_sngon lhan cig tu spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_sems can gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngal na gnas 
[\[255b.4\]]pas yongs su smin par bya ba de dag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' mngal na gnas par ston te 'di ni mngal na gnas par ston pa gnyis pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' ni rmongs pa med cing dran la shes bzhin du ma'i ltor 'gro ste/_ma'i lto na 'dug pa'i tshe 'ang dran pa 
[\[255b.5\]]nyams pa med do/_/'di ni mngal na gnas par ston pa gsum pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' ni ma'i mngal na 'dug kyang 'di lta ste phyogs dang /_'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi mgon po 
[\[255b.6\]]rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs shing chos bsgrag pa dang /_yang dag pa'i gtom bya ba rgyun mi gcod cing byang chub sems dpa'i stobs tshad med pa yang yongs su ston te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de dag mngal na gnas kyang de lta bu'i smon lam gyi khyad par bdog pas byang chub sems 
[\[255b.7\]]dpa' de dag ni ye shes mu med pa dang ldan pa ste/_'di ni mngal na gnas par ston pa bzhi pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe/_de ni 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun nas gnas par 'gyur ba yod de/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam gyis de 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]dag yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' mngal na gnas par ston te/_'di ni mngal na gnas par ston pa lnga ba'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' ni mi'i 'jig rten du byung nas kyang mir skyes pa rnam pa'i mchog thams 
[\[256a.2\]]cad dang ldan pa ston te/_'di ni mngal na gnas par ston pa drug pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' ni ma'i lus na 'dug bzhin du 'di lta ste dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor lta bur stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten 
[\[256a.3\]]gyi khams su snang ste/_de la mos pa chen po dang ldan pa'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag gis shes par gyur nas de dag nye bar 'ongs shing mchod pa dang /_rim gro byed de 'di 
[\[256a.4\]]ni mngal na gnas par ston pa bdun pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' mngal na gnas pas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma par gyur pa rnams dang tshogs te/_chos kyi brda'i sgo chen po ye shes chen po'i snying po zhes bya 
[\[256a.5\]]ba yang dag par 'gro bar bya ba yod do/_/de dag dang 'du ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mngal na gnas par ston te/_'di ni mngal na gnas pa ston pa brgyad pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' ni dri ma med pa'i snying po can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 
[\[256a.6\]]par zhugs shing ma'i mngal du 'gro ste/_ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus mal yang gnod par mi 'gyur bar dga' ldan gyi gnas rab bas kyang lhag pa'i rgyan ma'i khong du kun nas gnas par 'gyur te/_'di ni mngal na gnas pa ston pa dgu ba'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[256a.7\]]dpa' ma'i mngal na 'dug pa'i mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bsod nams chen po'i me tog kun nas rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i rim gro 'byung ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]'das de dag kyang de la byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po mtha' dang dbus med pa yang dag par ston te/_shes par bya ba de shes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu phra ba'i 'gro ba bcu ston to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems 
[\[256b.2\]]dpa' rnams kyi shin tu phra ba'i rgyud ston pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na yang gnas la thog ma sems bskyed pa nye bar bzung ba nas dbang bskur ba'i bar du yang yongs su ston pa dang /_ma'i mngal na yang gnas la dga' 
[\[256b.3\]]ldan na gnas pa yang yongs su ston pa dang /_ma'i mngal na'ang gnas la skye ba yang yongs su ston pa dang /_ma'i mngal na'ang gnas la gzhon nu'i sa yang yongs su ston pa dang /_ma'i mngal na'ang gnas la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du 'dug par yang yongs su ston 
[\[256b.4\]]pa dang /_ma'i mngal na'ang gnas la mngon par 'byung ba yang yongs su ston pa dang /_ma'i mngal na'ang gnas la dka' ba spyod pa'i sbyor ba dang /_snying po byang chub tu 'gro ba nas rnam par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du yang yongs su ston pa dang /_ma'i mngal na yang gnas la 
[\[256b.5\]]chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang yongs su ston pa dang /_ma'i mngal na'ang gnas la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang yongs su ston pa dang /_ma'i mngal na'ang gnas la shin tu phra la rgya che bar 'jug pa'i tshul gyis mngal gyi gnas de nyid du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams 
[\[256b.6\]]cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyi rnam pa dang /_sgo yang yongs su ston pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shin tu phra ba'i rgyud ston pa ste/_de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[256b.7\]]rnams ye shes chen po shin tu phra ba bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tsher skye ba ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa' dran zhing shes bzhin du skye ba dang /_'od zer gyi dra 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]ba snang ba chen pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par bkang ste/_lus snang ba dang ldan par skye ba dang phyir mi ldog cing srid pa'i tha ma par gyur par skye ba dang ma skyes shing 'byung ba med par skye ba dang khams gsum pa sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur khong du chud de skye ba dang /_phyogs 
[\[257a.2\]]bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gsum lus yongs su ston cing skye ba dang /_lus de nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya bar skye ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'od zer bkye bas yang dag par bskul ba'i lus su skye ba dang /_ye shes chen pos rnam par 'byed pa'i ting nge 
[\[257a.3\]]'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i lus su skye ba dang /_kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' skyes nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur/_sems can thams cad kyang rab tu 'grol bar 'gyur/_ngan song thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_bdud thams cad kyang rab tu spa 
[\[257a.4\]]'gong bar 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa yang 'ong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tsher skye ba ste/_de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can 'dul ba'i don du yongs su ston pa dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di 
[\[257a.5\]]dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gad mo cher dgod pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar kye ma'o/_/'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba ste/_'di la nged ma gtogs par gzhan 'byin par byed pa su'ang med do snyam nas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams gad mo cher dgod pa dang /_
[\[257a.6\]]kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni nyon mongs pas mdongs par byas pa'o/_/bdag ni shes rab dang ye shes kyis shin tu brgyan pa'o/_/zhes nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams gad mo cher dgod pa dang /_lus kyi gzhi 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku bla na med pa chen po dus 
[\[257a.7\]]gsum rgyas par 'gengs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes byang chub sems dpa' rnams gad mo cher dgod pa dang /_kye rgyal ba'i sras gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i mig bsgribs pa med pas phyogs bcur tshangs pa'i lha'i gnas nye bar bzung ba nas dbang phyug 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]chen po'i gnas kyi bar du rnam par lta zhing 'di snyam du sems te/_sems can 'di dag ni lus su 'phel ba'o/_/bdag ni ye shes kyi stobs dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar mthong nas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams gad mo cher dgod pa dang /_sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can rnams da dung 
[\[257b.2\]]phyir mi ldog par mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams gad mo cher dgod pa dang sa bon chung ngu las 'bras bu cher 'gyur ba mthong nas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams gad mo cher dgod pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa don yod par mthong nas/_byang chub 
[\[257b.3\]]sems dpa' rnams gad mo cher dgod pa dang /_sngon theg pa la lhan cig tu zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams chags pa'i gnas gzhan dang gzhan la chags pas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi che ba nyid ma thob pa mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams gad mo cher dgod pa dang /_rgyal 
[\[257b.4\]]ba'i sras gzhan yang sngon 'grogs par gyur pa'i lha dang mi rnams chung ngu na byis pa'i sa las kyang ma 'das shing yongs su skyo ba'i dbang po dang ldan par 'gyur ba mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams gad mo cher dgod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'od 
[\[257b.5\]]zer dbugs phyin pa chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pas reg par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams gad mo cher dgod pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gad mo cher dgod pa ste/_de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can 'dul 
[\[257b.6\]]ba'i dbang gi phyir dgod par 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i gom pas rnam par gnon pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yongs su bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams gom pas rnam par gnon pa dang /_nor 
[\[257b.7\]]bdun yongs su gtong bar bstan pa'i phyir gom pas rnam par gnon pa dang /_sa'i lha'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gom pas rnam par gnon pa dang /_khams gsum las 'das pa'i rnam par gnon pa dang /_'gros yongs su bstan pa'i phyir gom pas rnam par 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]gnon pa dang /_glang po'i 'gros dang /_khyu mchog gi 'gros dang /_seng ge'i 'gros dang /_'gros thams cad las 'das shing byang chub sems dpa'i 'gros khyad par du 'phags pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gros kyis 
[\[258a.2\]]rnam par gnon pa dang /_kye rgyal ba'i sras sa chen po yang rdo rje'i dbyings kyis kun nas bzung bar 'gyur te/_sa'i phyogs gzhan gyis byang chub sems dpa'i lus bzung bar mi nus pa bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams gom pas rnam par gnon pa dang /_sems 
[\[258a.3\]]can gzhan spro bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams gom pas rnam par gnon pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che bdun gyi nan tan yongs su bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams gom pas rnam par gnon pa dang /_chos nyid rab tu thob pas 
[\[258a.4\]]gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams gom pas rnam par gnon pa dang /_bdag ni 'jig rten na gtso bo yin/_bdag ni 'jig rten na phul du phyin pa yin no/_/zhes tshig brjod pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams gom pas rnam 
[\[258a.5\]]par gnon pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gom pas rnam par gnon pa ste/_de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can 'dul ba'i don du ston pa dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzhon nu'i 
[\[258a.6\]]sa kun tu ston pa'i las te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar yi ge dang grangs dang brda dang rtsis kyi sbyor ba thams cad las rab tu 'das pa'i bya ba kun tu ston pa'i las dang /_rta dang glang po dang /_shing rta rgyug pa thams cad 'phong kun las 'phags pa kun tu ston pa'i las dang /_cho lo dang 
[\[258a.7\]]brda thabs dang /_gar dang /_rgyan po dang rtsed mo dang /_'jig rten gyi dga' ba la phal las 'phags pa'i bya ba kun tu ston pa'i las dang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa kun tu ston pa'i las dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pas/_'jig 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]rten gyi khams tshad med pa rgyas par dgang ba kun tu ston pa'i las dang /_mi thams cad dang /_lha thams cad dang /_klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi 
[\[258b.2\]]mgon po thams cad las shin tu 'das par byang chub sems dpa'i mthu kun tu ston pa'i las dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi mgon po'i gzugs dang kha dog dang gzi brjid las shin tu 'das par byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dang /_kha dog dang /_
[\[258b.3\]]gzi brjid kun tu ston pa'i las dang /_'dod pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_rtse bas myos pa'i sems can rnams la chos kyi dga' bas rab tu dga' ba yang dag par bskyed pa kun tu ston pa'i las dang /_chos kyi rim gro bskyed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang 
[\[258b.4\]]rim gro bya bas 'dod pa'i khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa kun tu ston pa'i las dang /_chos la dga' ba'i snang bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par blang ba kun tu ston pa'i las so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 
[\[258b.5\]]gzhon nu'i sa kun tu ston pa'i las te de dag yongs su bstan nas de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du 'dong bar 'gyur ba'o/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_
[\[258b.6\]]'di ltar sngon lhan cig tu spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par bya ba'i don tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod pa'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa dang /_longs 
[\[258b.7\]]spyod dang skyid pa la chags pa'i lha dang mi rnams la longs spyod dang skyid pa'i che ba nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa dang /_rnyog pa lnga'i zhing du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na ting nge 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]'dzin la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang che ba nyid yongs su bstan pa'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa dang /_sngon gyi smon lam dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir btsun 
[\[259a.2\]]mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa dang /_pha dang ma dang gnyen pa'i tshogs kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings chen po dang ldan pa'i rol mo brdung ba dang /_dkrol ba'i sgras de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[259a.3\]]thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir/_btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas shing shin tu phra ba'i mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba nas yongs su 
[\[259a.4\]]mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du bstan pa'i phyir/_btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa dang /_chos kyi skyabs dang ldan pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/_btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[259a.5\]]rnams kyi btsun mo'i 'khor nye bar ston pa ste/_de dag ni srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpas yongs su bstan nas de'i 'og tu mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'byung ba ste/_
[\[259a.6\]]bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar khyim gyi gnas smad pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang /_gnas la dga' ba'i sems can gyen du bskyod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang /_'phags pa dang mthun pa'i 
[\[259a.7\]]lam gyi legs pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang /_rab tu byung ba'i yon tan dang /_legs pa yang dag par bsngags pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang /_
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]mtha' gnyis kyi lta ba dang bral ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang /_'dod pa'i bde ba dang phrad par brtson zhing bdag gi bde ba lhur len pa'i sems can skyo bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[259b.2\]]mngon par 'byung ba dang /_khams gsum pa thams cad las 'byung ba'i sngon gyi ltas yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang /_rang la rag las par spyod cing gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa la bsten pa'i 
[\[259b.3\]]phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi bsnyengs pa thob pa dang /_mthun par yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang /_kye 
[\[259b.4\]]rgyal ba'i sras chos nyid kyis kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' srid pa'i tha ma ba ni gdon mi za bar mngon par 'byung ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir mngon par 'byung ba yongs su ston pa 
[\[259b.5\]]dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dka' ba spyod pa'i sbyor ba ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar dma' ba la mos pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[259b.6\]]dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang /_lta ba'i rnam pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams gyen du bskyod pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang /_las dang bya bas 'khyams par gyur pa'i sems can rnams la las kyi rnam par 
[\[259b.7\]]smin pa mngon sum du bstan pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas par chos nyid rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang /_bdag gi dub pa nye bar zhi zhing mthu dang ldan pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang /_ma yin na chos la chags pa rnams 
[\[260a.2\]]kyi don du byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang /_'dod pa'i bde ba dang phrad par brtson zhing rang gi bde ba lhur len pa'i sems can rnams skyo bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang /_
[\[260a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsams pa'i khyad par yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang /_skye bo phyi ma rnams brtson 'grus rtsom pa la yang dag par sbyar ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[260a.4\]]rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang /_ma yin na dbang po yongs su ma smin pa'i lha dang /_mi rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus bsdad pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu 
[\[260a.5\]]po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir dka' ba spyod pa'i sbyor ba yongs su ston pa dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub tu 'gro ba ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar 
[\[260a.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu bskyod pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa dang /_
[\[260a.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bdag gi lus rnam par phye ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa dang /_sngon lhan cig tu spyod pa spyod pa'i grogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams bskul ba'i phyir/_
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa dang /_snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa dang /_sems can ji ltar mos pa rnams la lus dang spyod lam dang /_byang 
[\[260b.2\]]chub kyi shing gi rgyan rnam par phye ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du blta ba'i phyir/_byang chub 
[\[260b.3\]]sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa dang /_gom pa dor ba dang /_'deg pa thams cad du ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la snyoms par 'jug cing /_skad cig skad cig du rnam par 'tshang rgya ba las mi 'da' ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[260b.4\]]dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa dang /_lha dang klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad kyi mchod pa 
[\[260b.5\]]blang ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa dang /_chags pa med pa'i ye shes chen pos rnam par phye ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par blta ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[260b.6\]]yid la byed cing /_phyogs thams cad du rnam par phye ba'i mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub 
[\[260b.7\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub tu 'gro ba sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir yongs su bstan pa dag go/_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po nyi shu gsum pa/_/
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub la 'dug pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu bskyod cing /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/_/'jig rten 
[\[261a.2\]]gyi khams thams cad snang bar byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/_/ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed cing byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis rlob cing /_
[\[261a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan seng ge'i khri la rnam par lta zhing /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/_/yid nam mkha' dang mnyam pa la rnam par mi rtog cing byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po 
[\[261a.4\]]byang chub la 'khod do/_/ji ltar mthun pa'i lus dang spyod lam yongs su ston cing byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/_/rdo rje'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs par byed cing /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/_/de bzhin 
[\[261a.5\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs rnam par dag pa'i gnas yang dag par len cing /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/_/bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus 'gro ba thams cad byin gyis rlob cing /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang 
[\[261a.6\]]chub la 'khod do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'dug pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub kyi mchog la 'khod nas kyang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bcu 'byung ste/_bcu gang zhe 
[\[261a.7\]]na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de la snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhal mngon par bstan te/_phyag g.yas pa brkyang 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]zhing /_kye ded dpon chen po rgyal bar gyur cig_/rgyal bar gyur cig ces gsung brjod de 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dang po'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dgongs pa 
[\[261b.2\]]dang /_byin gyis rlob pa yang dag par mdzad de 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gnyis pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sngon lhan cig du spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'ongs te/_byang chub sems 
[\[261b.3\]]dpa' de dag la kun nas bskor cing mchod pa'i las rnam par phye ba rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub ste/_'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gsum pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rtswa 
[\[261b.4\]]dang gel ba dang /_sdong po dang /_nags tshal thams cad kyang bsam pa yod go lta ste/_snying po byang chub gang na bder 'dud cing phyag 'tshal te/_'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bzhi pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba'i tshe yang 
[\[261b.5\]]chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur te/_ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/_'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos lnga ba'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras rgya mtsho mchog gi dam pa dri 
[\[261b.6\]]ma med cing kun nas snang la 'od gsal ba'i sa'i snying po la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin chen pos kun nas yog par 'gyur te/_'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos drug pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub 
[\[261b.7\]]kyi mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /_rim gror bya ba shin tu rgya chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad du 'byung ste/_'di ni ngo mtshar 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]rmad du byung ba'i chos bdun pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ye shes mchog gi sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang /_dbang po dang spyod pa mngon du 'gyur te/_'di ni ngo mtshar rmad 
[\[262a.2\]]du byung ba'i chos brgyad pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la blo shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur te/_ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu nam mkha'i dbyings tshad med pa dang /_dus gsum rgyas par 
[\[262a.3\]]'gengs pa'i lus kun nas gnas par 'gyur te/_'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dgu pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus kyi las dus thams cad la yang dag par gzhol zhing ye shes chen po chags 
[\[262a.4\]]pa med pa rdul dang bral ba'i snang ba dang ldan par 'gyur te/_'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bcu pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnams te/_byang chub sems dpa' snying po byang chub mchog la gnas 
[\[262a.5\]]pa rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag go_/kye rgyal ba'i sras don rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gi dbang yang dag par mthong nas snying po byang chub mchog la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston te/_bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam 
[\[262a.6\]]klas pa na thab mo dang /_g.yul la mos pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi che ba nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston to/_/yid gnyis dang the tsom du gyur pa'i mi dang lha rnams kyi yid gnyis dang the tsom gcad pa'i 
[\[262a.7\]]phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/_/bdud kyi sde yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/_/thab mo dang g.yul la mos pa'i lha dang mi rnams kun nas bsdu ba dang /_kun nas 'dus pa'i lha dang mi rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/_/byang chub 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]sems dpa'i mthu la thub pa med pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/_/sems can gzhan mos shing spro bar bya ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/_/phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/_/snying po byang chub kyi bar gyi bdud kyi las yongs su bstan pa dang /_
[\[262b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lam thams cad las 'das pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/_/nyon mongs pa'i stobs kyis nyams smad cing stobs med par byas pa yongs su bstan pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod pa dang /_byams pa'i stobs yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir 
[\[262b.3\]]bdud 'dul ba ston to/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dag tu chos nyid rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras/_don bcu po de dag gi dbang mthong bas na/_byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba 
[\[262b.4\]]ston to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdud dang las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad las 'das shing byang chub 
[\[262b.5\]]sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la rnam par rtse ba yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan 'byam klas pa thams cad dang ldan pa yin/_chos dkar po'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par bstsags pa yin/_
[\[262b.6\]]chos snang ba rnam par dpyad par bya ba thams cad shin tu rnam par phye ba yin/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i lus dang ldan pa yin/_sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems dang dbyangs su ldan pa yin/_byin gyi rlabs thams cad kyis rab tu chog por byin gyis brlabs pa 
[\[262b.7\]]yin/_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rnam par mi rtog pa thob pa yin/_skad cig gcig gis dus gsum rnam par 'tshang rgya ba yin/_shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang rab tu thob pa yin/_
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin te/_'di ltar gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin/_zag pa zad pa shes pa'i bar gyi stobs dang ldan pa yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs 
[\[263a.2\]]pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste/_stobs bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[263a.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rnam pa bcu bskor te/_rnam pa bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pas shin tu sbyangs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang /_so sor yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i sgra rjes su bsgrags pa dang /_bden pa bzhi'i tshul gyis shin tu brtags pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[263a.4\]]rnam par thar ba bsgribs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rjes su song ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing blta bar dka' la g.yo ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing sdug bsngal gyi gsal shing 'byin pa dang /_sngon gyi snying rje chen po'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams 
[\[263a.5\]]cad du grag pa dang /_bskal pa grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]par chos ston par rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /_dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_legs par spyad pas bskor ba'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[263a.6\]]sgo rnam pa bcu po de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa rnam pa tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]par de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo de ni sems can gzhan gyi rgyud la chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcus 
[\[263a.7\]]thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_mngon par chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'byung bar 'gyur te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ltar smon lam thams cad kyi stobs kyi shugs dang /_snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_sems can gyi khams thams cad mi gtong ba dang /_ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul pa 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang /_dus la bab par thob par byed pa dang /_rigs pa'i tshul bzhin du [{]myi [,]mi [}]'khrul pa dang /_dus gsum shes par bya ba rab tu rtogs pa dang /_lus kyi dbang zil gyis mi non pa dang /_tshig gi dbang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par dka' ba dang /_ye shes 
[\[263b.2\]]kyi dbang tshigs bzhin du khong du tshud par byed pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcu po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_
[\[263b.3\]]mngon par [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rdzogs par mdzad zin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni don bcu'i dbang gzigs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po ston te/_bcu gang zhe na 
[\[263b.4\]]'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'du byed [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa yongs su bstan pa dang /_'dus byas thams cad yid brtan du mi rung bar bstan pa dang /_mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyogs bde bar 'gro bas 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba thams cad dang bral ba yang dag par bstan pa dang /_gzugs 
[\[263b.5\]]kyi lus la zhen pa'i lha dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnams la gzugs kyi lus [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag pa nyid du yang dag par bstan pa dang /_chos kyi sku la yang dag par sbyar ba dang /_rnam par 'gyur ba'i mthus phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]zlog par yongs su bstan pa dang /_'du byed thams cad 'dod dgur [{]myi [,]mi [}]rung zhing dbang bsgyur du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su 
[\[263b.6\]]bstan pa dang /_sa gsum gyi 'khor ba thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur yongs su bstan pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa ni snying po dam pa ste/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa'i chos nyid du yang dag par bstan pa dang /_kun 'byung zhing 'jig pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pa dang /_kye rgyal 
[\[263b.7\]]ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos nyid kyis kyang de bzhin te/_sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad rdzogs par mdzad de/_dgongs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu bskor te/_'dul ba thams cad shin tu dul nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]thams cad shin tu lung bstan par 'gyur te/_mnyam pa med pa'i go 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen por yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras don bcu po de dag yang dag par gzigs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[264a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i go 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yongs su ston to/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo ste/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang pos gsungs pa'o/_/
[\[264a.3\]]don tshang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba'o/_/mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa dang /_smon lam chen po rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad par byed pa'o/_/sems can gang gis 'di thos par gyur te/_thos nas kyang mos par byed pa dang /_mos par 
[\[264a.4\]]gyur nas kyang nan tan gyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa de dag thams cad myur du bla na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' nan tan lhur byed pa rnams kyis 'grub kyi nan tan 
[\[264a.5\]]dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldan pa rnams kyis ma yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nan tan la gnas pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang yon tan gyi 'byung gnas don rnam par gdon [{]myi [,]mi [}]za ba'i me tog chos kyi sgo thams 
[\[264a.6\]]cad la yang dag par gzhol ba/_ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba/_'gro ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa/_chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed par 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig 
[\[264a.7\]]rten dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di rim gror byas te/_mnyan par bya'o/_/blang bar bya'o/_/yongs su gzung bar bya'o/_/yongs su bzung nas kyang nges par rtogs pa'i sgos yongs su sbyang ba dang /_smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa la 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]brtson par bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dkon pa ma yin no/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u chos thams cad kyi sgor yang dag par gzhol ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 
[\[264b.2\]]bstan pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i chos nyid thob pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams rab tu g.yos par gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams g.yos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas shing gsal 
[\[264b.3\]]bar gyur to/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang dgyes par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la zhal bstan nas gsung brjod pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so/_/ji ltar khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 
[\[264b.4\]]'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_yon tan gyi 'byung gnas don rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog chos kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das 
[\[264b.5\]]pa/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di bstan pa ni rgyal 
[\[264b.6\]]ba'i bu khyod chos 'di dag la legs par bslabs pas shin tu byang ba ste/_rgyal ba'i bu khyod kyis chos kyi byin gyi rlabs dang mthus/_mos pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bshad de nged kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[264b.7\]]kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so/_/kye rgyal ba'i bu khyod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di da lta dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma thos pa'i chos thos par bya ba'i phyir nged kyis byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]bzang pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur bltas te/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bltas nas/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad la bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcud pa 'di dag smras so/_/gang rnams de dag bskal pa bye ba khrag 
[\[265a.2\]]khrig stong du brtul zhugs dka' spyad pa/_/gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong las byung ba'i chos kyi sras/_/gang rnams de dag sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong rnams byang chub rab 'god pa/_/dpe zla [{]myed [,]med [}]pa de dge rnams kyi spyod pa bshad kyis rtse gcig mnyan par 
[\[265a.3\]]byos/_/gang dag sangs rgyas khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod kyang bdag ni sangs rgyas [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa/_/gang dag nyon mongs bcings pa'i 'gro ba thar byed sems can 'du shes mi gnas dang /_/gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas yon tan rtag tu tshol yang yon tan [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa/_/de 
[\[265a.4\]]dag 'jig rten rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i spyod mchog mdzes pa brjod par bya/_/gang rnams de dag srid pa gsum na las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi dbang song snang /_/gang rnams de dga' 'phags pa'i yon tan ldan zhing khyu mchog spyod pa ston pa po/_/gang rnams de dag gti mug nyon mongs 
[\[265a.5\]]nyes bral bsam pa zhi zhing rab zhi ba/_/'gro ba rnams la spyod pa'i rim pa ston pa de dag yon tan brjod par bya/_/gang rnams de dag bdud g.yo 'gro ba kun las rgal te thams cad dbang byed pa/_/'gro ba thams cad bdag la sprul pa sna tshogs tha dad mtha' yas rab tu ston/_/sems 
[\[265a.6\]]bskyed gyur ma thag tu gnas dang 'jig pa'i bya ba thams cad ston byed pa/_/de dag yon tan sna tshogs mdzes pa sems can dga' bar byed pa brjod par bya/_/srid pa'i rgyud na sems can sdug bsngal nyen cing skye dang rga bas gzir ba dang /_/'chi dang mya ngan dag gis gtses shing 
[\[265a.7\]]gnod byas nyon mongs kun tu gzir mthong nas/_/de dag thar bar bya phyir snying rje rgya cher bskyed nas ye shes mchog dgod pa/_/de dag yon tan shin tu dge ba phyogs tsam bshad kyis rtse gcig mnyan par byos/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dga' bar bsam 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]gtan la yang rnam par rtsen/_/shes rab thabs kyi pha rol phyin cing byams dang snying rje lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_/dga' ba'i chos la brtson zhing btang snyoms dga' bas bskal pa brgyar yang spyod spyad pa/_/de dag spyod ldan yon tan ldan pa rnams kyi yon tan bstan gyis de dag 
[\[265b.2\]]nyon/_/gang rnams de dag byang chub gnyer phyir bye ba khrag khrig stong gi lus skoms pa/_/gang rnams byang chub zhi ba tshol phyir srog la lta ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par gyur pa dang /_/gang rnams de dag sems can phan phyir rtag brtson bdag gi bde ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]tshol ba/_/byams dang snying rje'i sems ldan 
[\[265b.3\]]thub pa de dag kun gyi spyod mchog brjod par bya/_/rgya mtsho'i chu thigs bgrangs pa re res thams cad zad par bya bar rung srid kyi/_/de dag yon tan bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig du ma stong du brjod byas kyang /_/dpe tsam bya bar mi nus legs par brjod cing bstan par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus 'on 
[\[265b.4\]]kyang go/_/sems can phan pa'i don du sangs rgyas yul rnams bstan par bya ba mnyan par byos/_/gang dag 'gro ba rnams kyi don phyir dge ba kun 'dzin dkar po 'phel byed kyang /_/mtho bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]sems dma' bar sems [{]myed [,]med [}{]myi [,]mi [}]dman chos tshol ngoms par yongs 
[\[265b.5\]]mi 'gyur/_/'gro ba kun nas don gnyer chu klung ye shes mtsho chen shes rab shing sdong ste/_/ston pa'i mkhas pa de dag rnams ni sa ltar 'gro ba thams cad 'tsho ba yin/_/byams pa rlan yin snying rje rtsa ba dga' ba sdong po brtan pa sdom pa ste/_/ze ba ye shes dri ni 
[\[265b.6\]]tshul khrims bzang po lo ma me tog yon tan can/_/sangs rgyas 'od kyis rab tu rgyas byas blo gros ldan pa sems can dgar byed pa/_/de dang de dag pad+mo lta bur 'dus byas ma gos 'gro ba rnams la snang /_/sa bon mos pa sa gzhi bsam pa byams dang snying rje dag ni rtsa ba 
[\[265b.7\]]ste/_/sdong po shes rab thabs ni yal ga lcug ma dag ni pha rol phyin rab lnga/_/bsam gtan shes rab mngon shes me tog rgyas pa kun mkhyen ye shes 'bras bu ste/_/chos kyi shing mchog rdzu 'phrul bya 'khod de dang des ni 'jig rten gsum po khebs/_/rim gyis dkar 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]yangs yongs su spel ba lus yin bden pa rnams ni rkang pa ste/_/dran pa mgrin pa spyod mchog shes rab mgo yin ral pa rnam par grol ba dge/_/stong pa don dam sul dang phug yin byams dang snying rje dag ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]gnyis te/_/de dag seng ge lta bur 
[\[266a.2\]]bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]sgra 'byin bdud sde rab tu skrag par byed/_/'gro ba ma lus rnams ni 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon nyon mongs mi zad 'khyams 'gyur te/_/bdud kyi bya ma rta dang rkun por bcas pas zin gyis gti mug mdongs gyur pa/_lam ni rab ston [{]myi [,]mi [}]mkhas sems can mthong nas 
[\[266a.3\]]ded dpon mkhas pa de dag ni/_/lam gyi mthar khrid 'jigs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i grong khyer dam pa mchog la rab tu 'god/_/'gro ba dag ni 'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa nyon mongs sna tshogs nad btab cing /_/yun ring nas ni 'dus byas sdug bsngal dag la gzhol zhing sdug bsngal 
[\[266a.4\]]rab 'bar ba/_/sems can mthong nas snying rje bskyed de nyon mongs pa yi nad pa kun gso zhing /_/nad rnams zhi bar byed pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dam pa dag kyang ston/_/rgyal po lta bu de dang de dag 'khor rnams dga' byed 'gro la chos ston pa/_/sdig pa spongs 
[\[266a.5\]]la dge la snyen cing sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyang tshol cig ces/_/rkang gnyis dbang po'i chos kyi yul la kun mkhyen ye shes dbang por dbang bskur ba/_/rgya chen byang chub yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas de dag 'gro ba'i 'phags pa'i nor/_/tshul khrims lte ba 
[\[266a.6\]]ting 'dzin mu khyud brgyan pa'i ye shes 'od dang shes rab mtshon/_/ye shes rno ba'i gzhung can nyon mongs 'joms zhing bdud kyi sde rnams dkrug byed pa/_/chos kyi sgron ma che 'byin mchog rnams de dang de dag sangs rgyas bskor ba yi/_/'khor lo mchog rnams bskor 
[\[266a.7\]]zhing pha rol rgol ba dag dang mu stegs thams cad 'joms/_/ye shes chu ni zab cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad shin tu rgya chen chos kyi ro dang ldan/_/byang chub yan lag de bzhin bsam gtan rin chen gang ba 'gro kun shes par dka'/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas kyi mtha' rlabs mtha' 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]yas yul rnams dag cing lhag bsam dge_/de dang de dag ye shes rgya mtsho mtshungs [{]myed [,]med [}]bstan pa zad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ro/_/'jig rten rab 'phags rtag tu yul gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]gos 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas gyur pa/_/bsam gtan mngon shes rab 'phel ye 
[\[266b.2\]]shes rtse mo lhag pa'i bsam pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]sgul ba/_/gang dag de dang nyer phrad shes rab ye shes mchog gis rab tu 'dra bar 'gyur/_/de dang de dag yon tan ri rab shes rab rab brtan 'gro ba kun gyis bltas/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog gi rdo rje mtshungs 
[\[266b.3\]]shing 'dra ste brtul zhugs thams cad brtan/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yas bsam pa mi phyed de/_/bdud dang sems can nyon mongs 'jig rten rlung dag gis ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]bskyod rab brtan pa/_/de dang de dag 'jig rten dam pa nyon mongs 
[\[266b.4\]]'bar ba dag las bzlog par byed/_/byams pa'i sprin rnams kun 'dus snying rje stug po rig pa'i glog chen rgyu ldog pa/_/thub pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gnas bzhi dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing rab tu sgrog_/so so yang dag rig dang tshul khrims yan lag brgyad 
[\[266b.5\]]ldan chu'i char 'bebs pa/_/de dang de dag sprin chen nyon mongs zhi byed sems can don phyir mngon par 'phags/_/shes rab dga' dang khrel ba dag ni 'obs te chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng /_/ye shes shing thags yin te thar pa'i sgo phye dran pa de dag sgo ba 
[\[266b.6\]]yin/_/bden pa rnams ni lam chen bzhi ste shin tu dge ba'i rdzu 'phrul rab brgyan pa/_/srid pa gsum na bdud sde dag gis [{]myi [,]mi [}]thul grong khyer chos nyid dag tu ston/_/thams cad mkhyen gyi sems mchog shing la rab 'dug rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i rkang pa brtan/_/gshog 
[\[266b.7\]]pa thabs kyi stobs te pha rol gnon mthu byams dang snying rje [{]myig [,]mig [}]gnyis yin/_/ston pa de dag 'gro ba kun na thub [{]myed [,]med [}]mkha' lding dbang po'i drag shul 'dra/_/srid pa'i mtsho nas 'don cing lha [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnams kyang mya ngan 'da' ba'i mchog la 'god/_/tshul khrims dkyil 'khor 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shugs ldan ye shes 'od zer phreng ba mdzes/_/'od snang kun 'char nyon mongs 'joms zhing srid pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu skem par byed/_/stobs dang dbang po dge ba'i sman 'phel sems can pad mo yongs su rgyas byed pa/_/de dang de dag 
[\[267a.2\]]snang byed chos kyi nyi ma'i khyu mchog 'gro ba kun tu 'byung /_/chos dbyings rnam par dag pa dkyil 'khor 'gro ba kun gyis blta na mdzes pa ste/_/nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyi tshogs mang skar ma 'dra ba dag ni zil gyis mnan/_/sems kyi rgyud rnams mthong nas srid pa gsum 
[\[267a.3\]]du 'phel dang 'grib pa rnam par ston/_/de dang de dag ye shes zla ba 'gro la 'char zhing mkhas pa nam mkha'i mtha'/_/chos kyi dbang po 'gro ba kun la dbang byed gzugs dang yon tan dag gis brgyan/_/ye shes rdo rje mnga' ba thabs ni [{]myig [,]mig [}]ste chos la dbang chen bsgyur 
[\[267a.4\]]gnas pa/_/lus dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs kun gyi blta ba'i dbang po ste/_/chos kyi 'gro ba kun las rgyal ba de dang de dag chos kyi dbang po yin/_/srid pa gsum na 'dod pa'i 'dam dang nyon mongs las las rab 'das kun dbang po/_/byams pa 
[\[267a.5\]]snang dang thugs rje bsam gtan dga' dang btang snyoms rnams la mos/_/srid pa gsum po kun tu tha dad lus ston chos kyi sgras kyang go byed pa/_/de dang de dag tshangs pa lta bur rnam dag mos shing lta ba'i rnam pa sel/_/'khor las rab tu 'das shing rnam dag 
[\[267a.6\]]yul dang ldan pa bdag po chos kyi dbang /_/phyir ldog [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur blo gros che 'chang gang rnams theg pa dma' dang tha dad la/_/chos kyi dbang por dbang bskur 'jig rten dam pa ye shes phyir ldog [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur ba/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan dbang phyug grags chen 
[\[267a.7\]]de dang de dag 'jig rten dbang /_/nam mkha'i mkha' dbyings lta bur dngos dang rnam bral [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa thams cad rnam bstsal ba/_/'gro ba kun tu bya ba nyams len khyu mchog ci la 'ang gnas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa ste/_/'gro ba kun tu spyod pa dkar zhugs mkhas pa de dag rab 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]tu [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa/_/de dang de dag ye shes dge zhing dag pas shes rab nam mkha'i dbyings dang 'dra/_/de dang de dag shin tu rgya chen thabs ldan sa ltar 'gro ba kun gyi gsos/_/chu 'dra de dang de dag byams dang snying rjes nyon mongs rnams ni rab tu sel/_/de 
[\[267b.2\]]dang de dag ye shes myes ni nyon mongs sreg cing bag chags bcas pa bstsal/_/ston pa de dag [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas rlung dang 'dra bar srid pa gsum na rab tu rgyu/_/de dang de dag rin chen 'dra ste shin tu dkon zhing 'gro ba dbul yang sel/_/de dang de dag rdo rje lta bur srid 
[\[267b.3\]]pa gsum na lta ba kun tu 'joms/_/de dang de dag yon tan kun gyi 'phring ba sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum mdzes byed/_/ston pa de dag nor bu rin chen mtshungs 'dra spyod pa kun gyi gtsug tu phyin/_/de dang de dag me tog lta bur yon tan rab rgyas byang chub 
[\[267b.4\]]yan lag rtse/_/phreng ba lta bur de dang de dag smon lam bcings shing 'jig rten mgon la gnas/_/de dang de dag tshul khrims ma nyams skyon med rnam dag dri ni dri rab zhim/_/de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum na chos dang ye shes kyi ni bag chags dag_/gdugs 'dra de dang 
[\[267b.5\]]de dag stobs kyi bla res nyon mongs rdul las skyob par byed/_/ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i thugs mnga' de dang de dag nga rgyal rgyal mtshan snyol/_/de dang de dag spyod pa'i ba dan sna tshogs yid 'ong ye shes kun tu 'phags/_/gos 'dra de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul 
[\[267b.6\]]yon tan 'gro ba kun la khebs par byed/_/theg pa 'dra ba khyu mchog mtha' yas de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum las 'byin/_/de dang de dag rab dul glang po lta bur yid kyis rtag tu dul la gnas/_/de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul rtas ni khal chen khyer zhing 'jig 
[\[267b.7\]]rten gsum las 'da'/_/klu yi dbang po lta bu de dang de dag sems kyi yul du chos char 'bebs/_/de dang de dag 'gro ba kun la me tog u dum ba ra mtshungs 'dra shin tu dkon/_/dpa' bo lta bu de dang de dag nyon mongs 'joms zhing bdud kyi sde rnams 'khrug_/
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog 'khor lo lta bu de dang de dag 'dren pa rnams kyis rab tu btsud/_/de dang de dag sgron ma lta bur mun pa sel cing sems can lam yang ston/_/de dang de dag chu klung lta bur yon tan ded cing lam rgyud rjes su 'gro/_/de dang de dag 
[\[268a.2\]]zam pa lta bur ngal ba [{]myed [,]med [}]par rtag tu 'gro ba sgrol/_/gru dang gru chen lta bur smon lam rab btab ye shes gangs chen mtsho thob byed/_/de dang de dag mnyan pa lta bur 'gro ba ye shes thang chen mchog la 'god/_/de dag skyed mos tshal gyi dga' la rtse zhing 
[\[268a.3\]]'gro la yang dag spyod pa ston/_/de dag chos kyi rnam thar mngon shes me tog ye shes gzhal [{]myed [,]med [}]khang dag pa/_/mkhas pa de dang de dag sman ltar nad zhi byed cing nyon mongs rab tu sel/_/sman gyis rgyas pa'i gangs ri lta bur de dang de dag ye shes 'byung gnas so/_/de dag 
[\[268a.4\]]sangs rgyas lta bur ye shes kyis ni 'gro ba gnyid log mun pa sel/_/yang dag sangs rgyas lta bur gzhan [{]myin [,]min [}]yid kyis 'gro ba yang dag rtogs par byed/_/de dang de dag rgyal ba ci 'dra de ltar 'ongs te mkhas pa de nyid gnas/_/de dag thams cad mkhyen pa lta bur ye shes 
[\[268a.5\]]'byung gnas kun nas sgor yang zhugs/_/zhi ba skyed pa de dang de dag ston pas rab bsngags 'gro ba kun la ston/_/de dang de dag rang gi ye shes yul dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yul shes/_/de dang de dag tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]dpung dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun na thub pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/de 
[\[268a.6\]]dag ye shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs blo gros 'chang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyang shes/_/gang na gang dag 'gro ba kun gyi gzugs dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rnams ji snyed snang yod pa/_/kun tu gzugs snyoms gzugs kyi rjes su song zhing [{]mying [,]ming [}]dbyangs rjes su song ba yin/_/gzugs 
[\[268a.7\]]rnams kun las 'das shing [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang rnam par bral yang bya ba thams cad ston/_/de dag mthu ni 'gro ba rnams kyis rnam pa kun tu brjod par mi nus so/_/gang dag 'di 'dra'i yon tan thob cing dngos bral dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i chos gnas shing /_/yod dang [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i mdud 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]pa thams cad bral ba mkhas pa ye shes mngon sum can/_/thams cad shes kyang ye shes rten pa ma yin ye shes de la gnas pa min/_/de dag spyod la 'jug pa yid 'ong 'jig rten dga' bar byed pa bshad par bya/_/chos kyi tshul ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dngos po dben 
[\[268b.2\]]pa lta bur rab rtogs nas/_/mkhas pa sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis smon lam thabs dang snying rje dag kyang byed/_/sprul pa'i ye shes sgo dang ldan pas khyu mchog bya ba sna tshogs rab ston pa'i/_/byang chub sems dpa' ma nor yid can rtse gcig mnyam 
[\[268b.3\]]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa legs par grag_/lus gcig la ni mtha' yas lus dang rgya chen lus rnams tha dad rab tu ston/_/sems [{]myed [,]med [}]yid [{]myed [,]med [}]sems kyi yul [{]myed [,]med [}]'on kyang 'gro ba kun tu de dag ston/_/khyu mchog brjod pa'i pha rol phyin pa de dag dbyangs gcig rnam par 
[\[268b.4\]]rjod byed kyang /_/'gro ba dag gi sgra skad ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu brjod/_/nyon mongs rgyud byung lus dang bral yang sems can rnams kyi lus la dbang bsgyur te/_/brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul gyis zhi ba rtogs shing sgra rnams thams cad rab tu ston/_/
[\[268b.5\]]de dag sems kyi rang bzhin zhi zhing 'od gsal nam mkha' mtshungs par yang dag shes/_/'gro ba kun la bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs sgo nas 'jig rten sna tshogs ston/_/de dag lus rnams gang la'ang gnas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]de lus kyang de dag ston pa byed/_/'gro ba 
[\[268b.6\]]thams cad kyi ni skye ba dag dang rgyu mthun gnas pa ji snyed pa/_/thams cad kun tu skye ba'i lus dang ldan yang skye ba dag la gnas pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/rang gi lus la mkha' 'dra dngos bral sems can sems la sna tshogs rnam pa ste/_/mkhas pa kun la dbang bsgyur de 
[\[268b.7\]]dag lus ni mtha' yas kun tu ston byed cing /_/me tog dri dang byug pa phye ma sil snyan gdugs dang ba dan rgyal mtshan rnams/_/thams cad mkhyen la mchod pas rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten mchog la mchod byed cing /_/mkhas pa bsam pa thag 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]pas lus kyis 'du byed mchod pa dam pa kun tu ston/_/mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba zhabs kyi drung 'khod rgyal ba thams cad kyi/_/'khor rnams kun na snang zhing mtshungs [{]myed [,]med [}]de dag zhu ba kun kyang zhu ba byed/_/chos kyi dam pa thos nas ting 'dzin re re mtha' 
[\[269a.2\]]yas sgo ldan thob gyur cing /_/blo gros ldan pa de snyed rnam par ldan pa ston pa byed kyang zad pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/'gro ba sgyu ma lta bur rtogs nas shes rab ye shes thabs kyi pha rol phyin/_/sgyu ma lta bu'i chos dang gzugs spobs mtha' yas dang ba 'gro ba kun la ston/_/
[\[269a.3\]]sna tshogs gzugs dang sgra rnams mtha' yas shin tu rgya che sems kyang rab tu ston/_/'gro ba thams cad la ni 'du shes dra ba 'jug pa ston kyang gnas pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/'gro don rjes 'gro de dag la la dag tu thog ma'i sems su 'gro la ston/_/la lar 'gro ba kun la 
[\[269a.4\]]byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas rgya chen dag kyang ston/_/la lar sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus brtan dang shes rab rnams/_/la lar tshangs pa'i lam sdud kha cig tu ni spyod pa mchog kyang rab tu ston/_/mkhas pa rtog [{]myed [,]med [}]de dag la lar spyod pa 
[\[269a.5\]]rdzogs shing bzod pa thob pa ston/_/la lar skye ba gcig gis thogs par nges shing la lar rgyal bas dbang bskur ba/_/la lar nyan thos gzugs su gyur cing la la dag du rang rgyal gzugs su 'gyur/_/bye ba khrag khrig mang po'i zhing du mya ngan 'da' yang spyod las 
[\[269a.6\]]ldog pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/de dag la lar lha dbang brgya byin lha dang bcas pa la lar tshangs par 'gyur/_/de dag la lar lha'i bu mo brgyas bskor la lar gcig pu spyod par ston/_/la lar dge slong rab tu zhi zhing yid zhi la lar rgyal po dbang phyug 'gyur/_/la lar chos kyi dra 
[\[269a.7\]]bar 'jug pa'i ye shes khyu mchog gzugs kyang rab tu ston/_/la lar bud [{]myed [,]med [}]sgyu rtsal pha rol rab phyin la lar dka' thub can du 'gyur/_/la lar 'dod pa'i longs spyod rgya chen ston cing la lar bsam gtan thub pa byed/_/la lar mya ngan 'da' dang tshe'i sa dang la lar 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]rgan dang byis par ston/_/de dag spyod pa bsam na skye bo mos par 'gyur te yid gnyis rnyed par 'gyur/_/la lar lha dang 'grogs shing la lar shi 'pho la lar mngal 'gro gnas par ston/_/la lar mngal zhugs la lar rnam par sangs rgyas la lar 
[\[269b.2\]]'khor lo rab tu bskor/_/la lar skye ba la lar mya ngan las 'das pa la lar bzo yang rab tu slob/_/la lar bud [{]myed [,]med [}]tshogs kyi dbus gnas la lar ting 'dzin la lar mngon par 'byung /_/la lar khyu mchog byang chub dam par sangs rgyas byang chub shing gi drung 
[\[269b.3\]]na bzhugs/_/la lar 'khor lo rab tu bskor zhing la lar sna tshogs chos rnams yongs su tshol/_/la lar sangs rgyas gyur cing zhing rnams bye ba brgyar khyab 'gro bar ston byed kyang /_/byang chub don du spyod pa dag gi tshogs rnams las kyang phyir ldog ma 
[\[269b.4\]]yin no/_/bskal pa'i grangs la 'jug pa'i pha rol phyin pas bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya dag_/khyu mchog sems gcig nang ston sems gcig bskal pa brgyar yang de bzhin ston pa byed/_/'gro ba thams cad la'ang rtog dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtog pa yi yul rnams thams 
[\[269b.5\]]cad ston/_/[{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing phyogs la gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]spyod pa de dag kun kyang rab tu ston/_/gang phyir rgyal ba nye rgyal de dag nyi tse'i phyogs [{]myed [,]med [}]kun na bzhugs pas na/_/'gro ba kun gyi rgyal ba ji snyed pa dag thams cad rdul gcig steng du mthong /_/
[\[269b.6\]]sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsgrub dang sems can yul dang chos kyi rgyu tshul rnams kyang mthong /_/de ltar brtson pas bskal pa khrag khrig brtson byed 'on kyang cha shas zad mi 'gyur/_/de ltar 'gro ba kun gyi sems can tshul rnams mtha' yas rgya che rab tu shes/_/
[\[269b.7\]]sems can gcig la mtha' yas lus dang rgyu dang bye ba khrag khrig yod pa rnams/_/de dag 'gro ba gcig dang ma lus thams cad dag la rnam pa kun tu ston pa byed/_/bslab pa 'di yi phyogs la pha rol phyin te ma bslabs rnams ni ston pa byed/_/dbang po rnon 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]po dang ni 'bring dang gang dag dbang po rtul ba'ang rab shes nas/_/'gro bar skal ba yod dang skal ba med pa'i dbang po'i 'khor lo skor ba byed/_/dbang po re re la yang dbang po thams cad rnam pa phan tshun gnas pa dang /_/dbang po'i dngos po phra ba'i 
[\[270a.2\]]tshul dang gang dag dbang po brtan pa 'ang rab tu shes/_/de ltar khams dang mos dang bsam pa spyod dang nyon mongs bag chags rnams kyang shes/_/sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yi sems spyod da ltar byung ba'ang de bzhin te/_/sems can kun gyi spyod pa'i pha rol phyin 
[\[270a.3\]]kyang 'od dang 'gro ba yod ma yin/_/ma nor spyod pa shes nas 'gro ba kun la chos kyi dam pa ston pa byed/_/de ltar sems kyi sems spyod sna tshogs kun nas nyon mongs nyon mongs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dag_/sems gcig la ni khong du chud nas byang chub mchog tu kun mkhyen rnams sangs rgyas/_/
[\[270a.4\]]sems kyi skad cig gcig gis 'gro ba rnams phye rang gi shes pas rtogs gyur nas/_/sems kyi tshul shes sems [{]myed [,]med [}]rab tu gzhol bas ye shes mchog la kun kyang 'god/_/rdzu 'phrul mchog thob ye shes khyu mchog mngon par shes pa kun gyis rab tu 'phags/_/
[\[270a.5\]]sems bskyed gcig gis khrag khrig mtha' yas zhing dang phyogs rnams thams cad du yang 'gro/_/de ltar ye shes dbang bsgyur 'gro zhing bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig zad byed kyang /_/sgra rgyud shin tu phra ba gcig la zhugs par gnas las gar yang 'pho ba [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/'tsho ba'i
