[\[270a.6\]]don du sgyu mkhan gzugs rnams sna tshogs 'gro ba kun la ston byed kyang /_/sgyu ma kun btsal gzugs su [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]gzugs yod ma yin par yang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/de ltar mkhas pa ye shes thabs dang shes rab rgya chen sgyu mar zhugs pa rnams/_/sprul pa 
[\[270a.7\]]phun sum tshogs pas 'jig rten phal chen khyab par byas shes rab tu ston/_/nyi ma zla ba mkha' la rgyu zhing mdzes la shin tu 'phags pa rnams/_/ma rnyogs chu rnams ji snyed dag tu snang yang de ni chu dang 'dres ma yin/_/de ltar chos nyid dag pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog la shes 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]pas shin tu 'phags pa rnams/_/'gro ba dag pa'i sems kyi yul la snang yang 'gro ba dag dang mdzes ma yin/_/la la gnyid log [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam dag na bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad byed/_/lo ni bye ba khrag khrig mang po zad par rmis kyang mtshan mo de ma zad/_/de ltar chos nyid rang bzhin 
[\[270b.2\]]mtshungs par rjes rtogs bya ba sna tshogs kun ston te/_/skad cig gcig la bskal pa bye ba zad byed de dag ye shes zad [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur/_/ri yi dbang po'i ri sul gnas pa 'jig rten dag dang mnyam du thos pa'i sgra/_/kun nas sgra'i sgra brnyan de dang 'dra bar brjod kyang rtog cing 
[\[270b.3\]]g.yo ba [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/de bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin shes pa'i khyu mchog byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dag_/rtog pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par sems can sgra rnams ji snyed par ni chos dang spyod pa ston/_/dpyid zla dag gi smyig rgyu g.yos la ji ltar sems can chur ni 'du shes nas/_/
[\[270b.4\]]de nas chu rnyed [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur rab tung du [{]myed [,]med [}]cing je bas je skom rnam 'phel ba/_/de ltar mkhas pa thar la zhugs pa sems can dag gi nyon mongs g.yo ba rnams/_/shes pas rtogs nas sems can 'du shes bya [{]myed [,]med [}]phyir zhing bya ba rnam par 'phel/_/gzugs ni dbu ba 
[\[270b.5\]]lta bur khyu mchog ston te tshor ba chu'i chu bur 'dra/_/'du shes thams cad smyig rgyu lta bur rag las 'du byed chu skyes shing dang 'dra/_/sems ni sgyu 'dra bsgrub bya skyed byed de bzhin bya ba sna tshogs rab tu ston/_/de ltar phung po dgod pa ston kyang dbang bsgyur dag ni de la gnas 
[\[270b.6\]]pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/skye mched stong ba'i rang bzhin dbang [{]myed [,]med [}]'khrul 'khor bya ba kun tu 'byin byed dang /_/khams ni chos kyi dbyings mtshungs dngos po dag dang bral bar 'gro ba rnams la ston/_/dam pa'i don tshul zhi ba las ni bden pa sna tshogs rnams kyang rab tu ston/_/de ltar de 
[\[270b.7\]]dag chos tshul rnam par dgod pa ston pa byed kyang gnas pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/'ong ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing phyogs su 'gro ba [{]myed [,]med [}]la rgyud du gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i/_/nyon mongs rgyu las byung ba'i las dang las las sdug bsngal de ltar lam gsum du/_/rkyen la rag las 'byung ba rnams dang yod dang 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]{]myed [,]med [}]las rab tu 'das pa yi/_/yang dag don dam dbu ma'i lam ni dngos po [{]myed [,]med [}]la gnas pa rab tu ston/_/skad cig gcig la dus gsum khong du chud kyang skad cig sna tshogs rnams kyang bstan/_/'dod dang gzugs [{]myed [,]med [}]khams kyi yul 
[\[271a.2\]]dang bya ba sna tshogs ston par byed/_/sdom pa gsum gyi spyod dang rab tu ldan zhing thar pa gsum yang rab tu ston/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gcig la theg pa gsum du rnam par dgod pa de bzhin ston/_/gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rab tu dbye ba'i chos dang dbang po pha rol 
[\[271a.3\]]phyin/_/khams dang mos pa dag dang nyon mongs rnam 'byed kun tu 'gro ba thob gyur pa/_/[{]myig [,]mig [}]gi yul gyur sngon gyi gnas pa dran zhing nyon mongs zhi bar mkhas pa dag_/sangs rgyas stobs bcu dag gis ye shes shin tu yangs kyang stobs la [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/sangs 
[\[271a.4\]]rgyas thams cad rjes su dpog stong 'gro ba kun tu mngon sum chos bzhed de/_/nyon mongs zag pa lhan cig skyes pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga' byang ba'ang brnyes par 'gyur ba [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/'byung bas thugs su chud pa'i ye shes rgya chen des ni 'gro ba 'don pa mdzad/_/'di yi gnas la rgyal 
[\[271a.5\]]sras 'jigs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]cing 'on kyang zhi bar spyod pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/'khrul ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga' lam las g.yo ba'ang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mnga' dgongs pa nyams pa 'ang mi mnga' ste/_/mos dang brtson 'grus ting 'dzin shes rab rnam par 'byed pa ye shes gang du 'ang nyams pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/thams cad mkhyen 
[\[271a.6\]]mdzad sdom pa gsum mdzad dus gsum kun la mngon sum mkhyen mnga' ba/_/'gro ba kun gyis ma thob byams pa'i chos nyid [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phrogs chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]brnyes pa/_/chos sgo gang dag gis ni spyod pa 'di dag rab tu thob pa smra ba'i mchog_/de dag yon 
[\[271a.7\]]tan mang po don gyis brgyan pa'i phyogs tsam bdag gis brjod par bya/_/de dag spyod pa bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu brjod kyang zad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus te/_/'on kyang ji ltar sa las rdul 'dra ye shes spyod pa phyogs tsam brjod par bya/_/sangs rgyas ye shes rten ldan 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]bsam pa thob pas ngo mtshar 'du shes gnas pa rnams/_/spyod pa mchog dang ldan zhing byams pa'i rjes song brtson 'grus brtan pas rnam gnon cing /_/tshul khrims [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo dbugs phyin de dag 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par byed/_/lung bstan rab tu thob 
[\[271b.2\]]nas rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa tshul bzhin thob par byed/_/sangs rgyas yon tan dag la zhugs kyang sems can sems dang zhing la sems pa byed/_/bskal pa'i dus la 'jug pa'i ye shes ldan zhing mkhas pa skyo ba'i 'du shes [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/gzungs kyi tshul 
[\[271b.3\]]dang yang dag tha dad stobs rnams thob cing yang dag don gyis rgal/_/bstan pa mtshungs [{]myed [,]med [}]sems kyis mkhas pa byang chub zhi ba rnam par 'tshang yang rgya/_/sems kyi spyod pa thams cad bzang po'i yon tan spyod pa'i mchog tu smon par byed/_/snying rje'i rkyen dang 
[\[271b.4\]]byams pa mchog sten byang chub dam pa spyod par byed dang ldan/_/brtson pas pha rol phyin rtogs rab tu mkhas shing skyo ba'i pha rol phyin gyur pas/_/khyu mchog mos dang rab tu rtogs pa'i stobs thob byang chub dam pa mngon 'tshang rgya/_/mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa thob 
[\[271b.5\]]cing ye shes tshul gyis chos mchog ston byed pa/_/yon tan thob byed spobs dang ldan pa de dag chos kyi dbang phyug mchog tu 'gyur/_/dbang la gnas kyang gnas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pas mnyam pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sems kyi 'brug sgra sgrog_/ye shes mchog dang de bzhin sprul 
[\[271b.6\]]pa sgrub cing byang chub nye bar 'gro/_/mkhas pa de dag bskal pa 'byam klas byin rlabs shes pas dbugs phyin rab tu 'thob/_/zab la gnas pas brtan par 'gro na gnas shing nem nur bstsal bas mkhas pa rnams/_ye shes bsam gyis mi 
[\[271b.7\]]khyab chos kyi dgongs pa mkhas shing rnam phye pha rol phyin/_/snyoms par 'jug pa'i ye shes yul la zhugs nas thams cad mkhyen par 'tshang yang rgya/_/ye shes rnam thar kun gyi pha rol phyin cing mngon par shes pas rnams par rtsen/_/rig pa'i snang 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]ldan rnam grol nyon mongs bral bas 'gro la skyed mos tshal dang 'dra/_/gang la dkar ba'i spyod pa'i gzhal [{]myed [,]med [}]khang mdzes sna tshogs spyod pa ston pa po/_/'gro ba kun la rgyan rnams du ma rab tu ston kyang sems las g.yo ba [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/
[\[272a.2\]]bsam pa shin tu shes pas brtan pa rab tu mkhas shing pha rol phyin gyur pas/_/mkhas pa dag ni dag cing sbyangs pa'i byang chub phyag rgya snang ba'i ye shes kyis/_/'gro ba dag dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mtshungs zhum [{]myed [,]med [}]khyu mchog lhag pa'i bsam pa ri bo 'dra/_/ye shes rgya mtsho 'dra dang 
[\[272a.3\]]yon tan [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad don du spyod pa chen po spyod/_/de dag rin chen 'dra ba'i gnas la rdo rje lta bu'i go cha bgos pas gnas/_/shin tu rgya chen rtsom la rab tu mkhas shing 'gro ba kun na thub [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_/byang chub mchog tu lung bstan skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]khong du chud pa'i rgya chen 
[\[272a.4\]]sems la gnas/_/sangs rgyas gter mchog mi zad thob nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'tshang rgya'o/_/rtag tu kun rdzob shes pas dbang 'gyur rnam par 'phrul pa rnams la mkhas pas na/_/zhing rnams kun dang chos kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul 
[\[272a.5\]]ba'i ye shes rgyud la gnas/_/lus dang smon lam spyod yul ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa la yang de bzhin te/_/'gro ba dag la rnam par rtse ba bye ba khrag khrig du ma mang po ston/_/mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis rnam par 'phrul zhing nges par rnam par 
[\[272a.6\]]rtse/_/khyu mchog de dag sangs rgyas yul la stobs thob 'gro ba kun gyis thub pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/mkhas pa 'jigs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]dang bag tsha [{]myed [,]med [}]dang ma 'dres rnams kyis shin tu brgyan/_/sangs rgyas sras dag las rnams thams cad byed cing shin tu mdzes pa'i lus dang 
[\[272a.7\]]ldan/_/de dag lus kyi las kyi dngos po shin tu rgya che dag kyang dag cing dge_/de yang 'byin pa'i tshe na rgyal bas byin gyis brlabs shing las ni mchog kyang byed/_/dam pa de dag sems bskyed gcig la sems rgyas byed pa'i sems kyang rab tu ston/_/rgyal 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]ba'i dbang po thob pas rtag tu dbang po'i ting 'dzin dbang la rab tu gnas/_/bsam pa dag cing g.yo sgyu rnams dang bral te lhag pa'i bsam pa mngon sum gyur/_/mos pa'i 'jug pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad 'gro ba dag la rab tu ston/_/bag chags thams 
[\[272b.2\]]cad spangs nas spyod pa dam pa rab tu 'dzin/_/nan tan bya ba grub pa'i ye shes mkhas pas thams cad mkhyen pa 'tshang yang rgya/_/bsam pa rnam par spangs nas de dag skyon med gnas pa zhi ba'i mchog kyang thob/_/mkhas pa 'di lam shin tu bslabs pa de dag ming ni 
[\[272b.3\]]yon tan sgo nas grags/_/mtha' yas sems kyi yul ldan gnas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par lam rnams yang du sgom pa byed/_/ye shes tshul la gnas shing 'gro ba rnams la lam gyi rgyan rnams shin tu ston/_/spyod pa lag pa lta bu dga' dang ldan pa lto yin snying po ye shes mchog_/
[\[272b.4\]]snying ni rdo rje lta bu snying rje'i go bgos ye shes gdab pa'i mtshon cha yin/_/shes rab mgo ste chos rtogs [{]myig [,]mig [}]yin byang chub spyod pa yang ni rna ba yin/_/tshul khrims dag cing nyon mongs [{]myed [,]med [}]la gtsang ste mun pa zhi byed sna yin te/_/spobs pa lce yin lus ni rig pa yin 
[\[272b.5\]]te sems ni ye shes dam pa yin/_/spyod pa rgyu ba yin te byang chub shing gnas seng ge'i khri ni 'dug pa yin/_/tshangs pa'i lam rnams dag ni lam yin stong pa chags [{]myed [,]med [}]dam pa spyod yul lo/_/gang gi de dag snang bar 'gyur ba'i snang ba bde bar gshegs kyi ye 
[\[272b.6\]]shes yul/_/sems can spyod la rnam par lta ba ye shes mchog ste rnam pa sna tshogs bsgyings/_/sems can dben zhing chags dang bral ba'i sbyin pa bsnyems pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i tshul khrims dang /_/bzod pa mi 'khrug brtson 'grus [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog dbang bsgyur ba ni bsam gtan 
[\[272b.7\]]dam pa yin/_/rgyu ba [{]myed [,]med [}]cing nam mkha' 'dra ba shes rab byams pa sems can rnam par 'dren/_/skyo med snying rje rnam dag chos ni dga' ba nyon mongs gnas las btang yang snyoms/_/don ni zhi ba chos kyi yul la nye bar 'gro ba bsod nams 'gro la bsngos/_/ye shes 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]tshogs ni ral gyi rnon po lta bu snang ba chen po rig pa ste/_/'gro ba rnams la thos pa ston pas mi ngoms bskal par 'dren kyang 'jigs pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/nan tan byed la gnas te bdud rnams btul nas bdud kyi lam yang rab tu bcad/_/rgyal ba 
[\[273a.2\]]rnams kyi 'phrin las gang yin ye shes spyod dang lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dzin/_/nga rgyal las rnams rnam par spangs te rtag tu ye shes kyi 'ang bya ba byed/_/bdud rnams byin gyi rlabs bcom mkhas pa de dag sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis 'phags/_/chos kyi byin 
[\[273a.3\]]gyi rlabs thob blo gros chen po 'chang ba lha yi gnas su 'dod/_/lha rnams byas te 'chi 'phos song nas mchog gi mngal ni shin tu phra bar 'gro/_/skye ba mchog ni nye bar bstan nas mchog gi gom pa bdun ni 'dor bar byed/_/mkhas pa de dag sems can kun la 
[\[273a.4\]]bzo dang spyod dang btsun mo'i 'khor kyang ston/_/chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par mngon par byung nas byang chub shing drung chos kyi rgyan kyang byed/_/stong pa'i bstan las 'od zer dra ba yangs pa bkye zhing yang dag bskul ba byed/_/bdud rnams btul te byang chub go 'phang sangs rgyas 
[\[273a.5\]]chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor/_/sangs rgyas sa yang rab tu bstan nas 'dren pa de dag mtshungs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par bzhud/_/gang gis mkhas pa bskal pa bye bar rnam par rtse zhing yang dag byung gyur nas/_/sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma sangs rgyas yon 
[\[273a.6\]]tan rab 'god kyang /_/rnam pa kun tu sems can [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas chos lam yin spyod lam yin pa'i/_/de dag gi ni spyod pa 'di 'dra mtha' yas shin tu rgya chen mdor bstan to/_/de 'dra'i spyod dang ldan pa'i ye shes khyu mchog rdzu 'phrul dag gis rnam par rtse/_/zhing 
[\[273a.7\]]rnams bye ba stong yang skra rtse gcig la bskal pa khrag khrig brgyar 'dzin te/_/lag tu khyer te zhing rnams bye bar 'gro yang lus la ngal dub gang yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/mkhas pas khyer nas ji lta'i gnas su bkod kyang 'gro ba dag la gnod pa [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa'i zhing 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]gi rgyan rnams ji snyed rnam pa tha dad bstan pa dag_/kun kyang ba spu gcig gi bu gar khyu mchog de dag yang dag rab tu ston/_/mkhas pa ba spu'i bu gar rgya mtsho'i chu rnams ma lus khong chud rab ston kyang /_/'phel zhing 'grib [{]myed [,]med [}]'gro ba dag la gnod par 'gyur [{]myed [,]med [}]bya 
[\[273b.2\]]ba de yang ston/_/khor yug khrag khrig shin tu phra ba'i rdul byas lag gis bsdus khyer zhing /_/zhing rnams khrag khrig bye ma snyed du 'dor byed gcig tu gnyis kyang gzhog mi byed/_/zhing rnams de dag rdul du byas te de bzhin gzhan yang rnam par 'jig byed 
[\[273b.3\]]de/_/de 'dra'i rjes su dpag pa zad par gyur kyang 'jug pa de dag mi zad do/_/'jig rten kun gyi nyi ma zla ba skar ma gang dag stong rnams ji snyed dang /_/gang yang nor bu'i 'od dang [{]mye [,]me [}]yi 'od dang gang na gang rnams lha dbang 'od/_/mang po de dag rab tu 'das 
[\[273b.4\]]pa'i 'od zer khrag khrig spu gcig khung nas 'gyed/_/'jig rten kun gyi ngan song sdug bsngal zhi bar byed cing chos kyi dam pa ston/_/'gro ba ma lus sgra yi rnam pa sna tshogs skad rnams thams cad ji snyed pa/_/khyu mchog de dag tshig gcig rab tu 
[\[273b.5\]]brjod pas sgra rnams thams cad tshang bar brjod/_/srog chags bye ba rnams kyis yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thos dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur/_/rgyal bas bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam pa ji snyed thams cad de las thos par 'gyur/_/gang yang ji snyed 'das pa'i 
[\[273b.6\]]bskal pa yod pa de dag ma 'ongs bskal par ston/_/gang yang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ji snyed de dag 'das par ston/_/khyu mchog dag ni zhing rnams 'tshig dang gnas pa rnam pa tha dad ston par byed/_/'gro ba ji snyed thams cad mkhas pa de dag skra rtse gcig 
[\[273b.7\]]la rab tu 'god/_/'das dang ma byon pa dang phyogs bcu kun na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba ji snyed pa/_/de dag thams cad rang gi lus las ma nor dbang bsgyur rnam par 'phrul ba ston/_/sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs la shes pa'i mkhas pa de dag 'gro ba ji snyed sems/_/
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]de snyed lus rnams rdul dang bral ba ston kyang lus la gnas pa gang yang [{]myed[,]med[}]/_/lam rgyud drug po gang rnams ji snyed yod pa'i 'gro ba kun gyi lus bsdus shing /_/brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon po rnams dang de bzhin lha dang 
[\[274a.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}]yi rnams/_/gang yang nyan thos rang rgyal rnams la dad cing sangs rgyas sku la mos pa la/_/sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub pa'i spyod pa dag dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa ston/_/'gro ba kun gyi 'du shes dra ba rab dang 'bring dang tha mar 'jug pa rnams/_/
[\[274a.3\]]thams cad shes shing byin rlob byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing rnams kun kyang rab tu ston/_/'du shes dra ba rnams sgoms blo ldan 'jig rten 'du shes rnams la dbang bsgyur ba/_/bya ba dang ni sbyor ba ji snyed pa dang dkon mchog byang chub spyod pa ston/_/de dag de dang 
[\[274a.4\]]rnam par 'phrul pa shin tu rgya chen dam pa gzhan yang ston/_/de dag gang la 'jig rten sa [{]myin [,]min [}]pa dang yul [{]myin [,]min [}]de dag bya ba ston/_/ston kyang lta ba lhur len ma yin gzhan yang phyir zhing gong du ston pa byed/_/de dag sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji bzhin spyod pa ji bzhin yang dag 
[\[274a.5\]]'jug_/lus ni nam mkha' lta bu dag dang yid la chags [{]myed [,]med [}]'jig rten gsum gyi gtso/_tshul khrims spos kyi byug pa rab tu zhi ba gos yin yon tan sna tshogs rgyan/_/chos kyi go 'phang skyon [{]myed [,]med [}]thob cing thams cad mkhyen pa yid bzhin nor bu ste/_/bde gshegs kun gyi 
[\[274a.6\]]ye shes dbang bskur thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal po'i thabs la gnas/_/pha rol phyin pa rtag 'byung 'khor lo yin te glang po mngon par shes pa mchog_/ye shes rdzu 'phrul rta ste chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]'gro shes rab nor bu dam pa yin/_/spyod pa btsun mo bzang mo bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi po khyim bdag dam pa'o/_/
[\[274a.7\]]thabs la shin tu mkhas pa blon po yin te mkhas pa de dag 'khor los sgyur/_/stong pa khyim ste ting 'dzin grong khyer mchog yin byams dang snying rje'i go ca'o/_/shes rab ral gyi yin te dran pa gzhu mdzes dbang po rno ba mda' yang yin/_/'jig rten mkhyen pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs ni 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]gdugs te ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng /_/de dang de dag bzod pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi dpung dang sde rnams 'dus pa 'joms/_/gzungs ni sa ste byang chub spyod pa chu klung ye shes lu ma shes rab shing /_/me tog byang chub yan lag ting nge 'dzin ni rta ste rdzu 'phrul 
[\[274b.2\]]rnam par brgyan/_/stong pa rnam thar brgyad pa rdzing bu yin te rnam par dpyod pa bzang mo btsun mo yin/_/thar ba bdud rtsi bza' ba yin te chos ni btung ba theg pa gsum gyis rtse/_/de dag spyod pa de 'dra yid 'ong khyad par 'phags te de bas gong du mang /_/gang gis 
[\[274b.3\]]bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du skyo ba yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyo bar/_/ston pa mchod cing rnam dag zhing la brtson pas 'gro ba ye shes mchog la 'god/_/kha na ma tho kun [{]myed [,]med [}]ye shes rab gnas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rgyas byed/_/zhing rnams rdul gyi 'brur blags re re nas kyang 
[\[274b.4\]]bgrang zhing brtsi bar nus gyur la/_/bar snang mkha' chen 'di yang skra yis gzhal te zad par bya bar nus srid de/_/skad cig gcig la 'gro ba rnams kyi sems ni bgrang tshul shes par nus srid kyi/_/sangs rgyas sras rnams spyod pa dag ni bskal pa brgyar 
[\[274b.5\]]brjod zad par [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_/gang zhig yon tan rnam dag 'di dag 'thob par 'dod cing gong du gzhan 'dod dang /_/gang zhig sdug bsngal rnams las 'gro bar thar byas bde la 'god pa dang /_/gang zhig bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs dang mnyam du 
[\[274b.6\]]'gyur bar 'dod pa dag_/des ni rdo rje lta bur brtan pa'i sems su gyis te yon tan bslab par byos/_/shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u ste/_bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o//_//
[\[274b.7\]{D44-45}]sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal skyabs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba'i nang pho brang brtsegs pa rgyan chen po can na/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]kun tu bzang po dang 'jam dpal la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes pa dam pa'i ye shes dang /_brtan pa dam pa'i ye shes dang /_chags [{]myed [,]med [}]dam pa'i ye shes dang /_me tog dam pa'i ye shes dang /_
[\[275a.2\]]nyi ma dam pa'i ye shes dang /_zla ba dam pa'i ye shes dang /_dri [{]myed [,]med [}]dam pa'i ye shes dang /_rdo rje dam pa'i ye shes dang /_rdul [{]myed [,]med [}]dam pa'i ye shes dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba dam pa'i chos ye shes dang /_byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i rgyal 
[\[275a.3\]]mtshan dang /_ri rab rgyal mtshan dang /_rin chen rgyal mtshan dang /_chags [{]myed [,]med [}]rgyal mtshan dang /_me tog rgyal mtshan dang /_dri [{]myed [,]med [}]rgyal mtshan dang /_nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang /_mdzes pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /_rdul [{]myed [,]med [}]rgyal mtshan dang /_byang 
[\[275a.4\]]chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gzi brjid dang /_blo gros chen po'i gzi brjid dang /_ye shes rdo rje'i gzi brjid dang /_dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i gzi brjid dang /_chos kyi nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang /_bsod 
[\[275a.5\]]nams ri bo'i gzi brjid dang /_ye shes snang ba'i gzi brjid dang /_kun nas dpal gyi gzi brjid dang /_kun nas 'od dpal gzi brjid dang /_byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu snang bas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gzi brjid dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[275a.6\]]sa'i snying po dang /_nam mkha'i snying po dang /_pad+ma'i snying po dang /_rin po che'i snying po dang /_nyi ma'i snying po dang /_yon tan rnam dag snying po dang /_chos rgya mtsho'i snying po dang /_rnam par snang ba'i snying po dang /_gtsug gi snying po dang /_byang chub 
[\[275a.7\]]sems dpa' pad+mo dpal gyi snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang /_rnam par dag pa'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang /_dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang /_chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang /_kun nas lta ba'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang /_shin tu rnam par lta ba'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang /_ut+pa la'i 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]{]myig [,]mig [}]dang /_rdo rje'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang /_rin po che'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan dang /_chos kyi dbyings snang ba'i blo gros cod pan dang /_byang chub dam pa'i cod pan dang /_phyogs rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang /_
[\[275b.2\]]sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i snying po'i cod pan dang /_'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i cod pan dang /_kun nas rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang /_zil gyis non pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i cod pan dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng 
[\[275b.3\]]ge'i khri 'dzin pa'i cod pan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' kun nas snang ba'i cod pan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gtsug phud dang /_klu'i dbang po'i gtsug phud dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa snang ba'i gtsug phud 
[\[275b.4\]]dang /_byang chub dam pa'i gtsug phud dang /_smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i rin chen rgyal po'i gtsug phud dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu 'gyed pa'i nor bu rin chen 'brug sgra'i gtsug phud dang /_nam mkha'i 
[\[275b.5\]]dbyings thams cad tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad par rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i rin chen rgyal pos brgyan pa'i gtsug phud dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /_rin po che'i rgyal po dra bas kun nas yog pa'i gtsug phud dang /_de bzhin 
[\[275b.6\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgrog pa'i gtsug phud dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum gyi [{]mying [,]ming [}]thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i gtsug phud dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen po'i 'od dang /_gzi brjid dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 'od dang /_rin po che'i 
[\[275b.7\]]'od dang /_rdul dang bral ba'i 'od dang /_skar ma'i 'od dang /_chos kyi 'od dang zhi ba'i 'od dang /_nyi ma'i 'od dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lha'i 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dpal dang /_ye shes dpal dang /_
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]chos kyi dpal dang /_mngon par shes pa'i dpal dang /_'od kyi dpal dang /_me tog dpal dang /_rin po che'i dpal dang /_byang chub kyi dpal dang /_tshangs pa'i dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun nas snang ba'i dpal dang /_byang chub 
[\[276a.2\]]sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang /_rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dngas sgra'i dbyangs dang /_'jig rten dbang po'i dbyangs dang /_ri dbang rgyal po 'thab pa'i dbyangs dang /_chos kyi dbyings kun tu rgyas pa'i dbyangs dang /_chos rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang /_
[\[276a.3\]]bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'dul ba'i dbyangs dang /_snying rje chen po'i tshul gyi sprin rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i dbugs 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[276a.4\]]chos kyis 'phags pa dang /_khyad par gyis 'phags pa dang /_ye shes kyis 'phags pa dang /_bsod nams ri bos 'phags pa dang /_yon tan gyi tshogs kyis 'phags pa dang /_grags pas 'phags pa dang /_kun tu snang bas 'phags pa dang /_byams 
[\[276a.5\]]pa chen pos 'phags pa dang /_ye shes rgya mtshos 'phags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud kyi gdung gis 'phags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dpal dang /_mchog gi dpal dang /_kun tu 'phags pa'i dpal 
[\[276a.6\]]dang /_rnam par snang ba'i dpal dang /_chos kyi dpal dang /_zla ba'i dpal dang /_nam mkha'i dpal dang /_rin po che'i dpal dang /_dpal gyi dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ri'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /_
[\[276a.7\]]chos kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang /_'gro ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /_tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /_tshogs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang /_lha'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /_zhi ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /_mi g.yo ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /_khyu mchog gi dbang 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]po'i rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi dbang po'i rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang /_chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sgra dang /_sa'i dbyangs kyi sgra dang /_rgya mtsho'i 'brug gi sgra dang /_sprin gyi dbyangs kyi sgra dang /_chos snang ba'i 
[\[276b.2\]]sgra dang /_nam mkha'i dbyangs kyi sgra dang /_sems can kun gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu sgrog pa'i sgra dang /_sngon gyi smon lam yongs su bskul ba'i sgra dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor bcom zhing [{]myed [,]med [}]par byed pa'i sgra dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[276b.3\]]rin po che'i blo dang /_ye shes ri bo'i blo dang /_nam mkha'i blo dang /_dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i blo dang /_chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i blo dang /_rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i blo dang /_dus gsum snang ba'i blo dang /_yangs pa'i blo dang /_kun tu snang ba'i blo dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[276b.4\]]chos kyi dbyings su snang ba'i blo dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong tsam ste/_kun kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam gyis byung ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pas/_chags pa 
[\[276b.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i spyod yul can/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong bas lus mtha' yas pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bya 
[\[276b.6\]]ba la bsgrib pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i tshe/_nye bar 'dong ba rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]gcod pas/_tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]par phyin pa/_chos rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la ye shes snang ba/_rab tu thob 
[\[276b.7\]]pas snang ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa/_so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pas bskal pa mtha' yas par shin tu ston pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa 'gro ba'i bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi lus yongs su ston pas nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i ye shes kyi spyod 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]yul rnam par dag cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]gnas pa/_sems can gyi khams sems can [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_srog [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yongs su shes pas rab rib [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'od zer gyi dra bas rgyas par 'gengs pas nam mkha' 
[\[277a.2\]]dang mnyam pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/_/nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa lnga brgya ste/_thams cad kyang bden pa'i tshul gyi rang bzhin mngon par khong du chud pa/_yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du gyur pa/_chos kyi rang bzhin la zhugs pa/_srid 
[\[277a.3\]]pa'i rgya mtsho las gyen du 'phags pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs su 'gyur ba'i spyod yul can kun nas sbyor ba dang /_bag la nyal ba dang bcings pa rnam par bzlog pa/_chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i gnas la brten pa/_nam mkha' ltar zhi ba la rnam par spyod pa/_
[\[277a.4\]]sangs rgyas la the tsom dang nem nur dang /_yid gnyis yongs su chad pa/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la mos pa'i lam du zhugs pa sha stag dang /_'jig rten gyi dbang po sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/_'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i don du 
[\[277a.5\]]zhugs pa/_gsol ba ma btab par dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa/_sems can gzhan bsrung ba la zhugs pa/_'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sgo la zhugs pa/_sems can thams cad yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]gtong 
[\[277a.6\]]pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i spyod yul la byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi rigs yang dag par gzung ba'i smon lam gyis yang dag par skyes pa/_de bzhin 
[\[277a.7\]]gshegs pa'i gdung gi rgyud du 'byung ba mngon du gyur pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par mos pa sha stag dang yang thabs gcig go_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa de dag dang /_nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa/_
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]de dag dang 'jig rten gyi dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa de dag 'di snyam du gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_de bzhin 
[\[277b.2\]]gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]bsnyengs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang /_de bzhin 
[\[277b.3\]]gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang /_sngon legs par spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi skyabs dang /_dad pa'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]yongs su dag pa dang /_rgya 
[\[277b.4\]]chen po la mos pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang /_bsam pa thag pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing yang dag par zhugs pa ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'jug pa'am/_
[\[277b.5\]]khong du chud pa'am yid ches pa'am/_yongs su shes pa'am/_rnam par rtog pa'am/_gzung ba'am rnam par dpyad pa'am/_rnam par bsgom pa'am/_rnam par dbye ba'am/_rnam par dgrol ba'am/_rab tu brjod pa'am/_sems can pha rol gyi rgyud du phyin par bya bar ni [{]myi [,]mi [}]
[\[277b.6\]]nus na/_bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba dang /_sems can bsam pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_mos pa sna tshogs dang /_shes pa sna tshogs kyi tshigs dang /_brda sna tshogs su gyur pa/_dbang bsgyur ba'i sa 
[\[277b.7\]]gzhan dang /_gzhan la gnas pa dbang po sna tshogs su rnam par dag pa/_bsam pa dang sbyor ba rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan can/_sems dang bsam pa'i yul gzhan dang gzhan can/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/_chos 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan la mos pa dag la sngon thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs pa lta 'ang yang dag par bstan grang /_sngon byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa lta 'ang yang dag par bstan grang /_sngon gyi byang chub sems 
[\[278a.2\]]dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /_sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su mnan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /_sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 
[\[278a.3\]]bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /_sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par phye ba'i snang ba lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /_sngon byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi rgyan yongs su dag par mdzad pa 
[\[278a.4\]]lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /_sngon byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrub pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /_sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa lta'ang 
[\[278a.5\]]yang dag par bstan grang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /_mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgos rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/_
[\[278a.6\]]ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_khyu mchog gi mthu lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can gyi khams 'dul ba'i 
[\[278a.7\]]thabs kyi sgo lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos kyi grong khyer la mnga' mdzad pa lta 'ang yang dag par bstan grang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi lam snang bar mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]bstan grang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gshegs shing rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi yon pa zhes pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[278b.2\]]pa sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams dang yon tan ston pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi tshul la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan 
[\[278b.3\]]grang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la/_rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la yongs su bstan pa dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang 
[\[278b.4\]]dag par bstan grang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta 'ang yang dag par bstan grang snyam pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems 
[\[278b.5\]]dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/_seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nam mkha' dang mnyam pas dpe [{]myed [,]med [}]pa 'gro ba thams cad du rnam par snang ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa/_thugs rje chen po'i sgo'i rang 
[\[278b.6\]]bzhin can/_thugs rje chen po'i sgo dang ldan pa/_thugs rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba/_thugs rje chen po'i chos can la mnyam par gzhag go_/bcom ldan 'das kyi de ltar mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu pho brang brtsegs pa rgyan chen po can yang mtha' dang dbus 
[\[278b.7\]{]myed [,]med [}]par yangs shing rdo rje thub pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis sa'i gzhi rab tu bkod pa dang /_nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dra ba kun tu bkram pa/_rin po che du ma'i me tog sil mas chal bar gang ba/_nor bu rin po che dam pa mdzes par bkram pa 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]dang /_bai DUr+ya'i ka bas mdzes par byas pa/_rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rnam par snang bas rgyan shin tu rnam par phye ba/_rin po che bzang po mang po dang ldan pa'i nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi phung pos shin tu brgyan pa dang /_rin po 
[\[279a.2\]]che thams cad las sgo gang dang /_rta babs dang /_pu shu dang /_skar khung byas shing khri 'phang grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnam par dag pas brgyan pa dang /_'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad dang 'dra ba'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang /_'gro ba rgya mtsho'i nor bu rin po che rnam 
[\[279a.3\]]par phye ba dang /_nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa'i gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan rab tu bsgreng ba dang /_sgo dang rta babs thams cad las 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par 'gengs pa rab tu 'byung bas rnam par mdzes par byas pa dang /_
[\[279a.4\]]phyi rol gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i gzhi stegs bu brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pas brgyan pa dang /_phyogs kun nas them skas kyi phreng ba nor bu rin po ches brtsegs shing shin tu rnam par phye bas rab tu mdzes par kun nas gnas par gyur to/_/dze ta'i tshal thams cad 
[\[279a.5\]]kyang chu zheng gab par shin tu yangs shing rgya che bar kun nas gnas par gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang chu zheng kun tu rgya che zhing yangs pa dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan 
[\[279a.6\]]sna tshogs dang ldan zhing /_sa'i gzhi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pas kun nas grub pa dang /_nor bu rin po che grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ra bas kun nas bskor ba dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ta la'i phreng bas mdzes par brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to/_/
[\[279a.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na spos chu'i chu klung tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa klong mtha' yas par 'khyil pa'i spos kyi chus yongs su gang ba/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog mang po dang 'dres par gyur la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil cing 'bab pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dbyings 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]su sgrog pas rab tu brgyan par dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to/_/rin po che'i me tog pun da ri ka'i phreng ba dang /_rin po che'i shing gam yo rin po che thams cad kyi pad+mo rab tu rgyas shing /_shin tu 'phags pas mdzes par brgyan pa dang /_rin po 
[\[279b.2\]]che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i phreng ba bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa nor bu rin po che grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i dra ba kun tu snang bas brgyan cing mdzes pa dang /_nor bu rin po che'i gzhal [{]myed [,]med [}]khang nor bu rin po che 
[\[279b.3\]]thams cad kyis brgyan pa grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa spos thams cad kyi dad kun nas 'byung ba bdug spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang ldan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to/_/rin po che'i rgyal mtshan grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang /_gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyi rgyal mtshan 
[\[279b.4\]]dang /_rin po che'i snam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang /_me tog gi rgyal mtshan dang /_rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan dang /_phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan dang /_rin po che'i rgyal ba'i gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_nor bu 
[\[279b.5\]]rin po che snang bas kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /_nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i dbyangs rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /_nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal 
[\[279b.6\]]mtshan dang /_nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /_nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /_rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba thams cad 
[\[279b.7\]]phyogs kun nas rgyan tu gyur pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to/_/dze ta'i tshal gyi nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyang lha'i gzhal [{]myed [,]med [}]khang gi sprin bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur te/_dze ta'i tshal nyid kyang spos sna tshogs kyi 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]shing grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang /_brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyis kun nas 'khor cing rgyan pa dang /_rol mo brdung ba dang /_dkrol ba brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sprin las de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[280a.2\]]thams cad la bstod pa'i dbyangs dang nga ro snyan pa 'byung bas kun nas brgyan pa dang /_rin po che'i pad+mo brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang /_rin po che'i seng ge'i khri brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i steng lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan bting ba la/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[280a.3\]]'khod cing de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'byin pa'i sprin gyi kun nas brgyan pa dang /_lha'i dbang po brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i gzugs brnyan mngon par 'byung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i 'bru'i sprin gyis kun nas brgyan pa dang /_mu tig dkar po'i dra ba'i 
[\[280a.4\]]sprin brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pas kun nas brgyan pa dang /_mu tig dkar po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pas kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang /_rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i mu tig gi sprin brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i char mngon par 'bab pas rab tu brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to/_/
[\[280a.5\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dkar po'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang /_byin gyi rlabs/_
[\[280a.6\]]bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i phyir ro/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gcig tu zhugs pas/_sangs 
[\[280a.7\]]rgyas kyi zhing rnam par phye ba thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byin gyi rlabs yongs su ston pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]par yongs su ston par mdzad pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams pa spu'i bu ga gcig tu sngon gyi mtha'i de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yongs su ston par mdzad pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin 
[\[280b.2\]]gshegs pa rnams kyi 'od zer gcig gi sgo nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa snang bar 'gyur ba bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams pa spu'i rtse mo gcig las sprul pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sangs 
[\[280b.3\]]rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams pa spu'i sgo gcig nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang /_'jig pa'i bskal pa yongs su ston pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar dze 
[\[280b.4\]]ta'i tshal de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pas yongs su dag par kun nas gnas par gyur pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad kyang yongs su dag par 
[\[280b.5\]]kun nas gnas shing rab tu brgyan pa dang /_shin tu spud pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su rgyas pa dang /_dze ta'i tshul du yang dag par gzhol ba dang /_byang chub sems dpas yongs su rgyas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 
[\[280b.6\]]'khor rgya mtsho shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pa dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyis rab tu snang ba dang /_rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang /_zhing thams cad 
[\[280b.7\]]kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog par brgyan pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi lus thams cad sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang /_me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin shin tu rgyas pa'i lhun gyis kun tu rgyas shing brgyan pa dang /_gos thams cad 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]kyi shing gi sprin gyi mdzod nas gos kha dog sna tshogs su mdzes pa'i char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang /_phreng ba dang lda ldi dang se mo do'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rgyun mi chad par mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang /_spos sna 
[\[281a.2\]]tshogs kyi bdug spos phyogs kun nas 'thul ba'i sprin dang na bun gyi char thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i sprin las rin po che'i rgyal po'i phye ma zhib bu'i char rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad par rab tu 
[\[281a.3\]]'bab pa dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi sprin lha'i bu mo'i lag na khyer ba nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu rgyu zhing 'khor bas brgyan pa dang /_rin po che thams cad kyi pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'dab ma'i dkyil 'khor can chu ba mthon po 
[\[281a.4\]]dang ldan pa'i ze ba la rol mo bkod pa kun nas sgra 'byin cing dbyangs snyan par sgrog pas brgyan pa dang /_rin po che'i 'bru sna tshogs kyi dra ba dang /_rin po che seng ge'i dra ba sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i phreng ba dang /_se mo dos brgyan par kun nas gnas shing 
[\[281a.5\]]snang bar gyur to/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa de la nyams par bzhag ma thag tu/_/de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba 
[\[281a.6\]]snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi sprin sgron ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i smon lam gyi gtsug gi 'od zer snang ba 
[\[281a.7\]]zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/_nam mkha'i dbyings rgyan sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis brgyan pa dang /_lha rdzas 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin gyi char rab tu dgye ba dang /_lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i pad+mo'i sprin gyi char mngon par gtor ba dang /_lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i sprin gyi char rab tu btang ba dang /_lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char 
[\[281b.2\]]mngon par dbab pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par dgye ba dang /_lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad cing shin tu phra ba'i lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa 
[\[281b.3\]]dang /_lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan gyi sprin nam mkha'i dbyings las byin gyis brlab pa dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi rgyan yid du 'ong bas nam mkha'i dbyings rgyas par 'gengs par byed cing /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na 
[\[281b.4\]]ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/_'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su brten te/_khang pa brtsegs pa rgyan kun dang ldan zhing nor bu rin po che'i dra bas kun nas khyab pa dang /_seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po 
[\[281b.5\]]che phyogs rab tu snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i dra ba'i rgyan gyis kun nas brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/_/lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[281b.6\]]rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po kun nas snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[281b.7\]]po brtson 'grus kyi shugs thub par dka' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/_'jig 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad spos kyi lda ldi dang dra bas kun tu 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lda ldi dang dra ba chen pos kun tu 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang /_sangs 
[\[282a.2\]]rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud thams cad me tog thams cad kyi lda ldi dang /_phreng ba'i dra bas kun tu 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'khor thams cad phreng ba dang lda ldi dang /_se mo do'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang /_sangs 
[\[282a.3\]]rgyas kyi zhing gi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'og gi gzhi rten rdo rje thams cad kyi phreng bas yongs su gzung bar byin gyis brlab pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshul thams cad nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang /_'jig rten 
[\[282a.4\]]gyi khams thams cad gos sna tshogs kyi lda ldis kun nas yongs su blangs shing gzung bar byin gyis brlab pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lus kyi phreng ba dang lda ldi mang po'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_zhing 
[\[282a.5\]]thams cad nor bu rin po che dpal gyi 'od zer gyi lda ldi dang /_phreng ba'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che rnam par snang ba'i lda ldi dang /_dra bas kun tu 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang /_'jig 
[\[282a.6\]]rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gzhi nor bu rin po che seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i phreng ba dang /_lda ldi'i dra bas yongs su gzung bar byin gyis brlab pa byed cing /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/_'khor dang 
[\[282a.7\]]bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/_lho phyogs su brten te/_nor bu rin po che 'gro ba la rnam par snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/_
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i rgyan gyis kun nas brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/_/nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba 
[\[282b.2\]]snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i ri rab rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan mar [{]mye [,]me [}]zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes sgron ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba byang 
[\[282b.3\]]chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad bdug spos kha dog sna tshogs dang /_dri sna tshogs 
[\[282b.4\]]su ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang 
[\[282b.5\]]ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings thams cad bdug spos kha dog dang dri du mar ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin 
[\[282b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mdangs 'byung bas thams cad kyi rdul gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[282b.7\]]rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]dang /_chos kyi dbyings thams cad rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje'i snying po kha dog sna tshogs can/_rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa'i yul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang 
[\[283a.2\]]chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba'i yul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nor bu rin 
[\[283a.3\]]po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_sems can gyi khams kyi yul thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs 
[\[283a.4\]]pa thams cad kyi mtshan rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi nam mkha' rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu 
[\[283a.5\]]snang bar yongs su ston cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgra 'byin pa'i ri rab kyi sprin gyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang /_phyogs bcu thams cad rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub rab 
[\[283a.6\]]tu snang ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa byed cing /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/_'khor dang bcas pas 
[\[283a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/_nub phyogs su brten te/_khang pa brtsegs pa spos kyi rgyal po thams cad kyi lhun dang ldan pa mu tig gi dra bas kun nas khyab pa dang /_seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che lha'i dbang po rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi pad+mo'i 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/_rin po che gser gyi dra bas kun nas brgyan pa dang /_yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/_/byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[283b.2\]]khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i gos yongs su snang ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dpal rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems 
[\[283b.3\]]dpa' chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/_nam mkha'i dbyings 
[\[283b.4\]]rin po che'i snam bu'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos kha dog ser po dang /_mdog ser po'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos spos sna tshogs kyis dri 
[\[283b.5\]]zhim por byas pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu rin po che gser gyi mdog shin tu 
[\[283b.6\]]'bar ba'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che 'bar ba'i gos kyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che skar ma thams cad kyi gzugs 
[\[283b.7\]]brnyan gyis sna tshogs su gyur pa'i gos kyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas nor bu rin po che snam bu khra bo'i rdo ltar snang ba'i sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]bcu kun nas rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i dpal rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas nor bu'i rgyal po snang ba shin tu 
[\[284a.2\]]gsal bas phyogs kyi dbyings rnam par snang ba'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi gos kyi sprin gyis kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mjed 
[\[284a.3\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/_'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/_byang phyogs su brten te/_rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho yongs su 'byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_
[\[284a.4\]]seng ge'i khri bai DUr+ya'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/_nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge mdzes pa'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang /_rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan mgo la thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo 
[\[284a.5\]]krung bcas te 'khod do/_/byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sa chen po thams cad du mdzes pa'i rin po che 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya 
[\[284a.6\]]ba de bzhin gshegs pa [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i spyan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su shin tu 'phrul ba'i smon lam zla ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig 
[\[284a.7\]]tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]'byam klas pa thams cad spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad bdug spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_'jig rten 
[\[284b.2\]]gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad tsan dan gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab 
[\[284b.3\]]pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_
[\[284b.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad gser gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad gos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa 
[\[284b.5\]]dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad pad+mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing /_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/_'khor dang 
[\[284b.6\]]bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su brten te/_nor bu rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa sgo chos kyi dbyings thams cad la mngon par lta ba dang /_seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po spos mtshungs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i 
[\[284b.7\]]pad mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas rin po che'i rgyal po'i me tog gi dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang /_rin po che'i rgyal po mdzod sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]'khod do/_/shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi sprin gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs 
[\[285a.2\]]pa klu dbang gi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi 
[\[285a.3\]]dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/_nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par 
[\[285a.4\]]bya ba dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod spu'i kha dog gi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun 
[\[285a.5\]]tu khyab par bya ba dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad pad+mo'i snying po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i shing gi yal ga'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun 
[\[285a.6\]]tu khyab par bya ba dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin 
[\[285a.7\]]gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad nyi ma'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang /_nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad zla ba dang /_skar ma'i tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]gyis kun tu khyab par byed cing /_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/_'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/_shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams su brten te/_rin po che 
[\[285b.2\]]rdul dang bral zhing rnam par snang ba phun sum tshogs pa'i me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_seng ge'i khri rin po che seng ge rdo rje'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa'i byang chub 
[\[285b.3\]]sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/_/lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che nyi ma rab tu snang 
[\[285b.4\]]ba'i snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i ye shes kun tu snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi 
[\[285b.5\]]khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/_ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas me tog 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu 
[\[285b.6\]]dgye ba dang /_ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rol mo 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang /_ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang /_ba spu'i bu ga 
[\[285b.7\]]thams cad nas rin po che'i gos 'od 'phro ba'i spos dang /_bdug spos sna tshogs kyis rnam par bdugs pa'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang /_ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas klus rnam par sprul pa'i glog gi 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang /_ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang /_ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che gser rab 
[\[286a.2\]]tu 'bar ba 'od rab tu 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang /_ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i rgyal po dpal gyi snying po 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang /_ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che/_
[\[286a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa rgya mtsho ltar dus gsum gyi rgyud rab tu snang ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba byed cing /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/_
[\[286a.4\]]'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/_lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams su brten te/_nor bu rin po che chen po 'od zer gyi dra ba phyogs kun tu mngon par gzhol ba'i thig les chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rab tu snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_
[\[286a.5\]]seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che spos kyi sgron ma 'od 'phro ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/_rin po che'i rgyal po dri ma med pa'i snying po'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang /_rin po che'i rgyal po sems can thams cad rab tu 'dzud pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa'i cod 
[\[286a.6\]]pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/_/nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par 
[\[286a.7\]]snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi ri bo kun nas rnam par snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i smon lam ye shes dpal zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/_bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /_ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /_lus thams cad nas dus gsum 
[\[286b.2\]]du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /_ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /_lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i byang 
[\[286b.3\]]chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /_ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /_lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin 
[\[286b.4\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /_ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /_lus thams cad 
[\[286b.5\]]nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i tshogs kyi gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu dgye ba dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /_ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /_lus thams cad nas dus 
[\[286b.6\]]gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba'i gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu dgye ba dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /_ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /_lus thams cad nas dus gsum du 
[\[286b.7\]]byung ba'i nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu dgye ba dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /_ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /_lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub dang /_byang chub kyi shing gi gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /_ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /_lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs 
[\[287a.2\]]pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu dgye ba dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /_ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /_lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi lus kyi 
[\[287a.3\]]gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /_ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /_lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye bas/_skad cig 
[\[287a.4\]]skad cig tu nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/_'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/_nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams su 
[\[287a.5\]]brten te/_rin po che'i rgyal po phyogs kun nas rnam par snang ba'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri rin po che 'gro ba rnam par snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas mu tig 'od thub pa med pa'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang /_rin po che 'od kun tu snang ba'i cod pan bcings 
[\[287a.6\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/_/'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi ma rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[287a.7\]]'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med pa'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' bsgribs pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par non pa zhes bya ba byang 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/_ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad dang sgra dang dbyangs dang nges 
[\[287b.2\]]pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa rgya mtsho rab tu brjod pa dang /_dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra rab tu bsgrag pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu 
[\[287b.3\]]bsgrag pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi sgra rab tu bsgrag pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor zhing thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu 
[\[287b.4\]]bsgrag pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa dang bdud kyi dkrugs ma rnam par 'thor ba dang /_snying 
[\[287b.5\]]po byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa'i dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu bsgrag pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba dang /_mdo sde'i tshul dang ming rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra bsgrags pa dang /_'gro 
[\[287b.6\]]ba 'dul ba thams cad dus la bab pa'i 'khor los 'dul ba'i chos kyi tshul dang thabs kyi sgra rab tu bsgrag pa dang /_ye shes thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smon lam ji ltar btab pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i khyad par dang dus dang thabs dang /_chos kyi 
[\[287b.7\]]tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa byed cing /_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/_'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/_'og gi phyogs su brten te/_de 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzhal med khang gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi mdzod kyi khang ba brtsegs pa dang /_seng ge'i khri rin po che thams cad kyi gzugs kyi pad mo'i snying po yongs su bzung ba dag mngon 
[\[288a.2\]]par sprul nas/_rin po che'i snying po byang chub thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi cod pan mgo la bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/_skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/_/steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[288a.3\]]rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa shin tu ston pa zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun tu snang ba'i dbyangs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems 
[\[288a.4\]]dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi smon lam gyi gzhi rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/_
[\[288a.5\]]mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang /_ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang /_lus thams cad dang /_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang /_tshig gi lam thams cad dang /_gos dang smad g.yogs thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad dang /_
[\[288a.6\]]bdag dang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang /_sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa thams cad dang /_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa dang /_lung ma bstan pa ma byon pa thams cad dang /_da ltar byung ba 
[\[288a.7\]]phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad na bzhugs pa rnams kyi sngon sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mdzad pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dang /_len pa dang sbyin pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang /_ba spu'i 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]sgo dang lus thams cad dang /_yan lag dang nying lag dang tshig gi lam dang gos dang smad g.yogs thams cad la rab tu snang bar gyur par rnam par bstan pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu snang bar yongs su bstan 
[\[288b.2\]]pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par yan lag dang nying lag thams cad 'thub pa rab tu bstan pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur ba yongs su bstan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus dang drag shul dang /_rnam 
[\[288b.3\]]par gnon pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam gtan rgya mtsho yongs su tshol zhing rab tu bsgrub pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang /_
[\[288b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul yongs su bsgrub cing /_chos yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa dang /_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing shin tu zhe non pa'i lus dang ngo'i gzugs brnyan rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bya bas sngon gyi 
[\[288b.5\]]sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing dga' ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lam la 'gro ba thams cad mngon par mos par byed pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur 
[\[288b.6\]]pa yongs su bstan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo yongs su dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs 
[\[288b.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu grub pa dang /_rnam par mnan pa dang /_rnam par dag par byas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyi sprin gyis rgyas par bkang ste/_byang 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa byed cing /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/_
[\[289a.2\]]'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/_steng gi phyogs su brten te/_rdo rje'i dbang po sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_seng ge'i khri rdo rje dang /_in dra nI la'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul 
[\[289a.3\]]nas nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba'i dra bas kun nas brgyan pa dang /_rin po che'i rgyal po dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dbyangs su sgrog pa'i phreng ba rab tu 'phyang ba dang /_mgo la rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[289a.4\]]sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do//_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po nyi shu lnga pa/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcas par 
[\[289a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam gyis byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas zhal du lta ba/_ye shes yongs su dag pa'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang /_mdo sde'i tshul 
[\[289a.6\]]gyi gsung rgya mtsho la rna ba yongs su gzhol ba/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang rab tu thob par bya ba la/_dam pa'i pha rol tu bgrod par phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong ba/_
[\[289a.7\]]skad cig skad cig tu/_yongs su bstan par rnam par 'phrul bas byung ba/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba'i yul dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du lus 
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]mngon par 'byung zhing rnam par snang ba/_rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khams gcig tu snang zhing khongs su chud par yang dag par ston pa'i yul dang ldan pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_'dul ba'i dus la sdong bar 
[\[289b.2\]]gzhol ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rab tu sgrog pa'i yul dang ldan pa/_sems can gyi khams thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pa rab tu thob pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[289b.3\]]cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud pa/_srid pa'i rgyud du skye ba thams cad rmi lam lta bu shes par byung ba las dang rnam par smin pa thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bur shes pas rnam par dag pa/_ye shes mngon par grub pa thams cad smig rgyu lta bur mngon 
[\[289b.4\]]par shes pa/_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad sprul pa lta bur khong du chud pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pa'i khyu mchog dang /_seng ge'i nga ros rnam par gnon pa/_so so yang 
[\[289b.5\]]dag par rig pa [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa'i rgya mtshor zhugs pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho dang /_chos kyi nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes rab tu thob pa/_chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' ltar chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa/_chos thams cad 
[\[289b.6\]]la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par dkrug pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/_dus gsum thams cad shes pa'i stobs la rab tu gnas pa/_
[\[289b.7\]]chos thams cad la ye shes sgrib pa med pa rab tu thob pa/_gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]pas nam mkha'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa len pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_nam mkha' lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/_srid pa thams cad [{]myi [,]mi [}{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i ye shes kyi 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]spyod yul can/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa'i ye shes kyi sgor zhugs pa/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gcig nas gcig tu gzung ba'i rnam par 
[\[290a.2\]]'phrul pas byung ba/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad du skyes pa'i lus yongs su ston pa/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dbyibs phra ba dang /_rgya che ba dang yangs pa dang /_dog pa sna tshogs rab tu rtogs pa shin tu phra zhing rgya chen po yang dag 
[\[290a.3\]]par gzud pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa rgya chen po shin tu phra bar shes pa dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad dang sems kyi skad cig la 'grogs pa rab tu thob pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa/_
[\[290a.4\]]phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du mgo rmongs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa sems kyi skad cig gis phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par 'gengs pa sha stag ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de lta bu'i yon tan tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa dang ldan pa'i 
[\[290a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' sha stag gis dze ta'i tshal thams cad yongs su rgyas par gyur kyang /_nyan thos chen po sha ri'i bu dang /_mo'u dgal gyi bu dang 'od srungs chen po dang /_nam 'gru dang /_rab 'byor dang /_'gag [{]myed [,]med [}]dang /_mos pa dang /_ka t+ya'i bu dang /_byams gang gi bu la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]
[\[290a.6\]]pas dze ta'i tshal na 'khod bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa de dag dang /_sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul dang /_sangs rgyas kyi
