[\[290a.7\]]mnga' chen po dang /_sangs rgyas sbyong ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yang ma mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i yul bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa de dag dang /_byang chub 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]sems dpa' kun nas 'ongs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun nas tshogs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nye bar 'ongs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul 
[\[290b.2\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs su 'khod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i seng ge'i khri bkod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i khang pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa dang /_byang 
[\[290b.3\]]chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par lta ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bsgyings pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang /_
[\[290b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su smin par gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sngon du 'dor ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi lus rnam par dag pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus yongs su rdzogs 
[\[290b.5\]]pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi lus rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yongs su dag pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyi dkyil 
[\[290b.6\]]'khor kha dog mtha' yas pa'i bkod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa'i sprin kun tu 'gyed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs kyi dra ba rgyas par 'gengs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' spyod 
[\[290b.7\]]pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul pa yang ma mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba [{]myi [,]mi [}]mtshungs pa'i phyir te/_de dag gis ni sngon sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bstsags so/_/de dag la ni sngon sangs rgyas 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan dang /_bkod pa yongs su dag pa yang dag par bstan pa mdzad do/_/de dag la ni sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[291a.2\]]ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par brjod pa ma mdzad do/_/de dag gis ni sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe sems can rnams/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba ma byas so/_/de dag gis 
[\[291a.3\]]ni gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rab tu bzhag pa ma byas so/_/de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin no/_/de dag gis ni sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir brtson pa ma yin no/_/de dag gis 
[\[291a.4\]]ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba ma byas so/_/de dag gis ni sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/_'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis la dmigs pa ma byas so/_/de dag gis ni thams cad 
[\[291a.5\]]mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bstsags pa ma byas so/_/de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma bsgrubs so/_/de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul 
[\[291a.6\]]pa'i mngon par shes pa khong du ma chud do/_/de dag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i mig gi lam gyis rnam par dmigs par bya ba 'jig rten las 'das pa thun mong ma yin pa'i byang chub tu dmigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam chen po las byung 
[\[291a.7\]]ba khong du ma chud do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kun gyis ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyi mig gi lam gyis rnam par dmigs pa thun mong ma yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs las byung ba'i sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyis grub pa/_
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes sna tshogs yongs su 'dzin pa byin gyis rlob pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa khong du ma chud do/_/de bas na nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung dang /_bzang po'i zung la sogs pa de dag 
[\[291b.2\]]gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de mi mthong ngo /_/mi shes so/_/khong du mi chud do/_/mi rtogs so/_/mi rig go_/yid mi ches so/_/mi sems so/_/rnam par mi lta'o/_/rtogs par mi lta'o/_/nges par mi sems so/_/nye bar mi sems so/_/de 
[\[291b.3\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul te nyan thos kyi spyod yul ma yin no/_/de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mi mthong ste/_de dag la de dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med do/_/
[\[291b.4\]]de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong du de lta bu'i ye shes kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]rnam par ma dag go_/[{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa chung ngu la rgya chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jug tu ting nge 'dzin de lta bu de med do/_/de dag shes pa dang /_blta ba 'am/_khong du chud par bya ba'am/_rtogs par bya 
[\[291b.5\]]ba 'am/_rgyas par dgang par bya ba'am/_'jug par bya ba'am/_rnam par blta ba'am/_nyams su myong bar bya ba'am/_gnan pa'am/_rnam par gnan pa'am/_gzhan gyis thos par bya ba'am/_bstan par bya ba'am/_smos par bya ba'am/_yang dag par 
[\[291b.6\]]bstan par bya ba'am/_bstabs par bya ba'am/_sbyin par bya ba'am/_de la sems can rnams yongs su bskul bar bya ba'am/_sbyar bar bya ba'am/_rab tu dgod par bya ba'am/_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos nyid la sems can dgod par byar 
[\[291b.7\]]yang de dag la de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa med do/_/de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul med do/_/de lta bu'i khyu mchog gi mthu med do/_/de lta bu'i stobs med do/_/de lta bu'i dbang med do/_/de lta bu'i gnas med do/_/de lta bu'i 'du shes med do/_/de lta bu'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi mthu med do/_/de lta bu'i ye shes 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag ni de ltar nyan thos kyi theg pas byung ba nyan thos kyi lam gyis yongs su grub pa/_nyan thos kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa/_nyan thos kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa/_
[\[292a.2\]]bden pa snang ba shes pas nges par rtogs pa/_yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa/_shin tu zhi ba'i mthar thug pa/_snying rje chen po'i bsam pa med pa/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la [{]myi [,]mi [}]lta mi sdod pa/_rang gi don grub pa dag ste/_de dag ni dze ta'i tshal de 
[\[292a.3\]]nyid du kun nas 'dus te 'khod la/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dang g.yas g.yon dang /_snam logs na bcom ldan 'das la mngon du lta bar gnas kyang /_dze ta'i tshal der sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba de dag mthong bar ma gyur to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_thams 
[\[292a.4\]]cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ma bsgrubs pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ma bsdus pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang dag par ma zhugs pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la smon lam yang dag par ma btab pa 
[\[292a.5\]]dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par ma bsgrubs pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su ma bsgoms pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma sbyangs pa de dag gis ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de la 
[\[292a.6\]]'jug cing rtogs par bya ba'am/_blta zhing khong du chud par bya bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]nus so/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' rigs dang ldan pa rnams kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]gi lam gyis blta ba yin gyis/_nyan thos kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis blta ba ma yin no/_/de bas na nyan thos 
[\[292a.7\]]chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa yang mthong bar ma gyur to/_/
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]de'ang 'di lta ste dper na/_gang gA'i chu klung chen po'i ngogs pha rol tshur rol du [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]bkres pa dang /_skom pas rab tu mnar ba gcer ba gos [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_lus kyi mdog dang kha dog tshig cing 'jum pa rlung dang nyi mas bskams pa/_bya rog mang 
[\[292b.2\]]pos gtse ba/_spyang ki dang /_was tho btsams pa/_brgya stong mang po kun nas 'dus kyang /_gang gA'i chu klung chen po [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ste/_sgrib pa'i las kyis bsgribs pa'i phyir la las ni bskams te chu med pa mthong ngo /_/la las ni thal bas yongs su gang bar mthong ngo /_/
[\[292b.3\]]de bzhin du nyan thos chen po gnas brtan de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthun pa'i phyogs ma rig pa'i ling tog gis [{]myig [,]mig [}]kun nas khebs pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus yongs su ma bzung 
[\[292b.4\]]ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ma shes so/_/'di lta ste dper na 'dun ma chen po 'dus pa'i skye bo mang po'i dbus su [{]myi [,]mi [}]la la zhig gnyid kyis myos te/_log par gyur nas de gnyid kyis log pa'i [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam du gnas de nyid na 
[\[292b.5\]]lha'i grong rdal brgya byin gyi gnas blta na mdzes pa dang /_ri rab kyi steng shing dang bcas pa/_bza' shing gi ra ba'i 'khor dang bcas pa/_lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis gang ba/_lha'i bu khrag khrig brgya phrag stong snyed gnas pa lha'i me tog sna tshogs 
[\[292b.6\]]kyis yongs su gang ba dang /_yid bzhin gyi shing lha rdzas kyi gos dang mu tig gi phreng ba dang /_rin po che'i rgyan dang /_se mo do sna tshogs mang po 'byin pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs rlung gis yongs su bskyod cing sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong la snyan pa 
[\[292b.7\]]'byin pa'i sil snyan gyi shing mang po dang /_dga' ba'i rtsed mo'i bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs mthong bar gyur la/_lha'i bu mo mang pos glu blangs pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi rol mo byas pa'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa thos par gyur te/_bdag nyid kyang de na 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]'dug pa snyam byed la/_lha rdzas kyi bkod pas klubs pa'i gnas de dag thams cad mthong bar gyur kyang /_skye bo'i tshogs mang po de dag gis gnas de nyid na 'khod bzhin du [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong /_mi shes/_khong du mi chud do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[293a.2\]]de ni skyes bu gnyid kyi log pa de nyid kyi [{]rmyi [,]rmi [}]lam gyis blta ba yin gyi/_gnas de nyid na 'khod kyang skye bo mang po de dag gis blta ba ma yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_'jig rten gyi dbang po byang chub la mngon par mos pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[293a.3\]]byin gyi rlabs rgya chen po dang /_rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs ma nor bar shin tu bstsags pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam shin tu mngon par bsgrubs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad la shin tu zhugs pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[293a.4\]]sems dpa'i lam bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa la shin tu gnas pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi chos nyid dang /_yan lag rnam pa thams cad du shin tu rdzogs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang /_smon lam 
[\[293a.5\]]yongs su rdzogs par bya ba rnam par dag pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su gnon pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par spyod pa thams cad la rnam par rtse ba dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[293a.6\]]dpa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul thams cad la chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par rnam par spyod pas bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de dag dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa de dag mthong zhing khong du chud la nyams su myong bar gyur kyang /_nyan thos chen 
[\[293a.7\]]po mchog gi zung dang /_bzang po'i zung la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i [{]myig [,]mig [}{]myed [,]med [}]pas mthong bar ma gyur shes par ma gyur to/_/'di lta ste dper na/_ri'i rgyal po kha ba can sman gyi 'byung gnas kyis gang ba la sngags dang /_rig sngags dang /_sman gyi tshul 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]dang /_blang ba'i rgyus shes shing rig sngags grub pa'i skyes bu gnas pa/_sman gyi cho ga thams cad shes pa sman blang ba'i las byed kyang /_ri bo'i dbang po de nyid la gnas pa'i phyugs dang /_ba lang dang ra lug 'tsho ba dang /_rngon pa dang de ma yin pa'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]sman gyi tshul 
[\[293b.2\]{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa gzhan dag gis/_sman de dag gi cho ga dang /_sman gyi ro dang mthu dang yon tan dang byin dang /_thabs dang 'phrod pa mi shes so/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[293b.3\]]rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul gyis byung ba/_de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul de dag mthong yang nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung dang /_bzang po'i zung la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa rang gi dgos pas tshim par gyur pa/_gzhan gyi dgos 
[\[293b.4\]]pa yal bar gzhog pa/_btang snyoms can de dag dze ta'i tshal de nyid na gnas kyang /_tshe 'di la bde bar spyod pas bde zhing dga' bar gnas pa las phar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul de dag khong du mi chud do/_/'di lta 
[\[293b.5\]]ste dper na/_sa chen po rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas phun sum tshogs pa/_gter brgya stong du mas gang ba rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su gang ba 'di la'ang rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang /_gter gyi rgyus la mkhas shing byang 
[\[293b.6\]]ba'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]rin po che brtag pa'i gtsug lag gis blo shin tu byang ba gter gyi gtsug lag dang rgyus dang /_dan rtags gya nom par lobs pa/_bsod nams rgya chen po'i stobs kyis brtan pa dag de las rin po che ci 'dod par blangs shing /_bdag kyang yongs su 
[\[293b.7\]]tshim par byed/_pha dang ma la'ang legs par rim gro byed/_bu pho smos kyang legs par gso bar byed cing /_de ma yin pa'i sems can rgan pa dang /_na ba dang /_dbul ba dang /_nyam nyes pa dang /_kha zas dang /_gos kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]'byor pa rnams 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]la sdud cing khyab par bgo bsha' byed la/_nor gyi dga' ba sna tshogs nyams su myong bar byed kyang /_sems can rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang /_gter gyi rgyus [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa bsod nams ma byas pa/_rin po che la shes pa'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]
[\[294a.2\]]yongs su ma dag pa/_de dag nyid na 'khod kyang /_rin po che'i 'byung gnas de dag dang rin po che'i gter de dag khong du [{]myi [,]mi [}]chud [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pas rin po che'ang blang du [{]myed [,]med [}]do/_/rin po che'i don kyang byar med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[294a.3\]]yul bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa la ye shes kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]shin tu rnam par dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa la zhugs pa/_de dag dze ta'i tshal na 'khod cing sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong la chos kyi tshul 
[\[294a.4\]]rgya mtsho la 'jug cing ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya yongs su sgrub ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa dang /_rim gro la brtson zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la mngon par brtson te/_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can de dag yongs su sdud kyang /_nyan 
[\[294a.5\]]thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po kun nas 'dus pa de lta bu'ang ma mthong ma shes so/_/'di lta ste dper na/_skyes bu la la zhig [{]myig [,]mig [}]gnyis gos kyis bkab ste/_rin 
[\[294a.6\]]po che'i gling du phyin par gyur na/_des rin po che'i gling der phan tshun 'gro ba dang /_'greng ba dang 'dug pa dang nyal ba byas kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas de [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/rin po che'i shing dang gos kyi rin po che dang /_spos kyi rin po che dang /_rin po che thams cad 
[\[294a.7\]]kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong la/_rin po che de dag gi spyod yul lam/_rin thang ngam/_yongs su spyod pa'i rgyus kyang mi shes pas/_de ni rin po che de dag len kyang [{]myi [,]mi [}]len la/_rin po che'i don kyang nyams su myong par [{]myi [,]mi [}]byed do/_/gang gi [{]myig [,]mig [}]la bsgribs pa med pa de dag gis ni de 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]dag thams cad mthong zhing shes so/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos rin po che'i gling chen por phyin pa de dag gis bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur pa mngon du gyur te/_dze ta'i tshal na bzhugs 
[\[294b.2\]]shing sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa yongs su ston pa mthong yang nyan thos chen po de dag_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung de nyid na gnas shing spyod kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul 
[\[294b.3\]]de dag ma mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mang po de lta bu'i rin po che'i 'byung gnas chen po yang mthong bar ma gyur to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang /_cho 'phrul bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab 
[\[294b.4\]]pa de dag ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi ma rig pa'i gos kyis ye shes kyi mig bkab pa/_de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mig yongs su dag pa de lta bu med do/_/de dag gis chos kyi dbyings gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 
[\[294b.5\]]'jug pa de lta bu khong du ma chud do/_/'di lta ste dper na/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]yongs su dag pa rdul dang bral bas rab tu snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rab rib dang /_mun pa thams cad dang mi 'grogs pa yod de/_de [{]myi [,]mi [}]la la zhig gis thob par gyur na/_de rdul dang 
[\[294b.6\]]bral bas rab tu snang ba dang ldan pa'i mig yongs su dag pa dang ldan pas mtshan mo mun pa'i mun nag shin tu gnag par gyur pa'i nang na sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kun nas 'dus pa dang /_cho ga dang spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan zhing mun pa'i rab 
[\[294b.7\]]rib kyis [{]myig [,]mig [}]yongs su 'khrugs par gyur pa [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]khrod na 'dug cing rnam par rgyu la phan tshun 'gro ba dang /_'greng ba dang spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spyod kyang mi de dag gis skyes bu spyod lam sna tshogs kyi spyod pa de mi mthong [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes so/_/skyes bu 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]des ni 'gro ba'i tshogs chen po spyod lam dang cho ga sna tshogs kyis rnam par spyod pa/_phyogs tha dad du mngon par bltas pa/_dbyibs kyi rnam pa tha dad pa kha dog gi rnam pa tha dad pa dmigs pa'i tshul tha dad pa thams 
[\[295a.2\]]cad kyang mi mthong ba med do/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor mnga' ba/_rnam par dag cing chags pa mi mnga' ba'i spyan dang ldan pas 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs te/_sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi 
[\[295a.3\]]rnam par 'phrul pa dang cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa mdzad kyang /_nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul chen po de dag mthong bar ma gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[295a.4\]]chen po'i tshogs chen po de lta bu yang mthong bar ma gyur to/_/'di lta ste dper na/_dge slong la la zhig skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi dbus su sas khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa 'am/_chus khyab pa'am/_mes khyab pa 'am/_rlung gis 
[\[295a.5\]]khyab pa 'am/_sngon pos khyab pa'am/_sar pos khyab pa 'am/_dmar pos khyab pa 'am/_dkar pos khyab pa 'am/_lhas khyab pa 'am/_sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyis khyab pa 'am/_sgra dang dbyangs kun gyis khyab pa 'am/_dmigs 
[\[295a.6\]]pa thams cad kyis khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na 'gro ba mang po'i tshogs de dag gis chu'i phung po de mi mthong ngo /_/me'i snang ba de yang mi mthong ngo /_/sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyis khyab pa dang /_dmigs pa thams cad kyis khyab pa'i bar 
[\[295a.7\]]du yang mi mthong ste/_ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par spyod pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi yul gyi rnam par sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag yongs su bstan 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]pa mdzad na nyan thos chen po de dag gis mthong zhing shes par ma gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam la zhugs pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul de dag mthong ngo /_/khong du chud do/_/'di lta ste dper na/_bsku ba grub pa'i [{]myi [,]mi [}]ni mig gnyis 
[\[295b.2\]]bskus ma thag tu/_skye bo mang po thams cad kyis lus mi mthong ngo /_/des ni 'gro 'am 'dug gam/_'greng yang rung ste/_'gro ba mang po thams cad mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi yul las 
[\[295b.3\]]yongs su 'das pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul du bzhugs pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mig gis shes par bya ba des 'gro ba thams cad gzigs kyang nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ngo /_/
[\[295b.4\]]'di lta ste dper na/[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]tsher 'grogs pa'i lha rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba ni/_des [{]myi [,]mi [}]de mthong yang [{]myis [,]mis [}]lha de mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kun nas 'dus pa 
[\[295b.5\]]chen po'i dbus su sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yongs su bstan pa mdzad kyang /_nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_cho 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par 'phrul 
[\[295b.6\]]pa de dag kyang ma mthong ngo /_/ma shes so/_/'di lta ste dper na/_dge slong sems can thams cad la dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu bgrod par phyin pa'i mchog thob pa 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa ni shes pa med la tshor ba med pas dbang po drug gis kyang bya 
[\[295b.7\]]ba gang yang nyams su mi myong ste/_mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma yin la 'jig rten gyi tha snyad thams cad gnas de yod kyang snyoms par zhugs pa de nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs dang mthus des mi shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]de na'ang rnam par spyod la de dag la dbang po drug kyang yod de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa dang khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang /_cho 'phrul de dag mthong bar ma gyur/_khong du chud par ma gyur shes par ma gyur to/_/
[\[296a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul chen po de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang khong du ma chud ma mthong ma shes so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi yul ni zab cing yangs la tshad med de/_blta bar dka' zhing rtogs par 
[\[296a.3\]]dka' ste/_khong du chud par dka' la 'jig rten thams cad las yongs su 'das pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'dus pa'o/_/de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal de 
[\[296a.4\]]nyid na 'khod cing /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na spyod kyang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de dag kyang ma mthong ngo /_/dze ta'i tshal 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 
[\[296a.5\]]dag pa'i yon tan dang /_rgyan yongs su 'dus pa de dag kyang ma mthong ma shes te/_de ni snod du ma gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam gyi gtsug gi 'od zer rab tu snang bas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs 
[\[296a.6\]]kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/ltos shig sems can dam pa yi/_/sangs rgyas byang chub bsam [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab/_/rgyal bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ba/_dze ta'i rgyal mtshan 'dir bstan to/_/rang byung rnams kyi byin gyi 
[\[296a.7\]]rlabs/_/bgrang du med par 'byung ba la/_/sangs rgyas chos tshul mi shes pa'i/_/'jig rten kun kyang mgo rmongs so/_/chos kyi rgyal po'i cho 'phrul dag_/tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab cing /_/shin tu zab pa 'byung ba ni/_/de la 'jig 
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]rten 'bab mi nus/_rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kha dog mdog_/mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par klubs/_/yang dag sangs rgyas bskyed pa yis/_chos rab de dag mtshan nyid med/_/rnam 'phrul mtha' dang dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]la/_/tshig gi lam gyis brjod 
[\[296b.2\]]dka' ba'i/_/rnam 'phrul shin tu zab pa dag_/rgyal bas dze ta'i tshal du bstan/_/rgyal sras bdag nyid che ba'i rnams/_/zhing rnams bsam yas bye ba nas/_/rgyal ba'i zhal ltar mos dga' ste/_/kun nas 'dus pa'i tshogs la ltos/_/smon lam 
[\[296b.3\]]yongs su phun sum tshogs/_/spyod lam spyod pa chags med pa/_/de dag bsam pa shes par ni/_/'jig rten kun gyis mi nus so/_/de dag sems dang spyod yul dang /_/spyod pa dag kyang nyan thos dang /_/rang rgyal thams cad yongs kyis kyang /_/
[\[296b.4\]]rnam pa kun tu shes mi nus/_/rgyal sras shes rab chen po rnams/_/gzhan gyis thub dka' pham byed la/_/dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan ma 'dres shing /_/ye shes sa la gzhol gyur pa/_/ting 'dzin dpag tu tshad med la/_/grags chen mnyam par gzhag 
[\[296b.5\]]pa rnams/_/chos dbyings thams cad rgyas bkang zhing /_rnam par 'phrul pa kun kyang ston/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' thub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs kyi rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/_phyogs bcur rnam par bltas 
[\[296b.6\]]nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/bsod nams snying po shes rab che/_/byang chub spyod pa'i tshul rtogs shing /_/'jig rten kun la bde byed pa'i/_/bde gshegs sku las skyes pa ltos/_/yid gzhungs blo gros mtha' yas shing /_/
[\[296b.7\]]shin tu mnyam gzhag sems ldan pa/_/mtha' dang dbus med zab pa yi/_/ye shes rgya chen spyod yul can/_/rgyan rab mang pos mdzes byas pa'i/_/dze ta'i nags tshal rgya che ba/_/byang chub sems dpas kun rgyas shing /_/bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]gnas gyur pa/_/gnas med mi gnas gyur ba rnams/_/phyogs rnams bcu nas kun 'dus te/_/pad+mo'i stan la 'khod pa dag_/rgya mtsho mang la blta bgyis/_/gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]len pa med pa rnams/_/spros pa med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]rten 
[\[297a.2\]]la/_/rdul bral chags pa'i sems med pa/_/chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba dang /_/ye shes rgyal mtshan rab dpa' ba/_/rdo rje'i sems ni mi g.yo zhing /_/grub pa med pa'i chos rnams la/_/mya ngan 'da' bar gang ston pa/_/phyogs bcu'i zhing mang bye ba 
[\[297a.3\]]rnams/_/grangs kyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]chod kun nas 'dus/_/yang dag sangs rgyas drung du lhags/_gnyis kyi 'du shes rnam par spangs/_/rang 'byung shAkya seng ge yi/_/rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag mthong /_/de yi byin rlabs dam pa yi/_/byang chub sems 
[\[297a.4\]]dpa' 'di dag lhags/_/sangs rgyas chos la 'byed pa med/_/chos dbyings gzhi la'ang de bzhin te/_/tha snyad tsam du yongs 'byed pa'i/_/pha rol phyin pa rgyal ba'i sras/_/chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med pa'i/_/mtha' la thugs pa de dag gnas/_/
[\[297a.5\]]tshig rnams yongs su zad med pas/_chos la dbye ba'ang rab tu byed/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi brjid rgyal pos/_/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_/de'i tshe tshigs 
[\[297a.6\]]su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/ltos shig sems can dam pa yi/_/ye shes dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs/_/dus dang dus [{]myin [,]min [}]mkhyen mdzad cing /_/sems can rnams la chos kyang ston/_/mu stegs ldan pa tshogs 'dus pa'i/_/rgol ba 
[\[297a.7\]]thams cad rab tu 'joms/_/sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du/_/rnam par 'phrul ba yongs su ston/_/phyogs na mi bzhugs bde gshegs rnams/_/sangs rgyas yul gyi rjes mi bzhud/_/tshad med pa dang tshad yod las/_/thub pa chen 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]po 'das pa [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/nyi ma mkha' las 'gro ba ni/_/nyin par 'grangs pa smos pa byed/_/de bzhin mkhyen pas mkhas ston pa/_/dus gsum chags pa med pas brjod/_/zla ba nya ba'i mtshan mo la/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'phags par snang /_/de 
[\[297b.2\]]bzhin chos dkar yongs rdzogs pa'i/_/mgon po rnams kyang mthong ba yin/_/bar snang nam mkha'i dbyings 'di las/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rgyu ba ni/_/gar yang thogs pa med par 'gro/_/sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul de bzhin no/_/ji ltar nam 
[\[297b.3\]]mkha'i phyogs rnams kyi/_/zhing rnams kun la mi gnas pa/_/de bzhin 'jig rten sgron ma yi/_/sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul shes par bya/_/ji ltar sa ni 'jig rten na/_/lus can kun gyi gnas yin pa/_'jig rten sgron ma'i 'jig rten na/_/
[\[297b.4\]]chos kyi 'khor lo de ltar gnas/_/ji ltar rlung ni chags med par/_/mkha' las mgyogs par rab rgyu ba/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid kyang /_/'jig rten khams su rab tu rgyu/_/ji ltar chu yi phung po la/_/zhing rnams bgrangs pa kun 
[\[297b.5\]]gnas pa/_/de bzhin dus gsum sangs rgyas kyang /_/ye shes tshogs la rab tu gnas/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying po chags pa med pa'i rgyal pos/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_
[\[297b.6\]]de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/ji ltar rdo rje'i ri dang brag_/zang yag shin tu mtho yod pa/_/da ltar 'jig rten kun skyob pa'i/_/sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pas mtho/_/ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu chen dag_/tshad med rnyog 
[\[297b.7\]]pa med pa ltar/_/sangs rgyas mthong ba'ang de bzhin te/_/'jig rten kun gyi skom pa gcod/_/rgya mtsho'i chu las 'phags pa yi/_/ri bo ri rab ci 'dra ba/_/de bzhin 'jig rten sgron na yang /_chos kyi mtsho las mngon par 'phags/_/rin chen 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]kun gyi 'byung gnas kyis/_/rgya mtsho rgyas pa ji bzhin du/_/rang byung ye shes de bzhin te/_mi zad skad cig rab mkhyen pa/_/mgon po'i ye shes shin tu zab/_/tshad med de bzhin bgrang du [{]myed[,]med[}]/_de bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa/_/
[\[298a.2\]]bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab tshad med ston/_/sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid ston pa yi/_/sgyu mkhan mkhas pa ji lta ba/_/de ltar sangs rgyas mkhyen dbang yang /_/rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston/_/yid bzhin nor bu rnam dag pa/_/bsam don rdzogs byed ji lta ba/_/de bzhin 
[\[298a.3\]]bsam pa dag pa la/_/rgyal ba smon lam rdzogs pa mdzad/_/'od snang gsal ba byed pa yi/_/rin chen rnam snang ji lta ba/_/de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa dag_/'gro ba'i bsam pa gsal bar mdzad/_/ji ltar phyogs la mngon lta ba'i/_/rin chen 
[\[298a.4\]]zur brgyad rab gnas pa/_de bzhin chags med sgron ma yang /_/chos dbyings rab tu snang ba mdzad du/_/chu 'dang rin chen 'od gsal ba/_/ji ltar dri med chu 'dang byed/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas mthong bas kyang /_/'gro ba'i dbang po dag par 'gyur/_/de nas 
[\[298a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su smon lam rab tu 'phrul ba'i zla ba'i rgyal pos/_/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/phyogs 'di in dra nI la yi/_/kha dog 
[\[298a.6\]]mdog gcig byas pa ltar/_sangs rgyas mthong bas skye dgu rnams/_/de bzhin byang chub mdog tu 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rdul phran re re la/_/rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs rnams/_/tshad kyis gzhal du med pa ston/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnam dag 
[\[298a.7\]]mdzad/_/de ni rmad byung shin tu zab/_/mtha' yas bsgrub par dka' ba ste/_/blo ldan ye shes yul de la/_/'jig rten rnams ni 'bab mi nus/_/byang chub sems dpa' bsgrub don du/_/bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/sangs rgyas tshul 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]gyis rnam sbyangs pa'i/_/chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa ston/_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsam yas pa/_/blo ldan bskor ba'i sangs rgyas kyis/_/kun nas gang bar gyur pa yang /_/rgyal ba de la ston pa mdzad/_/chos kun mnga' sgyur ston pa ste/_/shAkya'i 
[\[298b.2\]]khyu mchog skyes par gyur/_/de yi cho 'phrul tshad med pa/_'di dag rab tu byung ba yin/_/brtan pa'i spyod pa sna tshogs rnams/_/tshad med rnam par gzigs gyur nas/_/rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa/_/tshad med gzi can ston pa mdzad/_/'jig 
[\[298b.3\]]rten mgon po rgyal sras rnams/_/chos kyi dbyings la slob pa mdzad/_/chos rnams thams cad yongs la yang /_/chags med ye shes spyod yul 'gyur/_/skyes bu dbang po'i byin rlabs kyis/_/cho 'phrul brgya dang rab ldan zhing /_/'jig rten thams cad 
[\[298b.4\]]rnam spyod pa'i/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/_/sems can gtso bo'i yul la yang /_/ye shes dkyil 'khor yongs sbyongs shing /_/shes rab chen po'i klu chen rnams/_/'jig rten thams cad 'grel bar 'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[298b.5\]]chos kyi don gyi blo gros gzi brjid rgyal pos/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/drang srong dam pa'i mchog rnams kyi/_/dus gsum nyan thos gang byung 
[\[298b.6\]]ba/_/de dag kun gyis bde gshegs kyi/_/gshegs thabs 'jog 'deg mi shes so/_/dus gsum ma lus thams cad kyi/_/ma nor rang rgyal gang byung ba/_/de dag gis kyang mgon po yi/_/gshegs thabs 'jog 'deg mi rig go_/
[\[298b.7\]]ma rig mun pas bsgribs pa rnams/_/khyi ltar ltong la rgyus pa yi/_/sems can de 'dra kun gyis ni/_/mgon po [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes smos mi dgos/_/rgyal ba tshad mas gzhal ba [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/de ni shes par mi nus te/_/sangs rgyas chags med ye shes can/_/
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]tshig gi lam las shin tu 'das/_/zla ba nya rgyas 'od mnga' ba/_brtan pa mtshan gyis rnam par bris/_/de ni bskal pa dpag yas par/_/rnam 'phrul thogs med spyod pa mdzad/_/tshul sgo re res sangs rgyas la/_/shin tu mnyam 
[\[299a.2\]]bzhag bsam byas kyang /_/bskal pa bye ba bsam yas pa/_/brjod du med pa zad 'gyur gyi/_/rang byung rnams kyi yon tan las/_/phyogs gcig cha yi mthar [{]myi [,]mi [}]phyin/_/sangs rgyas de yi zhal bltas kyang /_/sangs rgyas chos ni bsam mi khyab/_/gang zhig de la smon 
[\[299a.3\]]byed cing /_/gang zhig yid kyis dga' mos pa/_/de dag kun gyi de 'dra ba'i/_/spyod yul blta dka' 'thob par 'gyur/_/bsod nams ye shes mtha' yas shing /_/tshogs can yangs pas rnam gnon la/_/dri med blo ldan sems gnas pa/_/de dag 'di yi tshul la 
[\[299a.4\]]'jug_/de dag smon lam rgya che bas/_/sems dang sdom pa rgya che ste/_/rgyal ba'i spyod yul thob gyur cing /_/byang chub rgya chen gnon par 'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal pos/_
[\[299a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/chags med ye shes sku mnga' bas/_/rang byung rnams ni sku med de/_/bsam yas ye shes yul mnga' bas/_/de dag bsam par mi 
[\[299a.6\]]nus so/_/phrin las dkar po bsam yas pas/_/sangs rgyas sku rab bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/de la 'jig rten gsum mi 'go_/mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos mdzes/_/chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam sbyangs pas/_/'jig rten kun tu snang ba mdzad/_/sangs 
[\[299a.7\]]rgyas byang chub sgo yin te/_/ye shes kun gyi gnas chen no/_/chags pa thams cad rnam spangs pas/_/rdul med spros pa mi mnga'o/_/ye shes 'od zer rab 'gyed pas/_'jig rten kun tu nyi ma 'dra/_/khams gsum thams cad rnam sbyong 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]pas/_/srid pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par gcod/_/byang chub sems dpa' bsgrub pa mdzad/_/byang chub 'byung gnas de bzhin no/_/kha dog mtha' yas ston mdzad kyang /_/kha dog kun la gnas pa med/_/sems can kun gyis bsam yas pa'i/_/kha dog 
[\[299b.2\]]tshad med yongs su ston/_/skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas kyi/_/byang chub bsam yas sbyangs pas na/_/de yi ye shes mthar phyin par/_/rtag par sus kyang mi nus so/_/ye shes bstan pa zad [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes/_/rang bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba med/_/de la 
[\[299b.3\]]dus gsum rgyal ba kun/_/skad cig gcig gis rab tu brjod/_/rtag par las gzhan yongs btang ste/_/shes ldan byang chub don gnyer bas/_/sems la sems shes bya ba yang /_de la sems skye med par bsam/_/gang gi sangs rgyas 
[\[299b.4\]]bskyed pa yi/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams bsam mi khyab/_/de dag brjod pa'i yul ma yin/_/shin tu zab pas tshig lam spangs/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyis/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi 
[\[299b.5\]]rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par blta/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/dran pa rmongs med dag pa rnams/_/chos 'dzin shin tu nges rtogs shing /_/blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab la/_/byang chub rgya mtsho [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa/_/de dag yid ni 'di 
[\[299b.6\]]la des/_/de dag spyod pa'i spyod yul yin/_/de dag shes pa 'dir [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo/_/de dag 'di la the tsom 'chad/_/de dag skyo bar [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gyur te/_/de dag yid kyang zhum mi 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas chos la rab gzhol bar/_/de dag sems kyang rab tu 'byung /_
[\[299b.7\]]de dag dad pa rting tshugs shing /_/yang dag 'phags pa rab tu bskyed/_/dmigs med gnas pa med pa yi/_/ye shes 'di la de dag dga'/_/bskal pa bye bar bstsags pa yi/_/yongs su rdzogs pa'i dge ba'i chos/_/ye shes 'di 'dod mtshungs 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]pa med/_/de dag thams cad yongs su sngo/_/'khor ba'i nang na rnam rgyu yang /_/'khor ba dag la gnas pa [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams rab rtogs pas/_/sangs rgyas yul la rab tu rtse/_/sems can khams ni ji snyed 
[\[300a.2\]]du/_/'jig rten phun sum tshogs rgyu ba/_/de dag thams cad brtan pas spangs/_/sangs rgyas phun sum tshogs la gnas/_/sangs rgyas rtag tu 'byung 'gyur kyang /_'jig rten don med rab tu gnas/_/chags med spyod pa de dag ni/_/rtag tu sems 
[\[300a.3\]]can don la gnas/_/de dag spyod pa mtshungs med de/_/lus can kun gyis bsam mi khyab/_/'jig rten bde ba kun sems pas/_/de dag sdug bsngal rnam par bzlog_/'jig rten kun la snying brtse zhing /_/byang chub ye shes rnam dag pas/_/de dag 
[\[300a.4\]]'jig rten snang bar gyur/_/'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'grel/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i rgyal pos/_/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di 
[\[300a.5\]]dag smras so/_/bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyar yang /_/sangs rgyas sgra ni rab dkon na/_/the tsom thams cad gcod pa yi/_/dam pa mthong ba ci zhig smos/_/chos kun thugs su chud rtogs pa/_/'jig rten gsum po'i bsod nams stegs/_/sems 
[\[300a.6\]]can thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i/_/'jig rten sgron ma mthong gis dga'/_/sems can gtso bo ma smad pa'i/_/gzugs kyi sku ni mthong gyur na/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu/_/ngoms shing tshim pa skyer mi btub/_/[{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]dbang po'i sku gzugs la/_/rgyal 
[\[300a.7\]]ba'i sras rnams lta lta zhing /_/rang gi dge ba'i chags med pa/_/gzhan don brtson pa byang chub bsngo/_/thub pa chen po'i gzugs kyi sku/_/de las so so yang dag rig_/chags med ye shes 'byung 'gyur bas/_/de ni sangs rgyas byang chub sgo/_/sems 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]can bsam yas tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_/snang bar mdzad de theg chen la/_/btsud nas thub pa chen po'i mchog_/byang chub dam par lung yang ston/_/bsod nams chen po'i rang bzhin zhing /_/ye shes dkyil 'khor shar cing 'byung /_/'jig rten tshad med kun tu snang /_/
[\[300b.2\]]bsod nams phung po rnam 'phel mdzad/_/sdug bsngal dra ba rab tu gcod/_/ye shes phung po rnam par spyod/_/gang gis rgyal ba bsnyen bkur ba/_/de dag ngan song 'jigs pa med/_/rkang gnyis dam pa mthong gyur na/_/shin tu yangs pa'i sems skye 
[\[300b.3\]]ste/_/'di snang gsal ba'i shes rab mthu/_/grangs med pa yang skye bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas skyes bu'i mchog mthong zhing /_/byang chub dam par nges par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur bya zhes/_/de dag kun kyang nges par sems/_/de 
[\[300b.4\]]nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi smon lam gyi gzhi rab tu rtogs pas/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/yon tan mtha' yas phun ldan pa/_/shAkya'i khyu mchog thub mthong nas/_/yongs su bsngo ba byed 
[\[300b.5\]]pa'i sems/_/theg pa che la rnam par 'dag_/sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/_/thugs rje chen mnga' brtan pa rnams/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad pa/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bskal pa khrag khrig phrag brgyar yang /_/sems 
[\[300b.6\]]can don la brtson mdzad pa'i/_/sangs rgyas rnams la lus can rnams/_/kun gyis lan glan cis kyang nus/_/ngan song gsum po mi bzad par/_/bskal pa bye bar btsos bla yi/_/chags pa thams cad zlog mdzad pa'i/_/ston pa mi mthong ma 
[\[300b.7\]]yin no/_/sems can kun gyi rgyud rnams na/_/sdug bsngal phung po ji yod pa/_/ma lus nyams su bzod nus kyi/_/sangs rgyas mi mthong ma yin no/_/'jig rten 'di dag thams cad na/_/tha dad ngan song rgyud yod pa/_/de dag yun ring gnas 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]bla yi/_/sangs rgyas mi mthong ma yin no/_/sems can dmyal ba re rer yang /_/bskal pa tshad med gnas bla yi/_/mtha' yas rgyal bas brnyes pa yi/_/byang chub mchog las ring gnas [{]myin[,]min[}]/_/ci zhig phyir ni ngan song 
[\[301a.2\]]du/_/yun ring gnas par 'dod ce na/_/rgyal ba'i dbang po mthong ba ni/_/ye shes 'phel ba'i rgyur 'gyur phyir/_/rgyal ba 'jig rten mchog mthong na/_/sdug bsngal thams cad 'chad par 'gyur/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyod yul gyi/_/ye shes 
[\[301a.3\]]khong du chud pa 'byung /_/sangs rgyas [{]myi [,]mi [}]yi mchog mthong zhing /_/sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/_/byang chub gang gis 'thob pa yi/_/bsod nams tshad med 'phel bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas mthong ba sems can rnams/_/the tsom yid gnyis chad par 
[\[301a.4\]]'gyur/_/'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten gyi/_/bsam pa'ang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la rnam par bltas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 
[\[301a.5\]]nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid de bas kyang rnam par dbye ba dang rgya cher brjod pa dang /_gsal bar bya ba dang rab tu brjod pa dang /_yang dag par bstan pa dang /_shin tu snang bar bya ba dang /_rab tu gsal bar bya ba dang man ngag bstan pa'i phyir/_chos kyi dbyings 
[\[301a.6\]]kyi tshul nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pas/_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang sems can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid dang /_'jig rten thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang las kyi rgyud thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang sems can gyi bsam 
[\[301a.7\]]pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_sems can gyi mos pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_chos kyi snang ba mnyam pa nyid dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus mnyam pa nyid dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po mnyam pa nyid kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin seng 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]ge rnam par bsgyings pa/_'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bstan pa'i tshul bcus yang dag par rab tu ston te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la/_/sangs rgyas gcig 
[\[301b.2\]]nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan pa dang /_'di lta ste/_nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du/_/phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su brjod pa bstan pa dang /_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[301b.3\]]thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su skye ba dang /_mtha' dang dbus med pa'i mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgo rgya mtsho yongs su brjod cing bstan pa dang /_'di lta ste/_nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 
[\[301b.4\]]'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun snying po byang chub la mngon du gyur pa'i gnas bstan pa dang /_'di lta ste dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar sprul pa ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas/_sems skad cig la rab tu dgye zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par dgang ba bstan pa dang /_'di lta ste/_
[\[301b.5\]]phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho gzhi mnyam par byin gyis brlab cing lus gcig gis rgyas par dgang bstan pa dang /_'di lta ste/_dmigs pa'i gzhi thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul ba dus gsum thams cad yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ba'i 
[\[301b.6\]]byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa dang /_'di lta ste zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la/_dus gsum gyi zhing gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_bskal pa rgya mtsho yongs su bshad cing bstan pa dang /_'di lta ste/_dus 
[\[301b.7\]]gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas rab tu brjod pa phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlabs pas/_byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'byung bar bstan pa dang /_'di lta ste/_chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i seng ge'i khri dang /_
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang /_snying po byang chub kyi rgyan tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa tha dad pa rab tu bskor ba/_phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlab pa bstan pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar seng ge rnam 
[\[302a.2\]]par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la bstan pa bcu po de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa shin tu bstan pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod de/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul lo/_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[302a.3\]]dpa' kun tu bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid kyi don gyi phyogs bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal du lta zhing 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad la 
[\[302a.4\]]rnam par bltas nas/_sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la rnam par bltas te/_'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab par gzhol ba la rnam par 
[\[302a.5\]]bltas nas ye shes bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa'i sgyu ma'i chos nyid la rnam par bltas te/_dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rnam par bltas nas/_mtha' dang dbus med pa'i ngag gi lam dang nges pa'i tshig dang /_chos kyi 
[\[302a.6\]]tshul thams cad la rnam par bltas te/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/ba spu gcig la rgya mtsho rgal ba'i zhing /_/zhing kun shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam/_/de nas sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor/_kun gyis yongs 
[\[302a.7\]]bskor sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs/_/spu gcig rtse la zhing mang rgya mtsho rnams/_/snying po byang chub pad+mo'i gdan gnas pas/_/chos dbyings rgya chen yongs su rgyas bkang zhing /_/shing drung dam pa kun na mgon po snang /_/zhing rnams kun gyi rdul 
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]phran rab mang rnyed/_/rgyal ba spu rtse gcig la yongs bzhugs pa/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi yongs su bskor/_/kun kyang bzang po'i spyod pa ston pa mdzad/_/zhing mchog gcig na rgyal ba bzhugs gyur kyang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i sprin mang mi zad pa/_de 
[\[302b.2\]]dag phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad nas/_/'byam klas zhing kun bkang zhing kun kyang 'ong /_/zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran mnyam pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho 'od/_/phyogs bcu'i chos dbyings rgyas pa kun bkang zhing /_/ston pa de la 
[\[302b.3\]]kun kyang 'khor nas ldang /_/zhing rnams kun tu gzugs brnyan rab tu ston/_/chos kyi rgyal po rgyal ba'i ye shes mtsho/_/de dag kun kyang bzang po'i spyod la gnas/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du nye bar 'dong /_/'byam klas zhing rnams kun na 'khod spyod cing /_/
[\[302b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba rab gnas te/_/chos kyi sprin mnyan dpa' bo de dag ni/_/zhing gcig du yang bskal pa bye bar spyod/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par byed/_/chos kyi gang chen mtsho spyod rnam par snang /_/smon lam rgya mtsho kun la rab tu 
[\[302b.5\]]'jug_/de dag sangs rgyas sa yi spyod yul gnas/_/rgyal ba'i chos rnams gzhan dang gzhan byung ba'i/_/de dag kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes/_/sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa rgya mtsho dang /_/rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen yangs la 'jug_/bde 
[\[302b.6\]]gshegs chos dbyings kun tu rgyas bkang zhing /_/zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran ji snyed pa'i/_/sku yi sprin rnams rtag tu 'gyed mdzad cing /_/chos kyi char gyis byang chub rab la dgod//_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen 
[\[302b.7\]]po'i mdo/_/bam po nyi shu drug pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid la de bas kyang brnan te/_'god pa mdzad pa'i don du smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i nang nas chos 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]kyi dbyings sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs pas dus gsum snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer chen po 'od zer gyi 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang ldan pa bkye ste/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[303a.2\]]rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad snang bar mdzad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' dze ta'i tshal du tshogs pa de dag gi chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa 
[\[303a.3\]]thams cad dang /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'i khongs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba dag la/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi [{]mying [,]ming [}]du bya ba kha dog sna tshogs dang /_rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par dag pa dang /_zhing 
[\[303a.4\]]sna tshogs dang /_dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' snying po byang chub tu phyin te/_seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis shin tu mchod pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis kun 
[\[303a.5\]]nas bskor ba/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mthong ste/_la la na ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa tsam du shin tu yangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na/_chos kyi dbyings rgyas par khyab pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 
[\[303a.6\]]'khor gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong ngo /_/la la na ni lha'i gnas na 'dug_/la la na ni klu'i gnas na 'dug_/la la na ni gnod sbyin gyi gnas na 'dug_/la la na ni lha ma yin gyi gnas na 'dug_/la la na ni nam mkha' lding gi gnas na 'dug_/
[\[303a.7\]]la la na ni mi'am ci'i gnas na 'dug_/la la na ni lto 'phye chen po'i gnas na 'dug_/la la na ni mi'i dbang po'i gnas na 'dug_/la la na ni mi'i 'jig rten gyi grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_khams dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]'khor dag na rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang /_spyod lam sna tshogs dang /_lus sna tshogs dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa sna tshogs dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pa sna tshogs dang /_rigs dang rgyud sna tshogs su byung ba dang /_kha dog 
[\[303b.2\]]rnam par dmigs pa sna tshogs dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang /_'od zer gyi dra ba dgye ba sna tshogs dang /_dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang /_gtam gyi skyes bu'i gzhi sna tshogs dang /_bstan pa'i gzhi sna tshogs dang /_/tshig dang yi ge dang nges pa'i 
[\[303b.3\]]tshig sna tshogs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs na chos ston pa mthong bar gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa phyogs bcu na rnam par gnas pa/_phyogs 
[\[303b.4\]]kyi rgyud mtha' yas par 'dus pa/_phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du gtogs pa/_chos sna tshogs kyi sgo dang ldan pa/_phyogs kyi [{]mying [,]ming [}]du bya ba sna tshogs su gtogs pa/_phyogs sna tshogs kun tu gzhol ba/_phyogs cha rnam pa tha dad par gtogs pa/_
[\[303b.5\]]phyogs sna tshogs kyi rjes su song ba/_phyogs rgya mtsho sna tshogs su gtogs pa 'di lta ste/_shar phyogs dang /_lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /_shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /_
[\[303b.6\]]lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi zhing gi lhun gyi phyogs dang /_sems can gyi lus kyi phyogs dang /_sems can gyi [{]mying [,]ming [}]du bya ba'i phyogs dang /_sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i phyogs 
[\[303b.7\]]dang /_phyogs bcu'i da ltar byung ba'i phyogs dang /_nam mkha'i khongs thams cad du skra'i rtse mo shin tu phra ba dgod pas dmigs pa'i phyogs dang /_zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa khong du chud par 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]bya ba'i phyogs dang /_las kyi 'du byed sna tshogs kyis yongs su grub pa'i phyogs dang /_skra'i rtse mo gcig la mtha' dang dbus med pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi [{]mying [,]ming [}]du byar gtogs pa'i phyogs kyi khongs su chud pa'i dus gsum gyi dbyings 
[\[304a.2\]]mnyam pa nyid du gzhol bas/_kun tu gtogs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pas/_sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi 'dus ches kyi rnam pa la mnyam pa'i sgra dbyangs su gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems la gzugs brnyan rab tu snang bar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[304a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa/_sems can thams cad kyi lus la mngon par lta ba/_dmigs par bya bas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'gro ba'i tshul dang ldan pa/_bskal pa thams cad la ye shes tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa/_zhing thams cad la kun tu snyoms 
[\[304a.4\]]pas sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba de bzhin du gzugs mngon sum du bstan pa rnam par dmigs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bstan pas/_sems can thams cad 'dul ba rgyun mi 'chad pa mthong bar 
[\[304a.5\]]gyur pa de dag thams cad ni sngon/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis dge ba'i spyod pa skal ba mnyam pa dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdus pa mthong ba dang mnyam pa dang /_rjes su dran pa dang bsnyen bkur bas yongs su smin par byas pa dag go_/sngon 
[\[304a.6\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud pa dag go_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi drung du gshegs pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bsdus pa dag ste/_de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba skal pa mnyam pas/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[304a.7\]]du yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis shin tu bzung ba'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs shing nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs par gyur ba dag kyang mthong zhing khong du chud par gyur 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]pa yin te/_/la la ni chos kyi sku la 'jug go_/la la ni gzugs kyi sku la 'jug go_/la la ni sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su bsgrub pa la 'jug go_/la la ni pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa la 'jug go_/la la ni spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i 
[\[304b.2\]]rgyan la 'jug go_/la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa yi rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go_/la la ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go_/la la ni sangs rgyas rnam par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go_/la la 
[\[304b.3\]]ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]bsnyengs pa la 'jug go_/la la ni sangs rgyas kyi so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho la 'jug go_/de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra 
[\[304b.4\]]ba snyed la 'jug ste mos pa sna tshogs dang lam sna tshogs dang /_sgo sna tshogs dang /_'jug pa sna tshogs dang /_'bab pa sna tshogs dang /_rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_rjes su 'brang ba sna tshogs dang /_phyogs sna tshogs dang snod sna tshogs dang yul sna tshogs dang /_'jig rten 
[\[304b.5\]]sna tshogs dang khong du chud pa sna tshogs dang /_tshogs sna tshogs dang rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang /_thabs sna tshogs dang ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la 'jug go_/ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyis 'jug pa 'di lta ste/_
[\[304b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kun nas brgyan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum thams cad la thogs pa med par yul snang bar byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa'i 
[\[304b.7\]]ye shes snang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin nam mkha'i dbyings su snang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]bcu 'thob pas rnam par 'byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i rgyan gyis rnam par gnon cing rnam par bsgyings pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad 
[\[305a.2\]]kyi klong gi snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du thogs pa med par sgra sgrogs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i zla ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis brgyan pa'i 'od kyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag 
[\[305a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go_/byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi rgyal po'i thabs chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rgyal mtshan dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa thams 
[\[305a.4\]]cad la sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rnam par lta ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad du tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa'i lus snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tha dad pa'i yul la 'jug pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[305a.5\]]sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa snying rje'i snying po can dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi gnas la rten pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu zhil 
[\[305a.6\]]rab tu zhi bas kun tu snang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sprul pa bzang po [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]su med pas/_kun tu 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhing thams cad yongs su 'du ba'i byin gyi rlabs 
[\[305a.7\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhing thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par mngon par bsgrub pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du dbang po'i kha dog gis rnam par spyod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]thams cad du khyad par du 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor chags pa med pa'i rnam par spyod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa las byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yon tan rgya mtsho 
[\[305b.2\]]thams cad la nan tan gyis 'jug pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ma lus pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pas/_phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis rlob pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[305b.3\]]cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho la 'jug pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyi ma'i mthar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs bcu'i zhing rgya mtsho da ltar byung ba thams 
[\[305b.4\]]cad yongs su dag par mos pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas thams cad dang rnam par spyod cing 'grogs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad la chags pa med 
[\[305b.5\]]pa'i mthar 'jug pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu byin gyis rlob pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skur 'phrul pa mngon par sgrub pa dang /_
[\[305b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dbang po rgya mtsho rdo rje'i dbang po lta bu thams cad khong du chud pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gcig pa'i snying po'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 
[\[305b.7\]]'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig gi cha la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad khong du chud pas khom par gnas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du zhing 'byam klas pa bsgrub pa yongs su ston pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin spyi'u tshugs su gzhi la rnam par spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sems can gyi lus tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad par byin gyis rlob pa dang /_
[\[306a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi klong thams cad la mngon sum du yang dag par gzhol ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin mtshan nyid yongs su shes pas rab tu 'byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[306a.3\]]ting nge 'dzin dus gsum sems kyi skad cig la tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi rang bzhin dam pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[306a.4\]]kyi rigs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa'i seng ge dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes pa'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bcu'i rtsal gyis 
[\[306a.5\]]rnam par gnon pas yang dag par rtsom pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad kun nas mthong ba'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kha dog thams cad dkyil 'khor gyis 'gro bar shin tu mdzes pa 
[\[306a.6\]]mngon par sgrub pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin glong mi g.yo ba'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos gcig la chos thams cad yongs su 'du bar ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos gcig 
[\[306a.7\]]gi tshig gi lam la nges pa'i dag gi rab tu 'byed pas/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go_/byang chub sems 
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi mu la mthar thug pa med pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bskal pa thams cad khong du chud pas tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa'i ye shes dang /_
[\[306b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshul shin tu phra bas stobs bcu khongs su chud pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin [{]myi [,]mi [}]'phrogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bskal pa thams cad du mngon par sgrub pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[306b.3\]]phyogs thams cad kun tu shugs kyis mngon du thar pa'i sprin dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par sgrub pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshor ba thams cad kyis reg pa med pas bde ba'i 
[\[306b.4\]]rgyal mtshan dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad du nam mkha'i rgyan mngon par sgrub pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig tu 'gro ba snyed kyi sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi sprin mngon par sgrub pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[306b.5\]]dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i zla ba'i 'od nam mkha' ltar rdul dang bral ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkha' ltar byin gyis rlob pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad la dbang po'i rgyan 
[\[306b.6\]]rab tu snang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi don rnam par 'byed pa'i sgron ma dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stobs bcu'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dpal 
[\[306b.7\]]gyi rgyal mtshan dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu 'dres pa'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig la brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin par byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]'dzin bsod nams mi zad pa'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mthong ba'i yul rab tu snang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad la rdo rje'i seng ge ltar rab tu 
[\[307a.2\]]gnas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa yongs su bstan pas kun tu rnam par dmigs pa mngon par sgrub pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyan pa'i 
[\[307a.3\]]nyi ma gnon pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gcig tu spyod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rab tu zhi bar sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrogs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas 
[\[307a.4\]]thams cad mthong ba'i sa mtshams 'dzin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi pad mo'i tshal rab tu rgyas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gnas med pa'i chos kyi nam mkha' 
[\[307a.5\]]la rnam par lta ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs gcig tu phyogs bcu rgya mtsho yongs su sdud pa'i klong dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi thams cad kyi sgor 'jug pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 
[\[307a.6\]]'dzin chos rgya mtsho thams cad dang ldan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad la 'od rab tu 'gyed pas/_rab tu zhi ba'i lus su 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig la mngon 
[\[307a.7\]]par shes pa dang /_smon lam thams cad mngon par sgrub pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag par thams cad du kun nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]thams cad rgyan gcig tu khong du chud par 'jug pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad dran pa'i rang bzhin gyis rab tu snang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad par chen po dang ldan pa'i ye shes mngon par 
[\[307b.2\]]shes pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig gis chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul mtha' yas pa rang gi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings tshul gcig gis chos thams cad tshul gcig 
[\[307b.3\]]par rnam par dgod pa'i 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gzi brjid kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can gyi khams mig 'phrul lta bu yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam dang /_
[\[307b.4\]]spyod pa byin gyis rlob pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi thams cad tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pad+mo'i byin rnam par 'phrul pas kun tu rnam par gnon pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[307b.5\]]sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi rgyud khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus sems can thams cad la mngon du byin gyis rlob pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag 
[\[307b.6\]]rgya mtshor 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad yongs su 'byed pa'i tshul mngon par shes pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba'i gzhi tha dad pa thams cad khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin snying rje chen po'i mdzod 
[\[307b.7\]]tha mi dad pa'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin nyid du rtogs pa'i mtha' la 'jug pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i pho brang la rnam par lta bas seng 
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]ge rnam par bsgyings pa dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lam la 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang 
[\[308a.2\]]mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go_/sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs par 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sngon bskal pa mnyam par spyad pa yang rjes su dran no/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag 
[\[308a.3\]]dze ta'i tshal du phyin cing /_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na 'khod pa/_seng ge'i khri rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad mo'i snying po can 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba dang mnyam par yangs pa la 'khod pa/_ye shes dang mngon par shes pa chen 
[\[308a.4\]]po'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba/_ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rno ba dang ldan pa'i sa rjes su thob pa/_ye shes kyis kun tu rnam par dpyod pa/_shes rab kyi 'byung gnas kyi rigs su byung ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mngon du gyur pa/_ye shes 
[\[308a.5\]]kyi mig rab rib med pa dang ldan pa/_sems can gyi kha lo bsgyur ba'i rang bzhin thob pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba/_rtag tu rnam par rtog pa med par chos la spyod pa/_chos kyi [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa thams cad rab tu rtogs pa/_
[\[308a.6\]]chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis zhi bar dmigs pa 'jig rten thams cad shin tu zhi bas/_gnas tha dad pa med pa la rab tu gzhol ba/_'jig rten tha dad pa thams cad du rab tu zhugs pa/_gnas med par zhing thams cad du 'dong ba/_chos kyi gnas 
[\[308a.7\]]thams cad la brten pa med par chos thams cad bla gab med pa'i gzhal med khang du phyin pa/_'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba la zhugs pa sems can thams cad la bde ba'i lam ston pa/_ye shes dang rnam par thar pa shin tu 
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]'phags pa'i gnas kyi spyod yul can/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa/_srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa/_'gro ba thams cad la yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par ston pa/_chos rgya mtsho shes 
[\[308b.2\]]rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor can/_ting nge 'dzin gang chen mtsho dang ldan pa'i dbyings la shin tu mnyam par bzhag cing /_snying rje chen po rab tu sems pa/_chos kyi tshul sgyu ma'i rnam pa 'di lta bu rab tu rtogs pa/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rmi lam lta 
[\[308b.3\]]bur zhugs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba thams cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud pa/_sgra skad dang dbyangs thams cad sgra brnyan lta bur rnam par rig pa/_chos thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes sprul pa lta bu rab tu rtogs pa/_khyad par du 
[\[308b.4\]]'phags pa'i smon lam shin tu bstsags pa/_ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas dag pa'i mkhas pa dang ldan pa/_sems shin tu zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa gzungs kyi rgyud thams cad kyi yul dang ldan pa/_ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs 
[\[308b.5\]]kyis dogs pa med par kun nas rab tu gnon pa chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas kyi mthar phyin pa'i mig dang ldan pa/_chos thams cad la dmigs pa med par rnam par spyod pa rab tu thob pa shes rab rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la rnam par spyod pa/_ye shes kyi pha rol tu 
[\[308b.6\]]phyin pa'i pha rol tu song ba/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dang /_shugs thob pa/_rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbang du gyur pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don 
[\[308b.7\]]mkhas pa la phyin ci log med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/_chos kyi mdzod dbye ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa/_nges pa'i tshig shes pa la mngon par mkhas pa/_spobs pa'i stobs dang /_chos kyi sprin zad [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa dang ldan pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'jigs pas khyu mchog dang 
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]seng ge'i nga ro 'byin pa/_gnas med pa'i chos kyi dga' ba la dga' bas mos pa/_chos thams cad la rab rib [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]gis lta ba/_'jig rten thams cad kyi 'byung ba dang /_'jig pa shes pa'i zla bar gyur pa/_
[\[309a.2\]]shes rab kyi dkyil 'khor gyis bden pa'i tshul thams cad la rnam par spyod pa'i 'od zer can/_ye shes kyi rdo rje bsod nams kyi khor yug tu gyur pa/_dper bya ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/_chos thams cad la dbang po dang ye shes kyi myu gu rab tu 
[\[309a.3\]]skyes pa/_dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa/_bdud thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu snyol ba la dpa' ba ye shes mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzi brjid can/_'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_chos 
[\[309a.4\]]thams cad la shes rab sgrib pa med par zad pa dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa'i mtha'i ye shes kyis rnam par sangs rgyas pa/_yang dag pa'i mtha'i kun gyi mthar phyin pa la gnas pa/_mtshan ma med pa la rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi [{]myig [,]mig [}]mngon sum can/_
[\[309a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i rgyu la mkhas pa/[ {]myi [,]mi [}]gnyis pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad la rnam par lta ba/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud gnas [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la thams cad du gzugs 
[\[309a.6\]]brnyan snang bar gyur pa/_chos thams cad la mun pa dang rnam par bral ba ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mun pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la rab tu zhugs pa/_phyogs kun tu chos kyi snang ba rab tu bkye ba/_'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing mchog tu gyur pa/_
[\[309a.7\]]thos pa dang mthong ba dang /_smon lam don yod pa'i zla ba/_bsod nams kyi ri rab 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/_phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad tshar gcod pa la shin tu dpa' ba/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sgra 
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]skad dang dbyangs kyi nga ro 'byin pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mthong bas [{]myi [,]mi [}]ngoms pa/_sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi dbang bsgyur ba dang ldan pa/_'gro ba gdul ba dang mthun pa'i lus su byin gyis rlob pa/_zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad du lus 
[\[309b.2\]]gcig gis rgyas par 'gengs pa/_mngon par 'du bya ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa/_thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gro ba'i ye shes chen po'i theg pa'i gru dang ldan pa/_ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus rab tu snang 
[\[309b.3\]]ba/_ye shes kyi nyi ma 'gro ba thams cad du shar ba/_'gro ba thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dga' ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang /_dbang po rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can/_chos thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i yul 
[\[309b.4\]]khong du chud pa/_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin skye ba med pa rnam par rig pa phra ba dang yangs pa phan tshun du yongs su bsdu ba la dbang bsgyur ba sangs rgyas kyis zab mo'i tshul nges par rtogs pa/_don zab mo'i tshig dang /_yi ge'i tha snyad la mkhas pa/_tshig 
[\[309b.5\]]dang yi ge dang /_don [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa rab tu brjod pa/_mdo sde rgya mtsho thams cad tshig gcig tu chud par rab tu ston pa/_gzungs dang ye shes kyi lus rgya chen po byin gyis rlob pa/_bskal pa mtha' yas par yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs dang ldan pa'i byin gyi 
[\[309b.6\]]rlabs can/_sems kyi skad cig gcig gis bskal pa brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]par gnas pa/_rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can/_sems kyi skad cig gcig gis dus gsum shes pas/_'jig rten thams cad mngon par shes pa/_chos kyi gzungs 
[\[309b.7\]]kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa dran zhing spobs pa 'gro ba thams cad kyis ye shes par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa/_sangs rgyas kyi yul la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa/_gya nom par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]la rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa/_chags pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i mtha'i chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mngon par mkhas pa/_chos thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul la ye shes kyis rnam par rtse 
[\[310a.2\]]ba/_dmigs pa thams cad rgyan bzang por byin gyis rlob pa/_chos kyi dbyings phyogs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la phyogs kyi rjes su 'brang bas rab tu zhugs pa phyogs thams cad rnam par dbye ba chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par gzhol ba shin tu phra ba ste/_yangs pa'i rdul shin tu 
[\[310a.3\]]phra ba la byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba/_rang bzhin kha dog [{]myed [,]med [}]pa las kha dog thams cad yongs su ston pa/_phyogs gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba de lta bu'i yon tan dang ye shes mtha' yas pas yang dag par bskyed de/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi 
[\[310a.4\]]snying po dang ldan par gyur pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa bsngags pa bkur ba tshig dang yi ge [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pas yon tan dang legs pa brjod du yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dze ta'i tshal du 'dus te/_'khod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho 
[\[310a.5\]]la 'jug pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis rab tu snang bar gyur pa/_de dag gi lus thams cad dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i stan de dag dang /_dze ta'i tshal 
[\[310a.6\]]thams cad nas kyang /_dga' ba chen po'i shugs rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos snang ba bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa rab tu thob pas dga' ba'i shugs las byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i rgyan mngon par 'thon nas/_chos kyi 
[\[310a.7\]]dbyings thams cad rgyas pa khyab par gyur to/_/'di lta ste sems kyi skad cig re re la 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin shin tu yangs pa/_'gro ba thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa mngon par 'thon te/_phyogs bcu rgyas pa khyab par gyur to/_/rin po che 
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i sprin mngon par 'thon te/_dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i sprin gyi nga ro rjes su bsgrags pas phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/_/[{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa thams cad las 'gro ba thams cad rol 
[\[310b.2\]]mo'i sprin mngon par 'thon te/_sems can thams cad kyi las dang rnam par smin pa rol mo'i sgra snyan par blang bas rjes su sgrog cing phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 
[\[310b.3\]]sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa'i tshul gyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sgra dbyangs rab tu sgrog pas phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa dang /_rnam par 
[\[310b.4\]]'phrul ba'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dbyangs rjes su rjod cing /_phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par brgyan 
[\[310b.5\]]pa'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/_zhing thams cad du 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba gcig nas/_gcig tu brgyud pa rab tu brjod cing phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/_/dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i snying po byang chub 
[\[310b.6\]]kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyan byung ba yongs su ston cing /_phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/_/[{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa thams cad las klu'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon 
[\[310b.7\]]nas/_spos sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bebs shing phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/_/'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po'i lus dang 'dra ba'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa byed cing /_
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/_/zhing yongs su dag pa rin po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mngon par ston cing /_
[\[311a.2\]]phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to/_/de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byin gyi rlabs dang /_chos snang ba rgya mtsho bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid kyis rgyan chen po rnam par sprul pa'i sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]
[\[311a.3\]]pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa de dag yongs su ston pa byed cing phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras 
[\[311a.4\]]so/_/dze ta'i tshal du sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs/_/mtha' yas rgya chen yongs su byung la ltos/_/dmigs pa kun las lus kyi sprin chen rnams/_/mngon par mthon cing phyogs rnams kun tu khyab/_/bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi sna tshogs rgyan/_/
[\[311a.5\]]kha dog mtha' yas rgya chen rnam dag pa/_/stan dang [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa yongs su bcas pa la/_/de dag thams cad gzugs brnyan 'byung ba snang /_/rgyan rnams sna tshogs rin chen 'od 'phro'i sprin/_/bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi spu rtse las/_/sangs 
[\[311a.6\]]rgyas gsung rnams rab tu sgrog byed cing /_/zhing rnams kun gyi dbyings su khyab par 'phro/_/tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gzugs 'dra lus rnams dang /_/spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dag pa'i gzugs/_/zhing gi me tog kun las mngon 'thon te/_/bsam gtan yan 
[\[311a.7\]]lag brjod cing kun tu 'dong /_/kun tu bzang po 'dra ba'i rgyal ba'i sras/_/mtshan rab dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i lus/_/grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]bsam yas bde gshegs ba spu las/_/sprul pa de 'dra thogs pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'byung /_/bde gshegs sras po dus 
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]gsum byung ba rnams/_/yon tan rgya mtsho'i legs pa brjod pa dag_/rgya mtsho che mnyam rgyan sprin de dag kun/_/dze ta'i tshal na gnas shing rab tu brjod/_/phyogs rnams kun gyi sems can yongs kyi las/_/rgya mtsho chen po sna tshogs ma lus par/_/dze
