[\[311b.2\]]ta'i tshal gyi shing gi gzugs rnams kyi/_gseb nas byung bar gyur pa kun tu grag_/dus gsum byung ba'i rgyal ba thams cad kyi/_/zhing rnams kun gyi ma lus rnam 'phrul ba/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed de dag kyang /_/so so'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]
[\[311b.3\]]kyis dmigs par gyur pa snang /_/sangs rgyas phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i sprin/_/spu rtse re rer sna tshogs rnam phye ba'i/_/sangs rgyas gnas rnams skad cig re rer snang /_/de dag la yang sangs rgyas sprin mang bzhugs/_/'gro dang mnyam par 
[\[311b.4\]]phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing /_/sems can thabs kyis yongs su smin par byed/_/de dag 'od las spos kyi 'od 'phro dang /_me tog phal chen rgya mtsho'i sprin kyang 'byung /_/mkha' ltar tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]rin chen gzhal med khang /_/ma lus rgyan rab kun 
[\[311b.5\]]gyis rnam mdzes pa/_/de dag thams cad phyogs rnams kun khyab byed/_/zhing dang snying po byang chub de bzhin no/_/dus gsum byung ba'i rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis/_/kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i rnam tshul du/_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par dag byas pa'i/_/
[\[311b.6\]]rgyan rab sna tshogs 'gro ltar tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_/phyogs rnams dus gsum kun tu gang byung rnams/_/bskal pa rgya mtsho chen por rnam sbyangs pa/_/de dag kun kyang dze ta'i nags tshal gyi/_/bar snang mkha' la gzugs brnyan tshul du snang /_/de nas 
[\[311b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis/_rgyud shin tu snang bar byas pa de dag las/_byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang /_snying rje chen po'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du zhugs par gyur nas/_de dag de bas 
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]kyang 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang /_yongs su bsdu ba'i don du zhugs par gyur te/_de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa de dag gi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang /_'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par 'thon pa 
[\[312a.2\]]gyur te/_'od zer de dag gi sgo re re nas kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'phrul ba'i sprin 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad dang 'dra ba'i lus dang /_'gro ba thams cad la mngon par lta ba'i lus dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_'phrod pa'i 
[\[312a.3\]]lus dang ldan pa mngon par 'thon te/_mngon par 'thon nas kyang /_phyogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bkang nas/_sems can thams cad yang dag par bskul zhing yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul bar byed do/_/lha'i gnas na shi 'pho ba yongs su 
[\[312a.4\]]bstan pa'i sgo dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /_rmi lam yongs su bstan pa'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis 
[\[312a.5\]]sems can yongs su bskul ba byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyis byung ba'i sgo dang /_'jig rten gyi khams yongs su bskyod pa'i sgo dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[312a.6\]]thams cad kyi yon tan la nan tan du bya ba dang /_rab tu bsgrub pa'i sgo dang /_yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /_
[\[312a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi lam gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba rab tu brjod pa'i sgo dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i phyir/_
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]chos kyi tshig dang yi ge re re'i phyir/_lus grangs med pa yongs su gtang ba yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro zhing chos thams cad yongs su dri ba'i sgo dang /_dus la ji ltar 'bab pa dang /_bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro 
[\[312b.2\]]ba'i drung du 'gro zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par 'gyur ba thob par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho snang ba'i rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par bya ba'i sgo dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bdud dang /_phas kyi rgol bas [{]myi [,]mi [}]tshugs pa'i stobs 
[\[312b.3\]]kyi rgyal mtshan yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /_bzo thams cad shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /_'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags par shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo 
[\[312b.4\]]dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i khyad par shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la 'jug pa'i thabs kyis nyon mong pa dang /_bag chags sna tshogs yang dag par gzhom pa 
[\[312b.5\]]la shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang /_de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba'i thabs dang bsdu ba'i sgo/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis byang chub 
[\[312b.6\]]sems dpa' de dag sems can thams cad kyi gnas su phyin par snang ste/_la la ni lha'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo /_/la la ni klu'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo /_/la la ni gnod sbyin gyi gnas su phyin par snang ngo /_/la la ni dri za'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo /_/la 
[\[312b.7\]]la ni lha ma yin gyi gnas su phyin par snang ngo /_/la la ni nam mkha' lding gi gnas su phyin par snang ngo /_/la la ni mi 'am ci'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo /_/la la ni lto 'phye chen po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo /_/la la ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo /_/
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]la la ni mi'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo /_/la la ni gshin rje'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo /_/la la ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi gnas thams cad du phyin par snang ngo /_/la la ni sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten thams cad du phyin par snang ngo /_/la 
[\[313a.2\]]la ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas kyi rgyud thams cad du phyin par snang ste/_mthong bas 'dul ba'i sems can dang /_thos pas 'dul ba dang rjes su dran pas 'dul ba dang /_dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba dang /[ {]mying [,]ming [}]gi chu klung gi sgras 'dul ba dang /_
[\[313a.3\]]'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba dang /_'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu dgye bas 'dul ba dang /_sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba'i phyir snying rje chen po tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa dang smon lam tha mi dad pa dang ye shes tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa 
[\[313a.4\]]dang /_sems can yongs su bsdu ba tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa' de dag dze ta'i tshal nas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad dang /_sems can gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad du 
[\[313a.5\]]rgyas par 'gengs par byed par snang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo ste/_la la ni rang gi gnas dang khang pa brtsegs pa dang /_stan dang 'khor dang bcas pas/_phyogs bcu rgyas par byed par snang yang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[313a.6\]]zhabs kyi drung nas [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo'o/_/la la ni sprul pa'i sprin rab tu 'gyed par snang ngo /_/la la ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du gcig pu gnyis su [{]myed [,]med [}]par 'gro bar snang yang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo'o/_/
[\[313a.7\]]la la ni dge sbyong gi gzugs/_la la ni tshangs pa'i gzugs/_/la la ni brtul zhugs can thams cad kyi cha byad dang /_cho ga dang chu zheng gi gzugs/_la la ni sman pa'i gzugs/_la la ni tshong pa'i gzugs/_la la ni snyan pas 'tsho ba'i gzugs/_la la 
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]ni gar mkhan gyi gzugs/_la la ni lha khyer ba'i gzugs/_la la ni bzo thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugs su grong dang grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_khams dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du phyin par snang ste/_dus kyi dbang gis dus kyi rjes su 
[\[313b.2\]]'brang zhing [{]mying [,]ming [}]dang gzugs dang lus mngon par bsgrub pa tha dad pa dang /_lus kyi kha dog dang dbyibs tshul dang 'dra ba dang dbyangs rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_skad rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_spyod lam rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_gnas rnam pa tha dad pas byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[313b.3\]]spyod pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad [{]myig [,]mig [}]'phrul lta bur shes pa dang /_bzo'i 'khor thams cad rab tu brjod pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi shes pa brjod pas snang ba'i sgron ma dang /_bde ba thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis brgyan pa dang /_las thams 
[\[313b.4\]]cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa dang /_phyogs thams cad theg pa la gnas pas rab tu sbyong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba la spyod cing /_sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba'i 
[\[313b.5\]]don du grong dang grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang ljongs dang /_khams dang /_rgyal po'i gnas dag du phyin par snang ngo /_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa na 'dug 'dug pa las skal ba mthun pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[313b.6\]]dpa' de dag dang /_rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lag na rdo rje dag dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyi nyams blta ba la brtson zhing sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur bar smon pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha dag dang /_sngon gyi smon 
[\[313b.7\]]lam gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rkang gis 'gro ba'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha dag dang /_chos mnyan pa la mngon par mos pa'i sa'i lha dag dang /_snying rje chen po la brtson pa'i lu ma dang /_mtsho dang mtshe'u dang /_rdzing bu dang khron pa dang /_chu klung 
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]gi lha dag dang /_shes rab kyi 'od snang bas rab tu gsal ba'i me'i lha dag dang /_rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa'i rlung gi lha dag dang /_chos kyi phyogs snang ba khong du chud pa'i phyogs kyi lha dag dang /_ma rig pa'i mun pa 
[\[314a.2\]]bsal ba la brtson pa'i mtshan mo'i lha dag dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson pa'i nyi ma'i lha dag dang /_chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi nam mkha' brgyan pa la brtson pa'i nam mkha'i lha dag dang /_'gro ba thams cad srid 
[\[314a.3\]]pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar brtson pa'i gang chen mtsho'i lha dag dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du tshogs yang dag par bstsags pa la brtson zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i spo mngon par 'phags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i ri'i lha dag dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi 
[\[314a.4\]]lus brgyan par brtson zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kha dog dang byin gyi rlabs la smon cing brtson pa'i chu klung gi lha dag dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi grong rdal yongs su bskyang bar brtson pa'i grong gi lha dag dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i 
[\[314a.5\]]chos kyi grong khyer du smon cing mos pa'i klu'i dbang po dag dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dag dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba la brtson pa'i dri za'i dbang 
[\[314a.6\]]po dag dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog pa la brtson pa'i grul bum gyi dbang po dag dang /_sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho nas gdon pa'i smon lam gyis zhugs pa'i nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dag dang /_'jig rten thams cad 
[\[314a.7\]]las 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang /_stobs yongs su bsgrub par smon lam yongs su bskyed pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po dag dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas dga' bar gyur cing /_lus rab tu 'dud pa'i lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag 
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]dang /_'khor ba las skyo ba'i yid dang ldan zhing ngor blta ba'i lha'i dbang po dag dang /_rim gro chen po rab tu byed cing lus rab tu 'dud pa'i tshangs pa'i dbang po dag dang /_lhan cig tu de dag gis rim gro chen pos mngon par bstod de mchod cing /_de lta bu'i byang chub 
[\[314b.2\]]sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par rang gi gnas nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba lan brgya phrag du ma zhig tu byas nas/_mchod pa rnam pa du mas mchod de/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung 
[\[314b.3\]]nas/_lho phyogs logs su yul rgyu zhing song ngo //_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po nyi shu bdun pa/_de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/_
[\[314b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bas/_dze ta'i tshal nas byung ste/_lho phyogs logs su 'gro ba mthong nas/_de 'di snyam du gyur te/_bdag kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig tu yul rgyu zhing 'gro'o snyam nas/_
[\[314b.5\]]de dge slong drug cu tsam gyis bskor cing mdun du byas te/_rang gi gnas nas byung nas/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang 
[\[314b.6\]]ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung ste/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dge slong lhan cig tu spyod pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon par gsar du zhugs pa sha stag ste/_'di 
[\[314b.7\]]ltar dge slong rgya mtsho'i blo dang /_legs par byin pa chen po dang /_bsod nams kyi 'od dang /_bu chen po dang kun khyab sbyin pa dang /_rnam dag spyod pa dang /_lha'i dpal dang /_dbang po'i blo gros dang /_tshangs pa'i dam pa dang /_dge slong zhi ba'i blo gros dang /_de dag la 
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i dge slong drug cu tsam kun kyang /_sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_mos pa zab mor gyur pa/_dad pa'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]yongs su dag pa/_sems rgya chen pos yongs su spyod pa/_sangs rgyas kyi phyogs 
[\[315a.2\]]rnam par blta ba la mthu yod pa/_chos kyi ngo bo nyid dang /_rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_gzhan la phan par gyur pa'i blo can/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la mngon par mos pa/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos bstan pas 
[\[315a.3\]]'dul ba sha stag dang 'grogs shing mdun du byas te sngon du bdar nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus de ltar lam du zhugs te/_'dong ba'i tshe dge slong de dag kun la bltas nas/_dge slong rgya 
[\[315a.4\]]mtsho'i blo la smras pa/_rgya mtsho'i blo byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par brgyan cing /_yongs su dag pa/_lha dang mir bcas pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa dang /_'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag cing sems can tshad 
[\[315a.5\]{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i dga' ba yongs su skyed pa dang /_'od zer gyi dra ba'i rgyan sems can dpag tu [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /_'khor phun sum tshogs pa sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bzung ba dang /_lam gyi rgyan 'gro na lam [{]myig [,]mig [}{]mangs [,]mang [}]ris su 
[\[315a.6\]]gnas pa dang lam rnam par gnon pa'i rgyan phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la mngon par lta bar gnas pa dang /_bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyan g.yas g.yon nas gter chen po mngon par 'thon pa dang sngon gyi sangs rgyas la rim gro byas pa'i dge ba'i 
[\[315a.7\]]rtsa ba dang rgyu mthun pas/_shing gi gseb thams cad nas rgyan mang po 'byung ba dang /_'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad la mchod pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs shing btud de phyag 'tshal ba dang /_phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'od 
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mang po bkye ba/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu sgrog cing spyi bor 'char ba la ltos shig ces de dag la sogs pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lam du zhugs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan tshad med pa dag_/
[\[315b.2\]]dge slong de dag la yongs su bstan to/_/brjod do bshad do/_/smos so/_/bkrol lo/_/rab tu brjod do/_/rnam par phye'o/_/gsal bar byas so/_/de ltar gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i yon tan ci tsam ci tsam du brjod pa de tsam de tsam du dge slong de 
[\[315b.3\]]dag gi sems rnam par dag par gyur to/_/dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar gyur to/_/mos pa skyes par gyur to/_/de dag gi sems kyi rgyud las su rung bar gyur to/_/dbang po rab tu dang bar gyur to/_/yid bde ba rnam par 'phel bar gyur to/_/
[\[315b.4\]]yid [{]myi [,]mi [}]bde ba rab tu byang bar gyur to/_/sems kyi skyon dang bral bar gyur to/_/sgrib pa thams cad phyir ldog par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas blta ba la mngon par mos par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos la sems rab tu gzhol bar gyur to/_/byang chub sems 
[\[315b.5\]]dpa'i dbang po yongs su dag par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i shugs skyes par gyur to/_/snying rje chen po byung bar gyur to/_/pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor gnon par gyur to/_/snying rje chen po yongs su skyes par gyur to/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs 
[\[315b.6\]]rgyas rgya mtsho yongs su snang bar gyur to/_/de ltar de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos pa'i shugs thob par gyur nas 'di skad 'dzer to/_/mkhan po bdag cag kyang skyes bu dam pa de'i drung du phyin par mdzad du gsol zhes nas/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 
[\[315b.7\]]dge slong de dag dang 'grogs te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der song nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal dge slong 'di dag ni khyod la blta bar 'dod pa dag go_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag dang /_'khor 
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i phyogs de tsam dang bcas par glang po'i lta stangs kyi gzi dang ldan par khyab par bltas pa dang /_de'i rjes la dge slong de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_thal mo sbyar 
[\[316a.2\]]te 'di skad ces smras so/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod mthong ba dang /_khyod la phyag 'tshal ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dang bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan khyod kyis mkhyen pa dang /_mkhan pos thugs su chud pa dang /_gang yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[316a.3\]]shAkya thub pas mngon du gzigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des/_khyod ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar gyur te/_rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i lus thob par shog shig_/rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i dbyangs dang /_rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i mtshan dang /_'di lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang khyod ji lta ba bzhin 
[\[316a.4\]]du thob par shog shig ces dge slong de dag gis de skad du smras pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dge slong dag yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen 
[\[316a.5\]]po la zhugs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa lta smos kyang ci smos kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yang gnon par 'gyur ro/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad blta ba dang /_bsnyen bkur ba dang /_mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba la 
[\[316a.6\]]yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bstsags pa las phyir mi ldog cing yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /_chos thams cad btsal ba la yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[316a.7\]]pa thams cad sbyor ba la yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa la yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /_dus gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du 'jug pa la 
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho rgyas par dgang zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la/_yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /_sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba la 
[\[316b.2\]]yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /_zhing dang bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyar bas sems 
[\[316b.3\]]can gcig yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshul du sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya bas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gcig yongs su bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa'o/_/dge slong dag yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu 
[\[316b.4\]]po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/'khor ba'i rgyud thams cad las phyir ldog par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad las gyen du 
[\[316b.5\]]'phags par 'gyur ro/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad las yongs su 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam la yang dag par 
[\[316b.6\]]'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan gyi nan tan la rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs la yang 
[\[316b.7\]]dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad rab tu 'dul bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang shin tu nye bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas dge slong de 
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]dag gis chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas/_sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par mthong ba la chags pa med pa'i mig gi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/_/de'i mthus phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[317a.2\]]khams na bzhugs pa'i/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi 'gro ba'i rgyud du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma lus pa mthong bar gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can 
[\[317a.3\]]rnams kyang ma lus par mthong bar gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang rnam par phye ba sna tshogs su mthong bar gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag na rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu shes par gyur to/_/
[\[317a.4\]]sems can de dag gi rin po che'i gnas dang /_longs spyod de dag kyang mthong bar gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho yang thos par gyur to/_/chos bstan pa de dag kyang tshig dang yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig dang skad dang ming 
[\[317a.5\]]dang brdas yongs su shes par gyur to/_/sems can de dag gi sems dang dbang po dang bsam pa la yang rnam par lta bar gyur to/_/sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i tshe rabs bcu yang rjes su dran par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi 
[\[317a.6\]]chos kyi 'khor lo bcu'i nges pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/_/bstan pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu 
[\[317a.7\]]zhugs par gyur to/_/rjes su bstan pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur te/_ting nge 
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]'dzin de thob ma thag tu/_byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag stong phrag bcu yang yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/_/ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu yang yongs su non par gyur to/_/pha rol tu phyin pa'i yan lag stong phrag bcu yang rnam par dag par gyur te/_snang ba 
[\[317b.2\]]chen po rab tu thob cing shes rab chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi snang bar gyur pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bcu rab tu thob par gyur to/_/de ltar mngon par shes pa'i myu gu gzhon zhing shin tu phra ba thob ste/_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa brtan 
[\[317b.3\]]pa la gnas pa de dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul nas rab tu bkod do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la rab tu gnas pa de dag smon lam chen po rgya 
[\[317b.4\]]mtsho la zhugs shing mngon par sgrub par gyur to/_/de ltar smon lam chen po rgya mtshos mngon par bsgrub pa'i sems rnam par dag pas lus yongs su dag pa rab tu thob par gyur to/_/lus rnam par dag pas lus yang pa rab tu thob par gyur to/_/
[\[317b.5\]]de ltar lus rnam par dag pa dang lus yang bas mngon par shes pa'i sgo de dag shin tu yangs par byed pas/_mi nyams shing rjes su 'brang ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob par gyur to/_/mngon par shes pa de thob pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i 
[\[317b.6\]]rkang pa'i drung nas kyang mi g.yo la/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir phyogs bcur yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i 'phrin las kyi sprin mngon par bsgrub par gyur to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/_
[\[317b.7\]]dge slong de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod nas mthar gyis yul rgyu zhing lho phyogs logs su skyid pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i grong rdal chen po gang na ba der logs su song ste/_phyin nas grong rdal chen po skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi shar/_
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]phyogs logs na nags tshal chen po sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan ces bya ba sngon gyi sangs rgyas bzhugs bzhugs pa'i mchod rten sems can smin par mdzad pa'i don du/_de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa/_zhing 
[\[318a.2\]]mtha' yas par ming gi sgra rjes su grags pa/_sngon cad bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe/_yongs su gtang bar dka' ba du ma yongs su btang ba ste/_sa'i phyogs de na lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' 
[\[318a.3\]]lding dang /_mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod pa la brtson pa'i gnas yod pa der 'khor dang bcas te phyin nas der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/_mdo sde chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rab tu snang ba 
[\[318a.4\]]zhes bya ba mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu 'byung ba bstan to/_/de bstan pa'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po nas klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma nye bar lhags te/_de dag gis chos kyi tshul de thos nas/_klu'i rgyud la rnam par smod cing /_de bzhin 
[\[318a.5\]]gshegs pa'i yon tan la mos par gyur nas klu'i rgyud rnam par bzlog ste/_lha dang mir skye ba yongs su 'dzin par gyur nas/_der klu stong phrag bcu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/chos de bstan pa'i tshe 
[\[318a.6\]]sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa/_theg pa gsum gyis dus gzhan dang gzhan du rnam par dul bar gyur to/_/de nas skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi mi rnams kyis/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal 
[\[318a.7\]]du phyin te/_sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi mchod rten gyi gzhi 'di nyid na rnam par spyod do zhes thos nas/_dge bsnyen tshong dpon shes rab chen po la sogs pa/_dge bsnyen pa dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_khye'u dang bu mo mang po dag so so nas 
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya dang bcas te/_skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal nas byung nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong ngo /_/de la dge bsnyen shes rab chen po ni dge bsnyen bzang pos byin dang /_lhas byin dang /_bsod nams 'od dang /_grags pa'i lha dang 
[\[318b.2\]]grags pas byin dang /_zla ba'i dpal dang /_zla ba dga' bo dang /_blo gros bzang po dang /_blo gros chen po dang /_sgra gcan bzang po dang /_dge bsnyen bzang po'i dpal dang /_de dag la sogs pa dge bsnyen lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/_'jam 
[\[318b.3\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de la dge bsnyen 
[\[318b.4\]]ma shes rab chen mo ni/_dge bsnyen ma 'od bzang mo dang /_lus bzang mo dang /_dge ba yod pa dang /_dge ba'i dpal dang /_zla ba'i 'od dang /_dpal gyi 'od dang /_dpal bzang mo dang /_dge bsnyen ma mig bzang mo dang /_de dag la 
[\[318b.5\]]sogs pa dge bsnyen ma lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba 
[\[318b.6\]]byas nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de la tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ni/_tshong dpon gyi bu brtul zhugs bzang po dang /_tshul khrims bzang po dang /_ngang tshul bzang po dang /_rnam par gnon pa bzang po dang /_bsam pa bzang po dang /_blo gros bzang po 
[\[318b.7\]]dang /_blo bzang po dang /_mig bzang po dang /_lag pa bzang po dang /_tshong dpon gyi bu 'od bzang po dang /_de dag la sogs pa tshong dpon gyi bu lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de la khyim bdag shes rab chen po'i bu mo dge ba bzang mo ni bu mo bzang mo dang /_yid 
[\[319a.2\]]du 'ong ba'i bzhin dang /_brtan pa'i blo gros dang /_dpal bzang mo dang /_tshangs pas byin dang /_dpal gyi 'od dang /_bu mo 'od bzang mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/_'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[319a.3\]]nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal nas skyes pa dang /_bud 
[\[319a.4\]]med dang khye'u dang bu mo de dag 'dus te/_'khod par shes nas bsam pa ji lta bzhin du bstan pa'i byin gyi zil gyis mnan te byams pa chen po'i byin gyis tshim par byas nas/_snying rje chen po'i byin gyis chos bstan pa mngon par bsgrubs te/_ye shes kyi 
[\[319a.5\]]byin gyis sems dang bsam pa rnam par phye nas/_so so yang dag par rig pa chen pos chos bstan par dga' ste/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la bltas so/_/tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]shes bya ba ci'i phyir nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]shes bya zhe na/_tshong dpon 
[\[319a.6\]]gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba de thog ma ma'i mngal du zhugs ma thag tu khyim de'i 'khor kun nas rnam par phye ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyi sdong po 'thon par gyur to/_/rin po che'i sdong po de dag gi 'og na rin po che'i gter bdun yod de/_gser dang dngul dang bai DUr+ya dang /_
[\[319a.7\]]shel dang mu tig dmar po dang /_a sma gar b+ha dang /_mu sa ra galpa dang /_rin po che de bdun gyi rin po che'i sdong po de dag kyang gter de dag nas skyes te/_sa'i gzhi brtol nas mngon par 'thon par gyur to/_/de yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su 
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]rdzogs te/_zla ba bcu lon nas btsas pa dang /_de'i tshe gter chen po bdun po de dag kyang chu zheng dang rngams su khru bdun tsam du sa'i steng nas mngon par 'phags te/_snang bar byung nas rnam par snang zhing mdzes par gyur to/_/khyim der rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod 
[\[319b.2\]]lnga brgya yang byung bar gyur te/_'di ltar mar gyi snod dang /_til mar gyi snod dang sbrang rtsi'i snod dang mar sar gyi snod dang /_gzhan dag kyang so so nas yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba dag ste/_'di ltar rdo rje'i snod spos sna tshogs kyis yongs su 
[\[319b.3\]]gang ba dang /_spos kyi snod gos sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang /_man shel gyi snod kha zas dang /_spyan gzigs sna tshogs ro mchog tu zhim pas yongs su gang ba dang /_nor bu'i snod rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang /_gser gyi snod 
[\[319b.4\]]dngul sil mas yongs su gang ba dang /_dngul gyi snod gser phyes yongs su gang ba dang phra men gyi snod nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Yas yongs su gang ba dang /_shel gyi snod mu sa ra gal pas yongs su gang ba dang /_mu sa ra gal pa'i snod rin po che shel gyi yongs su 
[\[319b.5\]]gang ba dang /_a sma gar b+ha'i snod mu tig dmar pos yongs su gang ba dang /_mu tig dmar po'i snod a sma gar b+has yongs su gang ba dang /_nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi snod nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gis yongs su gang ba dang /_nor bu rin po che chu 'dang 
[\[319b.6\]]gi snod nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyis yongs su gang ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa rin po che'i snod lnga brgya 'thon par gyur to/_/tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de btsas ma thag tu khyim dang bang ba dang mdzod thams cad du nor dang 'bru dang /_
[\[319b.7\]]dbyig dang /_gser dang rin po che sna tshogs kyi char mngon par bab par gyur to/_/de la bram ze'i ltas pa dang /_pha dang ma dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis 'di btsas ma thag tu nor mang po phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar gyur pas na/_nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]zhes de ltar ming du btags te/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas so/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o/_/mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan pa'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i bsam 
[\[320a.2\]]pa can no/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su sbyangs pa la rab tu brtson pa'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa la mngon par mos pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod du gyur pa'o/_/bsam pa'i nam mkha' 
[\[320a.3\]]yongs su dag pa'o/_/byang chub kyi sems chags pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la bltas te/_dga' ba'i gtam byas nas de la 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las 
[\[320a.4\]]kyang brtsams/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsdu zhing /_thob par bya ba las kyang brtsams/_sangs rgyas thams cad gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa las kyang brtsams/_sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa 
[\[320a.5\]]thams cad shes par bya ba las kyang brtsams/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang sprul pa'i rgyud las kyang brtsams/_sangs rgyas thams cad 
[\[320a.6\]]rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku yongs su grub pa las kyang brtsams/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rnam par phye ba las kyang brtsams/_sangs 
[\[320a.7\]]rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi brgyan rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid las kyang brtsams te/_chos kyang bstan par gyur to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/_tshong dpon 
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag chos dang mthun pa'i gtam gyis bstan te/_yang dag par bskul nas spro ba bskyed de/_dga' bar byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud de/_sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[320b.2\]]ba yongs su dran par byas nas/_skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal de'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan pas/_byin gyis brlabs te bde bar byas nas de nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[320b.3\]]gyur pa las rnam pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang /_che ba nyid thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos shing brtson pas phyi bzhin du 'brang ste/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad de mngon par bstod do/_/blo gros chen po 
[\[320b.4\]]mtha' yas spyod yul can/_/khyod kyi mthus ni sems can sman slad du/_/bdag kyang byang chub mchog tu zhugs par gyur/_/de la nges pa gang mchis bdag las gson/_/dga' ba'i chus bkang 'obs kyis kun nas bskor/_/nga rgyal dregs pa'i ra ba 
[\[320b.5\]]mtho bar brtsegs/_/sems can lam rgyud sgo rnams btsud cing gdangs/_/de 'dra'i khyim ni srid gsum ming ldan che/_/de ni gti mug ma rig gzings pas khebs/_/'dod chags zhe sdang me lces rab tu gdungs/_/rtag par bdud kyi dbang po'i 
[\[320b.6\]]dbang du gyur/_/de la byis pa ma rig rten kyang 'cha'/_/sred pa'i sgrog dang zhags pas shin tu glags/_/g.yo dang sgyu yi skyon gyis tho btsams shing /_/the tsom yid gnyis dag gis mig mdongs pa/_/log pa phyin phyogs lam la rab tu zhugs/_/
[\[320b.7\]]phrag dog ser sna'i thag pas btags shing bcings/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]byol song sems dmyal mi khom rgyu/_/rga shi na dang skye bas rab tu mnar/_/mgo rmongs lam rgyud 'khor lo kun tu 'khor/_/de la khyod ni thugs rje rnam dag pa'i/_/dkyil 'khor 
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]ye shes 'od zer snang ba mdzad/_/nyon mongs rgya mtsho bskam par shar te 'phags/_/nyi ma 'dra bas bdag la snang ba mdzod/_/byams pa bsgoms pas dkyil 'khor rdzogs shing nya/_/bsod nams zla 'od bde ba'i gzer 'gyed pa/_/
[\[321a.2\]]sems can kun gyi gnas su shar gyur gyi/_/zla ba nya ba lta bus bdag snang mdzod/_/dkar mthus thams cad yongs bstsags dkor mnga' zhing /_/chos dbyings mkha' la chags pa med mnga' ba/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen sngon 'dren pas/_/rgyal 
[\[321a.3\]]por gyur pas bdag la bstan du gsol/_/byang chub theg pa'i smon lam mthu mnga' ste/_/bsod nams ye shes shin tu yangs bstsags shing /_/sems can kun la phan pa'i don zhugs pa'i/_/ded dpon chen pos bdag kyang bskyang du gsol/_/bzod 
[\[321a.4\]]pa brtan zhing sra ba'i go mnabs te/_/ye shes bshan mnga' thugs rje'i phyag ring bas/_/bdud kyi dmag dpung tshogs rnams mngon gyur par/_/dpa' ba chen pos bdag gi bsel yang mdzod/_/chos kyi ri rab spo la brtan bzhugs shing /_/ting 'dzin 
[\[321a.5\]]mchog gi lha mos kun nas bskor/_/nyon mongs sgra gcan lha min 'dul mdzad pa/_/brgya byin gyur pas bdag kyang gzigs su gsol/_/byis pa'i gnas gyur khams gsum khang pa na/_/nyon mongs las rnams rnam par bsal ba mkhyen/_/rgyu yi 
[\[321a.6\]]sa dang lam rgyud 'khor rmongs par/_/me mar 'dra bas bdag kyang shul bstan gsol/_/ngan 'gro'i lam rnams rnam par zlog mdzad cing /_bde bar 'gro ba'i lam rnams rnam sbyong ba/_/'jig rten kun gyi lam gyi rgyud las 'das/_/bdag 
[\[321a.7\]]la'ang thar pa'i sgo ni bstan du gsol/_/rtag dang bdag dang bde bar 'du shes ldan/_/log 'dzin sgo re'i skyabs kyis gcad gyur kyis/_/bden pa'i ye shes spyan rno mchog mnga' bas/_/thar sgo bdag la'ang myur du dbye bar gsol/_/yang dag 
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]lag pa'i lam la mkhas gyur cing /_/lam gyi rgyus dang tshul la bsnyengs mi mnga'/_/lam rnams kun gyis 'dul ba thugs chud pa/_/bdag la byang chub shul ni bstan du gsol/_/yang dag lta ba'i sa yi thad la bzhugs/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan chab 
[\[321b.2\]]kyis bskrun/_/sangs rgyas chos legs me tog char 'bebs pa/_/byang chub shul ni bdag la bstan du gsol/_/rgyal ba gang 'das ma byon gang rnams dang /_/da ltar byung ba'i rgyal ba snang mdzad pa/_/sems can gtso bo legs par gshegs pa'i 
[\[321b.3\]]phyogs/_/de yang lam sgron mdzad pas bdag bstan gsol/_/las kyi 'khrul 'khor tshul la mi bsnyengs pa/_/chos theg shing rta'i 'khrul 'khor mkhyen gyur cing /_/ye shes theg pa'i tshul la rnam nges pa/_/byang chub theg pa bdag la bshad du 
[\[321b.4\]]gsol/_/mos shing smon pa'i 'khor lo mu khyud can/_/bzod pa rdo rje snying rje srog shing brtan/_/dad pa'i gnya' shing rin chen legs spras pa'i/_/byang chub theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/_/gzungs rnams kun gyi rnam dag dkyil 'khor 
[\[321b.5\]]can/_/byams pa brtsegs pa'i dga' bas rab brgyan pa/_/so so yang dag rig pa'i dril 'phring can/_/theg mchog bzang po bdag la bstan du gsol/_/tshangs pa'i spyod pa'i lam gyis mngon par brgyan/_/ting 'dzin bud med khrag khrig kun 
[\[321b.6\]]nas rgyu/_/chos kyi rnga yi dbyangs chen rab bsgrags pa/_/theg pa'i dam pa bdag la bstabs su gsol/_/bsdu ba bzhi yi mi zad mdzod ldan pa/_/ye shes rin chen yon tan phreng gis brgyan/_/khrel yod dul ba'i 'phreng bas mchog bsdams 
[\[321b.7\]]pa'i/_/theg pa'i dam pa bdag la bstan du gsol/_/sbyin pa'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor bzang po can/_/tshul khrims tsan dan snying rje'i byug ldan zhing /_/bzod pa'i gzer gyis mtshams rnams dam sbyar ba'i/_/theg pa'i mchog la myur du bdag 
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]bzhag gsol/_/sems can thams cad 'dul las mi ldog pa/_/bsam gtan ting 'dzin kha khyer mthor sgron cing /_/shes rab thabs gnyis 'byor mthun 'gro rgyu ba'i/_/chos kyi theg pa'i mchog la bdag bzhag gsol/_/
[\[322a.2\]]smon lam 'khor los lam gyi 'khor sbyong ba/_/chos kyi gzungs dam mthu brtan che ldan zhing /_/ye shes 'khrul 'khor legs sbyangs legs byas pa'i/_/chos kyi theg pa de la bdag skyon gsol/_/kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas rab sbyangs shing /_/sems 
[\[322a.3\]]can lta bas rgyu la thogs med pa/_/kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas gnon gyur pa'i/_/ye shes theg pas bdag la bsdud du gsol/_/de ni brtan pas rdo rje bzhin gnas pa/_/ye shes sgyu mas legs sbyangs legs byas shing /_/sgrib dang chags 
[\[322a.4\]]pa thams cad gcod pa yi/_/bzang po'i theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/_/'gro mnyam dri med shin tu yangs gyur pa/_/sems can thams cad skyob pas bde sgrub cing /_/chos dbyings shin tu rgya chen rnam snang ba'i/_/byang chub theg 
[\[322a.5\]]la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/_/sdug bsngal phung po rab 'byung gcod byed pa/_/nyon mongs las kyi rdul mang sbyong sel cing /_/bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba kun 'joms pa'i/_/chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/_/phyogs rnams kun tu ye shes 
[\[322a.6\]]rab snang ba/_/chos dbyings nam mkha' rnam par klubs byed cing /_/sems can kun gyi bsam pa rdzogs byed pa'i/_/chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/_/rnam dag mkha' ltar tshad med mi zad pa/_/sred dang ma rig lta ba'i skyon med cing /_/
[\[322a.7\]]sems can kun la phan par rab gnas pa'i/_/chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/_/rlung chen langs pa'i shugs kyi shugs ldan pas/_/smon lam mthu yis 'jig rten kun 'dzin cing /_/zhi ba'i gnas rab kun sar skyel byed pa'i/_/
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/_/sa chen bzhi yi stobs kyi stobs ldan pa/_/snying rje'i mthu dang shugs kyis khur khyer zhing /_/ye shes lo tog 'gro ba nyer 'tsho ba'i/_/theg pa'i mchog la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/_/nyi ma lta bur 
[\[322b.2\]]'gro ba nyer 'tsho zhing /_/bsdu ba rab yangs 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor can/_/gzungs kyi stobs mchog dag pa'i 'od bzang ba'i/_/ye shes nyi ma bdag la bstan tu gsol/_/bskal pa mang po du mar rab bslabs pas/_rgyu yi tshul dang su kun 
[\[322b.3\]]mkhas gyur pa/_/gang gis 'dus byas grong khyer gzhom 'gyur ba'i/_/shes brtan rdo rje 'phags pas bdag la stsal du gsol/_/sangs rgyas legs kun bslab pa phun sum gyis/_/ye shes rgya mtsho yangs pa gang zhig la/_/tshad med rgya 
[\[322b.4\]]mtsho'i blo mang bslab gyur pas/_/de legs ci 'dra 'phags pas bka' stsal gsol/_/gang na yang dag spyan mnga' khyod bzhugs shing /_/ye shes rgyal po'i cod pan legs brgyan te/_/chos kyi dbu thod dam pas dbu bcings pa'i/_/chos kyi 
[\[322b.5\]]rgyal po'i pho brang bdag kyang ston/_de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas glang po'i lta stangs kyis bltas te/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[322b.6\]]sems bskyed de/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang zhing byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod de/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dri bar bsam pa legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_
[\[322b.7\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen cing bsten pa dang /_rim gror bya ba 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su grub par 'gyur ba'i gzhi yin te 'di ni mthun pa'i rgyu yin gyis/_rigs kyi bu de bas na khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes bsnyen 
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]bkur bas yongs su ma skyo bar gyis shig_/nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]smras pa/_'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi/_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang 
[\[323a.2\]]chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsam par bgyi/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bgyi/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems 
[\[323a.3\]]dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyang bar bgyi/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa bgyi/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[323a.4\]]spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la lhag par dmigs par bgyi/_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyas par bgyi/_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpas kun tu 
[\[323a.5\]]bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba rgya cher bstan du gsol/_de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_/dge ba'i bsod nams gang chen mtsho/_/de ltar khyod ni nga 
[\[323a.6\]]yi drung du nyer phyin te/_/snying rje snying brtse rgya chen gyi/_/yid ldan byang chub dam pa tshol ba legs/_/'gro ba thams cad dgrol don du/_/spyod pa mtshungs med don du smon lam rab 'debs shing /_/'gro ba kun gyi skyabs 'gyur ba/_/byang chub sems 
[\[323a.7\]]dpa'i spyod pa tshul 'di yin/_/byang chub sems dpa'i brtan pa rnams/_/'khor ba'i nang na skyo med yid kyis spyod byed pa/_/de dag kun tu bzang po yi/_/spyod pa thub med chags med 'thob par 'gyur/_/bsod nams 'od can bsod nams 
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]dpal/_/de ltar khyod ni kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la/_/'gro la phan phyir smon byed pa/_/bsod nams rgya mtsho dge zhing dag pa'i mtshan/_/mtha' dang dbus [{]myed [,]med [}]tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sangs rgyas kun kyang mthong bar 'gyur/_/dran 
[\[323b.2\]]pa'i mthu dang stobs kyis kyang /_/de dag chos kyi sprin kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/_/de ltar khyod kyis phyogs bcu yi/_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun tu rgyal ba mthong nas kyang /_/byang chub spyod pa'i don gyi phyir/_/de dag kun la smon lam rgya mtsho 
[\[323b.3\]]dag byed 'gyur/_/'jig rten gtso la slob byed cing /_/gang rnams sangs rgyas sa la gnas ni bcas byas shing /_/'di tshul rgya mtshor zhugs gyur pa/_/de dag kun kyang thams cad gzigs par 'gyur/_/khyod ni 'byam klas zhing kun tu/_/bskal 
[\[323b.4\]]mang zhing rdul snyed du kun tu bzang po yi/_/spyod pa'i dam pa spyod byas shing /_/byang chub dam pa zhi ba 'thob par 'gyur/_/zhing rnams mtha' dang dbus med pa/_/ma lus kun tu bskal pa rgya mtshor spyad par gyis/_/kun tu bzang po'i spyod mchog phyir/_/
[\[323b.5\]]smon lam rgya chen yongs su rdzogs par byos/_/khyod ni smon lam thos gyur nas/_/sems can khrag khrig dga' ba yongs su skyes gyur cing /_/kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyis/_/byang chub mchog tu smon pa byed la ltos/_/de nas 'jam dpal 
[\[323b.6\]]gzhon nur gyur pas tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs 
[\[323b.7\]]su btsal bar sems pa legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de lta bu'i sems can yang rab tu dkon te/_de bas kyang gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]chub tu sems bskyed nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba de lta bu'i sems can ni ches dkon no/_rigs kyi bu de bas na byang chub sems dpas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir/_yang dag 
[\[324a.2\]]pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen las gdon mi za bar rtogs pa thob par gyis shig_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su btsal ba la yongs su skyo ba'i yid med par gyis shig_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba la ngoms pa med par gyis shig_/dge ba'i 
[\[324a.3\]]bshes gnyen gyis bstan pa la mthun par 'dzin par gyis shig_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa la khong khro ba med par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/_yul mi mo gya nom mchog ces bya ba yod de/_de na 
[\[324a.4\]]mgul legs pa zhes bya ba'i ri zhig yod pa de la/_dge slong sprin gyi dpal zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dang /_ji 
[\[324a.5\]]ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsam par bya ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bya ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_ji ltar yongs 
[\[324a.6\]]su dag par bya ba dang /_ji ltar 'jug par bya ba dang /_ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bya ba dang /_ji ltar rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /_ji ltar lhag par dmigs par bya ba dang /_ji ltar rgyas par bya ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas kun tu bzang po'i 
[\[324a.7\]]spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dris shig dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen des khyod la kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ston to/_/de nas tshang dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dga' rangs te/_mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba 
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]skyes nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_lan brgya stong du mar phyir bltas te/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid du 
[\[324b.2\]]'ong ba'i sems dang ldan pas/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi mthong ba mi bzod de/_gdong mchi mas gang bar du zhing 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]mthar gyis yul mi mo gya nom mchog ces bya ba der 
[\[324b.3\]]song ste phyin nas/_yul mi mo gya nom mchog nas rnam par brgyus te/_sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas byung zhing las rgya chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa'i longs spyod yid du 'ong ba la yongs su spyod cing ri mgul legs pa gang na ba der phyin nas/_mgul legs pa'i 
[\[324b.4\]]ri la 'dzegs te/_dge slong sprin gyi dpal la chos tshol zhing /_shar phyogs logs su byung ngo /_/de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_nub byang gi 
[\[324b.5\]]phyogs mtshams su yang byung ste/_bla 'og tu 'ang lta zhing dge slong sprin gyi dpal tshol tshol ba las des zhag bdun lon pa dang /_dge slong sprin gyi dpal ri rtse cig gi sman ljongs na 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas/_de dge slong sprin gyi dpal gang na ba der song 
[\[324b.6\]]ste/_dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_dge slong sprin gyi dpal la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/_mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa thugs su chud par mdzad du 
[\[324b.7\]]gsol/_bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]brtsam pa dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar 'jug par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar rjes su 'brang bar bgyi ba dang /_
[\[325a.2\]]ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar lhag par dmigs par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar rgyas par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[325a.3\]]'gyur ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags pa khyod ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang /_rjes su ston pa mdzad ces thos na/_'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba 
[\[325a.4\]]bdag la bstan du gsol/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing /_byang chub sems 
[\[325a.5\]]dpa'i spyod pa yongs su 'dri ba legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su btsal ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul yongs su btsal ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba rnam par dag pa 
[\[325a.6\]]yongs su btsal ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnam par dag pas yongs su btsal ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa rnam par dag 
[\[325a.7\]]pa yongs su btsal ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su bstan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba'i snying rje'i rgyud yongs su bstan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba 
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpas 'khor ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yongs su bstan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas kyi skyon dang /_'jigs pas mi gos pa'i rgyud yongs su btsal ba 'di ni dka'o/_/
[\[325b.2\]]shin tu dka'o/_/rigs kyi bu kho bo ni mos pa'i stobs kyi dbang gis mig gi blo gros dang /_dad pa'i mig rnam par dag pas kun tu mngon par lta ba'i ye shes kyi 'od snang ba/_phyin phyogs med pa dang /_yul kun la thogs pa med cing sgrib pa thams cad dang 
[\[325b.3\]]bral ba'i lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang /_mig gi yul kun nas yongs su dag pa'i lus rnam par dag pa dang /_phyogs kyi rgyud 'byam klas pa thams cad du mngon par 'dud pa'i lus kyis 'dud pa la mkhas pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin 
[\[325b.4\]]yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi stobs kyis phyogs kyi rgyud thams cad nas mngon du gzigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ste/_'di ltar shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas gnyis dang bcu dang /_sangs rgyas brgya 
[\[325b.5\]]dang /_sangs rgyas stong dang /_sangs rgyas brgya phrag stong dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba brgya dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba stong dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag stong dang /_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa/_
[\[325b.6\]]dpag tu med pa/_grangs med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa/_kun tu mtha' yas pas mtshams med pa/_gzhal du med pa/_brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul 
[\[325b.7\]]shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba bsnyed dang /_stong dang /_stong gnyis pa dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong 
[\[326a.2\]]gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin 
[\[326a.3\]]tu phra ba snyed dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ste/_shar phyogs logs su ji lta ba bzhin du/_lho phyogs dang nub phyogs 
[\[326a.4\]]dang /_byang phyogs dang /_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang bla'i phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang mthong ba nas/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[326a.5\]]pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ba'i bar du ste/_phyogs re rer rnam par bltas kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog sna tshogs mnga' ba dang /_dbyibs sna tshogs mnga' ba dang /_rnam par 
[\[326a.6\]]'phrul pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang /_khyu mchog gi mthu dang /_rnam par rol pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang /_'od zer gyi dra ba snang ba kha dog du ma can dang /_kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 
[\[326a.7\]]'gyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang /_pho brang dang rgyan sna tshogs mnga' ba dang /_sku tshe'i tshad rnam par dag pa rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang /_'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par mdzad pa dang /_
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]mngon par 'tshang rgya ba rnam par dag pa'i sgos rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang seng ge'i nga ro rnam par sgrog pa mang po mthong ngo /_/de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bos ni sgo kun nas dmigs pa thams cad rnam par rig pa 
[\[326b.2\]]la yang dag par gzhol ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'di thob par zad na/_byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa gang gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang pho brang rnam par dag 
[\[326b.3\]]pa'i rgyan mngon par mthong bas/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo kun nas snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu thob pa dang /_bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnam par dag pas/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo 
[\[326b.4\]]'gro ba thams cad du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /_gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu tshad med pa'i rjes su 'brang bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo/_stobs kyis sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /_gang gis chos mnyan pa'i rnam pas/_
[\[326b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sprin la lta bas/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo chos kyis sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang gang gis phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad kyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa la 'jug pas/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i 
[\[326b.6\]]sgo phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po rab tu thob pa dang /_gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba la rab tu phra bar dmigs shing 'jug pas/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo phyogs thams cad du 'jug 
[\[326b.7\]]pa rab tu thob pa dang /_bskal pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing rnam par dmigs pa dang mi bral bas/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo bskal par sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /_gang gis dus thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong 
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]zhing 'grogs pa dang mi 'bral bas/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dus su sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /_gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas mngon par 'phags shing zil gyis mi non pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su 
[\[327a.2\]]mthong zhing rnam par rig pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo zhing du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /_gang gis dus gsum gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor rang gi sems dang bsam par yang dag par gzhol bas/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dus 
[\[327a.3\]]gsum du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /_gang gis dmigs pa thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang dag par tshogs pa mthong zhing dmigs pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dmigs par sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /_gang gis skad 
[\[327a.4\]]cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba rnam par dmigs pas/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo zhi bas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /_gang gis nyin gcig tu gnas 
[\[327a.5\]]thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gshegs par rnam par dmigs pas/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo 'bral bas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /_gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa re re skyil mo krung du bzhugs pas kyang /_
[\[327a.6\]]chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par dmigs pas/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo shin tu yangs pas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /_gang gis skra'i rtse mo gcig la sangs rgyas brjod du med 
[\[327a.7\]]pa byung ba mnyes par bya ba la 'jug pas/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo shin tu phra bas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /_skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing /_rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa rnam par dmigs pas/_
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo rgyan du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /_sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pas gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo bgos par 
[\[327b.2\]]sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /_rang gis sems dang bsam pa la bltas nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snang ba rab tu thob pas/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo sems kyis sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad 
[\[327b.3\]]kyis las rnam pa ji lta bur bstsags pa'i gzugs brnyan yongs su ston pas/_gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo las kyis sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad pad mo'i tshal gyis rgyas par 
[\[327b.4\]]sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen po ston pa/_phyogs kun tu mngon sum du dmigs pas/_gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo rnam par 'phrul pas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs brnyan gyi sprin 
[\[327b.5\]]dbyangs sgrogs pas chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' kun nas snang ba/_gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo nam mkhas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 
[\[327b.6\]]'di nyid na phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo zhes bya ba yod pa de na/_dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin ces bya ba 'dug gi_/de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig 
[\[327b.7\]]dang /_rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen de khyod la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs dang /_rgyu yongs su ston par 'gyur ro/_/tshogs kyis rgya chen po yang khong du chud par byed do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang /_shugs rgya chen po yang yongs su skyed 
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]par byed do/_/byang chub kyi sems kyi tshogs dang rgyu rgya chen po yang yongs su brjod par 'gyur ro/_/theg pa chen po rab tu thob pa dang /_snang bar 'gyur ba rgya chen po yang bskyed par byed do/_/pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs kyi stobs rgya chen 
[\[328a.2\]]po yang rab tu ston par byed do/_/spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i tshul rgya chen po yang rab tu rjod par 'gyur ro/_/smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po yang yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/_/sgo kun nas 'byung ba'i rgyan rgya chen po yang rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur 
[\[328a.3\]]ro/_/snying rje chen po'i stobs rgya chen po yang yongs su 'phel bar byed do/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_dge slong sprin gyi dpal la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs 
[\[328a.4\]]su bskor ba byas te/_lan brgya stong du mar phyir bltas nas/_dge slong sprin gyi dpal gyi drung nas song ngo //_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po nyi shu brgyad pa/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor 
[\[328a.5\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag de bzhin rjes su bsam pa dang /_ye shes snang ba de rjes su dran par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de rnam par dpyad pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul de rjes su 
[\[328a.6\]]sbyang ba dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i tshul de blta ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor de la mngon par mos par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyogs de la mngon par spro bar bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de la rjes su bsam pa dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[328a.7\]]gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de rjes su dran par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi tshul rtogs par bya ba de khong du chud par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi nam mkha' de la rjes su blta bar byed cing /_mthar gyis phyogs kyis ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo gang na ba dang /_
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gang na ba der phyin nas/_dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar 
[\[328b.2\]]nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par zhugs te/_bla na med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la 'jug par 'tshal na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi rgyud 
[\[328b.3\]]las phyir ldog cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /_'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rgal zhing thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /_byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sa las gyen du 'phags par 'gyur zhing /_
[\[328b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang /_'khor ba'i rgyud las ldog par 'gyur zhing /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyud du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /_'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rgyud kyi 'khor lo las phyir ldog cing byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[328b.5\]]spyod pa dang /_smon lam gyi 'khor lor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /_bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'joms shing sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba thams cad rab tu ston pa dang /_srid pa'i rgya mtsho yongs su skems shing snying rje chen po'i mtsho 
[\[328b.6\]]rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang /_mi khom pa dang ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro dang log par ltung ba thams cad kyi sgo gcod cing /_mtho ris dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo 'byed pa dang /_khams gsum gyi grong khyer gyi sgo rnam par gcod cing thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[328b.7\]]nyid kyi pho brang gi sgo rnam par 'byed pa dang /_yo byad thams cad kyi sred pa rnam par spong zhing 'gro ba thams cad bsdu ba'i smon lam yongs su bskyed par 'gyur ba ma 'tshal lo/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor 
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams ni byang chub tu 
[\[329a.2\]]sems kyang mi skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sgo kun tu snang ba rab tu thob pa dang /_thabs kyi snying po dang ldan pa'i lam gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang bas rab tu snang bar 'gyur ba dang /_bsod nams kyi rgya mtsho'i tshogs rgya chen po bstsags pa dang /_dkar 
[\[329a.3\]]po'i tshogs thams cad kyi rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bkur bas yongs su skyo ba med pa dang /_lus dang srog la 'phangs pa mi rtsi ba dang /_dngos por 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /_mthon dman med pa'i sa 
[\[329a.4\]]ltar sems mnyam pa dang /_rang bzhin gyi snying rje che zhing byams par sems pa dang ldan pa dang /_srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du gnas par 'dug pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la mngon par mos pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu 
[\[329a.5\]]sems skye ste/_'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir snying rje chen po'i sems dang 'gro ba thams cad la snyoms par nan tan du bya ba'i phyir byams pa chen po'i sems dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bde 
[\[329a.6\]]ba'i sems dang /_mi dge ba'i chos thams cad las rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir phan pa'i sems dang /_'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir snying brtse ba'i sems dang /_bsgribs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir chags pa med pa'i 
[\[329a.7\]]sems dang /_chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir/_rgya chen po'i sems dang nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu gzhol zhing kun tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mtha' yas pa'i sems dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rnam par 
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]dmigs par bya ba'i phyir dri ma med pa'i sems dang /_dus gsum gyi dmigs pa ma lus par ye shes kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa'i sems dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ye shes kyi sems kyang skye 
[\[329b.2\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu kho bos ni phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo 'dir lo bcu gnyis su rgya mtsho chen po 'di la dmigs te/_mngon du byas nas 'di ltar rgya mtsho rgya che zhing tshad med pa la rjes su bsam pa dang /_dri ma med cing dang ba dang /_zab cing gting 
[\[329b.3\]]dpag dka' ba dang /_bags kyis gzhol zhing legs par gnas pa dang /_rin po che'i 'byung gnas du mas rnam par brgyan pa dang /_chu'i phung po tshad med pa dang /_kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa mang zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_'byung po mtha' yas 
[\[329b.4\]]pa'i gnas su gyur pa dang srog chags mang po sna tshogs kyi rten du gyur pa dang /_sprin chen po'i char yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_gang zhing 'bri bar 'gyur ba med pa la rjes su sems par byed cing gnas te/_rigs kyi bu de la kho bos 'di snyam du bsam mo/_/
[\[329b.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgya mtsho chen po 'di bas kyang 'phags par rgya che la 'di bas kyang yangs shing 'di bas kyang tshad med la/_'di bas kyang ngo mtshar dang ldan pa la la zhig yod dam snyam ste/_de ltar kho bo tshul bzhin du bsam pa yid la byed pa 
[\[329b.6\]]la brtson par gnas pa'i tshe/_rgya mtsho chen po'i 'og gi gzhi las pad mo chen po nor bu rin po che in+d+ra nI la thub pa med cing rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i chu ba can/_nor bu rin po che baiDUR+Ya dam pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/_'dzam bu chu klung gi gser ltar dri ma med pa'i 
[\[329b.7\]]lo ma rgya chen po can/_dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi snying po'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_rin po che a sma gar b+ha'i ze ba can/_rgya mtsho tsam du yangs shing rgya che ba lha ma yin gyi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus sdong po'i lhun nas bzung ba/_rin po che sna tshogs brgya 
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]phrag stong gi dra bas kun nas yog pa/_klu yi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus spos chu'i char mngon par phab pa/_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus dar dang rin po che'i lda ldi dang se mo do mang po mchus bzung zhing rab tu spyangs 
[\[330a.2\]]pa mi'am ci'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus phan pa'i sems kyis kun nas blta ba/_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus 'khor nas mngon par 'dud pa/_srin po'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus lus 'dud cing mngon par mchod pa/_dri za'i dbang po brgya stong phrag 
[\[330a.3\]]bcus rol mo dang glu sna tshogs snyan pas bstod cing mchod pa/_lha'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /_spos dang phreng ba dang /_bdug spos dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan gyi sprin 
[\[330a.4\]]gyi char mngon par phab pa/_tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus spyi bos gtugs te/_phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa/_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha brgya stong phrag bcus thal mo sbyar cing phyag bya ba/_mi'i dbang po 'khor los sgyur ba brgya stong 
[\[330a.5\]]phrag bcus rin po che bdun gyis bsu zhing mngon par mchod pa/_rgya mtsho'i lha brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par mthon cing phyag bya ba/_nor bu rin po che skar ma'i dad brgya stong phrag bcus 'od zer gyi rgyan gyis rab tu snang bar byas pa/_nor bu rin po che bsod 
[\[330a.6\]]nams kyis dag pa brgya stong phrag bcus mkhos su phebs par 'phel bas rab tu brgyan pa/_nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po rab tu gsal bar byas pa/_nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po brgya stong phrag bcus dpal chen 
[\[330a.7\]]po shin tu 'bar bar gyur pa/_nor bu rin po che'i mdzod snang ba brgya stong phrag bcus mtha' yas par snang bar byas pa/_nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung brgya stong phrag bcus yongs su ston par gnas pas rab tu brgyan pa/_nor bu rin po che 
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]rdo rje'i seng ge brgya stong phrag bcus thub pa med par brgyan pa/_nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po brgya stong phrag bcus rgya cher gsal bar bsgrubs pa/_nor bu rin po che 'bar ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog sna tshogs su brgyan pa/_nor bu rin po che yid bzhin 
[\[330b.2\]]gyi rgyal po brgya stong phrag bcus mi zad pa'i rgyan dang 'od 'bar bar byas pa byung ste/_pad+ma chen po de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pas yongs su brtan pa'o/_/
[\[330b.3\]]phyogs thams cad du mngon par dmigs su yod pa'o/_/sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos kyis byung ba'o/_/rjen pa'i dri ma med pa'i las kyis byung ba'o/_/nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis brgyan pa'o/_/rmi lam lta bu'i chos nyid kyis yongs su 
[\[330b.4\]]byung ba'o/_/mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis rgyas btab pa'o/_/chags pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul dang ldan pa'o/_/phyogs kyi khams kun tu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi yul brjod pa dang mthun pa ste/_
[\[330b.5\]]de'i rnam pa dang yon tan dang dbyibs dang /_kha dog dang rgyan gyis mthar phyin pa ni bskal pa brgya stong grangs med par yang khong du chud par mi nus te/_pad mo chen po de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyil mo krung du bzhugs pas khyab cing yongs su rgyas par 
[\[330b.6\]]mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de yang 'di nas bzung ba nas/_srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi mthas klas par mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gdan gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi 
[\[330b.7\]]khyab pa dang /_'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_mtshan phun sum tshogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_spyi gtsug ltar mi mthong ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_ljags yangs pa bsam gyis mi 
[\[331a.2\]]khyab pa yang mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang thos so/_/stobs tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang mi bsnyengs pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_
[\[331a.3\]]so so yang dag par rig pa'i stobs mngon par bsgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang rjes su shes so/_/sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang rjes su dran no/_/mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rnam par 
[\[331a.4\]]'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang mthong ngo /_/chos kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra mngon par bsgrags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang yongs su bstan pa rnam par dmigs pa'i gnas dang /_rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang thos so/_/g.yas g.yos 
[\[331a.5\]]kyi sku'i rnam pa tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_sems can gyi don dang dgos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su grub par 'gyur ba'ang mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang phyag g.yas pa brkyang zhing kho bo'i mgo la byugs nas/_chos kyi rnam 
[\[331a.6\]]grangs kun nas [{]myig [,]mig [}]ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab tu brjod pa chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi dang /_rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad rab tu snang ba chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor la yang dag par gzhol zhing snang 
[\[331a.7\]]par byed pa/_zhing gi dkyil 'khor dang rnam pa thams cad rnam par dag pas yongs su snang ba/_phas kyi rgol ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba bdud kyi dkrugs ma'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'joms pa/_sems can gyi khams thams cad 
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]shin tu tshim par byed pa/_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi thibs po rab tu snang bar byed pa/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa/_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i 'khor lo'i rgyud dang /_mthu snang bar byed pa yang dag par 
[\[331b.2\]]bstan te/_kho bos yang kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs de blangs so/_/bzung ngo spel to bsams so/_/de ltar bzung ba de la'ang bri na ni snag tsha rgya mtsho chen po'i phung po tsam dang /_smyi gu'i phung po ri rab ri'i rgyal po tsam zad par gyur kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[331b.3\]]de las le'u re re dang sgo re re dang chos kyi tshul re re dang chos kyi tshig rnam par phye ba re re las kyang zad pa 'am/_'grib pa 'am/_'byang ba 'am/_mthar thug pa'am/_mtha' zad par 'gyur ba dmigs par mi rung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de ltar bdag 
[\[331b.4\]]gis lo bcu gnyis tshang bar chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya ba 'di la nyi ma gcig cing yang thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig khong du chud do/_/zhi ba'i sgo'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig la 
[\[331b.5\]]zhugs so/_/glong mtha' yas pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig la yang dag par 'jug go_/sa la rnam par dpyod cing rjes su rtog par byed pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig rnam par bsgoms te rnam par dbye ba byas so/_/
[\[331b.6\]]gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig yongs su blangs so/_/pad mo'i rgyan gyi gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig mngon par bsgrubs so/_/dbyangs kyi tshul gyi gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa 
[\[331b.7\]]zhig yang dag par bshad do/_/nam mkha'i snying po'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig rab tu phye ba'o/_/skar ma brtsegs pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig shin tu rgyas par byas so/_/rgya mtsho snying po'i gzungs 
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig yongs su bkod do/_/kho bo'i drung du shar phyogs logs nas lha dang lha'i dbang po'am/_klu dang klu'i dbang po 'am/_gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'am/_dri za dang dri za'i dbang po 
[\[332a.2\]]'am/_lha ma yin dang lha ma yin gyi dbang po'am/_nam mkha' lding dang nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'am/_mi'am ci dang mi 'am ci'i dbang po'am/_lto 'phye chen po dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'am/_mi dang mi'i dbang po'am/_tshangs pa dang /_
[\[332a.3\]]tshangs pa'i dbang po'am/_sems can gang su 'ongs kyang rung ste/_de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snang ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya ba 'di nyid du la rab tu bkod cing btsud de/_de dag 
[\[332a.4\]]kun kyang kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la mos par byas so/_/rtog tu btsud do/_/yongs su bstan to/_/yang dag par brjod do/_/yongs su gsal bar byas so/_/rnam par phye'o/_/rgyas par byas so/_/mngon par bstan to/_/rnam par 
[\[332a.5\]]bkrol lo rab tu phye'o/_/shin tu snang bar byas so/_/de ltar shar phyogs la ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams 
[\[332a.6\]]dang /_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang bla'i phyogs nas sems can gang su 'ongs kyang rung ste/_kun la yang snga ma bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bos ni chos kyi rnam grangs gcig cig shes par zad na/_byang chub sems dpa'i smon 
[\[332a.7\]]lam yongs su dag pa dang ldan pas/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa/_bskal pa thams cad du gnas pa rgyu mi 'chad pa'i phyir smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang /_bsam pa ji lta ba 
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir sems can rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang /_stobs bcu'i ye shes chags pa med pa'i snang ba yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang /_yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul 
[\[332b.2\]]ba'i dus la mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang /_zhing thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pas/_zhing rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[332b.3\]]mchod cing rim gro byed pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang /_ye shes rnam par rig pas chos rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang /_nan tan dang ldan pas yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang /_brjod pa thams cad 
[\[332b.4\]]du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir/_'gro ba'i skad rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad drug cu 'das pa'i lho phyogs kyi gnas 
[\[332b.5\]]'di nyid na/_lang ka'i gnas rgya mtsho'i dogs shes bya ba yod de/_de na dge slong shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/_de'i gan du song la/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyang bar bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]
[\[332b.6\]]dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/_dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
