[\[332b.7\]]nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag de dang /_kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs de yang rjes su dran par byed cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de yang rjes su bsam pa dang /_chos kyi tshig dang yi ge'i sprin de dag kyang yongs 
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]su gzung ba dang /_chos kyi sgo rgya mtsho'i tshul de dag la'ang 'jug par bya ba dang chos kyi tshul de'ang rnam par blta ba dang /_chos kyi le'u dang glong gi tshul de dag la 'jug par bya ba dang /_chos kyi nam mkha' de la yang 
[\[333a.2\]]dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang /_chos kyi dkyil 'khor de yang rjes su sbyang bar bya ba dang /_chos rin po che'i gling de yang rjes su sems shing mthar gyis lang ka'i gnas rgya mtsho'i ngogs shes bya ba gdan pa der phyin nas/_dge slong shin tu brtan pa mthong 
[\[333a.3\]]bar dga' zhing shar phyogs su bltas so/_/de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_
[\[333a.4\]]bla dang 'og tu dge slong shin tu brtan pa mthong bar dga' ste/_kun tu bltas pa dang /_des dge slong shin tu brtan pa nam mkha'i dbyings la lha brgya stong grangs med pas yongs su bskor cing phan tshun du 'chag pa mthong ngo /_/nam mkha'i dbyings de yang lha'i 
[\[333a.5\]]dbang po rnams kyis dge slong shin tu brtan pa la mchod pa'i las su bya ba'i phyir/_lha rdzas kyi me tog sil ma'i sprin gyis yog pa dang /_lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sprin gyi sgra dang /_dar gyi ba dan grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par mthong ngo /_/klu'i dbang 
[\[333a.6\]]po rnams kyis nam mkha' de la a ga ru nag po'i spos mngon par 'thul ba'i sprin shin tu mtho ba las 'brug sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'byung bar byas pa mthong ngo /_/mi 'am ci'i dbang po rnams kyis nam mkha' de la lha rdzas kyi ngag snyan pa'i rgyud kyi bstod pa'i 
[\[333a.7\]]rol mo brdung ba dang /_dkrol ba dang glur blang ba'i dbyangs thams cad sbyar cing blangs pa thos par gyur to/_/lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams kyis nam mkha' de la gos shin tu phra zhing mdog bzang ba'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag yid dga' bas bkye 
[\[333b\]]
[\[333b.1\]]ste/_dge slong shin tu brtan pa la dad cing mos pa'i gzugs su phyung ba mthong ngo /_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams kyis kyang nam mkha' de la nor bu rin po che'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa byin gyis brlabs te/_yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan snang ba 
[\[333b.2\]]dang ldan par byas pa mthong ngo /_/nam mkha' lding gi dbang po mang po yang [{]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]gzugs dang kha dog dang dbyibs su 'khod cing nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i bu mos kun nas bskor te/_gsod pa med pa la dga' zhing thal mo sbyar te gnas pa bsam 
[\[333b.3\]]gyis mi khyab pa mthong ngo /_/gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong 'khor dang bcas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang nam mkha' de la shin tu mi sdug pa'i gzugs su dge slong shin tu brtan pa la byams pa'i mthu dang ldan par 'khod pa mthong ngo /_/srin po'i 
[\[333b.4\]]dbang po brgya stong 'khor dang bcas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang nam mkha' de la dge slong shin tu brtan pa yongs su bsrung ba byed cing kun tu rgyu ba mthong ngo /_/tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang nam mkha' de la thal mo sbyar 
[\[333b.5\]]cing dga' ba dang yid du 'ong ba'i tshig gi rgyud kyi bstod pa rab tu brjod pa mthong ngo /_/gnas gtsang ma'i lha brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang nam mkha' de la dge slong shin tu brtan pa la mchod pa'i las su bya ba'i phyir thal mo sbyar cing gzhal med khang na gnas 
[\[333b.6\]]pa mthong ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]dge slong shin tu brtan pa de ltar nam mkha'i dbyings la 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/_dge slong shin tu brtan pa la thal 
[\[333b.7\]]mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal bar bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub 
[\[334a\]]
[\[334a.1\]]sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsdu bar bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan par 
[\[334a.2\]]bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgom par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su brtul bar 
[\[334a.3\]]bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgom par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par dag par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su sbyang 
[\[334a.4\]]bar bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/_/zhes bdag gis thos na/_'phags pa ji 
[\[334a.5\]]ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos la nan tan du bgyi/_ji ltar nan tan bgyis na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin dang /_skol bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[334a.6\]]dang /_tshul gcig tu 'gyur ba'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /_ye shes rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos dang mi 'bral ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yongs su thob par bgyi ba'i slad du byang 
[\[334a.7\]]chub sems dpa'i smon lam thams cad dang mi 'bral ba dang /_bskal pa thams cad du gnas pas yongs su mi skyo bar bgyi ba'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su dag par bgyi ba'i slad du 
[\[334b\]]
[\[334b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad rnam par dmigs par bgyi ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /_byang chub 
[\[334b.2\]]sems dpa'i spyod pa sprul pa lta bus srid pa'i rgyud thams cad du skye zhing 'chi 'pho ba'i skye mched rang gi lus kyis nyams su myong bar bgyi ba'i slad du 'dus byas kyi gnas dang mi 'bral ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su gzung 
[\[334b.3\]]ba'i slad du chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba dang /_dus gsum gyi ye shes khong du chud cing rjes su 'brang bar bgyi ba'i slad du/_ye shes snang ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ba de bdag la bstan du gsol/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_dge slong shin tu brtan 
[\[334b.4\]]pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_sangs rgyas kyi chos dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos dang rang byung gi chos 'dri ba legs so/_/legs so/_/
[\[334b.5\]]rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i sgo thob pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba thogs pa med pa'i sgo de kho bos blangs te/_yongs su bzung nas rjes su 'brang zhing rnam par dbye ba dang /_rnam par 
[\[334b.6\]]dpyad pa dang rnam par brtag pa dang snang bar bya ba dang /_rab tu snang bar byas pas thogs pa med pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ye shes snang ba thob bo/_/de thob pas kho bo ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa 
[\[334b.7\]]med do/_/sems can thams cad kyi skye ba dang 'chi 'pho yongs su shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do/_/sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par bya ba'i sgor 'jug pa la thogs pa med do/_/phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par 'gro ba thams cad dang 'grogs par bya ba la thogs 
[\[335a\]]
[\[335a.1\]]pa med do/_/da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi 'gro ba thams cad rnam par rig par bya ba la thogs pa med do/_/sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad dang /_kun rdzob yongs su shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do/_/sems can thams cad kyi the 
[\[335a.2\]]tsom gcad par bya ba la thogs pa med do/_/sems can thams cad kyi dbang po tha dad par khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/_/sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba'i dus su 'gro bar bya ba la thogs pa med do/_/
[\[335a.3\]]nyin mtshan dang skad cig dang yud tsam dang thang cig dang /_dus kyi ming du bya ba khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/_/dus gsum rgya mtsho'i rgyud du 'jug par bya ba la thogs pa med do/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rang gi lus kyis rgyas par dgang 
[\[335a.4\]]bar bya ba la thogs pa med do/_/de ni de ltar dngos po med pa la gnas shing mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i phyir te/_rigs kyi bu dngos po med pa la gnas shing mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul de'i byin gyis kho bo nam mkha' 
[\[335a.5\]]dbyings 'di las phan tshun du 'gro zhing 'dug pa dang /_snyes pa dang spyod lam sna tshogs su spyod do/_/mi snang bar byed do/_/snang bar 'byung ngo /_/du ba 'thul bar byed do/_/me lce 'bar bar byed do/_/gcig tu byas shing mang por bsgyur ro/_/mang por 
[\[335a.6\]]byas shing gcig tu bsgyur ro/_/snang ba dang mi snang ba'ang nyams su myong bar byed do/_/rtsig pa la'ang thag thogs med pa dang rab la'ang thag thogs med par 'gro ste/_dper na nam mkha' la bya bzhin no/_/nam mkha' la'ang skyil mo krung gis 'gro ste/_
[\[335a.7\]]dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no/_/sa la yang byi'u zul dang steng du 'byung ba byed de/_dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no/_/chu la yang bying ba med par 'gro ste/_dper na sa la bya ba bzhin no/_/du ba 'thul ba dang /_me lce 'bar bar byed de/_dper 
[\[335b\]]
[\[335b.1\]]na me'i phung po chen po bzhin no/_/sa yang yongs su g.yo bar byed do/_/nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis de ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing de ltar mthu che la/_de ltar gzi brjid che yang lag pas kun nas yongs su nyug go_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar dag tu yang 
[\[335b.2\]]lus kyis dbang bsgyur ro/_/'jig rten spos kyi dud pa na bun du chags pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byas shing rab tu 'bar bar byed do/_/rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin gyi dra bas 'jig rten kun nas khebs par byas 
[\[335b.3\]]shing /_'gro ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i sprul pa'i sprin rab tu 'gyed do/_/kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dra ba'i sprin rab tu bkye zhing phyogs kun tu 'ang 'gro ste/_'di ltar shar phyogs su 'gro'o/_/lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang byang phyogs dang /_
[\[335b.4\]]byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang bla'i phyogs su yang 'gro'o/_/sems kyi skad cig re re zhing yang shar phyogs logs su 
[\[335b.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams gnyis dang bcu yang 'da'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang /_'jig rten gyi khams stong dang /_'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang /_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang /_
[\[335b.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag stong dang /_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang /_'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang /_'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dang /_'jig rten 
[\[335b.7\]]gyi khams dpag tu med pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams mtshungs pa med pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[336a\]]
[\[336a.1\]]kun tu mtha' yas pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams mtshams med pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang 'da' bar byed de/_'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[336a.2\]]de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dang de dag dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa de dang de dag dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs de dang de dag dang /_'jig rten 
[\[336a.3\]]gyi khams kyi rgyud de dang de dag dang /_'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'du ba de dang de dag dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba de dang de dag dang /_'jig rten gyi khams su bya ba de dang de dag dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kyi sgo de dang de dag dang /_
[\[336a.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal par bya ba de dang de dag dang /_'jig rten gyi khams su 'jug pa de dang de dag dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kyi snying po byang chub rnam par bkod pa de dang de dag dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[336a.5\]]de dang de dag na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus sna tshogs dang /_lus re re zhing yang 
[\[336a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi char 'bebs shing spyan sngar 'gro'o/_/de dag tu phyin nas kyang me tog thams cad dang spos thams cad dang /_phreng ba thams cad dang phye ma thams cad dang /_byug pa thams cad 
[\[336a.7\]]dang na bza' thams cad dang /_rgyal mtshan thams cad dang lha'i ba dan thams cad dang bla re thams cad dang /_dra ba thams cad dang gzugs thams cad kyi mchod pa rgyun ma chad par byed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang ji snyed du 
[\[336b\]]
[\[336b.1\]]gsungs pa dang /_bstan pa dang /_brjod pa dang /_yang dag par bshad pa dang /_yang dag par smos pa dang /_yongs su brjod pa dang /_man ngag du gsungs pa dang /_shin tu bstan pa dang rab tu brjod pa de dag thams cad kyang shes shing 'dzin to/_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[336b.2\]]ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rjes su dran no/_/shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang byang phyogs dang /_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /_shar lho'i phyogs 
[\[336b.3\]]mtshams dang /_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs su yang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams gnyis dang bcu yang 'da'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams brgya nas 
[\[336b.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang 'da'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong la/_'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho 
[\[336b.5\]]de dang de dag dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa de dang de dag nas/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag na chos ston pa de dag kun kyang mthong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la'ang me tog thams cad nas gzugs 
[\[336b.6\]]thams cad kyi bar gyi mchod pa byed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang ji snyed du gsungs pa nas/_rab tu brjod pa'i bar de dag thams cad kyang yongs su shes shing 'dzin to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[336b.7\]]yongs su dag pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rjes su dran no/_/sems can gang gis kho bo mthong bar gyur ba dang /_gang dang 'grogs par gyur pa de dag kun kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro/_/sems can 
[\[337a\]]
[\[337a.1\]]phra mo 'am rags pa 'am ngan pa'am bzang ba'am bde ba'am mi bde ba gang ji snyed cig kho bos mthong bar gyur pa de dag kun la yang yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_'dul ba'i dus las mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/_khong ta de 
[\[337a.2\]]dag gi lus kyi tshad dang mnyam par lus byin gyis rlob bo/_/sems can ji snyed cig kho bo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu 'gro ba 'di dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 
[\[337a.3\]]rnam par gnon pa don yod pa la rab tu gzhog go_/rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i sgo kun tu 'gro ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa dang /_rim gro rab tu sbyor ba sems can thams cad 
[\[337a.4\]]yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_mthun pa 'di shes par zad na/_kho bos byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po'i ngang tshul can/_theg pa chen po'i ngang tshul can/_byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang mi 'bral ba'i ngang tshul can/_thogs pa med pa'i 
[\[337a.5\]]ngang tshul can/_byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i snying po chud mi gson pa'i ngang tshul can/_byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi gtong ba'i ngang tshul can/_sangs rgyas kyi chos la lhag par dmigs pa'i ngang tshul can/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[337a.6\]]yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba'i ngang tshul can/_nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ngang tshul can/_'jig rten thams cad la mi gnas pa'i ngang tshul can/_chud mi gson pa'i ngang tshul can/_mnyams pa'i ngang tshul can/_ma god pa'i ngang tshul can/_
[\[337a.7\]]glags med pa'i ngang tshul can/_ma 'dres pa'i ngang tshul can/_rnyog pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/_'gyod pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/_rnam par dag pa'i ngang tshul can/_byang chub sems dpa' rdul dang bral ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_
[\[337b\]]
[\[337b.1\]]yon tan brjod pa nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/_dra byi la'i grong rdal rdo rje'i grong khyer can bya ba yod de/_de na dra byi la'i sprin ces bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod 
[\[337b.2\]]pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]dge slong rab tu brtan pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/_yang dang 
[\[337b.3\]]yang bltas nas dge slong shin tu brtan pa'i drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]chos kyi dad pa'i shugs dang /_byin gyis non pa/_sangs rgyas yid la bya ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcad pa 
[\[337b.4\]]la rab tu brtson pa/_dus gsum snang bas sems snang bar gyur pa smon lam chen po yid la byed pa dang ldan pa sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i thabs la zhugs pa/_'dus byas kyi dge ba thams cad la mi gnas pa'i 
[\[337b.5\]]sems dang ldan pa/_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs par bya ba la brtson pa/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su sbyang ba'i smon lam las mi g.yo ba/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gnas 
[\[337b.6\]]pa med par gnas pa chos kyi snang ba de rjes su dran par bya ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rjes su dran par bya ba dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs yongs su brjod pa byed cing /_mthar gyis dra byi la'i grong rdal rdo rje'i grong khyer du phyin nas/_
[\[337b.7\]]dra byi la'i sprin yongs su tshol tshol ba las/_grong khyer gyi khyams shig na chos bstan pa'i don du seng ge'i khril 'dug cing /_srog chags stong phrag bcu tsam zhig la chos kyi rnam grangs yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyan ces bya ba yongs su 
[\[338a\]]
[\[338a.1\]]ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]dra byi la'i sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_dra byi la'i sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas 
[\[338a.2\]]mdun du 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi 
[\[338a.3\]]ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub kyi sems srid pa'i lam rgyud thams cad du chab mi 'tshal ba dang /_ji ltar yongs su skyo ba ma mchis shing /_bsam pa brtan par 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar thub pa ma mchis shing lhag pa'i 
[\[338a.4\]]bsam pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar yongs su skyob ma mchis shing snying rje chen po'i stobs yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ba dang ji ltar sgo kun nas rnam par dag cing gzungs kyi stobs gnon par 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar ma rig pa'i rab rib dang sgrib pa rnam par 'thor 
[\[338a.5\]]zhing /_shes rab kyi 'od chos thams cad la rab rib ma mchis pa'i snang ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar don dang chos dang nges pa'i tshig dang spobs pa la mkhas pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs shing /_so so yang dag par rig pa'i stobs 
[\[338a.6\]]gnon par 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor lo tha mi dad pa yang dag par 'dzin cing dran pa'i stobs yongs su gnon par 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar chos thams cad kyi phyogs rigs pa'i snang ba rjes su rtog cing /_rig pa'i stobs 
[\[338a.7\]]rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs chos thams cad kyi don rnam par gdon mi za bar rab tu dbye ba la brtson pas 'grub par 'gyur ba ma 'tshal to/_/de nas dra byi la'i sprin gyis byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[338b\]]
[\[338b.1\]]la rim gro bya ba'i phyir seng ge'i khri de las langs te babs nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la lus thams cad kyis phyag byas nas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la gser gyi me tog gi phung pos mngon par gtor to/_/nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa mang po 
[\[338b.2\]]dang /_tsan dan gyi phye ma dam pas kyang mngon par gtor to/_/gos tshon sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas kha dog bsgyur ba brgya stong phrag du mas kyang mngon par bkab bo/_/spos kyi me tog kha dog rnam pa tha dad cing yid du 'ong la blta na sdug pa mang pos kyang mngon 
[\[338b.3\]]par gtor nas mchod pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag gis kyang /_mchod pa dang rim gro dang /_bkur sti dang bsti stang cher byas te/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[338b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdung mi gcad pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin no/_/'dod 
[\[338b.5\]]chags dang bral ba'i rigs yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du rnam par rig par bya ba la brtson pa yin/_zhing gi rgyud thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la zhugs pa yin/_sems can gyi rigs thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_'dul ba la sta 
[\[338b.6\]]gon du gnas pa yin/_chos kyi rigs thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa la brtson pa yin/_las kyi rigs thams cad dang mi 'gal bar gnas pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rigs thams cad yongs su 
[\[338b.7\]]rdzogs par bya ba la rab tu brtson pa yin/_smon lam gyi rigs thams cad rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin/_dus gsum gyi rgyud thams cad ye shes kyi khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa yin/_mos pa'i rigs shin tu brtan par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa 
[\[339a\]]
[\[339a.1\]]yin te/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mang po thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa yin/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par dgongs pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa yin/_'phags pa 
[\[339a.2\]]thams cad kyi rjes su dgyes par bya ba yin/_tshangs pa'i dbang po thams cad kyis mngon par dga' bar byas pa yin/_lha'i dbang po thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod pa yin/_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thams cad kyis yongs su bsrung ba yin/_
[\[339a.3\]]srin po'i dbang po thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa yin/_klu'i dbang po thams cad kyis bsu ba yin/_mi'am ci'i dbang po thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa yin/_'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa yin/_des 
[\[339a.4\]]ni sems can gyi khams thams cad kyang ngan song gi lam rgyud gsum po yongs su gcad pa dang mi khom pa dang /_ngan 'gro lam thams cad bzlog pa dang /_dbul ba'i lam thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba dang /_lha dang mi'i phun sum 
[\[339a.5\]]tshogs pa thob par bya ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po mnyam pa dang /_'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag yongs su dag par bya ba dang /_byang chub kyi 
[\[339a.6\]]sems 'byung ba'i rgyud yongs su bsgrub pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam snang ba thob par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes khong bu chud par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par bya bas dbugs phyin par byas pa 
[\[339a.7\]]yin/_rigs kyi bu de la bdag 'di snyam du sems te/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dka' ba byed pa ste/_'byung bar dka' zhing mthong bar dka' ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can rnams la bag dro bar byed pas 
[\[339b\]]
[\[339b.1\]]pha dang ma lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan tu gyur pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sdug bsngal gyis mnar ba rnams la skyabs su gyur pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'gro ba 
[\[339b.2\]]thams cad yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gnas su gyur pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pa rnams la dpung gnyen du gyur pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad ngan song gsum du ltung ba las 
[\[339b.3\]]yongs su rton pa'i phyir rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pas sa lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bsod nams rin po che'i mdzod mi zad pa'i gtos 
[\[339b.4\]]dang ldan pas rgya mtsho lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ye shes kyi 'od kyis snang bar byed pa'i phyir nyi ma lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa bas shin tu mtho bas ri rab lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni snying po byang 
[\[339b.5\]]chub tu ye shes kyi zla ba 'char bar 'gyur ba'i phyir zla ba lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu 'joms pas dpa' bor gyur pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rang byung gi chos kyi grong khyer du phyin par byed pas rtul 
[\[339b.6\]]phod pa lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi bag la byams pa'i rlan yongs su skem pas me lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos kyi sprin rgya chen po'i char mngon par 'bebs pas sprin lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems 
[\[339b.7\]]dpa' rnams ni sems can gyi dbang po dad pa la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa'i myu gu rnam par 'phel bar byed pas char pa lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos rgya mtsho'i 'gram yongs su ston pas mnyan pa lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 
[\[340a\]]
[\[340a.1\]]sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las yang dag par sgrol ba'i phyir zam pa lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad kyis mngon par bgrod par bya ba'i phyir mu stegs lta bu'o/_/de ltar dra byi la'i sprin 
[\[340a.2\]]gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]mdun du 'dug ste/_tshig gi rgyud de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su bsngags pa byas nas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la legs so zhes bsngags so/_/de ltar de byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[340a.3\]]yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i phyir tshig brjod pa'i tshe/_kha'i sgo nas 'od 'phro ba'i phung po rnam pa 'di lta bu byung ste/_'od 'phro ba'i phung po des stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur nas/_lha dang lha rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/_
[\[340a.4\]]klu dang klu rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/_gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/_dri za dang dri za rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/_lha ma yin dang lha ma yin rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/_nam mkha' lding dang nam mkha' lding rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/_mi'am ci dang 
[\[340a.5\]]mi'am ci rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/_lto 'phye chen po dang lto 'phye chen po rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/_mi dang mi rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/_mi ma yin pa dang mi ma yin pa rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/_tshangs pa dang tshangs pa rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/_sems can 
[\[340a.6\]]gang sus mthong yang rung ste/_snang ba des yongs su snang bar byas pa de dag dra byi la sprin gyi drung du 'ongs so/_/de nas de ltar dra byi la sprin gyis bsam pa byin gyis brlabs shing thal mo sbyar te/_gnas pa lus dang sems sim par gyur pa/_dga' ba rgya 
[\[340a.7\]]chen po skyes pa/_sri zhu chen po la gnas pa/_nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bcom pa/_g.yo rgyu dang bral ba/_dbang po rnam par dang bar gyur pa de dag la dra byi la'i sprin gyis chos kyi rnam grangs yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyan ces bya ba de nyid rgya cher yang dag par 
[\[340b\]]
[\[340b.1\]]bstan te/_khong du chud pa dang rtogs pa dang shes pa dang rig par byas so/_/de thos nas kyang de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/de nas de'i phyir chos kyi stan la 'dug nas/_tshong dpon 
[\[340b.2\]]gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu kho bo ni dbyangs dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob pa ste/_de'i mthus kho bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lha rnams kyi lha'i skad kyang shes so/_/de bzhin du klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_
[\[340b.3\]]dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /_tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad kyang shes so/_/lha rnams kyi lha'i skad sna tshogs kyang shes so/_/de bzhin du klu dang gnod 
[\[340b.4\]]sbyin dang dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /_tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad sna tshogs kyang shes so/_/lha rnams kyi lha'i skad gcig pa yang shes so/_/
[\[340b.5\]]de bzhin du klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /_tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad gcig pa yang shes so/_/lha rnams kyi lha'i skad tha 
[\[340b.6\]]dad pa yang shes so/_/de bzhin du klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /_tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad tha dad pa yang shes so/_/byol song gi 
[\[340b.7\]]skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi brda dang skad dang ming tha dad pa'ang shes so/_/sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi skad dang /_ming rnams kyang shes so/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi skad dang ming 
[\[341a\]]
[\[341a.1\]]rnams kyang shes so/_/'phags pa'i skad dang ming rnams kyang shes so/_/'phags pa ma yin pa'i skad dang ming rnams shes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig dang brda dang /_nges pa'i ngag sems can 
[\[341a.2\]]gyi bsam pa bzhin du 'byung ba yang shes so/_/sems kyi skad cig re re la yang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang gsung rgya mtsho sems can thams cad kyi ming dang gtam gyi sgra dang /_tshig tu 
[\[341a.3\]]ldan pa yang rtogs shing khong du chud do/_/ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can rnams kyi brda dang nges pa'i tshig dang skad dang ming rgya mtsho la 'jug cing shes pa de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba 
[\[341a.4\]]khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa/_grangs med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_mtshungs pa med pa/_kun tu mtha' yas pa mu med pa/_sa mtshams med pa gzhal du med pa/_brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang /_de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs 
[\[341a.5\]]dang byang phyogs dang /_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 
[\[341a.6\]]tshad med pa nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams kyi brda dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang skad dang ming rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug cing shes te/_'di ltar lha rnams kyi lha'i skad kyang shes so/_/tshangs pa rnams 
[\[341a.7\]]kyi tshangs pa'i skad kyi bar du'ang shes so/_/rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs snang ba dbyangs dang ldan pa 'di shes par zad na/_kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi brda'i rnam pa rgya mtsho 
[\[341b\]]
[\[341b.1\]]la zhugs pa de dag dang /_'gro ba sna tshogs kyi skad dang /_ming rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang /_'gro ba sna tshogs kyi ming shin tu bstan pa ming rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi brjod pa rab tu bkod pa dang /_rnam par spyod pa rgya 
[\[341b.2\]]mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang /_tshig thams cad kyi mtshams sbyar ba rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang /_tshig lhur blangs te bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang /_dus gsum gyi dmigs pa thams cad dmigs pa gcig tu rnam 
[\[341b.3\]]par spyod pa rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang /_tshig gis brtsegs te bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang /_tshig gnyis nas brtsegs te bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang /_tshig rab tu phye ste bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs 
[\[341b.4\]]pa de dag dang /_chos thams cad rab tu dbye bas 'dul ba'i tshul bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang /_dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i rgyan thams cad la zhugs pa de dag 
[\[341b.5\]]dang /_yi ge'i 'khor lo'i mthar phyin par bya bas rab tu dbye ba las byung ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul nags tshal na gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na tshong 
[\[341b.6\]]dpon btang brjod ces bya ba 'dug gi de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brtson par bya ba dang /_ji ltar 'byung bar bya ba dang /_ji ltar sems nges par bzhag par bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon 
[\[341b.7\]]gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis[,]bzang gis[}]/_dra byi la sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_chos kyi rim gro byas nas/_dad pa'i mtshan nyid rtsa ba tshugs pa la rab tu brtag pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen las 'ongs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[342a\]]
[\[342a.1\]]nyid la yang dag par lta zhing gdong mchi mas gang bar ngus te/_dra byi la sprin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_yang dang yang bltas te phyag 'tshal zhing dra byi la sprin gyi drung nas song ngo //_//
[\[342a.2\]]sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po nyi shu dgu pa/_de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs snang ba dbyangs dang ldan pa'i rgyan de nyid la rjes su bsam pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[342a.3\]]dpa'i skad kyi tshul rgya mtsho de nyid la 'jug par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul phra mo la 'jug pa de nyid rjes su dran par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sems rnam par byang bas/_rnam par dag pa de nyid kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /_
[\[342a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bag chags bsdu zhing bsgrub pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su smin par bya ba'i sgo de nyid rnam par sbyang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can bsdu ba'i ye shes de 
[\[342a.5\]]nyid shin tu byang bar bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa bya ba de nyid brtan par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs de nyid nye bar brtan par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa'i rgyud de nyid 
[\[342a.6\]]yongs su sbyang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sems de nyid gdon mi za bar dge bar bsam pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i yi dam chen po de nyid mthar phyin par byed cing /_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]yi dam la brtan zhing smon lam gyi sems kyis 
[\[342a.7\]]yongs su skyo ba med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyan dang ldan pa/_phyir mi ldog pas rnam par gnon pa'i brtson 'grus can/_yid kyis brtul ba las mi zlogs pa/_dad pa mi 'phrogs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa/_rdo rje mthu bo che mi phyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa dge 
[\[342b\]]
[\[342b.1\]]ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi gdams ngag 'thun par len pa/_shes rab kha ma bab pa'i yul dang ldan pa/_sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa la mngon du gyur pa/_ye shes rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul thogs pa med pa kun tu lta ba'i ye shes kyi tshul snang ba dang ldan pa/_
[\[342b.2\]]sa'i gzungs kun nas snang ba rab tu thob pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi'i bye brag la mngon sum du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_gzhi kun la rten pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin rnam par dmigs pa gnas pa med pa dang /_bdag gi med pa dang gnyis 
[\[342b.3\]]su med pa'i spyod yul la rab tu brtson pa/_'du shes thams cad las 'da' bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi sgo rnam par dag pa/_chos kyi phyogs dang gzhi tha dad pa'i phyogs la so sor rtog pa med pa 'jig rten gyi gzhi dang phyogs kyi bye brag las phyir mi ldog pa/_chos 
[\[342b.4\]]kyi gzhi dang phyogs kyi bye brag las phyir mi ldog pa sangs rgyas kyi phyogs dang gzhi tha dad pa mthong ba dang /_rnam par rig par bya ba la gzhol ba/_dus kyi phyogs dang gzhi'i bye brag khong du chud pa'i ye shes can/_chos kyi 'khor lo yid du 'ong bas yang dag par bsgrubs 
[\[342b.5\]]pa'i blo dang /_ye shes kun nas snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par snang bas sems gsal bar byas pa/_yid kyi yul lus kun dang ldan pa'i sa la zhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang bas rgyud shin tu snang bar byas pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[342b.6\]]nyid du dad pa'i dpa' rlabs kyi shugs kyis rab tu rlob pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa'i shugs dang 'bral ba med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad rang gi sems kyi rgyud khong du chud pa'i 'od kyis 
[\[342b.7\]]snang bar gyur pa/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba thams cad rang gi lus kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i smon lam dang chos kyi dbyings thams cad rang gi lus su yang dag par bsdu ba dang /_mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson pa/_de mthar gyis song song ste/_lo 
[\[343a\]]
[\[343a.1\]]bcu gnyis kyis yul nags tshal na gnas par phyin nas/_des tshong dpon btang brjod de btsal btsal te mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang lus thams cad kyis phab ste/_phyag 'tshal nas mdun du 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces 
[\[343a.2\]]smras so/_/'phags pa bdag de ring dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mjal bar gyur pa ni bdag gis 'thob par bgyi ba legs par thob bo/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni mthong bar dka' ba'o/_/'byung bar dka' ba'o/_/mjal bar dka' 
[\[343a.3\]]ba'o/_/bgrod par dka' ba'o/_/bsnyen bkur bgyi bar dka' ba'o/_/mnyes par bgyi bar dka' ba'o/_/'grogs par dka' ba'o/_/rim gro bgyi bar dka' ba'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni rjes su 'brang bar dka' ba lags na/_de lta bu'i dge 
[\[343a.4\]]ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa de ring bdag gis thob par gyur to/_/'phags pa bdag gis 'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la rim gro bgyi ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal blta ba dang /_
[\[343a.5\]]sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par dmigs par bgyi ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid thob par bgyi ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam khong du chud par bgyi ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /_
[\[343a.6\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa'i ye shes snang bar bgyi ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad rang gi lus su mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa rang gi spyod pa mngon par bsgrub par bgyi ba dang /_sangs 
[\[343a.7\]]rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mngon sum du rtogs par bgyi ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs dang mi bsnyengs pa yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa mnyan pas mi ngoms par bgyi ba dang /_sangs 
[\[343b\]]
[\[343b.1\]]rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa mnyan cing blang bar bgyi ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa yang dag par gzung bar bgyi ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa rnam par dbye bar bgyi ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos 
[\[343b.2\]]bstan pa yongs su gzung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_tshul gcig tu 'gyur bar bgyi ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang skal ba mnyam par bgyi ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs 
[\[343b.3\]]su dag par bgyi ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag par bgyi ba dang byang chub sems dpa' thams 
[\[343b.4\]]cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mdzod rab tu thob par bgyi ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos kyi gter dang mdzod mi zad pa'i ye shes snang ba thob par bgyi ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting 
[\[343b.5\]]nge 'dzin gyi gter dang mdzod khong du chud par bgyi ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mdzod tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i gter dang mdzod sems can 'dul ba'i mthar 
[\[343b.6\]]phyin par bgyi ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba'i gter dang mdzod rnam par dmigs par bgyi ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang gi gter dang /_mdzod rang gi sems kyis dbang du bgyi ba dang /_byang 
[\[343b.7\]]chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i gter dang /_mdzod rnam pa thams cad du brgyan par bgyi ba'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_'phags pa de lta bu'i sems kyis bdag 'dir mchis so/_/
[\[344a\]]
[\[344a.1\]]bsam pa de lta bu dang yid la smon pa de lta bu dang /_mngon par dga' ba de lta bu dang /_sems pa de lta bu dang /_gdon mi 'tshal bar bsgrub par bsam pa de lta bu dang /_/spyod yul mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu dang /_tshul 
[\[344a.2\]]khong du chud par bgyi ba la mos pa de lta bu dang /_rnam par dag pa la gzhol ba de lta bu dang /_rnam par dpyod pa'i bsam pa de lta bu dang /_rab tu gzhol ba'i sems de lta bu dang /_dge ba'i sbyor ba de lta bu dang /_mngon du 'gyur ba'i dbang po de lta bus bdag 
[\[344a.3\]]'dir mchis te/_'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang /_rjes su ston pa mdzad cing tshul ni nye bar ston pa mdzad/_rtogs par bgyi ba ni snang bar mdzad/_lam ni bstan par mdzad/_mu stegs la ni 'jog par mdzad/_
[\[344a.4\]]chos kyi sgo ni rnam par 'byed pa mdzad/_the tsom ni yongs su gcod par mdzad/_nem nur ni sel bar mdzad/_yid gnyis kyi zug rngu ni 'byin par mdzad/_dogs pa'i dri ma ni sbyong bar mdzad/_sems kyi thibs po ni snang bar mdzad/_sems kyi dri ma ni 
[\[344a.5\]]yongs su sel bar mdzad/_sems kyi rgyud ni rab tu dang bar mdzad/_sems kyi g.yo sgyu ni yongs su sel bar mdzad/_sems kyi gdung ba ni yongs su sim par mdzad/_'khor ba las ni sems rnam par bzlog par mdzad/_mi dge ba'i las ni phyir bzlog 
[\[344a.6\]]par mdzad/_sems can dmyal ba las ni ldog par mdzad/_gnas dang ni dbral bar mdzad/_mngon par zhen pa las ni gyen du bskyod pa mdzad/_chags pa thams cad las ni yongs su 'grel ba mdzad/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ni bsgrub pa mdzad/_chos kyi grong khyer du 'jug par bgyi ba'i 
[\[344a.7\]]glad du ni mngon du gyur par mdzad/_snying rje chen po la ni rab tu bsgrub pa mdzad/_byams pa chen po la ni rab tu gzhog pa mdzad/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la ni rab tu sbyor ba mdzad/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bsgom pa la ni 'dzud pa mdzad/_rtogs par 'gyur ba'i sgo la ni 
[\[344b\]]
[\[344b.1\]]gnas par mdzad/_rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa la ni gzhag par mdzad/_stobs dang ldan pas ni khyab par mdzad/_'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid du ni sems rnam par dbye ba mdzad do/_/zhes thos na/_'phags pa'i ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang 
[\[344b.2\]]chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brtson par bgyi/_ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi/_ji ltar brtson par bgyis na/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par 'gyur ba bdag la bstan du gsol/_de nas tshong dpon btang brjod kyis de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[344b.3\]]ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba gzungs kyi sgo klong mtha' yas pa sngon du 'gro ba la/_sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[344b.4\]]gyur pas yang dag par bsams shing ye shes snang ba nye bar bsgrubs pas snyoms par zhugs so/_/tshong dpon btang brjod de ltar snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu gzugs kyi lus yongs su dag pa rnam pa 'di lta bur gnas par gyur te/_lus yongs su dag 
[\[344b.5\]]pa de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang bcas/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas/_'od rnam par dag pa dang bcas/_sngon spyod pa la 
[\[344b.6\]]zhugs pa dang bcas/_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas/_smon lam gyi tshogs dang bcas/_spyod pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyan rnam par dag pa dang bcas/_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yongs su ston pa dang bcas/_chos kyi 'khor 
[\[344b.7\]]lo shin tu ston pa dang bcas/_sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang bcas/_chos kyi mu'i mthar thug pa dang bcas par kun kyang lus kyi khongs su chud cing 'dus par snang ste/_de dag kyang phan tshun ma 'dres pa dang /_phan tshun mchod 
[\[345a\]]
[\[345a.1\]]pa dang /_phan tshun shin tu rnam par phye ba dang /_phan tshun shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang /_tshul sna tshogs su zhugs pa dang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyan sna tshogs can mnga' 
[\[345a.2\]]ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs yongs su ston par snang ngo /_/theg pa sna tshogs rnam par dgod pa mdzad pa dang /_smon lam gyi sgo sna tshogs yongs su 
[\[345a.3\]]brjod pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams la la na ni dga' ldan gyi pho brang du skyes shing sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad par snang ngo /_/la la na ni dga' ldan gyi pho brang nas 'pho ba dang /_la la na ni yum gyi sku na bzhugs shing rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs 
[\[345a.4\]]yongs su ston pa dang /_la la na ni skye ba dang /_la la na ni byis pa'i rtsed mo ston pa mdzad pa dang /_la la na ni btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang /_la la na ni mngon par 'byung ba dang /_la la na ni snying po byang chub tu gshegs te/_rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan 
[\[345a.5\]]chen pos bdud kyi sde pham par mdzad pa dang /_la la na ni lha dang klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri zas yongs su bskor cing tshangs pa'i dbang pos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba gdab pa dang /_la la na ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad pa dang /_la la na 
[\[345a.6\]]ni sems can thams cad kyi gnas na bzhugs pa dang /_la la na ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar snang ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams la la na ni de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyis ring bsrel rnam par dgod par snang ngo /_/sangs rgyas 
[\[345a.7\]]kyi zhing la la na ni lha dang mi rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rgyan gyis klubs pa byed par snang ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sems can gyi ris rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_sems can gyi 'jig rten gyi rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_sems 
[\[345b\]]
[\[345b.1\]]can gyi lam rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_sems can gyi skyes gnas rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_sems can gyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_
[\[345b.2\]]sems can gyi mos pa'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_sems can gyi dbang po'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_dus kyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_sems can gyi las kyi bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_sems can gyi las mi mthun pa rnam par tha dad pa dang /_
[\[345b.3\]]sems can gyi 'jig rten rnam par dbye ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_sems can gyi tshul lam dang spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa la rnam par spyod pa dang /_sems can rgya mtsho bsam pa dang sbyor ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa dang dbang po mi mthun pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pa dang /_
[\[345b.4\]]nyon mongs pa dang /_bag chags sna tshogs bag la nyal bar gyur pa'i sems can 'byam klas pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su bstan pa dang /_yul sna tshogs kyi nges pa'i tshig dang /_dbyangs kyi yan lag dang gsung 
[\[345b.5\]]rnam pa sna tshogs su bsgrubs pa dang /_mdo sde sna tshogs kyi tshul rab tu brjod pa dang /_gzungs kyi sgo rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyud dang so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul gyi gzhung sna tshogs dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa'i ming rgya mtsho'i rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[345b.6\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang seng ge'i nga ro rab tu bsgrags pa dang /_sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yongs su bstan pa dang /_dran pa'i sgo sna tshogs can shin tu bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[345b.7\]]dpa' lung bstan pa'i seng ge'i nga ro sna tshogs dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i mthu phyung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' dang dbus med pa mtha' yas par rnam par tha dad pa phan tshun mchod pa dang /_rnam par dag pa'i 'khor 
[\[346a\]]
[\[346a.1\]]gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs yangs pa dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu phra bar 'dus pa dang /_dpag tshad gcig gi tshad tsam dang /_dpag tshad bcu'i tshad tsam dang /_dpag tshad brgya'i tshad tsam nas/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[346a.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi tshad tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs kyi yan lag dang /_sgra skad thams cad 
[\[346a.3\]]kyi rjes su 'gro bas chos ji snyed du bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang /_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]thos so blangs so/_/yang dag par bzung ngo bsams so/_/sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/byang chub 
[\[346a.4\]]sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon btang brjod dran zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de 
[\[346a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yongs su blangs shing 'dzin pa ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan de la rtog cing dpyod pa'i tshe/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig 
[\[346a.6\]]rten gyi khams 'dzam bu chu klung gi mdog dang ldan pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i snying po la sogs pa/_byang chub sems 
[\[346a.7\]]dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo /_/lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stobs thams cad kyi shugs dang ldan pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kun 
[\[346b\]]
[\[346b.1\]]tu rnam par yangs pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa'i rgyal po la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo /_/nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos 
[\[346b.2\]]thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab mar me'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/_byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i sems la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 
[\[346b.3\]]'khor thams cad dang /_thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo /_/byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'dul ba zhes bya ba 
[\[346b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i gom pas rnam par gnon pa la sogs pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo /_/byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[346b.5\]]khams rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi dmigs pa'i spyan rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa med par shin tu sprul ba la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]
[\[346b.6\]]pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo /_/shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od zer rab tu snang ba na/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[346b.7\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi mar me zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha dad pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs 
[\[347a\]]
[\[347a.1\]]gcig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo /_/lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma'i 'od gzer ltar snang ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgo kun nas ye shes 
[\[347a.2\]]rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i me tog gi 'od kun nas 'phro bar gtsug phud rab tu 'phyang ba la sogs pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo /_
[\[347a.3\]]nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi rgyan yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i snying po na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'od ces bya ba/_byang chub sems 
[\[347a.4\]]dpa' lus kyi 'od zer thogs pa med pa'i gzi brjid rgyal po blo gros la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo /_/'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 
[\[347a.5\]]seng ge snang zhing 'bar ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su snang ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings 'od 'phro zhing rnam par snang bar byung ba'i blo gros la sogs pa byang chub 
[\[347a.6\]]sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo /_/steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan gyi 'od rnam par snang ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[347a.7\]]pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan grags pa thogs pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang /_brtson 'grus thogs pa med pa'i blo gros la sogs pa/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 
[\[347b\]]
[\[347b.1\]]thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'ang mig lam du snang ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag la sogs pa/_phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i 
[\[347b.2\]]rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mthong yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang 'dir mi byon/_kho bo yang der 'gro ba med de nam 'dod pa de na bde ba yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang mtha' yas pa bzhugs pa 'ang mthong ngo /_/tsan dan 
[\[347b.3\]]yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rdo rje bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo /_/spos dri yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rin chen bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo /_/pad mo yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_
[\[347b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang rin chen pad mo bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo /_/gser yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang zhi ba bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo /_/mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa mi sgul 
[\[347b.5\]]ba bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo /_/shin tu brtan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo /_/me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros zla ba bzhugs pa yang mthong 
[\[347b.6\]]ngo /_/rin chen dpal gyi dad pas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bos ni phyogs gang dang gang na 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa gang 
[\[347b.7\]]dang gang mthong bar 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/dus gang dang gang du dmigs pa gang dang gang la sngon gyi spyod pa gang dang gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod pa dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa gang dang gang gi don dang /_
[\[348a\]]
[\[348a.1\]]sems can 'dul ba gang dang gang gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa gang dang gang mthong bar 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag kyang mthong ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang 'dir gshegs pa ma yin/_bdag kyang der phyin 
[\[348a.2\]]pa ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ga las kyang byon pa med par shes la/_rang gi lus kyang gar yang 'gro ba med par shes pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa yang rmi lam lta 
[\[348a.3\]]bur shes la/_rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa yang rmi lam dang 'dra bar rgyu bar shes pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa yang gzugs brnyan lta bur shes la rang gi sems rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa yang chu'i snod gsal 
[\[348a.4\]]ba lta bur shes pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa yang sgyu mas byas pa'i gzugs brnyan lta bur shes la rang gi sems rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa yang sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang sgra brnyan 
[\[348a.5\]]ri'i brag cha lta bur brjod par shes la rang gi sems rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa yang sgra brnyan lta bur shes pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs las 'byung ngo /_/zhes bya bar rjes su rtogs 
[\[348a.6\]]shing khong du chud do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad kyang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya 
[\[348a.7\]]ba dang /_gdul ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du phyin par bya ba yang rang gi sems kyi 
[\[348b\]]
[\[348b.1\]]byin gyi rlabs so/_/rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par rtse ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/chos kyi 
[\[348b.2\]]dbyings kun nas 'dus par khyu mchog gi mthu dbyung zhing rnam par 'phrul pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/bskal pa thams cad shin tu phra bar bsdu ba'i ye shes kyang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so/_/zhes bya bar khong du chud 
[\[348b.3\]]cing rjes su rtogs so/_/rigs kyi bu de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis ni rang gi sems nyid nye bar brtan par bya'o/_/chos kyi sprin gyis ni rang gi sems nyid yongs su brlan par bya'o/_/sgrib pa'i chos rnams 
[\[348b.4\]]las ni rang gi sems nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/brtson 'grus kyis ni rang gi sems nyid brtan par bya'o/_/bzod pas ni rang gi sems nyid mnyam par bya'o/_/ye shes khong du chud par bya ba la ni rang gi sems nyid gzhol 
[\[348b.5\]]bar bya'o/_/shes rab kyis ni rang gi sems nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/dbang rnams la ni rang gi sems nyid mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa nyid la ni rang gi sems nyid rgyas par bya'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[348b.6\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcus ni rang gi sems nyid snang bar bya'o snyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan 'di shes te/_blangs shing yongs su 'dzin par zad na/_kho bos byang chub sems 
[\[348b.7\]]dpa' chags pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa chags pa med pa rnam par spyod pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/_mya ngan las 'da' ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i mtha' la gnas pa'i rdzogs pa'i 
[\[349a\]]
[\[349a.1\]]byang chub kyi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/_gzhi kun nas phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi tshul shes pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du lus rnam par bkram pa/_sangs rgyas 
[\[349a.2\]]kyi yul tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa la rnam par spyod pa/_phyogs thams cad du mngon par phyogs pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/_phyin phyogs med pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par lta ba de dag gi lus la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jig cing 'du 
[\[349a.3\]]bar snang yang de dag la bdag dang 'jig rten gyi khams su gnyis kyi 'du shes med pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi 'dzam bu'i gling gi mgo 'gebs pas rgyas 
[\[349a.4\]]par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan ces bya ba 'dug gis/_de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/
[\[349a.5\]]de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]tshong dpon btang brjod kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_tshong dpon btang brjod la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_yang dang yang bltas te/_tshong dpon btang brjod 
[\[349a.6\]]kyi yon tan grangs med pa la snyan par brjod de/_brtag pa dang /_mos par bya ba dang /_mi btang bar bya ba sems shing du ste smre sngags bton nas/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen sdug par sems shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_dge 
[\[349a.7\]]ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur bar mos pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bsgo ba dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar byed pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus par rjes su blta ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rjes su 
[\[349b\]]
[\[349b.1\]]bsam pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la g.yo sgyu med par spyod pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar bya ba dang ldan pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams gnod pa thams cad yongs su spong bar byed pas ma tsam du sems/_
[\[349b.2\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskyed pas pha tsam du sems shing tshong dpon btang brjod kyi drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]tshong dpon btang brjod kyis bstan pa de la rjes su sems shing /_tshong dpon btang brjod kyi gdams ngag 
[\[349b.3\]]la nan tan bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rjes su dran par bya ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings la 'jug 
[\[349b.4\]]cing 'bab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa khong du chud par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su 'du bar bya ba'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[349b.5\]]pa'i rjes su blta bar bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bsdu ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyan rjes su sbyang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par thar 
[\[349b.6\]]pa'i rnam par dgod pa dang /_khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa la yongs su brtag pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa la sgrib pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i las la bsam pa 
[\[349b.7\]]shin tu brtan pa de la nan du bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i las dang /_smon lam gyi rgyud bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i rjes su spyod cing mthar gyis 'dzam bu gling gi mgo 'gebs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba gang na ba der phyin nas/_
[\[350a\]]
[\[350a.1\]]dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan tshol tshol ba las/_'chag pa'i gnas shig gi 'chag pa'i mthar 'dug ste/_ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba med cing [{]myi [,]mi [}]g.yo la byed pa med cing lus drang por bsrang 
[\[350a.2\]]ste/_dran pa mngon du byas nas ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab par rnam par 'phrul zhing g.yas g.yon dang /_steng logs su lus mtha' yas la tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba/_kha dog 
[\[350a.3\]]du ma'i lus dang ldan pa sems kyi skad cig re re la kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa yongs su ston pa de/_de de ltar mnyam par bzhag cing zab la zhi ste/_g.yo ba med cing dmigs pa med la dga' bas lus mtho bar gyur pa de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas 
[\[350a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu 'gyed par byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/rnam par thar pas rnam par 'phrul pa de'i mthus sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can thams cad yongs su smin 
[\[350a.5\]]par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa sbyar ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog pa dang /_ngan song gi lam thams 
[\[350a.6\]]cad yongs su gcad pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i lam gyi sgo dbye ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i sgrib pa rnam par gtor ba dang /_
[\[350a.7\]]sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod pa'i phyir rnam par 'phrul pa'i bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing de'i rkang pa'i mthil gnyis nas/_tshong dpon gyi tshogs bkur 
[\[350b\]]
[\[350b.1\]]sti dang /_rim gro sna tshogs byed pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i tshong dpon dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa lhag pa'i yul la spyod pa/_rgyan sna tshogs kyis lus shin tu klubs pa/_thor tshugs dang gtsug gi rin po che dang /_
[\[350b.2\]]cod pan sna tshogs thogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byis pa bye ba 'phyes pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa byung ba mthong ngo /_/bram ze dang khyim bdag mang po'i bza' btung rnam pa mang po dang /_ro'i yan lag sna tshogs su sbyar ba 
[\[350b.3\]]thams cad dang /_rgyan thams cad dang /_gos thams cad dang /_me tog thams cad dang /_phreng ba thams cad dang /_spos thams cad dang /_byug pa thams cad dang /_'dod pa'i yod byad thams cad dang /_rin po che thams cad dang /_gnas thams 
[\[350b.4\]]cad dang /_snod rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad dang /_yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyis sems can dbul po rnams yongs su sdud cing /_'gro ba sdug bsngal ba rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang /_sems can gyi sems tshim par bya ba dang /_
[\[350b.5\]]sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang /_sems can rnams byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed cing phyogs bcu bkang ste/_'dong ba mthong ngo /_/pus mo'i lha nga gnyis na rgyal rigs mkhas pa'i gzugs dang /_bram ze mkhas 
[\[350b.6\]]pa'i gzugs dang /_'jig rten na mkhas pa'i gzugs dang /_bzo sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i gzugs dang /_mi'i 'gro ba'i rgyud na mkhas pa'i gzugs dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i las kyi tshul dang /_rgyus la gsal 
[\[350b.7\]]zhing mkhas pa'i gzugs dang /_'jig rten gyi slob dpon du bya bar mkhas pa'i gzugs cha byad rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa/_dbyibs dang rgyan rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa/_yid du 'ong ba'i tshig mang po brjod pas/_yid mi bde ba'i sems can rab tu 
[\[351a\]]
[\[351a.1\]]dga' bar byed cing chos kyi nor gyis dbul ba'i sems can rnams la phan gdags pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams bde bar bya ba dang /_log par ltung ba'i sems can rnams mngon par gdon pa dang /_
[\[351a.2\]]theg pa'i gru la nyam nyes su gyur pa'i sems can rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang /_'jigs pa'i sems can rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgra kun tu grags par bya ba dang /_sdig pa las bzlog pa'i sgra yongs su bsgrag pa dang /_
[\[351a.3\]]dge ba'i chos yang dag par blang ba la sems can gzung ba dang /_don spyod pa la sems can dgod pa dang /_dga' ba'i shugs yongs su bskyed pa dang /_snyan par smra ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su brjod pa dang /_'jig rten la don 
[\[351a.4\]]mthun par bsgrub pa ston par byed cing phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo /_/lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas drang srong mang po 'gro ba thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs su 'khod pa/_pags pa dang shun pa'i gos gyon pa ril ba thogs pa/_
[\[351a.5\]]gzugs dang cha byad dang dbyibs sna tshogs can spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dag byung bas/_steng gi bar snang las sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brjod pa byed cing /_chos kyi sgra yongs su bsgrag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sgra brjod pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[351a.6\]]sems dpa'i dge 'dun yongs su bstan pa dang /_tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa dang /_dbang po dben pa la sems can dgong pa dang /_rang bzhin med pa'i don rab tu brtag pa dang /_ye shes kyi don la 'jig rten rab tu dgod pa dang /_
[\[351a.7\]]'jig rten gyi gtsug lag gi rnam pa yongs su brjod pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba'i lam gyi tshul rab tu bstan pa dang /_mthar gyis bya ba'i las la sems can rab tu dgod pa byed cing /_phyogs bcu bkang ste 'dong ba 
[\[351b\]]
[\[351b.1\]]mthong ngo /_/rtsib logs gnyis nas/_klu'i bu mo 'jig rten rgyu ba thams cad kyi grangs dang mnyam pa/_lus kyi dbyibs bsam gyis mi khyab pa du ma dang ldan pa byung ste klu'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bstan pa dang /_spos 
[\[351b.2\]]kyi sprin gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis brlab pa dang /_me tog gi sprin gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad brgyan pa dang /_phreng ba'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis nam 
[\[351b.3\]]mkha'i dbyings thams cad rnam par klubs pa dang /_rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis/_/chos kyi dbyings thams cad yongs su khebs par bya ba dang /_rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 
[\[351b.4\]]rgyan dang /_rin po che'i lha'i ba dan gyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang /_rin po che'i phyang 'phrul sna tshogs kyi sprin dang /_char bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang /_nor bu rin po che dam pa'i sprin gyi char 'bab pa bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[351b.5\]]pa'i rgyan dang /_rin po che'i se mo do sna tshogs dang /_me tog gi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i brgyan dang /_rin po che'i khri la skyil mo krung du 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa 
[\[351b.6\]]'bebs pa'i rgyan dang /_lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha'i bu mo mang po chos kyi glu snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_rin po che'i pad mo ze ba mtho ba mu tig gi dra bas brgyan pa/_rin po che'i 
[\[351b.7\]]rgyal po thams cad kyi 'bru'i sprin gyi char rnam par 'thor ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang /_rin po che'i cod pan gyi sprin nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa dang /_'od zer gyi sprin mtha' yas pa'i char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang /_
[\[352a\]]
[\[352a.1\]]lha'i lus kyi sprin gyi me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang /_lha'i bu mo mang po'i lus kyi sprin thal mo sbyar te/_gser gyi me tog snyim pas 'dor ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[352a.2\]]la yon tan dang /_legs pa thams cad du bstod pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing char 'bebs pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan nam mkha'i dbyings la byin gyis rlob cing /_spos kyi phung po'i sprin rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa dang /_bdug 
[\[352a.3\]]spos kyi na bun dang sprin shin tu rgya che bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mngon par khebs par bya ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rab tu brgyan pa dang /_sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang /_
[\[352a.4\]]sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pas skad cig skad cig tu chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mthong ngo /_/mthong ka'i dpal gyi be'u nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin 
[\[352a.5\]]tu phra ba snyed byung ste/_lha ma yin gyi sgyus rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston cing chu 'dzin chen po yongs su bskyam pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong rab tu bskyod pa dang /_ri'i rgyal po chen po thams cad 'thab par bya ba dang /_
[\[352a.6\]]lha'i gnas thams cad yongs su bskyod pa dang /_bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad zil gyis gnan pa dang /_bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu gdul ba dang /_nga rgyal dang rlom pa dang dregs pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang /_gnod par sems 
[\[352a.7\]]pa'i sems bzlog cing dga' bar bya ba dang /_'tho 'tsham pa'i sems phyir bzlog par bya ba dang /_sems can rnams kyis mi dge ba'i chos rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_nyon mongs pa'i ri rnam par gtor ba dang /_nyon mongs pa'i thab mo shin tu zhi bar bya ba 
[\[352b\]]
[\[352b.1\]]dang /_lha ma yin gyi sgyus rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_rnam par rtse ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams skyo bar bya ba dang /_sdig pa las gyen du bskyod pa dang /_'khor bas 'jigs par bya ba dang /_srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad nas gyen du 
[\[352b.2\]]bskyod de gnas med pa la rab tu gnas par bya ba dang /_byang chub kyi sems la sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha 
[\[352b.3\]]rol tu phyin pa la rab tu dgod par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gzung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul snang ba yongs su bskyed pa dang /_chos kyi tshul rnam par dgod pa sna tshogs kyis 
[\[352b.4\]]sems kyi skad cig re re zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs par byed pa/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mthong ngo /_/rgyab kyi gzhung nas nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas 
[\[352b.5\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can bdag tu mngon par zhen pa rnams la bdag med pa dang /_sems can med pa yongs su brjod pa byed cing /_rtag par mngon par zhen pa rnams la 'du byed thams cad [{]myi [,]mi [}]rtag par yongs su bstan 
[\[352b.6\]]pa dang /_'dod chags kyi spyod pa can rnams la [{]myi [,]mi [}]sdug pa dang /_zhe sdang gi spyod pa can rnams la byams pa dang /_gti mug gi spyod pa can rnams la rkyen las byung ba'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba brjod pa dang /_cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa can rnams la ye 
[\[352b.7\]]shes kyi yul dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshul mngon par bstan pa dang /_yul la mngon par dga' ba rnams la gnas med pa rab tu brjod pa dang /_zhi ba la gnas su sems pa rnams la smon lam gyi khyad par gyis spro ba bskyed pa dang /_phyogs kyi rgyud dang sgo thams 
[\[353a\]]
[\[353a.1\]]cad du chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i rgyud dang /_sgo thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don du brjod par byed cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mthong ngo /_/phrag pa'i lhun gnyis las gnod sbyin dang /_
[\[353a.2\]]srin po'i dbang po dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan zhing lus mi sdug pa kha dog dang chu zheng sna tshogs can spyod lam gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/_bzhon pa sna tshogs la zhon pa/_'khor sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/_sems can gyi khams yongs su bskyang 
[\[353a.3\]]ba la brtson pa/_'od sna tshogs kyis snang bar bya ba la brtson pa/_dbyangs sna tshogs rab tu sgrog pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas thabs mngon par bsgrub pa sna tshogs ma 'dres pas phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 
[\[353a.4\]]kun gyi nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs shing dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang /_'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang /_lag na rdo rje'i las kyis 
[\[353a.5\]]yang dag par song ba dang /_yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba dang /_sems can log par ltung ba rnams kyi ngan song gi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang /_'jig rten 
[\[353a.6\]]thams cad kyi nad dang /_gnod pa dang 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i don du brtson pa/_sems can gyi don bya bas 'jig rten yongs su bskyang ba la brtson pa rnams bsod nams dang /_ye shes kyi 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs par bya ba 
[\[353a.7\]]dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /_phas kyi rgol ba'i 'khor tshar gcod par byed cing /_chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par byed pa/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mthong ngo /_/mdun gyi lto nas [{]myi [,]mi [}]'am 
[\[353b\]]
[\[353b.1\]]ci'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mi'am ci'i dbang po'i bu mo'i 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa can dang /_dri za'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/_dri za'i dbang po'i bu mo'i 'khor 
[\[353b.2\]]brgya stong grangs med pa can dag byung nas/_lha'i rol mo brgya stong grangs med pa'i sgra snyan pa dang /_glu'i dbyangs kyis chos kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa brjod pa byed cing /_byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsngags pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[353b.3\]]sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa dang /_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sgo thams cad la mngon par bstod pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgo thams cad du 'jug pa dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo thams cad la mngon par spro bar bya ba dang 
[\[353b.4\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su brjod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'i sgo thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang /_sems can gyi sgo thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sgo thams cad yongs 
[\[353b.5\]]su dag par bya ba dang /_chos kyi sgo thams cad mngon par bstan par bya ba dang /_sgrib pa'i sgo thams cad rnam par bzlog par bya ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su bskyed pa byed cing /_chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong 
[\[353b.6\]]dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mthong ngo /_/kha'i sgo nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che bdun dang ldan zhing stobs kyi yan lag bzhi'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang ldan pa byung nas/_sbyin pa chen po'i 'od zer gyi rgyan rab tu 'gyed cing rin po che'i 
[\[353b.7\]]'byung gnas thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang /_nor bu rin po che'i tshogs thams cad sbyin pa dang /_dbul po rnams nor dang ldan par bya ba dang /_srog gcod pa las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang /_byams pa'i sems la sems can 
[\[354a\]]
[\[354a.1\]]rab tu dgod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_rab tu dbral ba dang /_rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su gtang ba dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa las rnam par bzlog pa dang /_
[\[354a.2\]]tshangs pa'i spyod pa la rab tu dgod pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang /_bslu ba [{]myed [,]med [}]pa la gzhol bar rab tu dgod pa dang /_phra ma'i tshig las rnam par bzlog pa dang /_gzhan 'dum par brtson pa'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang /_
[\[354a.3\]]zhe gcod pa'i tshig las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang /_'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang /_gnod pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i byung rgyal du smra ba las sems can rnam par bzlog pa dang /_don zab mo'i tshig 
[\[354a.4\]]rab tu dbye ba gdon mi za ba la yang dag par dgod pa dang /_ngag gi nyes pa thams cad las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang /_snying rje dang ldan pa'i tshig rab tu brjod par bya ba dang /_'jig rten gyi snying gi dri ma yongs su sel cing 'dod pa chung ba 
[\[354a.5\]]dang /_chog shes pa la brtson par sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /_chags sems las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang /_gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud dga' bar byed pa la rab tu dgod pa dang /_lta ba'i dra ba thams cad las 'jig rten rab 
[\[354a.6\]]tu gdon pa dang /_yid gnyis kyi ra ba thams cad rnam par gtor ba dang /_the tsom gyi spo thams cad yang rab tu gzhom pa dang /_nem nur dang som nyi'i rab rib yongs su bstsal ba dang /_chos rnam par dbye ba'i 'jig rten du rab tu dbye 
[\[354a.7\]]ba dang /_rkyen las byung ba rab tu brjod pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis bden pa'i tshul la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang /_sgrib pa med pa'i tshul la gzung ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi don gyi tshul sna tshogs brjod 
[\[354b\]]
[\[354b.1\]]pa byed cing /_phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mthong ngo /_/mig gnyis nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor brgya stong sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/_sems can dmyal ba 
[\[354b.2\]]chen po thams cad yongs su snang bar byed cing 'jig rten gyi mun pa chen po sel ba dang /_sems can rnams kyi gti mug gi rab rib sel ba dang /_grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi grang ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang /_
[\[354b.3\]]sa'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od kha dog dkar po can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /_gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od bai DUr+ya'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /_bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od dngul gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /_dngul gyi rang bzhin gyi
