[\[354b.4\]]zhing rnams su 'od gser gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /_gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od shel gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /_gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /_a smra gar+b+ha'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams 
[\[354b.5\]]su 'od gser gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /_gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od a sma gar+b+ha'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /_in dra nI la'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /_rin po che'i rgyal po 
[\[354b.6\]]nyi ma'i snying po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po in dra nI la'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /_mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /_
[\[354b.7\]]rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /_rin po che gcig gi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed 
[\[355a\]]
[\[355a.1\]]pa dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che gcig gi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang /_de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems 
[\[355a.2\]]can gyi don tshad med pa la brtson zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mthong ngo /_/smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas zla ba mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/_lha'i dbang po 
[\[355a.3\]]thams cad zil gyis gnon cing /_'jig rten thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba rnam par bzlog pa dang /_sangs rgyas blta bar dga' ba la rjes su bsngags pa byed cing /_sems can tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa gdul ba la brtson par phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings 
[\[355a.4\]]rgyas par 'gengs par mthong ngo /_/'phral ba nas tshangs pa chen po spyod lam rab tu zhi ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ba nas/_tshangs pa'i dbyangs su brjod de/_sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa dang 
[\[355a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba byed cing sems can gyi don tshad med pa la brtson par phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mthong ngo /_/mgo nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas 
[\[355a.6\]]kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/_kha dog dang dbyibs sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i lus yongs su ston cing /_dpe byad bzang pos rnam par bris pa'i lus rab tu ston pa dang /_'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin mtha' dang 
[\[355a.7\]]dbus med pa rab tu dgye ba dang /_ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nas bzung ste/_gtong ba dang len pa dang /_dngos po yongs su gtong ba'i sprin mang po rab tu dgye ba dang /_pha 
[\[355b\]]
[\[355b.1\]]rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho yongs su bstan pa dang /_sbyin pa'i spyod pa 'jig rten du yongs su brjod pa dang /_ser sna'i dri ma rnam par bzlog pa dang /_chags pa thams cad spang ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /_
[\[355b.2\]]'jig rten rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /_mtshan thams cad kyi yon tan yang dag par brjod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mtshan 'byung ba'i rgyu ston pa 
[\[355b.3\]]byed pa mthong ngo /_/yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing /_ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi pha 
[\[355b.4\]]rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho yongs su bstan pa dang /_sems can thams cad lam gyi rgyud dang yul las phyir phyogs par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la mngon du phyogs par bya ba dang /_'jig rten gyi 'dod pa la rnam 
[\[355b.5\]]par smad pa dang /_'jig rten gyi phyin ci log gi ling tog rnam par bsal ba dang /_log pa'i rnam par rtog pa rab tu zhi bar byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la yang dag par dgod pa dang /_snying rje chen po'i tshul khrims yongs 
[\[355b.6\]]su brjod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas kyi lam nan tan du bya ba'i tshul khrims la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /_srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud rmi lam lta bur sems can rnams la rab tu 
[\[355b.7\]]brjod cing /_rmi lam gyi tshul dang mnyam par yongs su gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir yul yongs su 'dzin pa dang nyon mongs pa la dbang bsgyur bar sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa byed pa mthong ngo /_/yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas 
[\[356a\]]
[\[356a.1\]]kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/_'jig rten rnams la mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu mngon par ston cing /_khro ba med pa dang /_'khrug pa med pa dang /_shar gnyer ba med pa dang /_zhe sdang ba med 
[\[356a.2\]]pa dang /_chud gson pa med pa dang /_khong khro ba med pa'i sems la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /_byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad yongs su gcod pa'i phyir/_ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 
[\[356a.3\]]ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i sprin rab tu 'gyed cing bzod pa'i stobs la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /_chos la dbang bsgyur ba la sems can rab tu snang bar byed pa mthong ngo /_/yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas 
[\[356a.4\]]kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs mtha' yas pa shin tu ston cing /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du brtsams pa las phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog pa'i stobs kyis thos pa rgya mtsho yongs su btsal 
[\[356a.5\]]bas mi skyo bar bya ba yongs su brjod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing rim gro bya ba la sems can rab tu gzud pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i brtson 'grus chen po la sems can rab tu 
[\[356a.6\]]dgod pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin lus thams cad las rab tu 'gyed cing byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa dang /_sems 
[\[356a.7\]]can rnams kyi le lo'i ri rnam par gtor ba dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang las la dbang bsgyur ba la 'jig rten rab tu gzud pa dang /_rgyun mi chad par brtson par byed pa mthong ngo /_/yang byang chub 
[\[356b\]]
[\[356b.1\]]sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes su dran pa'i lam la sems can thams cad rab tu dgod cing sgrib pa dang /_bar du gcod pa dang /_rab rib thams cad rnam 
[\[356b.2\]]par sel ba dang /_rlom pa dang bag med pa thams cad las sems can rnam par bzlog pa dang /_bag yod pa'i chos la rab tu dgod pa dang /_khengs pa 'gying ba dang /_nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan rab tu snyol ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bsam 
[\[356b.3\]]gtan gyi yan lag rgya mtsho brjod pa dang /_'jig rten rnams la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngags pa dang /_ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi tshul mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye 
[\[356b.4\]]ba dang /_sems la dbang bsgyur ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa byed cing skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo /_/yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 
[\[356b.5\]]byung ste/_ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang /_dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i skad thams cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa dang /_
[\[356b.6\]]yang dag par lta ba'i glog rab tu 'gyed pa dang /_chos kyi rang bzhin gyi sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang /_sems can rnams kyi bdag tu lta ba'i ri'i lhun rab tu gzhig pa dang /_lta ba thams cad kyi zug rngu dbyung ba dang /_the tsom dang yid 
[\[356b.7\]]gnyis dang nem nur gyi rab rib rnam par bstsal ba dang /_ye shes kyi dbang yang dag par bsngags pa byed cing /_sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo /_/yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[357a\]]
[\[357a.1\]]grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thabs mkhas pa'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu brjod pa byed cing ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang 
[\[357a.2\]]po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang /_'jig rten rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa rab tu brjod pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i 'byung ba mngon par bstan pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par bsngags pa dang /_'khor ba 
[\[357a.3\]]dang mya ngan las 'das pa tha [{]myi [,]mi [}]dad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /_'jig rten rnams la byang chub sems 
[\[357a.4\]]dpa'i dbang gi dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan pa byed cing /_sems bskyed pa re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo /_/yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/_ba spu'i bu ga thams cad 
[\[357a.5\]]nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgrog cing /_ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin 
[\[357a.6\]]rab tu dgye ba dang /_smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsngags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang /_smon lam chen po'i shing rta'i 'khor lo phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par 'dril 
[\[357a.7\]]ba/_chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa/_mi shes pa'i ri rnam par 'thor ba/_'jig rten du rab tu brjod pa byed cing /_smon lam sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pas/_sems kyi skad cig re re 
[\[357b\]]
[\[357b.1\]]la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo //_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po sum cu pa/_yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 
[\[357b.2\]]byung ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rab tu snang bar bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i stobs yongs su bsgrub pa'i sgra rab tu dbyung ba dang /_ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrub cing 'byin pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i 
[\[357b.3\]]sprin rab tu dgye ba dang /_bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i stobs yongs su bstan pa dang /_khor yug dang rdo rje'i ri thams cad lus kyi steng du rdib kyang mi nyams pa'i stobs rab tu brjod pa dang /_bskal pas 
[\[357b.4\]]tshig pa thams cad kyi me rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas kyang lus la gnod pa med pa'i stobs yongs su bstan pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad lag pa'i mthil gyi nam mkha'i dbyings su ston pa'i stobs yongs su ston pa byed 
[\[357b.5\]]cing /_sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings su 'gengs pas rgyun mi gcod pa mthong ngo /_/yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/_sems can rnams la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ston cing 
[\[357b.6\]]ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang /_'jig rten rnams la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan dang /_ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes 
[\[357b.7\]]kyis rab tu brjod pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par bstan pa dang /_smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su brjod pa dang /_
[\[358a\]]
[\[358a.1\]]sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis shin tu yangs par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad bdag [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rang bzhin la gzud pa 
[\[358a.2\]]mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par bstan pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho rnam par blta ba mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu brjod pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnam par 
[\[358a.3\]]dbye ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu dbye ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa rnam par blta ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yang dag par brjod pa dang /_sems can 
[\[358a.4\]]thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par grol ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan 
[\[358a.5\]]pa byed cing /_sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mthong ngo /_/spyi bo'i gtsug tor gyi gseb nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed 
[\[358a.6\]]mtshan dam pa dang /_dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pas brgyan pa/_'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi ri bo shin tu 'bar ba ltar snang ba 'od kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur spa zhing tshad med par 'bar ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings tshul gyis rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 
[\[358a.7\]]dbyangs mnga' ba/_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su ston pa 'gro ba thams cad la tha mi dad par chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs pa ste/_'di ltar snying po byang chub mchog tu phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[358b\]]
[\[358b.1\]]rnams la chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi'i bye brag mngon sum du shes pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la gzhi kun tu rten pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa 
[\[358b.2\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chos chen po'i rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba rnams la sgo kun nas 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur pa rnams la kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi 
[\[358b.3\]]sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshogs shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa rnams 
[\[358b.4\]]la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi bye brag shes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa rnams la 'gro ba yongs su sdud pas kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab 
[\[358b.5\]]pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' cher skyes pa rnams la dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum du dmigs pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la spyod 
[\[358b.6\]]pa rnams la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang gzhi rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshul dang thabs kyi snying po'i sprin kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 
[\[358b.7\]]chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams la dga' bar bgyi ba'i mdzod shin tu bstsags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[359a\]]
[\[359a.1\]]yangs pa la mos pa rnams la rnam par thar pa mi zad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam gyis dga' bar byed pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_gzugs la spyod pa'i sems can 
[\[359a.2\]]rnams la gzhi kun tu mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha rnams la tshul rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i 'brug sgra'i dbyangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_dbang bsgyur gyi 
[\[359a.3\]]lha rnams la stobs 'byung ba'i chos kyi yo byad mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs rgyal mtshan sna tshogs can yang dag par bsgrub pa'i dbyangs shes 
[\[359a.4\]]bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_'phrul dga'i lha rnams la ye shes rin po che sna tshogs la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i smon 
[\[359a.5\]]lam rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_mtshe ma'i lha rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_
[\[359a.6\]]lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas dge ba'i shugs 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi dbyings kyi nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[359a.7\]]pa'i gnas rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_dri za'i dbang po'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos yang dag par bgro ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 
[\[359b\]]
[\[359b.1\]]dbab pa dang /_lha ma yin gyi gnas su ye shes kyi tshul rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i thabs kyi sprin ces bya 
[\[359b.2\]]ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_mi'am ci'i dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi sprin yang dag par 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbyangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_klu'i dbang po'i gnas su byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[359b.3\]]rnam par 'phrul pa sgrog cing srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud las skyo ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i gnas su dga' ba rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'i shugs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char 
[\[359b.4\]]mngon par dbab pa dang /[ {]myi'i [,]mi'i [}]gnas su 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad 
[\[359b.5\]]rab tu zhi ba'i dbyangs dang /_'phags pa'i lam gyi tshig gi rgyud kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_byol song gi skye gnas su las kyi lam kha na ma tho ba med pa la nan tan du bya ba'i dbyangs dang /_de bzhin 
[\[359b.6\]]gshegs pa rjes su dran pa'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lhun ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrag pa/_sems can thams cad 
[\[359b.7\]]kyi gtong ba'i sems 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang /_sems can log par ltung ba rnams la sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba rab tu 'thob pas dbugs 'byung ba'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char 
[\[360a\]]
[\[360a.1\]]mngon par dbab pa mdzad cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mthong ngo /_/ba spu'i bu ga thams cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi kha dog dang 
[\[360a.2\]]gzugs kyi glong dang rgyan grangs med pa can dgos pa sna tshogs grangs med pa la sta gon du gnas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/_phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ste/_'di 
[\[360a.3\]]ltar ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /_dkyil 'khor la la las ni sbyin pa'i spyod pa skyon med pas/_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo /_/ba spu'i sgo'i dra ba dang /_dkyil 'khor la la las ni dus gsum 
[\[360a.4\]]gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang /_yi dam dang tshul khrims kyi dkyil 'khor du rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo /_/ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /_dkyil 'khor la la las ni byang chub sems 
[\[360a.5\]]dpa' thams cad bzod pa'i spyod pa'i rnam pa dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rka lag dang /_yan lag gi dam pa bcad kyang nyams su bzod pa byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_khu tshur dang dbyig pas bsnun te/_mtshon 
[\[360a.6\]]gyis lus la btab kyang nyams su bzod par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_lus thams cad gshegs sam/_snying dang [{]myig [,]mig [}]phyung yang nyams su bzod pa byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum du byung 
[\[360a.7\]]ba rnam par brtags pa'i lus dang ldan pa gzhan dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal ba'i ched du lus dang /_sems la gnod pa thams cad dang yan lag dang nying lag bcad pa thams cad kyang snying rje chen pos dbang du byas pa'i phyir nyams 
[\[360b\]]
[\[360b.1\]]su bzod par byas pa dang /_bag la zha bar byas pa dang btang snyoms su bzhag pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i spyod pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi gzugs de lta bu dag kyang mthong ngo /_/ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /_
[\[360b.2\]]dkyil 'khor la la las ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa rnam par phye ba'i gzugs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam 
[\[360b.3\]]par 'phrul pa 'jig rten yongs su bskyod pa dang rgya mtsho yongs su bskyod pa dang /_sems can yongs su skyo bar bya ba dang /_mu stegs can thams cad yongs su tshar gcad pa dang /_bdud thams cad spa dgong ba dang /_chos kyi phyogs snang bar 
[\[360b.4\]]bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen por rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo /_/ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /_dkyil 'khor la la las ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba'i rnam grangs ji snyed pa dang lus nye bar len pa ji 
[\[360b.5\]]snyed pa dang /_rigs su skye ba yongs su bzung ba ci snyed pa dang /_gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa ji snyed pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rjes su bstan pa yongs su bzung ba ji snyed pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis man ngag la nan tan du bya ba'i gnas ji snyed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam 
[\[360b.6\]]gtan gyi yan lag yongs su bsgrub pa dang /_'thun pa'i gtsug lag khang dang /_gnas dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_yul dang /_ri'i su la ji snyed pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag sus yongs su bsgrub pa'i drang srong gi lus ji snyed pa dang /_rgyal po'i thabs ji snyed 
[\[360b.7\]]pa dang /_'byung ba la mngon par mos pa ji snyed pa dang /_brtul zhugs dang yi dam dang /_tshul dang spyod lam ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]mthong ngo /_/ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /_dkyil 'khor la la 
[\[361a\]]
[\[361a.1\]]las ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa la rnam par spyod cing /_chos thams cad yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa'i lus yongs su bzung ba mthong ste/_lus gang gis chos kyi tshig gcig gi don du yang ba dog pa thams cad yongs 
[\[361a.2\]]su btang ste/_sems can thams cad las yongs su btsal ba dang rim gro dang /_bkur sti thams cad kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad las yongs su btsal ba dang /_dad pa dang sri zhus lus rab tu btud de/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 
[\[361a.3\]]las yongs su btsal ba dang /_chos kyi tshig gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshig thams cad la'ang de bzhin te/_'gro ba thams cad du gzugs brnyan byung ba'i lus thams cad kyi yongs su btsal ba de dag 
[\[361a.4\]]thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]ba spu'i sgo gcig gi 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor las mthong ngo /_/ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang /_dkyil 'khor la la las ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems can yongs su smin 
[\[361a.5\]]par bya ba'i thabs 'gro ba'i rgyud rgya mtsho thams cad du 'byam klas pa/_sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i sbyor bar mthong ngo /_/sems can re re la yang lus dang spyod pa'i tshul gyi sgo/_sngon gyi lus nye bar blangs pa thabs mkhas 
[\[361a.6\]]pa'i spyod pa la brtson pa/_sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas yongs su sdud pa yang ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig las mthong ngo /_/ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni sngon bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[361a.7\]]bskal pa thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa dang /_zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa mdzad 
[\[361b\]]
[\[361b.1\]]pa ji snyed pa dang /_smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dkyil 'khor ji snyed cig de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi zhabs kyi drung du 'khor ba'i skyon thams cad las so so'i re re'i gnyen por mngon par bsgrubs par mdzad pa/_de dag thams 
[\[361b.2\]]cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig las mthong ngo /_/ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor 
[\[361b.3\]]ba rgya mtsho mthong ngo /_/ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni ye shes kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba thams cad dang ldan pa mi shes pa'i gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can sad par byed pa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho 
[\[361b.4\]]mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa la sems shing rtog pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de rjes su dran par bya ba dang /_byang chub 
[\[361b.5\]]sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de la rjes su rnam par bsam pa dang /_sems can gyi don gyi tshul rgya mtsho de la 'jug par bya ba dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo rgyud kun la mngon du gnas pa'i rgyan de'i rjes su 'brang zhing khong 
[\[361b.6\]]du chud par bya ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi sgo de la 'jug par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par mnod pa'i ye shes de la rab tu brtag pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dbang gi 
[\[361b.7\]]stobs de yongs su bskyed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi stobs de brtan par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i stobs de shin tu rgyas par bya ba byed cing /_dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi mdun du nyin zhag gcig 
[\[362a\]]
[\[362a.1\]]kyang lon no/_/nyin zhag gnyis dang bdun yang lon no/_/zla ba phyed dang zla ba gcig dang /_zla ba gnyis dang zla ba drug gi bar dang /_nyin zhag kyang drug tu dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi mdun du lon te/_de ltar zla ba drug dang /_
[\[362a.2\]]nyin zhag drug 'das nas dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan ting nge 'dzin de las langs so/_/de nas nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]smras pa/_'phags pa ting nge 'dzin 'di de ltar zab la/_de ltar rgya che zhing de ltar tshad ma mchis pa'i yul dang ldan pa dang /_de ltar bsam gyis 
[\[362a.3\]]mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang /_de ltar snang ba mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang /_de ltar grangs ma mchis pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang /_de ltar mi 'phrogs pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa dang /_de ltar ma 'dres pa'i yul dang ldan pa dang /_de ltar phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba dang /_ting nge 
[\[362a.4\]]'dzin 'di de ltar sems can gyi don tshad ma mchis pa rab tu sgrub par gyur pa ni ngo mtshar te/_de ni sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po tshad ma mchis pa rnam par zhi bar bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas pa ste/_'di ltar dbul ba'i sdug bsngal 
[\[362a.5\]]zhi bar bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas so/_/sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud rgyun bcad pa dang /_byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud las yongs su bskyab pa dang /_mi khom pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sgo thams cad gcad pa dang /_mtho ris kyi lam gyi rgyud 
[\[362a.6\]]du phyin par bgyi ba dang /_lha dang mi'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba 'byung bar bgyi ba dang /_bsam gtan gyi yul gyis dga' ba nyams su myong bar bgyi ba dang /_'dus byas la spyod pa'i bde ba yongs su 'phel bar bgyi ba dang /_khams gsum pa 
[\[362a.7\]]las 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su bstan pa la sta gon du gnas so/_byang chub kyi sems yang dag par skye ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa la sta gon du gnas so/_/bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par skye ba'i rgyu rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang /_
[\[362b\]]
[\[362b.1\]]snying rje chen po'i shugs rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang /_smon lam chen po'i stobs yongs su bskyed par bgyi ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lam snang ba rab tu thob par bgyi ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'i theg pa rnam par dgod 
[\[362b.2\]]pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i khyad par la 'jug pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes shing snang bar bgyi ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sa shes shing snang ba thob par bgyi ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon 
[\[362b.3\]]lam dang spyod pa dang /_'byung ba'i rgyan rnam par dag pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa gnan pa la thogs pa ma mchis par bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas pa'o/_/'phags pa ting nge 'dzin de'i ming ci zhes bgyi smras pa/_
[\[362b.4\]]rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i btang snyoms yongs su thob pa zhes bya ba yod de/_ting nge 'dzin 'di ni de'i snang ba ste/_sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun 
[\[362b.5\]]nas lta ba'i btang snyoms rab tu thob pa'i snang ba las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shin tu bsgoms na sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa ting nge 'dzin brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu tshang ba 
[\[362b.6\]]yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_'phags pa ting nge 'dzin 'di'i yul der bas sam ma bas/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs pa la ni 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dmigs pa la thogs pa med do/_/
[\[362b.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams su 'jug par bya ba la thogs pa med do/_/'jig rten gyi khams rnam par gnon pa la thogs pa med do/_/'jig rten gyi khams yongs su brgyan pa la thogs pa med do/_/'jig rten gyi khams yongs su sbyang ba la 
[\[363a\]]
[\[363a.1\]]thogs pa med do/_/'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par bya ba la thogs pa med do/_/sangs rgyas blta zhing rnam par dmigs par bya ba la thogs pa med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba brtag pa la thogs 
[\[363a.2\]]pa med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi stobs la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtshor 'jug pa la thogs pa med do/_/sangs 
[\[363a.3\]]rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yongs su gzung ba la thogs pa med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ma 'dres pa shes shing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la 'jug cing 
[\[363a.4\]]khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/_/phyogs bcur 'jug cing rjes su bgrang bar bya ba la thogs pa med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa rjes su brtag par bya ba la thogs pa med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi phyogs rjes su brtag par bya ba la 
[\[363a.5\]]thogs pa med do/_/snying rje chen po'i phyogs rnam par mi spang ba la thogs pa med do/_/byams pas phyogs rgyas par dgang ba la thogs pa med do/_/sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyogs la 'jug pas mi ngoms par bya ba la thogs pa med do/_/
[\[363a.6\]]sems can rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/_/sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho thams cad shes shing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do/_/sems can gyi dbang po tha dad pa thams cad shes par bya ba la thogs 
[\[363a.7\]]pa med do/_/rigs kyi bu kho bos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa 'di shes su zad na/_byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi yul la blo gros rnam par 
[\[363b\]]
[\[363b.1\]]dag pa/_chos thams cad la rig pa rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes can/_blo shin tu yangs pas tshad med pa'i yul rgyas par 'gengs pa gzungs chen po'i snang ba la dbang bsgyur ba/_ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba thams cad shin tu dag pa 
[\[363b.2\]]mngon par shes pa rnam par 'grul ba dang /_khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa la shin tu byung ba so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/_ngag snyan pa sa'i snying po dang ldan pa brjod pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa rnams kyi spyod 
[\[363b.3\]]pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod pa'am/_spyod yul bstan pa'am/_yul rab tu brjod pa'am/_smon lam chen po'i stobs yang dag par bsngags pa'am/_'byung ba'i sgo yongs su snang bar bya ba 'am/_yang dag par bsgrub pa mngon par 
[\[363b.4\]]brjod pa'am/_lam yongs su bstan pa'am/_ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyun gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'am/_sems kyi yul shes par bya ba'am/_ye shes mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par bya bar nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na 
[\[363b.5\]]phyogs kyi gnas rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba zhig grong khyer 'od chen po zhes bya ba'i shar phyogs logs na yod de/_de na shed las skyes pa'i rgyal po 'od [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]chung 
[\[363b.6\]]ma dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin zhes bya ba yod kyis/_de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tu bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dga' rangs te/_
[\[363b.7\]]mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/_dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan las snying po yongs su blangs te/_chos kyi nye bar 'tsho ba byas pa/_ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la zhugs pa/_snang ba thob pa ye shes kyis snang bar gyur pa/_ting nge 
[\[364a\]]
[\[364a.1\]]'dzin gyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/_mos pa rnam par dag pa khong du chud pa/_sems can chos kyi tshul gyis snang ba'i rjes su song ba/_rnam par dag pa'i sgos snang ba dang ldan par gyur pa/_phyogs su ye shes kyi snang ba rab 
[\[364a.2\]]tu 'dal ba des/_dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan la btud de phyag 'tshal nas/_yang dang yang lta zhing 
[\[364a.3\]]yang dang yang mngon par blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_rab tu gdud pa dang /_gus par bya ba dang /_rim gror bya ba dang /_yid la bya ba dang /_bsam pa dang /_bsgom pa dang /_yongs su bsgom pa dang /_legs par brjod pa dang /_ngo mtshar du bya ba 
[\[364a.4\]]dang /_yon tan mngon du bya ba dang /_rjes su bsngags pa dang /_rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /_rjes su dran par bya ba dang /_brtan par bya ba dang /_mi gtang ba dang /_yid la bsam pa dang /_rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /_smon lam gyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba 
[\[364a.5\]]dang /_mthong bar dga' ba dang /_dbyangs kyi mtshan ma gzung ba dang /_gzungs kyi rjes su bsam pa dang /_ming yongs su gzung ba'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ba dang /_kha dog dang /_dbyibs rjes su dran par bya ba dang /_ye shes kyi yul rjes su 
[\[364a.6\]]bsam pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang /_smon lam gyi yul la rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /_spyod yul gyi yul rnam par sbyang bar bya ba dang /_ye shes kyi snang ba yongs su gzung ba byed cing /_dge slong rgya mtsho'i 
[\[364a.7\]]rgyal mtshan gyi drung nas song ngo //_//sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po so gcig pa/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi yon tan gyis ni mgu/_dge 
[\[364b\]]
[\[364b.1\]]ba'i bshes gnyen gyis ni yang dag par bsngags te btang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba'i byin gyis ni byin du brlabs/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la ni nan tan du byed/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid du 'ong ba ni rjes su 
[\[364b.2\]]sems/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'byung gnas tsam du lta/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ston pa yin par yang dag par lta/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos la rjes 
[\[364b.3\]]su lta/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs rgyas nam mkha' blta ba la mig tsam tu lta zhing mthar gyis phyogs kyi gnas rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa/_gang na ba der phyin nas des mthong ba/_bza' shing gi rab kun nas rnam par brgyan 
[\[364b.4\]]pa/_rin po che thams cad kyi ra bas kun nas bskor ba/_rin po che'i shing gi phreng ba spel ba legs pas yongs su brgyan pa/_rin po che thams cad kyi shing gi phreng ba'i me tog srab bu yid du 'ong ba'i sprin rab tu 'brul bas gzhi rgyas pa/_rin po che thams cad kyi shing gis yang dag par brgyan 
[\[364b.5\]]pa/_shing thams cad kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba/_spos sna tshogs kyi shing gi phreng ba las phyogs kun tu spos kyi ngad zhim pa rin po che'i phreng ba'i shing sna tshogs kyi lhun las rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba 'phyang ba/_rab tu 'byung 
[\[364b.6\]]zhing char ltar mngon par bab pa/_rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi shing dang nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes shing spa la/_rgya cher brgyan pa'i gzhi can yid bzhin gyi gos kyi shing thams cad las kha dog sna tshogs kyi gos 'byung bas gam yo khebs shing 
[\[364b.7\]]mdzes par brgyan pa/_sil snyan gyi shing thams cad las lha rdzas las kyang 'phags pa'i sil snyan rlung gis bskyod cing sgra 'byin pa'i dbyangs snyan par 'byung ba/_sa'i gzhi mthon dman med par gnas pa rgyan gyi shing sna tshogs kyi gseb nas/_rgyan sna 
[\[365a\]]
[\[365a.1\]]tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa rgyun tu 'byung zhing 'phyang bas/_rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa mthong ste/_bza' shing gi ra ba chen po kun nas rnam par brgyan pa de'i nang na khang pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun kyang nor bu rin po che 
[\[365a.2\]]dam pa sna tshogs kyi ba gam gyis rnam par brgyan pa dang /_khang pa brtsegs pa brgya stong phrag bcu 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las brtsegs pa'i bad dang ldan pa dang /_gzhal med khang brgya stong phrag bcu ka gdung rin po che rnam par snang ba/_
[\[365a.3\]]las bres pa/_rdzing bu brgya stong phrag bcu rin po che thams cad las gzhi blangs te/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi pha gus mu khyud byas pa/_rin po che thams cad kyi them skas btags pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs bus bskor ba/_lha 
[\[365a.4\]]rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/_gser gyi bye mas kun tu gram pa/_gzhi nor bu rin po che chu 'dang kun tu bkram pa/_phyogs bzhi nas them skas rnam par bres pa/_yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/_nga dur dang /_
[\[365a.5\]]rma bya dang /_khu byug dang /_khrung khrung dang /_ka la ping ka dang /_ku na la'i sgra skad snyan pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/_rin po che'i ta la'i phreng bas kun nas brgyan pa/_gser gyi dril bu'i dra bas kun nas yog pa/_rlung gis bskyod pa'i 
[\[365a.6\]]sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba/_steng nas rin po che'i bla re chen po bres pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi ra bas yongs su bskor ba/_rin po che'i dra bas brgyan pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan legs par bsgreng ba/_lu ma brgya stong phrag bcu dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi 'dam gyis 
[\[365a.7\]]mtha' 'khor ba rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa'i pad mos yongs su khyab pa/_rin po che'i pad mo'i 'od chen pos snang bar gyur pa'i chu dri ma med pa dang ldan pa yod pa ste/_bza' shing gi ra ba de'i dbus na gzhal med khang chen po 
[\[365b\]]
[\[365b.1\]]rgyal mtshan sna tshogs zhes bya ba/_sa'i gzhi rin po che rgya mtsho'i snying po las blangs pa/_nor bu rin po che'i ka ba bkye ba 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lhun mngon par 'phags pa nor bu rin po che 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i spang leb bkye bas 
[\[365b.2\]]brgyan pa/_gzhi nor bu rin po che 'bar ba grangs med pa'i dra bas bres pa/_rin po che'i rgyal po mi pham pa'i spos kyi dris gam yo kun nas bdugs pa/_rin po che'i rgyal po sgra snyan pa 'byin pa'i dri ngad kun tu ldang ba/_rin po che'i rgyal po dri rnam 
[\[365b.3\]]par gsal bar byed pas dbang po rno ba'i bag chags rnam par bsgrub pa dang ldan zhing gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs der stan grangs med cing tshad med pa bting bar gyur pa 'di lta ste pad mo'i snying po can dang /_nor bu rin po che phyogs snang 
[\[365b.4\]]bar byed pa'i pad mo'i snying po can dang /_nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i pad mo'i snying po can dang /_nor bu rin po che 'gro ba yid du 'ong ba'i pad mo'i snying po can dang /_nor bu rin po che mdzod sna tshogs kyi pad mo'i snying po can dang /_rin 
[\[365b.5\]]po che seng ge'i shing thags kyi pad mo'i snying po can dang /_nor bu rin po che dri ma [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i pad mo'i snying po can dang /_nor bu rin po ches brgyan pa'i pad mo'i snying po can dang /_nor bu rin po che sgo kun nas brgyan pa'i pad mo'i snying po can dang /_nor bu rin 
[\[365b.6\]]po che 'od kyi rgyan gyi pad ma'i snying po can dang /_nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa'i rin po ches rnam par brgyan pa'i 'od zer kun tu 'byung ba'i pad mo'i snying po can dang /_nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i seng ges gnon pa'i 
[\[365b.7\]]pad mo'i snying po can dag bshams shing bting ba ste/_gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs de'i ba gam mang po yang /_rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa/_kha dog bsam 
[\[366a\]]
[\[366a.1\]]gyis mi khyab par mdzes shing gzugs yid du 'ong ba dag go_/bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas brgyan pa de/_steng nas bla re chen po brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas khebs pa ste/_'di ltar gos kyi bla re dang khri shing gi bla re dang 
[\[366a.2\]]me tog gi bla re dang /_phreng ba'i bla re dang /_spos kyi bla re dang /_nor bu rin po che'i bla re dang /_gser gyi bla re dang /_rgyan gyi bla re dang /_rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i bla re dang /_glang po'i shugs dang ldan pas sprul pa'i lha mo'i bla re dang /_nor bu rin po che brgya byin 
[\[366a.3\]]mngon par dga' ba'i bla re dang /_de dag la sogs pa bla re brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas khebs par byas pa'o/_/rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas yog pa ste/_'di ltar rin po che dam pa'i dril bu'i dra ba dang /_rin po che'i 
[\[366a.4\]]gdugs kyi dra ba dang /_rin po che'i 'bru'i dra ba dang /_mu tig rgya mtsho'i snying po'i dra ba dang /_nor bu rin po che baiDUr+ya sngon po'i dra ba dang /_seng ge'i khri shing gi dra ba dang /_nor bu rin po che chu shel gyi dra ba dang /_spos kyi gzugs kyi dra ba dang /_
[\[366a.5\]]rin po che'i cod pan dang /_rin po che'i phreng ba'i dra ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas yog pa/_snang ba chen po brgya stong phrag bcus kyang kun nas yog pa ste/_'di ltar nor bu rin po che skar ma'i 'od zer gyi 
[\[366a.6\]]snang ba dang /_nor bu rin po nyi ma'i snying po'i snang ba dang /_nor bu rin po che zla ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi snang ba dang /_nor bu rin po che spos kyi dud pa 'od 'phro ba'i snang ba dang /_nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po'i snang ba dang /_nor bu rin po che 
[\[366a.7\]]pad mo'i snying po'i snang ba dang /_nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi snang ba dang /_nor bu rin po che sgron ma chen po'i snang ba dang /_nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i snang ba dang /_nor bu rin po che spos kyi sprin chen po dang /_
[\[366b\]]
[\[366b.1\]]klog gi phreng ba 'byung ba'i snang ba dang /_de dag la sogs pa nor bu rin po che'i snang ba chen po brgya stong phrag bcus rtag tu snang bar byas pa'o/_/bza' shing gi ra ba de ni rgyan chen po'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i char 'bab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste/_dus 
[\[366b.2\]]dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi sprin brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'brug sgra rab tu 'byung ba/_lha rdzas las 'das pa'i phreng ba dang /_lda ldi'i sprin chen po kun tu mched pas rab tu brgyan pa/_lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gos tshon sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sprin 
[\[366b.3\]]brgya stong phrag bcu'i sprin mngon par 'bab pa/_lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan gyi sprin brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par klubs pa/_lha'i bu brgya stong phrag bcu mthong bar dga' ste/_'og tu lta zhing rab tu 'dud pa'i phyag char bzhin du 'bab pa/_lha 
[\[366b.4\]]mo'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu sngon gyi spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pas rang rang gi lus 'bul ba'i char mngon par 'bab pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu chos mnyan pas/_skom zhing 'ong ba'i char mngon par 'bab ste/_de na dge 
[\[366b.5\]]bsnyen ma yid bzhin gser gyi snying po'i khri chen po la 'dug cing /_mu tig rgya mtsho'i snying po'i dra bas brgyan pa'i cod pan thogs pa/_lag pa la lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gser gyi dpung rgyan dang /_gdub bu thogs pa/_lag pa nor bu rin po che 
[\[366b.6\]]dpal gyi rang bzhin gyi 'od zer gyis rnam par mdzes par gyur pa/_rna cha rin po che mthon ting dri ma med pa rab tu 'phyang ba/_mgo nor bu rin po che'i dra bas mdzes par brgyan pa/_nor bu rin po che seng ge'i gdong gi rna ba'i gong rgyan thogs pa/_
[\[366b.7\]]nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i mgul kor thogs pa/_lus rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas yog cing 'od rab tu 'bar ba/_srog chags bye ba khrag khrig gi lus rab tu btud de/_phyag bya ba zhig 'dug ste/_dge bsnyen ma yid 
[\[367a\]]
[\[367a.1\]]bzhin de'i drung du shar phyogs nas tshangs pa chen po'am/_tshangs lha nye phan dang /_tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'am/_dbang byed dam/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa'am/_rab 'phrul dga' 
[\[367a.2\]]'am/_'phrul dga'i ris su gtogs pa'am/_rab dga' ldan nam/_dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa 'am/_rab mtshe ma 'am/_mtshe ma'i ris su gtogs pa'am/_lha'i dbang po 'am/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa'am/_
[\[367a.3\]]gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_dri za'i dbang po'am/_dri za 'am/_grul bum gyi dbang po'am/_grul bum 'am/_klu'i dbang po 'am/_klu'am/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po'am/_lha ma yin nam/_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'am/_nam mkha' 
[\[367a.4\]]lding ngam/_mi'am ci'i dbang po'am/_mi 'am ci 'am/_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'am/_lto 'phye chen po 'am/_gshin rje 'am/_gshin rje'i bu mo 'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rdzu 'phrul chen po'am/[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]sam/_mi'i dbang po'am/_mi'ang rung ste/_sems 
[\[367a.5\]]can tshad med grangs med pa dag 'ong ba dang /_de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang /_shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang /_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang /_nub byang 
[\[367a.6\]]gi phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang steng gi phyogs nas kyang /_tshangs pa chen po'am/_tshangs lha nye phan nam/_tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'am/_dbang byed dam/_dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa nas/_mi'i dbang po'am/_mi'i bar gyi sems can mang po 
[\[367a.7\]]'ong ba/_de dag nad sna tshogs zhig gis btab pa'am/_nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis kun nas 'khor tam/_lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen tam/_las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa zhig yod na'ang /_de dag gis dge bsnyen ma yid 
[\[367b\]]
[\[367b.1\]]bzhin de mthong ma thag tu nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar gyur/_sems can gyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang yang bral bar gyur/_lta ba'i gsal shing yang phyin par gyur/_sgrib pa'i ri thams cad kyang rnam par bshig par gyur/_rnam par dag pa'i 
[\[367b.2\]]dkyil 'khor bsgribs pa med pa yang khong du chud par gyur te/_rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor de yod pas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rab tu byang bar gyur/_dbang po'i myu gu thams cad kyang rnam par 'phel bar gyur/_thams cad 
[\[367b.3\]]mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtsho la yang dag par gzhol bar gyur/_gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad la'ang 'jug par gyur/_ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang tshul rgya mtsho thams cad kyang mngon sum du gyur/_smon lam gyi sgo thams 
[\[367b.4\]]cad kyang yang dag par skye bar gyur/_spyod pa'i sgo thams cad kyang rab tu byung bar gyur/_yon tan mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo thams cad kyang rnam par dag par gyur/_sems rgya chen po yang mngon par shes pa thams cad dang 
[\[367b.5\]]ldan pa'i tshul du byung bar gyur/_lus thogs pa med pas kyang thams cad du rjes su 'gro bar gyur to/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i nang du phyin te bltas nas/_dge bsnyen ma 
[\[367b.6\]]yid bzhin khri bzang po la 'dug pa mthong nas/_de dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gang na ba der song ste/_phyin nas dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[367b.7\]]'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags 
[\[368a\]]
[\[368a.1\]]ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do/_/zhes thos na/_'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 
[\[368a.2\]]bdag la bshad du gsol/_/des smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mya ngan med pa bde ba'i rgyal mtshan thob pa ste/_rigs kyi bu kho mo ni de'i mthus mthong na don yod pa'o/_/mnyan na don yod pa'o/_/rim gror 
[\[368a.3\]]byas na don yod pa'o/_/gnas gcig na 'grogs pa don yod pa'o/_/rjes su dran par byas pa don yod pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa/_yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[368a.4\]]pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma dgongs pa rnams kyis mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par mig lam du 'ong bar mi 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu kho mo mthong ba tsam gyis ni sems can rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 
[\[368a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu kho mo'i drung du shar phyogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa dag byon cing /_gdan rin po che'i khri 'di la bzhugs nas chos ston to/_/shar phyogs nas ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs bcu nas kyang de bzhin te/_
[\[368a.6\]]rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/_kho mo ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba'o/_/chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs pa dang mi 'bral ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu kho mo dang spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam 
[\[368a.7\]]ba'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go_/rigs 
[\[368b\]]
[\[368b.1\]]kyi bu sems can gzhan gang 'di na gnas pa de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/_phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun du gtogs pa sha stag ste/_kho mo dang spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dag go_/smras pa las 
[\[368b.2\]]'phags ma khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yun ji srid ci gnas thugs bskyed/_smras pa rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[368b.3\]]sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ces bya ba byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung du kho mos tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de kho mos mchod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos bstan pa kho mos yongs su bzung ngo /_/de'i 
[\[368b.4\]]snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba byung ste/_de'i bstan pa la'ang kho mo rab tu byung ngo /_/chos kyi 'khor lo yang kho mos bzung ngo /_/de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa dpal zhes bya ba byung ste/_de yang kho mos bsnyen 
[\[368b.5\]]bkur to/_/de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab dpal zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i snying po zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba byung ngo /_/
[\[368b.6\]]de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa dag pa zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i gtsug ces bya ba byung ngo /_/de'i kun snga 
[\[368b.7\]]rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa chu bo'i lha zhes bya ba byung ste/_rigs kyi bu gzhung de ltar tshe gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa dang /_bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[369a\]]
[\[369a.1\]]pa'i mtshams 'dabs chags su bsams te/_dran par byas na/_gang kho mos rim gror byas te/_bsnyen bkur ba dang /_mchod pa dang /_bsti stang du byas pa dang /_gang gi spyan sngar kho mos chos thos par gyur pa dang /_gang gi bstan 
[\[369a.2\]]pa la kho mos tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gang gA sum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed rjes su dran te/_rigs kyi bu de phan cad du kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bsnyen bkur ba ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 
[\[369a.3\]]mkhyen to/_/rigs kyi bu sems dang po bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu snying rje chen po'i khongs su 'gro ba thams cad chud pas/_byang chub sems 
[\[369a.4\]]dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu smon lam chen pos phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi zad zad du 'gro bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byams pa chen pos 'gro ba thams cad rgyas par 
[\[369a.5\]]'gengs pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas zhing thams cad du bskal pa thams cad yongs su sdud pas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/_/
[\[369a.6\]]rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lam las phyir mi ldog pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzungs kyi stobs kyis 'gro ba thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul 
[\[369a.7\]]khong du chud par byed pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu ye shes snang ba'i stobs kyis dus gsum gyi ye shes kyi tshul/_khong du chud par byed cing /_yang dag par 'dzin pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med 
[\[369b\]]
[\[369b.1\]]pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis zhing thams cad du sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang /_mos pa ci lta ba bzhin du 'od kyi dra ba'i 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/_/rigs kyi 
[\[369b.2\]]bu so so yang dag par rig pa'i stobs kyis tshig gcig brjod kyang 'gro ba thams cad shin tu tshim par byed pas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu lus rnam par dag pas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[369b.3\]]thams cad rang gi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o/_/nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]smras pa/_'phags ma khyod ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon 
[\[369b.4\]]par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_/smras pa rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_sems can gcig cig la dmigs shing gdul bar bya ba dang /_smin par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin te/_sems 
[\[369b.5\]]can brgya'i phyir ma yin/_sems can stong gi phyir ma yin/_sems can brgya phrag stong gi phyir ma yin/_sems can bye ba'i phyir ma yin/_sems can bye ba brgya'i phyir ma yin/_sems can bye ba stong gi phyir ma yin/_sems can bye ba brgya phrag stong gi phyir ma yin te/_
[\[369b.6\]]sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi don du/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no/_/sems can thams thams cad kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can khrag khrig gi phyir ma yin/_/sems can gang 
[\[369b.7\]]ya'i phyir ma yin/_sems can ban bun gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can phyar phyur gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can byang bying gi phyir ma yin/_sems can nyer 'jal gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can phyal phyol gyi phyir ma yin/_
[\[370a\]]
[\[370a.1\]]sems can yal yol gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can ljad ljod kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can phyod zim gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can phyad phyod kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can ldam ldem gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can ya gangs kyi 
[\[370a.2\]]phyir ma yin/_sems can cho ma'i phyir ma yin/_sems can khram khrim gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can nab nub kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can brgyud yas kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can btang yas kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can bkra yar gyi phyir ma 
[\[370a.3\]]yin/_sems can gsal yas kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can gzhal brtag gi phyir ma yin/_sems can mtshungs med kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can lam lum gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can rab rib kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can 
[\[370a.4\]]thab thib kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can 'grigs yol gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can then phyo'i phyir ma yin/_sems can bsam phyod kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can 'dra mnyam gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can brang breng gi phyir ma yin/_sems 
[\[370a.5\]]can bgrong yas kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can rgyas 'dal gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can bsngo yas kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can zang yag gi phyir ma yin/_sems can 'phro bkye'i phyir ma yin/_sems can rtse 'phyo'i phyir ma 
[\[370a.6\]]yin/_sems can yong tan gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can 'brug g.yos kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can sang yal gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can thing yug gi phyir ma yin/_sems can snang yal gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can 
[\[370a.7\]]nan pa'i phyir ma yin/_sems can yid 'phyo'i phyir ma yin/_sems can nab neb kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can khrig thams kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can yal yol gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can bgrang yas kyi phyir ma yin/_
[\[370b\]]
[\[370b.1\]]sems can thug yal gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can yad yud kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can phyo ldog gi phyir ma yin/_sems can brda yas kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can lhub be'i phyir ma yin/_sems can thag thug gi phyir ma yin/_
[\[370b.2\]]sems can khrig ge'i phyir ma yin/_sems can rig yas kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can snyad med kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can mchog phreng gi phyir ma yin/_sems can nyag 'bru'i phyir ma yin/_sems can spu 'phyes 
[\[370b.3\]]kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can 'bru 'brel gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can brjod 'os kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can lhod yas kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can brjod phul gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can zhi snyad kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can 
[\[370b.4\]]ngag thim gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can 'phyo 'gyur gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can nyar nyer gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can phyag phyig gi phyir ma yin/_sems can zal zul gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can sal sal gyi phyir ma 
[\[370b.5\]]yin/_sems can g.yo ldeg gi phyir ma yin/_sems can phan phun gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can brnang ya'i phyir ma yin/_sems can rem grol gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can rdzi ngad kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can rdzi rdul gyi 
[\[370b.6\]]phyir ma yin/_sems can phun yol gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can 'ol 'ol gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can ngad ngad kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can bgrang brtsi'i phyir ma yin/_sems can zab bgrang gi phyir ma yin/_sems can dga' 
[\[370b.7\]]rkyang gi phyir ma yin/_sems can grangs mtha'i phyir ma yin/_sems can phyod yal gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can 'ol phyod kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can gdab yas kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can gcal yas kyi phyir ma yin/_
[\[371a\]]
[\[371a.1\]]sems can bgrang yas kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can byim 'phyo'i phyir ma yin/_sems can yam me'i phyir ma yin/_sems can bsnyal yas kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can ldab ldob kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can 'phan chad kyi 
[\[371a.2\]]phyir ma yin/_sems can phang phung gi phyir ma yin/_sems can mtha' rdul gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can rgyu lding gi phyir ma yin/_sems can yun 'gyangs kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can mkha' yal gyi phyir ma yin/_sems 
[\[371a.3\]]can bun lob kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can lam lom gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can bsnyad yas kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can lang ling gi phyir ma yin/_sems can ljab ljib kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can mi brtsal gyi 
[\[371a.4\]]phyir ma yin/_sems can 'byam yas kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can nga 'grang gi phyir ma yin/_sems can smos yal gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can bkra chal gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can lo rgyas kyi phyir ma yin/_
[\[371a.5\]]sems can 'bum rdib kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can la lo'i phyir ma yin/_sems can phyam phyam gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can bgrang phyos kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can bgrang phyos la bsgres pa'i phyir ma 
[\[371a.6\]]yin/_sems can dpag yas kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can dpag yas la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/_sems can yal phyong gi phyir ma yin/_sems can yal phyong la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/_sems can mu yal

[\[371b\]]
[\[371b.1\]]mi 'jal la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/_sems can bsam phyod kyi phyir ma yin/_sems can bsam phyod la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/_sems can mtha' 'byam gyi phyir ma yin/_sems can mtha' 'byam la bsgres pa'i phyir ma 
[\[371b.2\]]yin/_sems can dpag thag gi phyir ma yin/_sems can dpag thag la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/_sems can brjod du med pa'i phyir ma yin/_sems can brjod du med pa la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/_sems can brjod 
[\[371b.3\]]du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i phyir ma yin/_sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/_sems can 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa nas/_brjod du 
[\[371b.4\]]med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/_gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/_
[\[371b.5\]]stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/_stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i 
[\[371b.6\]]sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa nas/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig 
[\[371b.7\]]rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du 'di lta ste yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub 
[\[372a\]]
[\[372a.1\]]tu skye ba ma yin gyi/_'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa lhag ma med pa mtha' dag thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[372a.2\]]rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o/_/'di lta ste sangs rgyas gcig bsnyen bkur ba dang /_mnyes par bya ba dang /_mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[372a.3\]]bcu bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang /_mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas/_brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang /_mchod 
[\[372a.4\]]cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/_'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang /_mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas/_
[\[372a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang /_mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[372a.6\]]rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/_'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin 
[\[372a.7\]]tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi bstan pa yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu 
[\[372b\]]
[\[372b.1\]]skye ba ma yin pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/_sangs rgyas gcig 
[\[372b.2\]]rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas rab tu 
[\[372b.3\]]zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[372b.4\]]dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[372b.5\]]dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/_sangs rgyas gcig gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang 
[\[372b.6\]]brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byang chub 
[\[372b.7\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byang chub sems 
[\[373a\]]
[\[373a.1\]]dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/_sems can gyi sems rgya mtsho gcig khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang 
[\[373a.2\]]brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi sems rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/_sems can gcig gi dbang po'i 'khor lo yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/_
[\[373a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi dbang po'i 'khor lo yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[373a.4\]]dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/_sems can gcig gi dbang po rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu 
[\[373a.5\]]phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/_'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par bya ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub 
[\[373a.6\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par bya ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/_
[\[373a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/_'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 
[\[373b\]]
[\[373b.1\]]sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug par bya 
[\[373b.2\]]ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/_'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[373b.3\]]rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug 
[\[373b.4\]]par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/_'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[373b.5\]]kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/_
[\[373b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/_'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub 
[\[373b.7\]]tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[374a\]]
[\[374a.1\]]rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin gyi/_sems can gyi khams ma lus pa lhag ma med pa mtha' dag thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o/_/
[\[374a.2\]]sangs rgyas ma lus pa thams cad bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang /_mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[374a.3\]]rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang /_mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam la mngon par mos pa yin/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems 
[\[374a.4\]]dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa brtan par 'gyur ba yin/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ma lus pa thams cad yongs su gzung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba 'byung ba yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa 
[\[374a.5\]]tha dad pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyi shugs drag po skye ba yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/_byang 
[\[374a.6\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yi dam brtan pa skye ba yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par mos pa 'byung ba yin/_'gro ba'i sems rgya mtsho 
[\[374a.7\]]ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam yongs su skye ba yin/_sems can gyi dbang po'i 'khor lo ma lus pa thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa skye ba yin/_sems 
[\[374b\]]
[\[374b.1\]]can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spro ba skye ba yin/_'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[374b.2\]]rnams kyi mos pa skye ba yin/_sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yongs su gcad pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongs su skye ba yin/_sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi las 
[\[374b.3\]]dang nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes chen po'i nyi ma 'char ba yin/_sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi snang ba 'byung ba yin/_
[\[374b.4\]]sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi me'i phung po rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i sprin chen po kun nas 'du ba yin/_rigs kyi bu mdor na de dag la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul dang /_
[\[374b.5\]]sgo grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bcu dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su bsgrub par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/_chos thams cad la yang dag 
[\[374b.6\]]par gzhol ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir zhing thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/_kho mos ni bdag gi smon lam nam mkha'i dbyings rnam par dag pa'i mtha' gang 
[\[374b.7\]]du thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog shig_/bdag gi smon lam 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog shig_/bdag gi smon lam sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang /_bag chags kyi 
[\[375a\]]
[\[375a.1\]]mtshams sbyor ba dang /_bag la nyal ba'i mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog shig_/ces de ltar smon lam btab bo/_/smras pa/_'phags ma rnam par thar pa 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu rnam par 
[\[375a.2\]]thar pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa med pa bde ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba ste/_rigs kyi bu kho mos kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de gcig pu shes par zad na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa'i phyir/_
[\[375a.3\]]sems rgya mtsho dang ldan pa lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i phyir ri rab dang 'dra ba/_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu sos par byed pa'i phyir sman gyi rgyal po mthong na legs pa lta bu/_sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i 
[\[375a.4\]]mun pa sel ba'i phyir nyi mar gyur pa/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i gnas su gyur pas sa lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi don byed pa'i phyir rlung du gyur pa/_sems can thams cad la ye shes kyi snang ba 'byin pa'i phyir mar mer gyur 
[\[375a.5\]]pa/_zhi ba'i sgras sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi char yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'bebs pa'i phyir sprin du gyur pa bsod nams kyi 'od gzer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa'i phyir zla ba lta bu/_'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i phyir/_brgya byin lta bu 
[\[375a.6\]]de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa smos pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi rnam pa mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su bstan par nus re skan/_/song rigs 
[\[375a.7\]]kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa 'di na yul chu ba gtsang ma zhes bya ba yod de/_de na drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs shes bya ba 'dug gi de'i gan du song la dris shig dang /_des rigs kyi bu khyod la byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[375b\]]
[\[375b.1\]]spyod pa ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_yang dang 
[\[375b.2\]]yang bltas te phyag 'tshal nas/_ngo mchi mas gang bar ngus te/_byang chub mchog tu dkon pa rjes su sems shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen rim gror bya ba dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang /_skyes bu dam pa dang 'phrad pa dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang /_
[\[375b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po 'thob par bya ba rjes su bsam pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang /_skal ba mnyam pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang /_
[\[375b.4\]]byang chub tu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par mos shing sems nges par gzhog pa dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang /_mi mnyam pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul rjes su bstan pa'i sbyor ba dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang /_sems dri ma med 
[\[375b.5\]]cing mi 'phrogs pa'i sbyor ba yang dag par bsgrub par dka' ba rjes su bsam pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du shugs drag po rnam par bskyed pa'i chos kyi snang ba dkon pa rjes su bsam pa byed cing /_dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi 
[\[375b.6\]]drung nas song ngo /_de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa'i gdams ngag gi rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par byed pa'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa 
[\[375b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas blta ba'i shugs drag pos rab tu snang bar bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_chos kyi gter 'thob par bya ba la shugs drag po skyes pa'i 
[\[376a\]]
[\[376a.1\]]sems dang ldan pa/_smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i shugs drag po rab tu 'phel ba'i sems dang ldan pa chos thams cad kyi phyogs la mngon du lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_chos kyi rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis snang bar byas pa'i 
[\[376a.2\]]sems dang ldan pa/_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_chos kyi dbyings la mun pa med par rnam par lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_rdo rje rin po che mthu bo ches [{]myi [,]mi [}]choms pa ltar dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_
[\[376a.3\]]bdud thams cad kyi dpung gis brgal bar dka' zhing thub par dka' ba'i sems dang ldan pa de mthar gyis yul chu ba gtsang ma ga la ba der phyin nas/_drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs tshol tshol ba las/_de'i tshe drang srong 'jigs 
[\[376a.4\]]mchog dbyangs dge ba sbyang ba'i gnas shing dang /_shing phran sna tshogs grangs med pa'i nags tshal mdangs dga' ba/_lo mas rgyas pa'i shing gis kun nas 'grigs pa/_rtag tu me tog rgyas pa dang ldan pa'i shing sna tshogs can/_rtag tu 
[\[376a.5\]]shing tog mang po dang ldan pa'i shing tog gi shing dang ldan pa/_nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing drung nor bu rin po che'i spang leb kyis rtag tu gshibs pa dang ldan pa/_tsan dan dam pa'i shing kun nas rnam par bres pa/_a gu ru yid du 'ong ba'i shing 
[\[376a.6\]]las spos kyi dri rtag tu 'byung bas rab tu brgyan pa/_phyogs bzhi nas shing ba ta la rnam par mdzes par skyes pas yongs su brgyan pa/_n+ya gro da'i shing dbyibs yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/_'dzam bu'i shing las rtag tu shing tog smin pa 'brul ba/_
[\[376a.7\]]me tog gi tshal pad+mo dang uta pa la gsar du skyes pas rab tu brgyan pa zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs drang srong stong phrag bcus bskor cing /_tsan dan gyi yal ga shin tu 'brel ba'i 
[\[376b\]]
[\[376b.1\]]bya skyibs shig na/_thor tshugs kyi cod pan can/_pags pa dang /_rtsa'i gos gyon pa/_shing shun gyi smad yogs can rtsa'i stan la 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs ga la ba der song ste/_phyin nas yang dag pa'i dge ba'i 
[\[376b.2\]]bshes gnyen dang phrad pa'i bsam pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni yang dag pa'i lam ston pas/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'byung ba'i sgo yin par yang dag par lta/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la gzhog pas/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i bshes 
[\[376b.3\]]gnyen gyi gdams ngag la rag lus par yang dag par lta/_stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che'i gling du skyel bas/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi mnyan pa la rag lus par yang dag par lta/_stobs bcu'i ye shes snang ba yang 
[\[376b.4\]]dag par bskyed pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sgron mas snang bar bya ba yin par yang dag par lta/_nyam nyes med par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong du phyin par byed pas/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ni dge ba'i bshes 
[\[376b.5\]]gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/_mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa yongs su ston pas/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mar me ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/_g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa thams cad med par byed pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 
[\[376b.6\]]stegs ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/_byams pa chen po'i stobs kyis sim pa yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gdugs ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta/_snying rje chen po yongs su bskyed
