[\[376b.7\]]pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta zhing chos kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul rab tu snang bar byed pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsal bar mthong ba ni/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag las par mthong nas/_lus thams 
[\[377a\]]
[\[377a.1\]]cad kyis phab ste/_phyag byas nas langs te/_drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas yid du 'ong ba'i tshul gyis yid du 'ong ba'i tshig brjod de/_'di skad ces 
[\[377a.2\]]smras so/_/'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags pa ni 
[\[377a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang /_rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes thos na/_'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/_de 
[\[377a.4\]]nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis bram ze'i byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag la bltas te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/byis pa dag rigs kyi bu 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_sems can thams cad 'jigs pa med pa 
[\[377a.5\]]la mgron du gnyer to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sta gon du gnas pa ste/_ye shes rgya mtsho la mngon du gyur pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char btung bar 'dod pa'o/_/chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho 
[\[377a.6\]]thams cad la 'jug par 'dod pa'o/_/ye shes kyi snang ba chen po la gnas par 'dod pa'o/_/snying rje chen po'i sprin bsdu bar 'dod pa'o/_/chos kyi char chen po mngon par dbab par 'dod pa'o/_/ye shes chen po'i zla ba 'jig rten du shar bar byas te/_nyon mongs pa'i 
[\[377a.7\]]gdung ba thams cad rab tu gzhil bar 'dod pa'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par spel bar 'dod pa'o/_/de nas bram ze'i byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag gis me tog dri zhim la yid du 'ong zhing kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa mang pos 
[\[377b\]]
[\[377b.1\]]tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la gtor to/_/mngon par gtor to/_/rab tu gtor to/_/mngon par phyag 'tshal to/_/de ltar btud de phyag 'tshal nas/_g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/_tshig 'di skad du brjod do/_/'di ni sems can thams 
[\[377b.2\]]cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par gcod par 'gyur ro/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud 
[\[377b.3\]]thams cad rnam par bzlog par 'gyur ro/_/mi khom pa'i sgo thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro/_/sred pa'i rgya mtsho yongs su skems par 'gyur ro/_/srid pa'i 'ching ba gcod par 'gyur ro/_/sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog 
[\[377b.4\]]par 'gyur ro/_/ma rig pa'i mun pa sel bar 'gyur ro/_/bsod nams kyi khor yug gis 'jig rten yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/_/ye shes rin po che'i 'byung gnas su yongs su ston par 'gyur ro/_/ye shes kyi nyi ma 'char bar bgyid 
[\[377b.5\]]par 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi mig rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten rnams la mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis byis pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/byis 
[\[377b.6\]]pa dag gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_sems can thams cad kyi bde ba rab tu bskyed de/_rim gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[377b.7\]]byis pa dag rigs kyi bu 'dis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ste/_de bas na 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyis yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/_tshong 
[\[378a\]]
[\[378a.1\]]dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan thob pa'o/_/nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 
[\[378a.2\]]gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/_/de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]mgo la byugs nas lag pa g.yas pas bzung ngo /_/tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la drang srong 
[\[378a.3\]]'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis lag pa g.yas pas bzung ma thag tu de'i mod la tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis[,]bzang gis[}]/_phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong bar gyur te/_de dag gi de bzhin 
[\[378a.4\]]gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhabs kyi drung na bdag nyid 'dug par shes par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang rnam pa grangs med par rnam par dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan par mthong ngo /_/de dag na'ang de 
[\[378a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho kha dog sna tshogs can rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa dag 'khod pa mthong ngo /_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de dag na 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po 'bar 
[\[378a.6\]]bas brgyan pa dag bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/de dag las kyang tshig dang yi ge gcig las kyang phyir phyogs pa med par chos bstan pa nyan to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo de dag kyang phan tshun ma 'dres par yang dag par 'dzin to/_/chos kyi 
[\[378a.7\]]sprin gyi char sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs la 'bab pa de dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam mos pa sna tshogs kyi stobs kyis rnam par sbyangs pa rgya mtsho la yang zhugs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi yang dag par 
[\[378b\]]
[\[378b.1\]]bsdu ba smon lam sna tshogs rgya mtshos rnam par dag pa rgya mtsho de dag la yang zhugs so/_/sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog sems can gyi bsams pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par 'gyur bar rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi 'od gzer gyi dra ba 'dod 
[\[378b.2\]]chags dang bral ba sna tshogs kyis rnam par dag pa'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi stobs de dag la'ang ye shes rnam par snang ba bsgribs pa med pa dang ldan pas zhugs so/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi 
[\[378b.3\]]thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes kyi 'od kyis snang bar gyur pa/_ting nge 'dzin rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po snang ba rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin ye shes [{]myi [,]mi [}]zad pa'i rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa/_gzungs kyi sgo snang ba phyogs kun gyi dra ba rab tu thob pa/_
[\[378b.4\]]gzungs kyi sgo rdo rje'i snying pos sems rab tu gsal bar byas pa/_ting nge 'dzin ye shes brtsegs pa rnam par phye ba'i yul la rnam par phye ba rab tu thob pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa gzhi kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i snying po yul du 
[\[378b.5\]]gyur pa/_ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba sangs rgyas nam mkha'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu zhugs pa/_ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i mu khyud kyis sems rab tu snang bar byas pa/_ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba dus gsum gyi ye shes rin po 
[\[378b.6\]]che mi zad pa'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu brtson pa des de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni nyin zhag gcig lon par shes so/_/la lar ni nyin zhag bdun lon pa snyam/_la lar ni zla ba phyed lon pa snyam/_la lar ni zla ba gcig lon pa snyam/_la lar ni lo gcig 
[\[378b.7\]]lon pa snyam/_la lar ni lo brgyar lon pa snyam/_la lar ni lo stong lon pa snyam/_la lar ni lo brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/_la lar ni lo bye ba lon pa snyam/_la lar ni lo bye ba brgya lon pa snyam/_la lar ni lo bye ba stong lon pa snyam/_la lar ni lo 
[\[379a\]]
[\[379a.1\]]bye ba brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/_la lar ni lo bye ba khrag khrig lon pa snyam/_la lar ni bskal pa phyed lon pa snyam/_la lar ni bskal pa gcig lon pa snyam/_la lar ni bskal pa brgya lon pa snyam/_la lar ni bskal pa stong lon pa 
[\[379a.2\]]snyam/_la lar ni bskal pa brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/_la lar ni bskal pa bye ba lon pa snyam/_la lar ni bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya lon pa snyam/_la lar ni bskal pa bye ba phrag stong lon pa snyam/_la lar ni bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam/_la lar ni bskal 
[\[379a.3\]]pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam byed pa nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snyed lon par gyur pa snyam byed de/_de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[379a.4\]]gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lon pa snyam byed pa nas/_bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lon pa snyam byed par gyur to/_/de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]btang 
[\[379a.5\]]ba dang /_des yang bdag drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi mdun du 'dug par shes par gyur to/_/de la drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis smras pa rigs kyi bu dran mod/_smras pa 'phags pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis dran 
[\[379a.6\]]no/_/smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan 'di shes par zad na/_byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa 
[\[379a.7\]]dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/_dus thams cad du 'khor lo bskor ba/_sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang /_ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba'i nyi ma la rnam par dmigs pa'i rgyan rab tu dgod pa 
[\[379b\]]
[\[379b.1\]]dus gsum gyi yul skad gcig gi ye shes su yang dag par sdud pa/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus shin tu rnam par bkram pa chos kyi dbyings thams cad la ye shes snang ba'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa/_sems can thams 
[\[379b.2\]]cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon sum du mngon par langs pa/_sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du spyod pas/_rnam par spyod pa dang mthun pa'i tshul dang ldan pa 'dod pa bzhin du kun tu snang zhing dri ma med la 'od dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 
[\[379b.3\]]'khor rnam par dag pa/_de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod pa'am/_smon lam gyi khyad par smos pa'am/_zhing gi mngon par 'du bya ba shes pa'am/_ye shes kyi yul la 'jug par bya ba'am/_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[379b.4\]]gyi spyod yul gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'am/_rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug par bya ba'am/_rnam par thar pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang /_rnam par rtse ba'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'am/_lus rnam par phye ba'i mtshan 
[\[379b.5\]]ma gzung bar bya ba 'am/_dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa brjod pa 'am/_ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu bstan par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul yongs su tshol ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de na bram ze rgyal 
[\[379b.6\]]ba'i drod kyi skye mched ces bya ba 'dug gis/_de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams 
[\[379b.7\]]bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/_drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_yang dang yang bltas te drang srong 'jig mchog dbyangs kyi drung nas song ngo /_
[\[380a\]]
[\[380a.1\]]sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po sum cu gnyis pa/_de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs[,]bzang[}]/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye 
[\[380a.2\]]shes kyis snang bar byas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon sum du rnam par spyod pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mngon sum gyi ye shes kyis mngon 
[\[380a.3\]]par shes pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyis/_sems snang bar gyur pa dus thams cad du yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa/_'du shes 
[\[380a.4\]]kyi rnam pa thams cad la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul gyis snang bar gyur pa/_'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes snang ba thob pa/_thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i spyod 
[\[380a.5\]]yul la rnam par spyod pa mngon tu gyur pa/_gnyis su rnam par rtog pa med pas mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i ye shes lhur len pa/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa thams cad la rab tu 'dal ba'i ye shes snang ba dang ldan pa/_mnyam pa 
[\[380a.6\]]thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i bzod pa rnam par dag pa la mos pa'i mdzod la mkhas pa rang bzhin gyi chos la bzod pa khong du chud pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rang bzhin bsgom 
[\[380a.7\]]pa dang mi 'bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po las phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_stobs bcu'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od rab tu thob pa/_chos kyi dbyings brjod pa la mngon par 
[\[380b\]]
[\[380b.1\]]mos pas/_ngoms pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam par spyod pa'i spyod yul la 'jug pa khong du chud pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan mtha' yas 
[\[380b.2\]]pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa/_rnam par spyad pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba mi zad pa/_khong du chud pa'i 
[\[380b.3\]]ye shes mtha' dang dbus med pa mngon du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul bar bya ba la zhum pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa des/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i yul 
[\[380b.4\]]mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba sna tshogs mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang /_
[\[380b.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa phra ba dang /_yangs pa'i khongs su chud par bya ba la yang dag par blta ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzhi mtha' yas pa'i ming gi dra ba sna tshogs yang dag par blta ba dang /_'jig 
[\[380b.6\]]rten gyi khams su rnam par spyad pa/_rnam par gdags pa mtha' yas pa'i kun rdzob rnam pa tha dad pa la yang dag par blta ba dang /_sems can gyi mos pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang /_sems can rnam par 
[\[380b.7\]]phye ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa/_mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang /_sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba khong du chud par bya ba la yang dag par blta ba dang /_sems can dang phyogs dang dus 
[\[381a\]]
[\[381a.1\]]mtha' yas pa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]gi rnam pa sna tshogs la yang dag par blta ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen mngon du bya ba byed cing mthar gyis yul tshol ba dang ldan pa gang na ba dang /_bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched ga la ba der 
[\[381a.2\]]phyin to/_/de'i tshe bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgrub pa'i gzhir byas shing dka' thub drag po la spyod de/_de'i phyogs bzhi nas me'i phung po ri rab tsam du che ba bus pa dang /_ri shin tu mtho ba'i g.yang sa'i lam gyi rgyud spu gri'i 
[\[381a.3\]]sos gshibs pas 'khod par snang ngo /_de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags 
[\[381a.4\]]pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad pa dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[381a.5\]]rnams la gdams ngag dang /_rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/_'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol 
[\[381a.6\]]des smras pa rigs kyi bu song la spu gri'i so dngar ba'i ri 'di la 'dzegs te/_me'i 'obs 'dir mchongs shig dang /_des khyod kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro zhes nas/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'di 
[\[381a.7\]]snyam du sems par gyur te/_mi khom pa brgyad las rnam par ldog pa yang shin tu dkon/_myir gyur te khom pa phun sum tshogs shing /_rnam par dag pa yang shin tu dkon/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang shin tu dkon/_dbang po 
[\[381b\]]
[\[381b.1\]]nyams pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang shin tu dkon/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thos pa yang shin du dkon/_skyes bu dam pa dang phrad pa yang shin tu dkon/_yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang shin tu dkon/_yang dag pa'i tshul rjes su bstan 
[\[381b.2\]]pas legs par sdud pa yang shin tu dkon/_yang dag par 'tsho bar bya ba yang shin tu dkon/_mi'i 'jig rten na chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan byed pa yang shin tu dkon na/_de skad zer zhing bdag gi dge ba'i bar chad la 
[\[381b.3\]]zhugs la de ltar bdag gi srog gcad par brtson pa 'di bdud dam cig ma yin nam/_bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa 'am/_bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'am/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen ltar brdzus pa'am/_byang chub sems 
[\[381b.4\]]dpa' la [{]myi [,]mi [}]gcags pa byed pa zhig ma yin grang /_bdag gi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bgegs byed par 'dod pa zhig ma yin grang /_bdag lam gol ba ngan par gzhug par 'dod pa zhig ma yin grang /_bdag gis sangs 
[\[381b.5\]]rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bya ba'i chos kyi sgo la bgegs byed pa zhig ma yin grang /_snyam nas/_de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pa'i tshe/_tshangs pa stong phrag bcu steng gi bar snang la gnas te/_'di skad ces 'dzer to/_/rigs kyi 
[\[381b.6\]]bu de lta bu'i sems mi brtan par ma byed cig_/rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pa ste/_brtson 'grus ldog pa med pa'o/_/brtsams pa chen po mthar dbyung ba la zhugs pa'o/_/
[\[381b.7\]]'gro ba thams cad kyi sred pa'i rlan bskam pa la mngon par brtson pa'o/_/lta ba'i rnam pa dang dra ba thams cad gtub pa la brtson pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i lcag lcig thams cad zad par bsreg pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o/_/mi 
[\[382a\]]
[\[382a.1\]]khom mi shes pa'i bas mtha'i dgon pa thams cad snang bar bya ba la brtson pa'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi rga shi'i g.yang sa dang /_'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa la yi dam brtan pa'o/_/
[\[382a.2\]]dus gsum gyi mun pa bsal ba la mngon par brtson pa'o/_/chos thams cad kyi 'od gzer dgye ba la zhugs pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/_tshangs pa ji snyed 
[\[382a.3\]]cig mkhan po dang dbang bsgyur ba dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bor rang rang rlom zhing sems pa/_lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa/_de dag thams cad 'phags pa 'di'i dka' thub dang /_brtul zhugs 
[\[382a.4\]]kyi thugs dam gyi mthus rang rang gi gnas na bag dga' ba med cing /_de dag bsam gtan gyi ro dga' ba myong ba med pas/_'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo /_/de dag phyin pa dang /_'phags pa 'di'i rdzu 'phrul gyi sbyin 
[\[382a.5\]]pa dang /_drag shul gyi dka' thub dang /_brtul zhugs kyi zil gyis mnan te/_lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang /_nga rgyal dang rlom sems thams cad rab tu spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/'gro ba thams 
[\[382a.6\]]cad la byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen pos khyab par bya ba dang /_byang chub kyi bsam pa brtan par bya ba dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa shin tu yangs par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par blta ba la 
[\[382a.7\]]mngon par brtson par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor thob par bya ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_thams cad du grags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs la thogs pa med cing bsgrib pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/
[\[382b\]]
[\[382b.1\]]bdud stong phrag bcu yang steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/_lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po ches mngon par gtor te/_'di skad ces 'dzer to/_/rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/_
[\[382b.2\]]'od 'phro ba'i phung po 'di las snang ba chen po byung zhing kho bo cag gi khyim dang /_lus dang rgyan gyi longs spyod thams cad zil gyis gnon to/_/de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang so so'i gnas gnas na bag dga' ba med pas 'khor dang bcas te 
[\[382b.3\]]'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo /_/kho bo cag 'di'i drung du phyin nas kyang /_'phags pa 'di ni kho bo cag la ci nas kyang rang rang gi sems sor chud nas byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[382b.4\]]chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos ston to/_dbang bsgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po/_stong phrag bcus kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog gis mngon par gtor te/_'di skad ces 'dzer to/_/rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' 
[\[382b.5\]]thub lngas yongs su gdung ba byed pa'i tshe/_kho bo cag kyang rang rang gi gnas na dga' ba med de/_de ltar bdag cag kyang rang rang gi skye bo'i 'khor dang bcas te 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo /_/bdag cag 'di'i drung du phyin pa dang 'di ni bdag 
[\[382b.6\]]cag la rang rang gi sems la dbang bsgyur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba thob par bya ba dang /_bsam pa ji lta bzhin du skye ba la dbang bsgyur ba thob par bya ba dang /_las kyi sgrib 
[\[382b.7\]]pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i dbang rab tu thob par bya ba dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob par bya ba dang /_yo byad la dbang ba'i rgyan yongs su dag par bya ba dang /_bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[383a\]]
[\[383a.1\]]tshe la dbang bsgyur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/rab 'phrul dga'i lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu yang steng gi bar snang la 'khod de/_lha rdzas kyi glu yang dag par sbyar ba'i nga ro snyan pa'i dbyangs bsgrags 
[\[383a.2\]]te/_mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/_/rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/_me'i phung po 'di las de dang 'dra ba'i 'od byung zhing des kho bo cag gi gzhal med khang 'di dag 
[\[383a.3\]]rnam par dag ste/_gsal ba dang 'od shin tu dang bar gyur to/_/rgyan 'di dang lha'i bu mo 'di dag kyang rnam par dag cing gsal la 'od shin du dang bar gyur to/_/de bas na bdag cag kyang lha'i bu dang lha mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang 
[\[383a.4\]]bcas par 'dod pa la dga' bar tshor ba med do/_/'dod pa'i bde ba la mngon par dga' ba med pas lus dang sems tshim par gyur nas/_'phags pa 'di'i drung du dong ba yin te/_'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag de ltar phyin pa rnams la 
[\[383a.5\]]sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/sems kyi 'od 'dang bar bya ba dang /_sems shin du dag par bya ba dang /_sems las su rung bar bya ba dang /_sems kyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa dang /_stobs bcu'i ye shes 
[\[383a.6\]]'thob pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang /_chos kyi shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir lus rnam par dag par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thob par bya ba'i phyir 
[\[383a.7\]]ngag rnam par dag par bya ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rab tu thob par bya bar sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu'i lha'i bu dang /_lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas 
[\[383b\]]
[\[383b.1\]]pa dag kyang steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/_spos sna tshogs kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char mngon par phab pas mchod pa byas te/_phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/_/rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i 
[\[383b.2\]]tshe/_bdag cag kyang rang rang gi gnas na dga' ba med de/_de ltar dga' ba med pas 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/_bdag cag phyin pa rnams la 'phags pa 'di ni yul thams cad la ltos pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/chog shes 
[\[383b.3\]]pa'i sems su bya ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa dang /_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rab tu thob par bya ba nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/rab mtshe ma'i lha'i 
[\[383b.4\]]rgyal po stong phrag bcu lha'i bu dang /_lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag gis kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog man da ra ba'i char mngon par phab ste/_'di skad ces 'dzer to/_/rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas 
[\[383b.5\]]yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/_bdag cag kyang lha rdzas kyi glu snyan pa la dga' ba med de/_de ltar dga' ba med pas 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/_bdag cag phyin nas kyang /_'phags pa 'di ni 'dod pa'i dga' 
[\[383b.6\]]ba thams cad rnam par bzlog par bya ba nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin stong phrag bcu so so nas/_nye ba'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_
[\[383b.7\]]lha'i bu dang /_lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pas/_lha rdzas kyi gos dang /_rin po che'i rgyan dang /_me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par phab ste/_'di skad ces 'dzer to/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[384a\]]
[\[384a.1\]]'phags pa 'di/_dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/_bdag cag kyang brgya byin gyi khang pa dang /_bza' shing gi ra ba dang /_rtse ba'i nags tshal dang /_lha rdzas kyi rol mo 
[\[384a.2\]]brdung zhing dkrol ba dang /_gam yo na glu len pa'i longs spyod la dga' ba med de/_de ltar bdag cag dga' ba med pas 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo /_/bdag cag der phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni kho bo cag la 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams 
[\[384a.3\]]cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/'di dag thams cad ni rtag pa ma yin te/_mi brtan zhing 'jig par 'gyur ba'i chos can no zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod do/_/dregs pa dang bag med pa thams cad yongs su gcad pa dang /_bla na 
[\[384a.4\]]med pa'i byang chub tu spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir chos ston to/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'dis bltas pa tsam gyis ri rab kyi rtse mo thams cad kyang g.yo bar 'gyur te/_des bdag cag gshigs pas sems skyo bar gyur nas/_thams 
[\[384a.5\]]cad mkhyen pa'i sems brtan pas/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su smon lam mngon par sgrub bo/_/klu'i rgyal po shugs ldan dang /_dga' bo dang /_bsnyen dga' bo la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa/_klu brgya stong phrag bcu dag kyang steng gi bar snang la 
[\[384a.6\]]gnas shing dus dang mthun pa'i lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi sprin dang /_klu'i bu mos glu blangs pa'i nga ro snyan pa'i dbyangs dang /_lha rdzas kyi spos chu'i rgyun rab tu 'bab pa'i char mngon par phab ste/_'di skad ces 'dzer to/_/rigs kyi bu 'phags 
[\[384a.7\]]pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/_me'i phung po chen po 'di las 'od chen po byung ste/_des klu'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas/_bye ma'i char dang /_nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa yongs su sel to/_/khro ba 
[\[384b\]]
[\[384b.1\]]'byung ba yang zhi bar byas te/_lus sim par byas nas yid shin tu mos par byed do/_/de ltar sems shin tu mos par gyur nas/_'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la chos ston te/_'di ltar klu'i lam gyi rgyud ngan pa rnam par smad pa dang /_sgrib pa'i 
[\[384b.2\]]las thams cad rab tu spang ba'i phyir nyes pa 'chags su btsud cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu dgod do/_/gnod sbyin gyi dbang po stong phrag bcu yang nam mkha'i dbyings 
[\[384b.3\]]la 'khod de/_mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched dang /_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/_/rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/_
[\[384b.4\]]kho bo cag gi 'khor kun kyang mi rnams la byams pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur te/_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /_grul bum thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur to/_/de dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'tshe ba med 
[\[384b.5\]]pa la zhugs pa rnams kho bo cag gi drung du 'ong ngo /_/kho bo cag kyang de ltar byams pa'i dbang gi zil gyis non pas/_rang rang gi gnas de dang /_de dag na dga' ba med de/_de ltar bdag cag kyang rang rang gi skye bo'i 'khor dang bcas te/_
[\[384b.6\]]'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo /_/'phags pa bdag cag de ltar 'ongs pa rnams la 'phags pa 'di'i sku las byung ba'i 'od kyis lus thams cad snang bar byas shing /_bde bas khyab par mdzad de/_de ltar bdag cag lus 
[\[384b.7\]]dang sems bde bar gyur nas/_'phags pa 'di ni ci nas kyang bdag cag la gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang grul bum dang /_lus srul po mang po byang chub tu sems skye bar 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to/_/dri za'i dbang po stong phrag 
[\[385a\]]
[\[385a.1\]]bcu dag kyang steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/_/rigs kyi bu kho bo cag kyang rang rang gi gnas na 'khod pa'i tshe/_'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/_me'i phung 
[\[385a.2\]]po 'di las 'od byung ste/_bdag cag gi gnas snang bar gyur to/_/de ltar bdag cag 'od des phog ste/_bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur pas/_'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/_bdag cag drung du phyin nas 
[\[385a.3\]]kyang 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag ci nas kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po stong phrag bcu dag kyang rgya mtsho'i nang nas mngon par 'thon 
[\[385a.4\]]te/_nam mkha' la pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces 'dzer to/_/rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/_kho bo cag gi lha ma yin gyi 
[\[385a.5\]]'jig rten rgya mtsho dang rir bcas pa'i sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor rab tu g.yo bar gyur te/_bdag cag kun gyi nga rgyal dang rlom sems dang /_dregs pa thams cad brtul shugs dang /_dka' thub kyi zil gyis non te/_
[\[385a.6\]]'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo /_/der phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la g.yo sgyu thams cad rab tu spang ba dang /_chos zab mo'i bzod pa la gzud pa dang /_mi g.yo ba'i chos nyid la rab tu dgod pa 
[\[385a.7\]]dang /_stobs bcu'i ye shes yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/_/nam mkha' lding gi dbang po shugs chen po 'dzin pa la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa nam mkha' lding gi dbang po stong phrag bcus kyang bram ze'i bu shin tu sdug gu'i 
[\[385b\]]
[\[385b.1\]]gzugs su mngon par sprul te/_'di skad ces 'dzer to/_/rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/_me'i phung po 'di dag las 'od chen po byung ste/_bdag cag gi gnas snang bar byas nas/_yongs 
[\[385b.2\]]su g.yo bar byed do/_/des bdag cag kyang 'jigs shing skrag ste/_skyo ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur nas 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo /_/'phags pa 'di yang bdag cag la chos ston cing /_byams pa chen po la yang dag par 
[\[385b.3\]]sbyor ba mdzad do/_/snying rje chen po la yang dag par dgod pa mdzad do/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'jug pa la yang yang dag par sbyor ba mdzad do/_/'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba'i sems can mngon par gdon par bya ba la'ang yongs su sbyor ba mdzad 
[\[385b.4\]]do/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgo rnam par dag par bya ba la'ang rab tu sbyor ba mdzad do/_/shes rab dang thabs shin tu gsal ba la'ang yang dag par sbyor ba mdzad do/_/rnam pa ji lta bur yongs su smyin par bya ba'i sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba la'ang 
[\[385b.5\]]rab tu sbyor ba mdzad do/_/mi'am ci'i dbang po stong phrag bcu yang steng gi bar snang la 'khod de 'di skad ces 'dzer to/_/rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/_kho bo cag gi gnas na 'khod pa'i 
[\[385b.6\]]shing ta la'i phreng ba las dril bu'i dra ba rin po che'i srad bus lda ldir brgyus pa'i sil snyan dang /_rol mo'i yo byad dang /_rin po che'i rgyan dang /_khyim gyi longs spyod thams cad las sangs rgyas kyi sgra byung ngo /_/chos kyi sgra dang 
[\[385b.7\]]phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi sgra dang /_byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa'i smon lam gyi sgra byung ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni byang chub sems dpa' [{]mying [,]ming [}]'di dang 'di zhes 
[\[386a\]]
[\[386a.1\]]bya ba zhig byang chub tu smon lam 'debs so/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni byang chub sems dpa'i [{]mying [,]ming [}]'di dang 'di zhes bya ba zhig dka' ba yongs su gtong ba byed do/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs 
[\[386a.2\]]su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni byang chub sems dpa' [{]mying [,]ming [}]'di dang 'di zhes bya ba zhig thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyong ba byed do/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[386a.3\]{]mying [,]ming [}]'di dang 'di zhes bya ba zhig snying po byang chub tu 'gro'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni byang chub sems dpa' [{]mying [,]ming [}]'di dang 'di zhes bya ba zhig dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa'i bdud rab tu pham par byas te/_bla 
[\[386a.4\]]na [{]myed [,]med [}]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di dang 'di zhes bya ba zhig chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad do/_/'jig rten gyi 
[\[386a.5\]]khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di dang ni che ge mo zhig sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las ma lus par mdzad nas/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba 
[\[386a.6\]]mdzad do/_/zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/_rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling gi rtswa dang shing dang /_yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_'dab ma thams cad rdul shin tu phra ba'i char blags pa'i mur thug par ni rung yang srid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi 
[\[386a.7\]]mtshan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i khyad par gang kho bo cag gi gnas na yod pa'i shing ta la'i phreng ba las rol mo'i yo byad dang /_rin po che'i rgyan dang /_khyim 
[\[386b\]]
[\[386b.1\]]gyi longs spyod rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra 'byung zhing /_nga ro 'byin pa dang /_rna lam du grags pa'i mtha' ni thug par mi rung ngo /_/de ltar bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'jug 
[\[386b.2\]]pa'i smon lam dang /_spyod pa dang mtshan gyi chu klung gi sgras dga' ba chen po'i shugs drag pos nyams bde ba skyes te/_'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo /_/de ltar bdag cag phyin par gyur nas kyang /_'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la ci 
[\[386b.3\]]nas kyang /_kho bo cag gi 'khor gyi sems can du ma zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir [{]myi [,]mi [}]ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos ston pa mdzad do/_/'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag dpag tu med pa kha dog shin 
[\[386b.4\]]tu mdzes pa dag kyang nam mkha' la 'khod cing yid kyis sprul pa'i mchod pas mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to/_/'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/_me'i phung po 'di dag las rnam pa 'di 
[\[386b.5\]]lta bu'i 'od byung te/_'od des mar na mnar med pa yan chad du sems can dmyal ba rnams snang bar byas nas/_sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rtse zil bar byas te/_'od de nyid kyis 'phags pa 'di bdag cag gi [{]myig [,]mig [}]
[\[386b.6\]]lam du snang bar bstan pas de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang 'phags pa 'di la sems mos par gyur nas/_'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i ris nyams su bde bar skyes so/_/de ltar bdag cag kyang 'phags pa 'dis mdzad pa la drin du 
[\[386b.7\]]gzo zhing mthong bas mi ngoms pas 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongs su spangs te/_'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo /_/der bdag cag phyin nas kyang 'phags pa 'di ni ci nas kyang /_sems can tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rnams byang 
[\[387a\]]
[\[387a.1\]]chub tu smon lam 'debs par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston pa mdzad do/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]chos kyi tshul rnam pa 'di lta bu thos nas dga' rangs te/_mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid 
[\[387a.2\]]bde ba skyes te/_bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes bskyed de/_bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags 
[\[387a.3\]]pa de ltar bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bka' dang /_'gal bar bgyis pa'i nongs pa la nongs par bshags so/_/de nas bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyis/_tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la tshigs su bcad 
[\[387a.4\]]pa 'di dag smras so/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rjes su bstan dang 'thun byed cing /_dran pa nye bar gzhag ste bla ma'i ngag gcog mi byed na/_de phyir de yi don rnams thams cad 'thun par 'grub par 'gyur/_/mthun pa'i sangs 
[\[387a.5\]]rgyas ye shes byang chub drung du 'tshang yang rgya/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]ri'i g.yang sa'i lam spu gri so gshibs pa la 'dzegs te/_me'i phung po chen po der mchongs so/_/de de ltar mchongs pa'i tshe/_byang 
[\[387a.6\]]chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba thob par gyur to/_/[{]mye [,]me [}]des reg nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu zhi ba'i bde ba mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba thob par gyur nas des 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[387a.7\]]'phags pa [{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]phung po la de ltar reg na bde ba dang /_ri'i lam spu gris gtams pa 'di yang de ltar reg na bde ba de ni ngo mtshar che'o/_/des smras pa/_rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dkyil 'khor 
[\[387b\]]
[\[387b.1\]]yongs su mi zad pa thob pa ste/_rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa dkyil 'khor yongs su mi zad pa 'di shes par zad na/_kho bos byang chub sems dpa' me'i phung po lta bu 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 
[\[387b.2\]]dang /_lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su zad par bya ba'i smon lam can ru mtshon phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa/_sems la thub pa med cing sems dma' ba med pa dang ldan pa/_yid zhum pa med pa can rdo rje'i snying po dang ldan pa'i 
[\[387b.3\]]mthu bo che lta bu brtsams pa chen po mthar phyin par bya ba la sgyid lug pa med pa sbyor ba lhod pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bur 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du brtson pa/_brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa/_phyir mi zlog pa'i go 
[\[387b.4\]]ca bgos pa/_de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na rgyal po seng ge dpal gyi bu mo byams ma zhes 
[\[387b.5\]]bya ba bu mo lnga brgya'i 'khor dang bcas pa 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis[,]bzang gis[}]/_
[\[387b.6\]]bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/_bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi 
[\[387b.7\]]drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bsam gyis [{]myi [,]mi [}]khyab pa la zhugs pa mos pa rgya chen pos rnam par dag pa theg pa chen po la mngon du phyogs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon 
[\[388a\]]
[\[388a.1\]]par mos pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang dag par zhugs pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang bar spro ba/_chos kyi rim gro la rnam par spyod pa/_chags pa med pa'i ye shes la mngon du gyur pa/_yang 
[\[388a.2\]]dag pa'i mtha' shin tu rtogs pa/_ye shes kyi mtha' la gnas pa'i yul dang ldan pa/_dus gsum skad cig gi cha shas la khong du chud par byed pa/_nam mkha'i mtha' gnyis su med pa mngon du gyur pa/_mi gnyis pa'i mtha' rnam par 
[\[388a.3\]]gdon mi za ba thob pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' la rnam par mi rtog par gnas pa/_bsgribs pa med pa'i mthas gdul ba khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa/_chos kyi mtha' dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]'gal bar bya ba la gzhol ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[388a.4\]]mtha' la mtha' med par khong du chud pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtha' la rnam par mi rtog par gnas pa/_sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi dra ba rnam par gtor ba'i ye shes la gzhol ba/_zhing la mngon par chags pa thams 
[\[388a.5\]]cad dang bral ba/_sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la chags pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la gnas pa med par spyod pa/_sems can thams cad la 
[\[388a.6\]]bdag med pa dang /_sems can med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/_sgra thams cad tshig gi lam lta bur khong du chud pa/_gzugs thams cad gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan dang mnyam par rnam par rig par bya ba la gzhol ba de mthar gyis 
[\[388a.7\]]seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i grong khyer gang na ba der phyin te/_bu mo byams ma tshol zhing yongs su rmed rmed pa las/_rgyal po seng ge dpal gyi bu mo byams ma 'khor bu mo lnga brgya dang ldan pa de khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya 
[\[388b\]]
[\[388b.1\]]ba'i nang na khri tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i rkang pa can/_gser gyi lcag phod kyi dra bas legs par blas pa/_lha rdzas kyi stan bting ba la 'dug cing chos ston to/_/zhes thos nas/_seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i grong khyer du song ste/_rgyal 
[\[388b.2\]]po seng ge dpal gyi gnas gang na ba der phyin nas/_rgyal po'i phyi sgo'i sgo gang na bu mo byams ma mthong bar dga' ba'i phyir sdod cing 'dug 'dug pa dang /_des der srog chags brgya phrag du ma dang /_srog chags stong phrag du ma dang /_
[\[388b.3\]]srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma 'dong ba mthong nas/_khyed gang nas 'ongs/_da gang du 'dod zhes dris pa dang /_de dag na re nged ni bu mo byams ma'i drung du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dong ngo zhes nas/_des bsams pa 'dir ni su 'gro 
[\[388b.4\]]yang bgag pa med pa lta zhig snyam ste/_de yang nang du phyin to/_/de ltar phyin te bltas na khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po can de yang /_gzhi shel du 'dug pa'i sa las blangs te/_bai DUr+ya'i ka ba bkye ba/_rtsig pa rdo rje las byas pa/_
[\[388b.5\]]'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi lhun dang ldan pa'i ba gam brgya phrag stong gis brgyan pa/_nor bu rin po che grangs med pas rnam par bris pa/_rin po che stong gi snying po'i me long gi dkyil 'khor gyis shin tu spa bar byas pa/_nor bu rin po 
[\[388b.6\]]che 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong bas rnam par brgyan pa/_rin po che'i shing thags grangs med pas yongs su bskor ba/_gser gyi dril bu brgya stong shin tu 'khrol ba'i sgra snyan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa 'dug par mthong ngo /_/bu 
[\[388b.7\]]mo byams ma de yang mig dkar nag 'byes pa/_skra mthon ting du 'dug pa/_mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa mthong nas/_des de'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_
[\[389a\]]
[\[389a.1\]]thal mo sbyar te mdun du 'dug nas/_'di skad ces smras so/_'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems 
[\[389a.2\]]dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/_'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang /_rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/_'phags ma ji ltar 
[\[389a.3\]]byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu/_kho mo'i gnas kyi rgyan la ltos shig_/ces nas des kun tu byul te 
[\[389a.4\]]bltas pa dang /_rtsig pa re re dang /_ka ba re re dang /_me long gi dkyil 'khor re re dang /_rnam pa'i bye brag re re dang /_dbyibs re re dang /_nor bu rin po che re re dang /_gser gyi dril bu re re dang /_rin po che'i shing re re dang /_
[\[389a.5\]]ba spu'i bu ga re re dang /_rin po che'i se mo do re re las kyang /_chos kyi dbyings thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thog ma thugs bskyed pa dang bcas pa/_spyod pa dang smon lam gyi yul dang bcas pa/_'byung 
[\[389a.6\]]ba'i rgyan dang bcas pa/_mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang bcas pa/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ston pa dang bcas par gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du 
[\[389a.7\]]mthong bar gyur to/_/[{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa de dag re re las ji lta ba bzhin du [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa thams cad las kyang mthong bar gyur to/_/'di lta ste dper na/_chus yongs su gang ba'i mtsho dang zhing rnyog pa med la rnam par gsal 
[\[389b\]]
[\[389b.1\]]ba la ni nam mkha' gnyi zla dang /_skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du yongs su snang ngo /_/de bzhin du khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po'i [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa re re las kyang chos kyi dbyings kun na bzhugs pa'i de 
[\[389b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du yongs su snang bar gyur te/_de ni bu mo byams ma'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu'i phyir te/_des de ltar rnam par bltas nas/_sangs rgyas mthong ba'i rgyan gyi mtshan ma 
[\[389b.3\]]de yongs su bzung ste/_thal mo sbyar nas/_bu mo byams ma'i gdong du bltas pa dang /_des smras pa/_rigs kyi bu kho mo ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba thob pa ste/_shes rab kyi 
[\[389b.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud 'di ni kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gang+gA'i klung sum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed las yongs su btsal ba ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun 
[\[389b.5\]]nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di sgo sna tshogs kyi khong du chud par bya bas rtogs par mdzad de/_gcig gis gang gsungs pa de 'ang gnyis kyis ma gsungs so/_/smras pa/_'phags ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun 
[\[389b.6\]]nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di la kho mo mngon du byed cing /_sems pa dang rjes su 'brang bar bya ba 
[\[389b.7\]]dang /_rnam par dpyod pa dang /_rjes su sems pa dang /_dran par bya ba dang /_yongs su gzung pa dang /_rnam par brtag pa dang /_mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_yang dag par brgyan par bya ba dang /_rab tu rnam par dbye ba 
[\[390a\]]
[\[390a.1\]]byed pa'i tshe/_gzungs kun nas sgo zhes bya ba yongs su skye ste/_gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor der ni chos kyi sgo brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu yongs su 'du'o/_/khong du chud do/_/mngon du gyur to/_/mngon par 
[\[390a.2\]]'du'o/_/khongs na 'khod do/_/'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sgo dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sgo dang /_chos kyi sgo dang /_sems can gyi sgo dang /_'das pa'i sgo dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i sgo dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sgo dang /_gnas 
[\[390a.3\]]pa'i mtha'i sgo dang /_bsod nams kyi sgo dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi sgo dang /_ye shes kyi sgo dang /_ye shes kyi tshogs kyi sgo dang /_smon lam gyi sgo dang /_smon lam gyi rnam pa'i sgo dang /_spyod pa'i sgo dang /_spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i 
[\[390a.4\]]sgo dang /_spyod pa yongs su 'byung ba'i sgo dang /_spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i sgo dang /_las kyi sgo dang /_las dang mi 'gal ba'i sgo dang /_las kyi rgyun gyi sgo dang /_las mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo dang /_mi mnyam 
[\[390a.5\]]pa'i las yongs su spang ba'i sgo dang /_yang dag pa'i las la nan tan du bya ba'i sgo dang /_las la dbang bsgyur ba'i sgo dang /_legs par spyad pa'i sgo dang /_legs par spyad pa yang dag par blang ba'i sgo dang /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[390a.6\]]gyi sgo dang /_ting nge 'dzin khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang /_ting nge 'dzin la rnam par spyad pa'i sgo dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi sgo dang /_ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i sgo dang /_mngon par shes pa'i sgo dang /_sems rgya mtsho'i 
[\[390a.7\]]sgo dang /_sems kyi rnam grangs kyi sgo dang /_sems kyi rgyud yongs su dag par bya ba'i sgo dang /_sems kyi thibs po snang bar bya ba'i sgo dang /_sems kyi mtsho dang bar bya ba'i sgo dang /_sems 'byung ba'i sgo dang /_sems 
[\[390b\]]
[\[390b.1\]]rnam par rgyu ba'i sgo dang /_sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyu ba'i sgo dang /_nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sgo dang /_nyon mongs pa'i sbyor ba'i sgo dang /_mos pa'i sgo dang /_sems can gyi spyod pa'i sgo dang /_sems can gyi spyod pa rnam 
[\[390b.2\]]pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang /_'jig rten 'byung ba'i sgo dang /_sems can gyi bsam pa'i sgo dang /_sems can gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang /_phyogs kyi sgo dang /_chos kyi phyogs kyi sgo dang /_snying rje chen po'i sgo dang /_byams pa chen 
[\[390b.3\]]po'i sgo dang /_zhi ba'i sgo dang /_ngag gi lam gyi sgo dang /_tshul gyi sgo dang /_khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang /_rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang /_yang dag par 'du ba'i sgo dang /_chags pa med pa'i mtha'i sgo dang /_kun gyi sgo dang /_sangs 
[\[390b.4\]]rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sgo dang /_nyan thos kyi chos kyi sgo dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo dang /_'jig rten gyi chos kyi sgo dang /_'jig rten 'byung ba'i chos kyi sgo dang /_'jig rten 
[\[390b.5\]]'jig pa'i chos kyi sgo dang /_'jig rten kun nas gnas pa'i sgo dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon 
[\[390b.6\]]mongs pa la rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu rnam par dag 
[\[390b.7\]]pa'i sgo dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gzhi mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang /_'jig rten gyi khams snrel zhi'i sgo dang /_'jig rten gyi khams spyi'u tshugs su rgyu ba'i sgo dang /[ {]myig [,]mig [}]'phrul du 'jug pa'i sgo dang /_'jig 
[\[391a\]]
[\[391a.1\]]rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi sgo dang /_gnas kyi 'du shes kyi rnam par gyur pa'i sgo dang /_phra ba rgya chen por khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang /_rgya chen po phra bar khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang /_sangs rgyas mthong bar 
[\[391a.2\]]bya ba'i sgo dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 'od gzer gyi dra ba rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang /_sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mngon par 
[\[391a.3\]]bsgrub pa'i sgo dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo tha dad pa'i sgo dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo nges pa'i tshig gi sgo dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba kun tu 'khor ba'i sgo dang /_sangs rgyas kyi phrin las kyi sgo dang /_
[\[391a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i sgo dang /_sangs rgyas kyi stobs snang ba'i sgo dang /_sangs 
[\[391a.5\]]rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa'i sgo dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi sgo dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sgo dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[391a.6\]]kyi sems can pha rol gyi sems thugs su chud pa'i sgo dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo dang /_dga' ldan gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa'i sgo nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba bstan pa'i bar gyi sgo dang /_sems 
[\[391a.7\]]can gyi don tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa mdzad pa'i sgo dang /_chos zab mo'i tshul gyi sgo dang /_chos sna tshogs kyi tshul gyi sgo dang /_byang chub kyi sems kyi chos kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang /_byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rnam pa'i chos kyi sgo dang /_byang chub kyi sems 
[\[391b\]]
[\[391b.1\]]kyi tshogs kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang /_smon lam gyi rnam pa'i sgo dang /_spyod pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang /_mngon par shes pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang /_'byung ba'i rnam pa'i sgo dang /_gzungs rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang /_ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam 
[\[391b.2\]]par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang /_shes rab yongs su dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang /_byang chub tshad [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang /_dran pa rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dag ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i 
[\[391b.3\]]rgyud dran pas kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di shes par zad na/_kho mos byang chub sems dpa' sems nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/_blo gros chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs pa/_rgyud bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis brtan pa/_'jig 
[\[391b.4\]]rten las 'das pa'i lam du zhugs pa/_'jig rten gyi chos yongs su [{]myi [,]mi [}]rgyu ba/_ye shes snang ba'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]rab rib [{]myed [,]med [}]pa rab tu thob pa/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad mun pa [{]myed [,]med [}]par khong du chud pa/_blo nam mkha' ltar tshad med pa dang 
[\[391b.5\]]ldan pa/[ {]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i [{]myig [,]mig [}]can/_chags pa med pa'i snang ba'i snying po dang ldan pa/_chos thams cad kyi don rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa/_zil gyis gnon la/_'jig rten kun gyi zil gyis mi non pa/_
[\[391b.6\]]'jig rten gyi spyod pa'i tshul la rnam par spyod pa/_'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad na kha na ma tho ba med pa/_'jig rten gyi don byed pa la brtson pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi ngag gi tshul dang /_rnam 
[\[391b.7\]]pa la mkhas pa/_'gro ba thams cad du gnas pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/_bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa ston pa/_dus kyi 'khor lo thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod 
[\[392a\]]
[\[392a.1\]]par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu/_lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul [{]myig [,]mig [}]gsum pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de na dge slong blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/_de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas 
[\[392a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]bu mo byams ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_bu mo byams ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas 
[\[392a.3\]]phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/_bu mo byams ma'i drung nas song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rnam par spyod pa zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi zab mo 
[\[392a.4\]]khong du chud par bya ba rjes su bsam pa dang /_sems can gyi ye shes shin tu phra zhing zab pa rjes su bsam pa dang /_'jig rten gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam 
[\[392a.5\]]pa dang /_sems kyi rgyud kyi dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi rnam par 
[\[392a.6\]]dpyod pa bden pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings brgyan pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang /_lus kyi 'khrul 'khor shugs kyis 'khor ba'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang /_las kyis sna tshogs 
[\[392a.7\]]su gyur pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa byed cing mthar gyis yul [{]myig [,]mig [}]gsum pa gang na ba der phyin te/_yul gyi 'khor dang /_grong khyer gyi 'khor dang /_tshong dus kyi 'khor dang /_grong rdal gyi 'khor dang /_yul gru'i 'khor dang /_lhas kyi 
[\[392b\]]
[\[392b.1\]]'khor dang /_drang srong dge ba sbyong ba'i gnas kyi 'khor dang /_yul dang phyogs kyi 'khor dang /_chu'i rgyud kyi 'khor dang /_ri'i sal sul gyi 'khor dang /_nags tshal chen po'i 'khor dag tu dge slong blta na sdug pa yongs su tshol tshol ba las des dge slong 
[\[392b.2\]]blta na sdug pa nags tshal stug po zhig na/_gzhon zhing dar la bab pa/_gzugs mdzes shing sdug la blta ba yid du 'ong ba/_skra mthon ting g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa/_mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/_gtsug tor gyi spyi bo can/_
[\[392b.3\]]'phral ba yangs pa/[ {]myig [,]mig [}]dkar nag 'byes shing rid la/_rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma ltar 'dug pa/_sna'i dbyibs legs shing bzang la/_ran par mdzes pa dang ldan pa/_mchu mtshal ltar mdog bzang shing shin tu legs pa dang ldan pa/_so mnyam zhing 
[\[392b.4\]]thags bzang la/_shin tu dkar ba bzhi bcu tshang ba dang ldan pa/_'gram pa'i lha nga seng ge ltar 'dug pa/_mkhur ba shas gang zhing rgyas pa/_smyin tshugs gzhu ltar 'dug cing ring la/_shin tu mdzes pa/_mdzod spu zla ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i thig le can/_
[\[392b.5\]]rna shal ring zhing lhod par 'phyang ba/_zla ba nya ba ltar bzhin mdangs dang ldan zhing shin tu bzang ba/_mgul zlum zhing dung ltar mdzes pa/_snying ka dpal gyi be'us brgyan pa/_ro stod seng ge'i ro stod ltar 'dug pa/_thal gong shin tu rgyas pa/_dpung ma go'i 
[\[392b.6\]]lhun legs shing zlum pa/_lag pa ring la/_dra bas 'brel pa'i sor mo can/_rka lag 'khor los brgyan pa/_rka lag 'jam zhing gzhon la shas rgyas pa/_bdun shin tu mtho ba/_rked pa rdo rje ltar 'dug pa/_lus che zhing drang ba/_brla zlum pa/_pho mtshan 
[\[392b.7\]]gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug pa/_byin pa [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e ne ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug pa/_sor mo ring ba/_rkang pa'i rting ba yangs pa/_'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan pa/_mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa/_ba spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su gyen du 
[\[393a\]]
[\[393a.1\]]'khyil ba/_shing n+ya gro da'i rgyal po ltar chu zheng gab pa/_lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa/[ {]myig [,]mig [}{]myi [,]mi [}]'gebs shing mi rgod pa/_dran pa nye bar gnas pa/_ri'i rgyal po kha ba can ltar rtswa dang /_nags tshal dang /_sman dang 
[\[393a.2\]]shing phran sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_blo shin tu yangs pa/_ye shes kyi spyod yul dang /_yul la thub pa [{]myed [,]med [}]pa/_dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan sprin gyi sgra lta bu dang ldan pa/_g.yo ba dang /_rlom sems dang /_g.yeng ba dang spros pa thams cad dang bral 
[\[393a.3\]]ba'i sems dang ldan pa/_ye shes kyi spyod yul ma 'dres pa/_sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po'i snang ba thob pa/_sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba dang /_gdul ba'i bsam pa rgyun [{]myi [,]mi [}]'chad pa/_snying rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor shin tu 
[\[393a.4\]]yangs pa skyes pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul yongs su gzung ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi ye shes snang ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul rjes su dran zhing 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du 'chag pa la 
[\[393a.5\]]zhugs te/_drag dal [{]myed [,]med [}]cing pad ral med la shin tu mdzes par 'chag pa/_gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i gos dang ldan pa/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_brgya byin 
[\[393a.6\]]dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi mgon po dang /[ {]myi [,]mi [}]dang [{]myi [,]mi [}]ma yin pas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong ngo /_/dge slong blta na mdzes pa de 'chag pa'i tshe/_phyogs mngon du gyur pa'i phyogs kyi lha rnams phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su bsgrub pa byed do/_/
[\[393a.7\]]rkang gis 'gro ba'i lha rnams rin po che'i pad+mos gom pa 'dor ba'i tshe/_yongs su blang bar byed do/_/[{]mye'i [,]me'i [}]lha snang ba'i dkyil 'khor zad [{]myi [,]mi [}]shes pa rnams kyang /_mun pa dang rab rib rnam par sel to/_/'dzam bu rgyal mtshan gyi nags tshal gyi lha rnams 
[\[393b\]]
[\[393b.1\]]kyang me tog mang po'i char mngon par 'bebs so/_/sa'i lha mi g.yo ba'i snying po can rnams kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas mang po ston to/_/nam mkha'i lha kun nas snang ba'i dpal dang ldan pa rnams kyang nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su brgyan pa byed do/_/rgya mtsho'i lha 
[\[393b.2\]]dpal kun nas 'byung ba rnams kyang rin po che dam pa mang pos mngon par 'thor to/_/ri rab kyi lha dri ma med pa'i snying po can rnams kyang thal mo sbyar cing phyag 'tshal to/_/rlung gi lha thogs pa med pa'i stobs can rnams kyang /_spos dang /_bdug spos dang /_
[\[393b.3\]]me tog 'thor ba'i rlung rab tu 'gyed do/_/mtshan mo'i lha gnas par byed pa lus shin tu brgyan pa rnams kyang lus shin tu btud cing phyag 'tshal to/_/nyin mo'i lha rtag tu sad par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor can rnams kyang nor bu rin po che phyogs snang 
[\[393b.4\]]bar byed pa'i rgyal mtshan thogs shing /_snang ba bskyed pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings la 'khod do/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dge slong blta na sdug pa gang na ba der phyin nas/_dge slong blta na sdug pa'i rkang pa'i bol gnyis la spyi bos 
[\[393b.5\]]gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/_dge slong blta na sdug pa'i rkang pa'i bol gnyis la bzhin sbyar te/_legs par phyin nas mdun du 'dug ste/_thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/'phags pa bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[393b.6\]]tu yang dag par zhugs nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba zhig lags te/_'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang /_rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/_'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas 
[\[393b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang /_ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/_des smras pa/_rigs kyi bu/_kho bo ni tshes btab na dar la bab pa/_rab tu byung bas btab na gsar du zhugs pa ste/_rigs 
[\[394a\]]
[\[394a.1\]]kyi bu/_kho bos ni tshe de 'dra ba gcig gis de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gang+gA sum cu rtsa brgyad kyi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/_bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zham ring du ni nyin zhag gcig du tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad 
[\[394a.2\]]do/_/la lar ni nyin zhag bdun du/_la lar ni zla ba phyed du/_la lar ni zla ba gcig tu/_la lar ni lo gcig tu/_la lar ni lo brgyar/_la lar ni lo stong du/_la lar ni lo brgya phrag stong du/_la lar ni lo bye bar/_la lar ni lo bye 
[\[394a.3\]]ba khrag khrig du/_la lar ni lo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par/_la lar ni bskal pa bar mar/_la lar ni bskal pa phyed du/_la lar ni bskal par/_bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zham ring du ni/_bskal pa 
[\[394a.4\]]brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de/_bskal pa bgrang ba'i tshul 'di nyid kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las chos bstan pa thos te/_gdams ngag dang /_rjes su bstan pa yang dag 
[\[394a.5\]]par blangs so/_/smon lam gyi rgyun yongs su sbyangs so/_/yang dag par bsgrub pa'i yul la zhugs so/_/spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyangs so/_/pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs par byas so/_/
[\[394a.6\]]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa/_yongs su shes par byas so/_/de dag gi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba phan tshun ma 'dres pa dag kyang yongs su bzung ngo /_/de dag gi stobs mnyam pa nyid kyang /_
[\[394a.7\]]khong du chud par byas so/_/de dag gis bstan pa yang dam pa'i chos zad pa'i mthar thug gi bar du yongs su bzung ngo /_/kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rnams kyang smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 
[\[394b\]]
[\[394b.1\]]'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs kyis rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrubs so/_/kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams kyang spyod pa thams cad la 
[\[394b.2\]]'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i stobs kyis rang gi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par bsgrubs so/_/kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa yang kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas 'byung ba'i 
[\[394b.3\]]stobs kyis mngon par bsgrubs so/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu/_kho bo 'chag sa 'di na 'chag pa'i tshe/_phyogs kyi rgyud kyi sgo thams cad kyang shin tu rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi sgos mngon du 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[394b.4\]]kyi rgyud kyi sgo thams cad kyang /_smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis sems bskyed pa gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i'ang brjod du med pa 'da' zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir rnam par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/sems kyi 
[\[394b.5\]]skad cig gcig la sems can gyi spyod pa'i tshul gyi sgo brjod du med pa'i yang /_brjod du med pa dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis stobs bcu'i 
[\[394b.6\]]ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/sems bskyed pa gcig la sangs rgyas brjod du [{]myed [,]med [}]pa'i yang /_brjod du med pa mthong ba rnam par dag pa dag kyang snga phyi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa'i smon lam mngon 
[\[394b.7\]]par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang /_brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur ba dang /_rim gro bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[395a\]]
[\[395a.1\]]sems bskyed pa gcig la de bzhin gshegs pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char rnams kyang chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs dang /_smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis/_chos kyi tshul grangs 
[\[395a.2\]]med pa rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir bsam pa la mngon par 'bab bo/_/sems bskyed pa gcig la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa [{]myig [,]mig [}]'phrul lta bur yongs 
[\[395a.3\]]su rdzogs par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro/_/sems bskyed pa gcig la ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang ting 
[\[395a.4\]]nge 'dzin gyi sgo gcig tu ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad yang dag par 'du bar bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro/_/sems bskyed pa gcig la dbang po rgya mtsho brjod du med 
[\[395a.5\]]pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang dran pa'i mthar phyin pa'i dbang po thob par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis dbang po'i 'khor lo dang /_dus kyi 'khor lo thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro/_/sems bskyed pa gcig la dus kyi 
[\[395a.6\]]'khor lo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang sems can zad mi shes pa zad par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis dus thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro/_/sems bskyed pa gcig la dus rgya mtsho 
[\[395a.7\]]brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa thams cad kyang dus gcig tu rnam par dgod pa'i tshul khong du chud pa'i ye shes snang ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dus gsum rnam par dgod pa'i phyir mngon 
[\[395b\]]
[\[395b.1\]]sum du 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa shin tu zhi bar mi 'gyur ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba 'di shes par zad na/_kho bos byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje lta bu dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[395b.2\]]cad kyi rigs su rigs dang ldan par byung ba dang /_srog gi dbang po la rgyun chad pa med pa/_ye shes kyi sgron ma zhi bar 'gyur ba med pa/_mi shigs mi phyed pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bu'i gzugs shin tu grub pa/_rgyu'i chos 
[\[395b.3\]]dang mnyam pa'i yan lag dang /_nying lag tu ldan pa'i lus can 'gro ba rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]par byed pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_'gro ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang lus dang kha dog dang /_dbyibs dang 
[\[395b.4\]]chu zheng yongs su ston pa/_me ma dag dang me lce dang /_dug dang mtshon gyis mi tshugs pa'i lus dang ldan pa rdo rjes ltar sra zhing khor yug ltar thug pa med pa'i lus can/_bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi stobs kyi stobs med par byed pa/_
[\[395b.5\]]'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi ri bo dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_'gro ba thams cad du rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa/_sgo thams cad du rnam par [{]dmyigs [,]dmigs [}]shing thos par 'gyur ba/_'gro ba thams 
[\[395b.6\]]cad kyi ngor blta ba/_chos thams cad kyi sprin gyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa/_phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba sgrib pa'i ri thams cad rnam par gtor bas blta na mdzes pa mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad shin tu 'joms pas shin tu dpa' bar snang ba dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[395b.7\]]rgya chen po'i rgyu 'thun pa las byung bas blta na dga' ba 'byung bar shin tu dka' zhing dkon pas me tog u dum bA ra lta bu de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/_yon tan brjod par nus re skan/_/song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na yul dge sbyong gi 
[\[396a\]]
[\[396a.1\]]dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba na grong khyer sgo bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/_de na khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug ces bya ba 'dug gis/_de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang /_ji ltar nan 
[\[396a.2\]]tan du bya ba dris shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang /_nan tan rnam par dag par bya ba la brtson pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i stobs snang bas sems shin tu snang bar gyur pa/_byang chub sems 
[\[396a.3\]]dpa'i brtan pa gzhan gyis mi thub cing brgal thag chad pa'i snying dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi go cha [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]pos sems zhum pa med pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa brtan pas kun tu gnas shing yongs su 'phel bar 'gyur ba 
[\[396a.4\]]la brtson pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sprin gyi char yongs su 'dzin pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char gyis yongs su mi ngoms pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad la 'jug pa'i smon 
[\[396a.5\]]lam la mngon du gyur pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi kha lo bsgyur bas yongs su sdud par bdag nyid yongs su gtong bar 'dod pa 'gro ba thams cad 'khor ba'i dgon pa chen po las bzla bar 'dod pa/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba dang /_
[\[396a.6\]]mnyan pa dang /_bsnyen bkur bas yongs su mi ngoms pa/_chos kyi rim gro tshad med pa bskyed pa dang ldan pa des/_dge slong blta na sdug pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_dge slong blta na sdug pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas 
[\[396a.7\]]phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/_yang dang yang bltas te/_dge slong blta na sdug pa'i drung nas song ngo //_//
